name: Kurhotel Skodsborg
address: Skodsborg Strandvej 139, 2942 Copenhagen, Capital Region
description: Kurhotel Skodsborg offers two restaurants on site and free parking. The spa features a sauna and hot tub. A wide range of massage, spa and beauty treatments can also be booked. Copenhagen is just a 20 minutes' drive away. At Kurhotel Skodsborg, all rooms include a TV, seating area and private bathroom. WiFi is free. The sea-view restaurant offers modern Nordic fine dining with seasonal ingredients, herbs from the garden and freshly-baked breads. The comprehensive wine list completes the dining experience. The Brasserie offers more casual dining yet still focused on local produce. In the lobby, guests can take a coffee break, browse the reading collection or simply relax. Bicycles can be rented on site. Skodsborg Strand Park is 250 metres away. Skodsborg Station is a 10-minute walk from Skodsborg Kurhotel.

name: Enjoy Resorts Marina Fiskenæs
address: Fiskenæsvej 2, 6300 Gråsten, South Denmark
description: This South Jutland property is on the Fiskenæs peninsula, 1 km from central Gråsten. It offers accommodation with a fully-equipped kitchen and free WiFi. Leisure options include a water park and a free gym and spa. All apartments and holiday homes at Enjoy Resort Marina Fiskenæs feature a living room with digital TV and a DVD player. Guests can also enjoy a dishwasher and washing machine. Communal facilities include a restaurant, a private beach area and a climbing wall. A sauna, steam room and cold bath are among the spa facilities offered, and guests can book beauty treatments on site. A playground and playroom are available for younger guests. Enjoy Resort Marina is within 20 minutes’ drive of Dybbøl Banke Museum, while Gråsten Castle, royal summer residence, is just a 5-minute drive away. On-site parking is free.

name: W Ibiza
address: Carrer Ricardo Curtoys Gotarredona, 37, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Much anticipated and off the beaten track, W Ibiza luxury beach hotel strikes a pose on the palm-fringed, sand-drenched beachfront of Santa Eulalia. The seasonal escape mixes the parallel realities of Ibiza with a magnetic pull that turns up the sass. This is where you get to stay and play with a brand that was made for the White Isle. Sun-kissed and diverse, Ibiza is more than an island, it’s a brand. This is where flower power meets club culture and myths, legends and nature amplify the compulsive, enigmatic spirit. As the third largest town, Santa Eulalia totally owns its relaxed pace and cosmopolitan attitude. Offering up a heady mix of local art galleries, trendy boutiques and amazing dining, alongside gorgeous beaches and dive-deep sea. Just 21km from Ibiza Airport, you can style it out among the chic marina and hotspots in no time. Worried about leaving your furry friends behind? Bring them along! Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets.Marriott

name: ME Ibiza
address: Urbanización S'Argamassa, 153, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Situated right in front of the beach and offering multiple swimming pools, a spa with contemporary beauty treatments, and beautiful ocean views, ME Ibiza hotel is located in S'Argamassa. Free Wi-Fi is available. This stylish and elegant hotel offers a variety of room types, including ground floor suites with direct pool access, sun loungers, private gardens and other exclusive benefits. Some suites have wonderful views of the sea. A free bottle of water is provided in all rooms. All rooms provide Smart TV with Chromecast. The Rooftop offers dazzling views, an infinity-style pool and Balinese beds, available only for adults. The ground floor presents an upbeat environment with daily DJs, Balinese beds and a poolside menu. Thai Room Spa Wellness offers Thai treatments. RADIO Rooftop bar offers Mediterranean cuisine and cocktails, with sea views while at Bianco Mare Restaurant guests can enjoy authentic Italian cuisine from organic ingredients and Origens Restaurant combines characterful Ibizan bohemian style with imaginative interpretations of classic Mediterranean dishes. Fresh ingredients and local specialities for lunch and dinner. The property offers a fitness area and free private parking. Complimentary yoga sessions are offered daily, on request and subject to availability. There is a Kids' Club. Nikki Beach Ibiza is located beside the hotel. Es Cana tourist resort is just 1.5 km away, and Ibiza town is 12 km from the property. Ibiza Airport is a 35-minute drive from the hotel. You can also hire a private boat to the beautiful neighbouring island of Formentera, on request and subject to availability. The hotel offers free valet parking.

name: Aguas de Ibiza Lifestyle & Spa
address: Salvador Camacho, 14, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: The new Aguas de Ibiza Lifestyle and Spa Hotel is the new concept of 5* luxury hotels with 112 rooms designed and managed by the Torres family as an expression of their worship of Ibiza. It is located in Santa Eulalia del R?o a few distance of Ibiza, beside the new congress palace. The hotel has modern facilities for any event, a restaurant with traditional cuisine, a chill out area, Air Ibiza and a bar.priceline.com

name: 7Pines Resort Ibiza
address: Calle Puig Delfin, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in Sant Josep de sa Talaia in the Ibiza Region, 18 km from Ibiza Town, 7Pines Resort Ibiza, part of Destination by Hyatt is surrounded by pine trees and boasts views of Es Vedrà Island, has three pools in total including one outdoor pool in our public area of the spa centre. Each Suite at this resort is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a seating area for your convenience. All suites feature a terrace or balcony, and some have a private pool. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. We are provided by three restaurants and three bars: - The View, awarded by 1 Sol by 2023 Repsol Guide and included in the 2023 MICHELIN Guide (Spain & Portugal) offers a fine dining experience with an elevated and sublime tasting menu with a Nordic twist. - Cone club offer dazzling evening during the most popular sunset in Ibiza where guests can drinks exquisite cocktails accompained by nice tapas and a comfort food menu - Pershing Yacht Terrace is the place where modern Asian cuisine meets signature drinks in a sophisticated atmosphere and exceptional setting with infinite views to the Mediterranean Sea. The resort has a 1.500 m2 area with two saunas, a steam bath, showers and waterbeds. The Laguna area is a place where families enjoy in a fantastic pool adapted to kids next to a food truck and our sustainable Kids Club concept, KIO. This resort offers water sports facilities for an extra charge, and bike hire is available. San Antonio is 7 km from 7Pines Resort Ibiza, part of Destination by Hyatt, while Playa d'en Bossa is 17 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 22 km from the property.

name: Bg Hotel Pamplona
address: C/ Neopatria, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Palma de Mallorca, Hotel Pamplona offers modern 4-star accommodation, as well as a private beach, a sauna and an outdoor pool. It provides a spa, as well as free Wi-Fi, body treatments and a kids pool. Hotel Pamplona Palma treats guests to a range of leisure facilities, including billiards, bicycle rental and Swimming Pool. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. Hotel Pamplona has 165 well-appointed rooms, each with an en suite bathroom. The traditional bar is an ideal place to relax with a beverage after a meal at the restaurant, which offers international cuisine for dinner. Breakfast is available 7 days a week and room service can be requested. Guests are also able to try one of the many bars and restaurants in the vicinity. Hotel Pamplona Palma is surrounded by the area's popular tourist attractions, including Palma Aquarium, which is a short walk away. Visit Mallorca StadiumVisit Mallorca Stadium is within an easy drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Hotel Ciutat Jardi
address: Illa De Malta 14, 07007 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Housed in a stunning, early 19th-century mansion, this beachfront hotel is surrounded by lovely, tropical gardens. The centre of Palma de Mallorca is less than 15 minutes' drive away. Spend the day relaxing by the outdoor swimming pool in this attractive, colonial-style hotel. Grab a sun lounger and take advantage of the sunshine on the terrace. In the summer months, you can take breakfast on the terrace of Ciutat Jardi, and kick start your day in the warm, morning sunshine. Palma de Mallorca can easily be reached by car, public transport or bicyle.

name: Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only
address: Paseo De Illetas, 7, 07184 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Situated on the sea front in Illetas, Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only is set within beautiful gardens and features a small exclusive beach. This stylish Hotel features 2 outdoor pools, a sun terrace and an extensive spa with pool. Each of the bright, air-conditioned rooms at the Meliá has stylish, modern décor, a flat-screen TV with Chromecast and a special pillow menu. Rooms also feature balconies with sea views. Red Level guests enjoy additional, exclusive services such as special discount in the parking, VIP check-in, free Nespresso coffee, free access to the Spa's thermal circuit and access to the Red Level lounge with free drinks. For an additional charge, guests have access to the SPA BY CLARINS, where health and beauty treatments are available. The spa includes a Finnish sauna, Turkish bath, hot water indoor pool and a hot tub. The fitness center is available 24 hours and it is free of charge. Hotel de Mar Gran Meliá - Adults Only has 4 restaurants, including the the Amaro Lounge, which offers light food, drinks and cocktails, a poolside restaurant Bardot, specializing in fresh fish, rice dishes and seafood meals. Arrels by Marga Coll is a fine dining restaurant offering tasting menus, with a beautiful terrace and sea views, serving traditional Mallorcan cuisine with a modern twist, and is only open for dinner. Perseo offers a delicious breakfast buffet with show cooking. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from Portals Nous Marina and central Palma is just 7 km away. Bendinat Golf Club is a 10-minute walk from the Meliá.

name: Zel Mallorca
address: Carrer Duc Estremera, 16, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located on Majorca's south coast, in the Palmanova beach area, Zel Mallorca exudes Mediterranean charm and essence. The unique entrance is a distinctive feature: its courtyard welcomes you in a cozy atmosphere. The rooms are designed in a locally inspired style and offer stunning sea views. Its swimming pools offer sea views, one of them has direct access to the beach. The hotel encourages a healthy, active and relaxed lifestyle and features a fully equipped gym. To maximize your wellbeing there is a spa and a full activities programme, which includes yoga retreats and fitness. A wide range of sports activities are also available, such as tennis, golf, scuba diving, etc. Reconnect with your inner self at Zel Mallorca, your Mediterranean home

name: Hotel Son Caliu Spa Oasis
address: Avenida De Son Caliu 8, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Son Caliu Hotel Spa Oasis is conveniently located in the popular Calvia area. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, postal service, 24-hour front desk are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, additional bathroom, additional toilet, private pool, internet access wireless (complimentary). To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as yoga room, hot tub, fitness center, sauna, golf course (on site). No matter what your reasons are for visiting Majorca, Son Caliu Hotel Spa Oasis will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: Hotel Illa d'Or & Illa d’Or Club Apartments
address: Passeig De Colon, 265, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Hotel Illa d'Or & Illa d’Or Club Apartments is located on the beachfront of Puerto Pollensa. The hotel boasts an outdoor pool with sea views. The fully equipped apartments feature a balcony, while the rooms include air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a safe. The hotel offers a buffet breakfast and free in-room breakfast while at dinner guests can have a fine meal from the a là carte menu. We suggest correct and adequate dress in the dining room and trust that gentlemen will understand the request not to wear shorts or T-shirts at dinner. In the summer months it is possible to have breakfast on the terrace. The Sunset Bar serves snacks and cocktails. Hotel Illa d'Or & Illa d’Or Club Apartments has a spa where guests can enjoy facial and body treatments, massages, pedicures and manicures. The spa has an indoor pool, hot tub, sauna, a Turkish bath and much more.

name: Hotel Agua Beach
address: Paseo del Mar, 24, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Hotel Agua Beach "Adults only" - Adults Only is situated next to Majorca’s Palma Nova Beach, just 150 metres from Palma Nova centre. It offers free Wi-Fi in public areas and a shared pool. Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Agua Beach "Adults only" - Adults Only includes satellite TV and a safe. Amenities and a hairdryer are included in the private bathrooms. Some rooms have a balcony with views of the sea. Hotel Agua Beach "Adults only" has a buffet restaurant with extensive wine list. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the lounge bar or outside on the seafront terrace. The hotel offers a varied entertainment programme. The Agua Beach - Adults Only is just a 5-minute walk from many of Palma Nova’s lively bars and discos. Palma is 14 km away, and there are various golf courses within a 10-minute drive of the hotel.

name: Hotel Bon Sol Resort & Spa
address: Paseo De Illetas, 30, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: This enchanting, family-run hotel overlooks the Bay of Palma, nestling amongst pine trees and tropical gardens. Descend through these gardens to the rock-lined pools and the secluded beach below. At the top of the Bon Sol you will find a Moorish tower offering amazing views across this picturesque bay in southern Majorca. From here, you can head down through the lush gardens, passing by the sun terraces, scenic swimming pools, spa facilities and down to the small, sandy beach on the Mediterranean Sea. Other great facilities include tennis courts and a winter conservatory. Inside, the Arabian-influenced decor, antique-style furniture and precious artwork combine to give the feel of a Medieval castle. This unique atmosphere is made more welcoming by the informal, family atmosphere.

name: Hotel Coronado Thalasso & Spa
address: Carretera Cala Fornells, 80, Calvià, Mallorca
description: Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools and a fitness center. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).#Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon We have adult only area: SPA, gym, Panoramic Pool, Panoramic Restaurant and the Pool Suite do not admit children.Expedia

name: Hotel Es Molí
address: Carretera De Valldemossa-Dei#192, 07179 Deia, Mallorca
description: Set on a hilltop in north-west Majorca, Es Moli is set in a 17th-century mansion with panoramic views of the sea, Deià village and the Tramuntana Mountains. It has a 32-meter fresh-water pool and an access to the sea, Sa Muleta(rocky cove) located 9Km from the Hotel. Four times a day, the hotel offers a free shuttle to Sa Muleta. There you can find a snack-bar, loungers and changing facilities. Muleta, access to the sea IMPORTANT INFORMATION: There is a limited capacity, we therefore kindly ask you to reserve your access to Muleta in advance on recepcion@esmoli.com or at the desk during your stay. A reservation will be required for the access. We herewith inform you that, in accordance to regulations, as from now, sunbeds cannot be placed at a distance which is less than 15 metres from the sea. There is a limited number of sunbeds. The Hotel Es Moli rooms offer: free WIFI, air conditioning, desk, safe, tea and coffee making facilities, satellite TV, telephone, mini bar, room service (only available in the main building). Guests can enjoy lunch by the pool at Sa Font d'es Moli Restaurant, and dinner at the Es Jardi á la carte restaurant or at the Tapas-Bar (closed Thursday´s). Leisure facilities at Es Molí Deia include more than 15.000sqm garden, well equiped GYM and a tennis court. Palma de Mallorca and its airport are around 30 minutes’ drive from Hotel Es Molí.

name: Cap Rocat
address: Ctra. d'Enderrocat, 07609 Llucmajor, Mallorca
description: Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World is a former military fortress, carefully restored to offer 5-star luxury accommodation. The hotel offers wonderful views of the Mediterranean Sea and the Majorcan countryside. Hotel Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World is set in a quiet area of Palma Bay, near Cala Blava. The hotel has direct access to the sea. There is also an outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace. The hotel offers a Spa which guests can use for free, and a Hammam at an extra cost. There are also tennis courts and a fitness centre with a personal training service. Outdoor yoga and pilates classes are also offered. Rooms at the hotel offer a private balcony, air conditioning and a minibar. They also come with a bathrobe and slippers, as well as a CD and DVD player. Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World’s restaurant serves fresh Mediterranean food. The hotel also offers large public lounges and patios. Free Wi-Fi access is available in all areas. For safety reasons due to the unique architecture of the fortress, Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World cannot accommodate children younger than 15 years old.

name: Iberostar Playa de Muro
address: Avenida Albufera, 07408 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Iberostar Playa de Muro has an ideal setting overlooking Muro Beach, 100 metres from Albufera Nature Reserve. This resort has a main pool, two children's pools and an indoor pool in the Spa area, a spa and rooms with balconies. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. The Playa de Muro features elegant décor throughout. Its rooms have TVs with satellite channels and a minibar. The hotel has 3 restaurants,1 snack bar with sea views and a food truck by the pool. The on-site spa features an indoor swimming pool, a hot tub, heated loungers, a rain-effect shower and 2 saunas. There is also a gym. A kid's club is available from May to October. Iberostar Playa de Muro offers unique services for cyclists and sports travelers. There is a repair shop, garage and a fully equipped gym. Bicycles are available for hire, there are special menus, sports shop and a dedicated team. S’Estany Gran Lake is just 15 minutes’ walk from the resort.

name: Europe Villa Cortes
address: Avenida Rafael Puig, 38, 38660 Arona, Tenerife
description: Europe Villa Cortes GL is located on the seafront in southern Tenerife’s Playa de las Américas resort. It offers a fitness room, spa, 6 restaurants and luxurious rooms with private balconies. The Villa Cortes GL is styled in the manner of a luxurious Mexican mansion. Rooms feature custom-made Mexican furniture, satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The Villa Cortes GL has a beach club restaurant and a variety of gourmet dining options. There are also 3 bars, including a beach bar. A buffet breakfast is offered and half-board rates include dishes from the specific daily menu of the half-board restaurant. The hotel’s outdoor pool features a waterfall and a children’s area. There is also a tennis court and a sun terrace with Balinese beds. Las Américas Golf Course is just 5 minutes’ drive from the Villa Cortés. Guests can also drive to Tenerife Sur Airport in 20-25 minutes. The hotel will remain completely closed for improvements to its facilities from May 2 to May 17, 2024

name: Maspalomas Princess
address: Avda. Tour Operador Tui, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: When you stay at Hotel Maspalomas Princess in San Bartolome de Tirajana, you'll be next to a golf course, a 5-minute drive from Maspalomas Dunes and 5 minutes from Yumbo Shopping Center. Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Limited parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Birdcage Gay Resort - Adult Only
address: Egipto, 10, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Aimed at gay men, the 4-star Birdcage G ay Resort men only Lifestyle Hotel is 5 minutes’ walk from the Yumbo Centre in Playa del Inglés. Set in tropical gardens, it features a nudist-friendly outdoor pool, hot tub, hammock and spa area. You choose between deluxe rooms and suites, some with a private garden and sun loungers. All have a fan, flat-screen satellite TV and DVD player, as well as a fridge and minibar. Bathrooms come with bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Suites have a separate bedroom and living room with a sofa. Rooms are studio style and feature air conditioning. A varied breakfast can be enjoyed daily on the terrace. There is a stylish lounge with a fireplace, where you can relax with a book from the library or a cocktail, tea or coffee. The spa offers massages, manicures, pedicures, hair styling and more in the garden massage temples or in your room. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are provided and an airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge. Playa del Inglés Beach is a 10-minute walk away and the famous Maspalomas Dunes is 2 km from the complex.

name: Sol Tenerife
address: Avenida Rafael Puig Llivina, 12, 38640 Arona, Tenerife
description: Sol Tenerife is located 200 metres from the beach in Tenerife’s Playa de las Américas Resort. It offers 3 outdoor pools with sun loungers, a tennis court and rooms with a furnished balcony with partial or front sea views. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Sol Tenerife feature tiled floors and cheerful colours. They are equipped with satellite TV, fridge, desk and chair. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. There is free WiFi available in all areas of the hotel. The hotel has a kids' club, hairdressers and supermarket on site. Sports facilities include a volleyball court and a small football pitch. There is also a massage service. The Tenerife Sol’s restaurant serves international buffet meals. There are also 2 bars, including a poolside bar. Las Américas Golf Course is 500 metres away from the hotel. Tenerife Sur Airport is 14 km away. You can take a boat to La Gomera Island in 35 minutes.

name: H10 Costa Adeje Palace
address: Playa La Enramada La Caleta, 38679 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Situated just 50 metres from La Enramada Beach in Tenerife, H10 Costa Adeje Palace features large outdoor pools, a hot tub and spa. The chic rooms include a furnished balcony. The hotel runs a free shuttle service to the popular resort of Playa de las Americas, 4 km away. Costa Adeje Golf Course is less than 2 km away. The hotel also offers golf packages and special green fees for some courses. The luxurious Despacio Spa Centre has a heated indoor pool, gym and Turkish bath. Guests can also book health and beauty treatments. A full programme of sport and other activities is available. H10 Costa Adeje Palace offers many dining options, including buffet and á la carte restaurants. There is a poolside bar

name: Hotel Ercilla de Bilbao, Autograph Collection
address: Ercilla, 37-39, 48011 Bilbao, Biscay
description: From industrial beginnings comes a city revitalized. An independent region with an independent soul.Infused by British soul. A place full of flavor, full of heart. Passionately revitalized by its people to signal the dawn of a new era.There is a place that stands out. Here you will find glamorous individualist rubbing shoulders with like-minded local;opening each others mind and awakening their senses. Where food and drink spark love, laughter and the fiery passion that´s within us all. It´s the best of Bilbao with all its proud British history. Passion for culture. Desire for flavor. And love for people are all ignited in one majestic destination.A new kind of hotel where you can experience 70´s glamour. Ercilla de Bilbao a hotel exactly like nothing else.Marriott

name: The Villas at Bahia del Duque
address: Avenida de Bruselas, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: With pool views, The Villas at Bahia del Duque is set in Adeje and has a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, bar, garden, sun terrace and children's playground. Both WiFi and private parking are available at the villa free of charge. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with bathrobes, bidet, bath and shower. A microwave, a fridge and minibar are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A continental breakfast is available every morning at The Villas at Bahia del Duque. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a spa facilities, wellness packages and beauty services. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at The Villas at Bahia del Duque, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near the villa include El Duque Beach, Enramada Beach and Playa de Fanabe. The nearest airport is Tenerife South, 21 km from The Villas at Bahia del Duque, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Alexandre Hotel Troya
address: Rafael Puig Lluvina, 2, 38670 Playa de las Américas, Tenerife
description: Set in tropical gardens, Alexandre Hotel Troya is located in Playa de las Americas beachfront. The hotel boasts an outdoor pool, spa and fitness center. The bright and modern rooms at the Troya Hotel include air conditioning, satellite TV and a balcony. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer. The hotel’s poolside Palapa Restaurant serves snacks, as well as Mediterranean and international cuisine. There is also a buffet restaurant and a cocktail lounge. There is a children’s play area and paddling pool at the hotel. Massage is available, and you can play billiards. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The Troya has easy access to the TF-1 Motorway, and Siam Water Park is a 5-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Sabbia by Gabbeach
address: Passeig De Neptuno, 30, 46011 Valencia, Valencia
description: Hotel Sabbia by Gabbeach brings a 360º proposal for your stay with high quality shows with dancers and live music. This stylish, design hotel is located next to Valencia's Las Arenas Beach, and it is just one minute's walk from Valencia Harbour. The themed rooms at Hotel Sabbia by Gabbeach feature unique, contemporary decor. All have a TV and bathroom. Some offer a terrace, sea or garden views and spa bath or shower. All have free fast broadband internet connection via WiFi and cable. Breakfast is served daily and the Sabbia by Gabbeach restaurant offers a fusion of modern international and Spanish cuisine. The hotel also has a pub which closes at 03:00. The property offers banquet facilities and meeting rooms. There are a number of bars, restaurants and shops on the same street as the Sabbia by Gabbeach. At Sabbia by Gabbeach we practice Hatha Yoga under the sun rays and the sea breeze. Buses to the centre pass from a stop opposite the hotel, and the Ciutat de les Arts i les Ciències is 3 km away. Ferries to Mallorca, Menorca and Ibiza all leave from the port. The Sabbia by Gabbeach is 300 metres from the Marina Real Tram Stop and Metro Station.

name: Hotel Panorama
address: Piazzale Santa Maria Elisabetta 1, 30126 Venice, Veneto
description: Hotel Panorama is located on Lido's waterfront, with a splendid view of the Lagoon and just opposite the water-bus stop for Venice. Rooms are elegant, bright, and cosy. WiFi is free. Panorama Hotel features a sun terrace, where drinks are served in spring and summer. The breakfast buffet includes croissants, cereals, packed jams and fresh fruit. The Panorama's friendly staff will be glad to suggest the best itineraries and ways to enjoy a unique Venetian stay.

name: Ausonia Hungaria Wellness & Lifestyle
address: Gran Viale S.M. Elisabetta 28, 30126 Venice, Veneto
description: Ausonia Hungaria is set in a building 250 metres from the beach and 5 minutes’ walk from the Vaporetto water bus stop. Modern rooms come with a flat-screen satellite TV. The hotel features the Lanna Gaia wellness centre, which includes sauna, Turkish bath and a range of massages. Staff are graduates of the prestigious Lanna Thai Academy in Thailand. The restaurant is specialised in traditional Italian cuisine. During the summer, guests can enjoy drinks on the terrace by the bar. The Ausonia Hungaria hotel is 9 km from Circolo Golf Venezia. St. Mark’s Square can be reached with a 15-minute ride on the vaporetto water bus.

name: B&B Una Terrazza sul Golfo di Sferracavallo
address: Via Torretta 58, 90147 Palermo, Sicily
description: Located in Sferracavallo in the Sicily region, with Lido di Sferracavallo and Barcarello Beach nearby, B&B Una Terrazza sul Golfo di Sferracavallo provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a hot tub. Every unit features a private bathroom and bidet, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a fridge. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy an Italian breakfast. Guests at B&B Una Terrazza sul Golfo di Sferracavallo can enjoy cycling nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Palermo Cathedral is 13 km from the accommodation, while Fontana Pretoria is 14 km away. The nearest airport is Falcone-Borsellino, 16 km from B&B Una Terrazza sul Golfo di Sferracavallo, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Grand Hotel Baia Verde
address: Via Angelo Musco, 8/10, 95021 Catania, Sicily
description: The 4-star Grand Hotel Baia Verde is set on volcanic rocks overlooking a natural bay, on the road between Acicastello and Catania. It offers an outdoor pool and a free gym. Baia Verde is surrounded by a garden with palm and pine trees and a semi-Olympic pool. It has a sun terrace built into the rocks, which features a staircase leading down to the sea. All rooms at Baia Verde come with elegant Italian furniture, a 32-inch HD LED TV with Sky channels, and a minibar. Many rooms also have a view of the Ionian Sea. The Oleandro Restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and traditional Sicilian and Mediterranean dishes at dinner. It has a wide selection of local wines and a sea-view terrace. The outdoor bar offers traditional Sicilian ice cream, snacks and drinks. The beauty centre is available for a variety of treatments and a free fitness centre is available for all guests.

name: Le Dune Sicily Hotel
address: Viale Kennedy, 10B, 95121 Catania, Sicily
description: Le Dune Sicily Hotel is only 2 km away from the city centre of Catania. It lies in an enchanting place between the golden sand of "de La Plaia" beach and a beautiful small Maritime pine forest. It perfectly fits into the landscape's colours with its Mediterranean style, set in this magnificent backdrop fully respecting the surrounding nature. Dune Sicily Hotel has a dining area for breakfast, a swimming pool, and surrounding garden.

name: NH Catania Parco Degli Aragonesi
address: Viale Kennedy Loc La Playa, 95121 Catania, Sicily
description: The NH Catania Parco Degli Aragonesi hotel is located in La Playa on Sicily’s East Coast. It sits just across the road from the beach but at same time is only a short 10-minute drive from the Catania Fontanarossa Airport and 3km from Catania’s city center. There are 124 rooms at NH Catania Parco Degli Aragonesi. With their neutral color scheme and hardwood floors, the rooms are cozy spaces in which to relax. Guests can enjoy the glorious Sicilian weather on their private balcony. Each morning, the hotel serves up a huge breakfast which includes a variety of foods and beverages. You can enjoy lunch and dinner both indoors and out at the Pietro D’Aragona restaurant, which features an Italian and Mediterranean menu. You may also choose to kick back with a drink at our sophisticated bar, where a simple snack menu is available. Enjoy the best Sicily has to offer at the hotel’s stunning private beach where umbrellas and sunbeds are free for guests to use. Alternatively, head to our swimming pool and sunbathe on the terrace. We can host your events with space for up to 280 guests in our 5 meeting rooms.NH Hoteles

name: Romano Palace Luxury Hotel
address: Viale Kennedy 28, 95121 Catania, Sicily
description: Just a 5-minute drive from Catania Fontanarossa Airport, the Romano Palace Luxury Hotel offers a beach-front location and peaceful gardens. It features a gourmet restaurant, a large pool and elegant rooms. The Romano Palace’s rooms are decorated with bright Mediterranean colours and traditional furnishings. Each has free Wi-Fi, a balcony, and a LCD TV with satellite channels. The Coriandolo restaurant serves Sicilian and classic Italian flavours, such as fresh swordfish, shellfish with saffron spice, and traditional Cannolo dessert. Guests can enjoy breakfast, including luxurious prosecco and strawberries, on the roof terrace, with views of Mount Etna. Catania Cathedral and Catania Harbour are 4 km from Hotel Romano Palace. The A18 Autostrada motorway is a 10-minute drive away. Guests can explore the Romano’s 25 hectares of gardens, or relax by the Arabian fountain. The pool includes a hydromassage feature. Valet parking and a hotel porter are available for free.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Catania Hotel and Conference Center
address: Via Antonello da Messina 45, Aci Castello, 95021 Catania, Sicily
description: Where You Want to Be. Blue skies and smiling faces greet you at the Four Points by Sheraton Catania Hotel and Conference Center, located on the breathtaking Cyclops Coast. Stroll across the street to the rocky beach and admire beautiful views. Visit Catania's celebrated sites, just 6 miles away and explore the rich history of Acireale and Taormina, at the foot of Mount Etna. This place offers the perfect combination of local hospitality, art and enviroinment. At the fON Art Gallery, art reigns supreme thanks to the great job of Fondazione Oelle. Fully accessible to all, even people with reduced mobility, the hotel offers 166 guest rooms and suites and all the amenities to enjoy your sicilian journey. After a full day, recharge in the fitness center, in the tennis court, in the wellness and beauty area of Arantia Rubra, take a dip by the pool or by the sea deck or dine surrounded by lemon trees sitting on the Chef's Table of our Horto Vegetable Garden for a unique taste experienceMarriott

name: B&B Morosoli Palace
address: 90 Via Androne, 95124 Catania, Sicily
description: No description found

name: Il Daviduccio
address: Via Sant'anna 20, 95100 Catania, Sicily
description: Located 600 metres from Catania Piazza Duomo, Il Daviduccio provides accommodation with a bar, a shared lounge and room service for your convenience. Complimentary WiFi is provided throughout the property. Rooms come with air conditioning and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a hot tub. The bed and breakfast offers a continental or buffet breakfast. Il Daviduccio features a terrace. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Roman Theatre of Catania, Casa di Verga and Ursino Castle. The nearest airport is Catania Fontanarossa Airport, 6 km from Il Daviduccio.

name: Le Palmette Suites
address: Via dei Villini 12, 09126 Cagliari, Sardinia
description: No description found

name: J44 Lifestyle Hotel
address: Via Dante Alighieri, 46, 30016 Jesolo, Veneto
description: Situated in Lido di Jesolo, 100 metres from Lido di Jesolo, J44 Lifestyle Hotel features accommodation with free bikes, private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a shared lounge and to a terrace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. All rooms have a wardrobe. The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options. At J44 Lifestyle Hotel you will find a restaurant serving Italian, Mediterranean and Seafood cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. You can play tennis at the accommodation, and the area is popular for cycling. Caribe Bay is 4.5 km from J44 Lifestyle Hotel, while Caorle Archaeological Sea Museum is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Venice Marco Polo Airport, 32 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Belair
address: Via Capo, 29, 80067 Sorrento, Naples
description: Set on the cliff tops and a 15-minute walk from the centre of Sorrento, Hotel Belair offers an outdoor pool, à la carte restaurant and elegant-style accommodation with a sea-view balcony. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Air-conditioned rooms at the 5-star Belair Hotel feature a satellite flat-screen TV, minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. A continental breakfast is provided daily and includes both hot and cold items. The on-site restaurant specialises in local cuisine and meals are served on one of the panoramic terraces with views of the Bay of Naples. Guests can enjoy the fitness centre and relax on the terrace with sun loungers. The property provides free private parking on site. Sorrento Train Station, where guests can catch trains to Naples, is 2 km away. Positano is a 30-minute drive away.

name: La Plage Resort
address: Via Nazionale 107/A, 98039 Taormina, Sicily
description: Overlooking the Ionian Sea, La Plage Resort is set directly on its free private beach, within the Isola Bella Nature Reserve. It features modern rooms and bungalows with garden or sea views. The cable way to the historic centre of Taormina is a 10-minute walk away. All accommodation comes with a modern design, air conditioning, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms have a balcony or patio, and some bungalows offer a private garden with hot tub. The Fusion restaurant specialises in traditional Sicilian cuisine, made with genuine local products. The bar serves international cocktails and spirits. A sweet Italian breakfast is available daily. La Plage provides a variety of beauty treatments and an outdoor massage gazebo. Expure Spa is complete with Turkish bath, hydromassage showers and chromotherapy. Staff can organise excursions to Mount Etna Regional Park, a 45-minute drive away. Parking is free.

name: Hotel Continental
address: Via Pagana, 8, 16038 Santa Margherita Ligure, Genoa
description: Overlooking the Bay of Santa Margherita Ligure and Portofino Promontory, Hotel Continental is surrounded by a landscaped garden leading to the beach. It features a fitness and wellness centre, and 2 restaurants. Continental Hotel's rooms are all equipped with free Wi-Fi and air conditioning. Some rooms have a private balcony with views of the garden or the sea. The restaurant with panoramic sea-view terrace serves buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner. Between May until October the small restaurant on the beach offers fresh fish, pasta, and salads. The Continental offers free use of the gym. The wellness centre includes a sauna, caldarium, and massage rooms. The hotel features both an indoor garage and a private outdoor parking.

name: Grand Hotel Royal
address: Via Correale 42, 80067 Sorrento, Naples
description: Featuring a private on-site beach and lush, palm-filled gardens, the Grand Hotel Royal is located on a cliff top in central Sorrento. It has an outdoor pool and panoramic views of the Gulf of Naples and Vesuvius. The rooms offer views of the sea, the gardens, or the town. Classically decorated with Sorrentine wooden furniture, each room has free WiFi and most include a marble bathroom and a balcony. In high season, guests enjoy free access to the beach, and free use of parasols, sun beds and beach towels. Inside, the lounges feature antique furniture, marbled staircases and crystal chandeliers. Grand Hotel Royal offers a complete gastronomic experience. It includes different on-site restaurants and bars serving regional and classic Italian cuisine. Several have panoramic views of the surrounding landscape. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Circumvesuviana Railway Station, which connects Sorrento with Naples, 50 km away. Pompeii and the Vesuvius National Park are a 40-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Lorelei Londres
address: Via Califano 2, 80067 Sorrento, Naples
description: Facing the beachfront, Hotel Lorelei Londres offers 5-star accommodation in Sorrento and has a garden, terrace and restaurant. Ideally located in the Sorrento City Centre district, this hotel provides a bar, as well as a hot tub. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while certain rooms also offer a balcony. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes Italian, vegetarian and vegan options. Popular points of interest near Hotel Lorelei Londres include Peter's Beach, Marameo Beach and Leonelli's Beach. The nearest airport is Naples International Airport, 49 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Riviera & Maximilians
address: Strada Costiera 22, 34151 Trieste, Trieste
description: Set on the Coast of Trieste just 800 metres from the picturesque Miramare Castle and Grignano Bay, Hotel Riviera & Maximilian’s offers direct access to the beach between late May and mid September. The hotel features a panoramic wellness centre. All with sea views, modern rooms of Riviera & Maximilian's Hotel are set in a renovated building dating back to 1898, or in a new wing with large panoramic windows. A lift will take you directly to the beach. The panoramic restaurant, Le Terrazze, serves local specialities and fresh seafood. In summer, dinner is served out on the terrace at sunset. Guests can also book the access to a wellness centre, that includes a sauna and a Turkish bath. The historic centre of Trieste is 9 km away.

name: Grand Hotel Ambasciatori
address: Via A Califano 18, 80067 Sorrento, Naples
description: The luxury Grand Hotel Ambasciatori is perched on a cliff overlooking the Tyrrhenian Sea in Sorrento. Offering views of the Bay of Naples from its rooftop terrace, it also has a private beach, garden with pool and free WiFi. Decorated with stucco ceilings, all rooms are very elegant and come with antique furniture and chairs or armchairs. Each one has an LCD TV and a balcony, some with beautiful sea views. Hotel Ambasciatori has a private beach with sunbathing terrace. In high season, guests enjoy free access to the beach, as well as free use of deck chairs, parasols and towels. A tennis court is available in the property's surroundings. Restaurant Le Muse serves traditional Italian, Neapolitan and international cuisine. Meals are served in the elegant dining room or on the terrace, both with views of the sea. There are 3 bars, one in the building, one by the pool, one at the bottom of the cliff. Snacks, drinks and cocktails, are available day and night. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Piazza Tasso, Sorrento’s main square. The pier for ferries to Capri island can be reached on foot in 15 minutes.

name: Grand Hotel Riviera
address: Via Califano 22/a, 80067 Sorrento, Naples
description: Grand Hotel Riviera is set on a cliff top looking out over the Gulf of Naples. Take the elevator down to its secluded private beach or bathe in the panoramic outdoor pool. Located just 500 metres from Sorrento's main square, Grand Hotel Riviera's beautiful gardens and terraces ensure you a peaceful and relaxing stay. The pool is surrounded by palms and eucalyptus trees and have views of the sea and Mount Vesuvius. Enjoy drinks at the snack bar before relaxing in the outdoor hot tub. Grand Hotel Riviera's beach is well-equipped with sun loungers, changing rooms, showers and a bar, and you can even go snorkelling here. Grand Hotel Riviera has an American bar with a grand piano, a restaurant serving international cuisine and a lounge with a huge sea-view terrace. Enjoy a rich buffet breakfast with fresh-baked local products here from 07:00 until 10:00. Local buses leave from close to Grand Hotel Riviera and you can organise a variety of activities at reception, from scuba-diving to boat rental.

name: Hotel Weber Ambassador
address: Via Marina Piccola 118, Capri, Naples
description: The 4-star Weber Ambassador overlooks the bay of Marina Piccola and the Faraglioni rocks. It offers a free shuttle to/from Capri centre, and free access to its 2 pools, hot tub and fitness centre. Spacious rooms are air conditioned, and feature an LCD TV and en suite bathroom. Most come with a balcony or terrace, and some have views of the Tyrrhenian Sea. Wi-Fi is available. The property is complete with 2 bars and an international à la carte restaurant specialising in fresh fish dishes. You can relax at the on-site hair salon, or take in the panoramic view from the terrace. A stairway from Hotel Weber Ambassador takes you directly to the beach shore.

name: Imperiale Palace Hotel
address: Via Pagana, 19, 16038 Santa Margherita Ligure, Genoa
description: An elegant, 19th-century villa, lush gardens, a private beach, and a spectacular view across the bay, these are just some of the reasons to choose Imperiale Palace Hotel. Once the residence of a noble family, this impressive villa has now been turned into a luxury hotel. It has a panoramic location in Santa Margherita Ligure, 5 km from Portofino and 3 km from Rapallo. Your room comes with air conditioning and Satellite TV, and some have a beautiful sea view. Throughout the summer you can relax on the private beach or at the sea-water pool with sunbathing terrace. You will also find a fitness centre, which includes a Turkish bath and a massage room. The Imperiale Palace features modern conference facilities with a maximum capacity of 200. The restaurant with sea-view terrace provides a special setting for a candlelit meal. In summer, lunch is served on the beach in the form of a rich buffet of local specialities and fresh fish.

name: The Pelican Beach Resort & Spa - Adults Only
address: Via Mar Adriatico, 34, 07026 Olbia, Sardinia
description: The Pelican Beach Resort & SPA is an adult-only hotel set right by the sea between Olbia and Golfo Aranci on the north-east coast of Sardinia. It offers a garden, wellness centre and access to a sandy beach. It consists of 2 buildings, 1 a few steps from the beach and the other 60 metres away. The Pelican Beach Resort & SPA - Adults Only also features an outdoor pool, sunbathing area, and a restaurant with a spacious terrace overlooking the sea. Dining on the terrace is available on request. The outdoor fitness area has views of the Tavolara Island. Rooms come with satellite TV and air conditioning and some also have a private balcony with table and chairs. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Scooters and cars can be rented at reception. Olbia is just 8 km away, while the airport and harbour can be reached in 15 minutes by car. Porto Cervo is approximately 30 km away.

name: Hotel C2
address: 48 Rue Roux De Brignoles, 13006 Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: Featuring a grand piano, HOTEL C2, located in the Pierre Puget courtyard in Marseille, is a 19th-century private mansion converted into a hotel. It features the original marble and parquet floors, columns, bas-relief sculptures, frescoes and bronze banisters, whilst offering a minimalist, contemporary twist. It opened in April 2014. The light and airy guest rooms are spacious with designer furnishings and have a private bathroom. A bar and meeting room. The hotel's specially-chartered boat leaves from the Vieux Port, and is available with the beach package. Each month the hotel also hosts art and photographic exhibitions and performances.

name: Hotel Cristal & Spa
address: 13-15 Rond-Point Duboys D'Angers, 06400 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Cristal Hôtel & Spa is located 200 metres from Boulevard de la Croisette and from the beaches. It offers 64 air-conditioned rooms. Free WiFi is available. The modern rooms at Cristal Hôtel & Spa are soundproofed and equipped with a telephone, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony and they all have wooden flooring. Bathrobes and slippers are included. A buffet breakfast is available in the morning. A wellness floor was added to the top floor of the hotel in July 2019. Guests benefit from free access to the indoor and outdoor pool with a massage jet and to the spa which features hammam, sauna and sun deck. Additional facilities include a 24-hour reception desk. Cannes’s main shopping street, Rue d’Antibes, is 60 metres from Cristal Hôtel & Spa. Cannes Train Station and Palais des Festivals de Cannes are a 10-minute walk away. Guests have access to on-site private parking for an additional cost.

name: Westminster Hotel & Spa Nice
address: 27 Promenade Des Anglais, Nice
description: Situated in the heart of Nice, on the Promenade des Anglais, Westminster Hotel & Spa features a spa and seafront terrace. The hotel is decorated in a Belle Epoque style and offers both a bar and luxury lounge areas. High-speed wired internet access and free WiFi are provided. There is also a fitness centre that guests can use free of charge. Guest rooms offer contemporary décor and are equipped with a flat-screen TV with free access to satellite channels and videos on demand. There is also a desk, a telephone with a direct line and voice mail, and an electronic lock and a safe. The air conditioning and heating systems are individually regulated in each room. Private bathrooms are marble or design concept and are equipped with a bath or shower, hairdryer and welcome products. A minibar is available and is at an extra charge. Restaurant Le Duc serves Mediterranean specialties which can be enjoyed on the hotel’s terrace, overlooking the Promenade des Anglais and the sea. A buffet breakfast is served daily and can be taken in the guestroom or on the terrace. Guests can enjoy a drink in Bar Le W, which also offers a terrace. Seven meeting and reception rooms are available at Hôtel Westminster. The SPA 27 offers a 400 m² a relaxation area with a sauna, steam bath, hot tub and counter-current swimming pool. There are 3 beauty treatment rooms, and guests can enjoy herbal tea or a fresh drink. The hotel is 15 minutes' drive from Nice Côte d'Azur Airport and only 14 minutes' walk from Nice-Ville train station.

name: Hotel Nice Riviera
address: 45 Rue Pastorelli, 06000 Nice
description: Hotel Nice Riviera is a 4-star hotel located in the heart of Nice, just 650 metres from the Promenade des Anglais, the flower market and the old city. It offers a fitness room and for an additional fee of EUR 10 per person, for one hour, guests have access to a wellness centre with a heated swimming pool and a sauna. Guest rooms at Hotel Nice Riviera feature environmentally friendly, bamboo parquet flooring and colourful cushions and bed throws. Each room has an en suite bathroom with toiletries. A buffet breakfast is served daily for EUR 18 per person in the hotel’s luminous breakfast room or in the comfort of guest rooms. The hotel's lounge bar, Riviera Café invites guests to use the free WiFi or enjoy a drink by the fireplace. Ideally located in the city center, the hotel has a private secured underground parking (maximum height 1m90) for a daily rate of EUR 25. Hotel Nice Riviera is located 1 km from Nice Train Station and a 15-minute drive from Nice Airport. Place Massena and Vieux Nice are 500 meters away. It is the ideal starting point to discover Nice and its surroundings.

name: Splendid Hotel & Spa Nice
address: 50 Boulevard Victor Hugo, Nice
description: Located in Nice's City Centre, Splendid Hotel & Spa Nice is a 4-star hotel just 600 metres from the Promenade des Anglais. The seasonal rooftop swimming pool and hot tub offer panoramic mountain and city views. The spa features a hammam and guests also have free access to the fitness centre and the sauna. The air-conditioned, non-smoking guest rooms and suites are equipped with a minibar and a flat-screen TV. All rooms include free WiFi access. Most rooms feature a balcony and some have a spa bath. Guests can enjoy drinks and snacks in the bar. A buffet breakfast is also served every morning. With private parking on site for an additional charge, the hotel is just 7 km from Nice-Cote d’Azur Airport. Casino Ruhl is a 3-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Le Negresco
address: 37 Promenade Des Anglais, 06000 Nice
description: Hotel Le Negresco, overlooks the beach and the Promenade des Anglais in Nice. Free Wifi access is provided and there is an on-site fitness centre. Each room and suite is decorated individually with period furniture and features air conditioning. Rooms are also equipped with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. A fresh buffet breakfast is served each morning in La Rotonde restaurant. Snacks and drinks can be enjoyed in the British-style bar, and gourmet meals are served at the Michelin star Le Chantecler restaurant. Hotel Le Negresco's guests can benefit from access to a private beach area, at an extra cost. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from Nice’s Old Town and Nice-Ville Train Station. Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is just 5 km from the hotel. A private limousine shuttle service is available for guests for a surcharge upon request. Private parking is available on site.

name: Windsor Hotel
address: 11 Rue Dalpozzo, 06000 Nice
description: This hotel is set in a 19th-century building in central Nice and features a tropical garden with a swimming pool. The hotel’s fitness and wellness centre offers a hammam, a sauna and massage treatments. Each air-conditioned and soundproofed room has been uniquely designed and decorated by an artist. Rooms are equipped with free WiFi, a satellite TV and an en suite bathroom. The larger rooms have a balcony or a spa bath. Hotel Windsor offers a menu of traditional meals made from organic ingredients. In the morning a buffet breakfast is served in the dining area or in the garden. Guests can enjoy a drink at the lounge bar, and during the winter are able to relax near the fireplace. Hotel Windsor is 500 metres from the beach and the Promenade des Anglais, and 950 metres from the Old Town of Nice. Gare de Nice-Ville Train Station is 800 metres away. Limited parking spaces are available upon request and for an extra charge.

name: Le Méridien Nice
address: 1 Promenade Des Anglais, 06046 Nice
description: Discover a modern design hotel in Nice and unlock the timeless elegance of the South of France. Offering a chic French Riviera beachfront hotel setting, Le Meridien Nice is the ideal place to unwind, indulge and relax in the alluring Cote d Azur. Located at the iconic, No 1. Promenade des Anglais, just steps away from Nice Old Town, this family friendly hotel invites guests to take in everything the destination has to offer. Be captivated by exhilarating views of the Mediterranean Sea from a selection of the 318 luxury guest rooms, including 15 suites. Reimagined to evoke the glamorous 1960s, each curated space reflects regional and cosmopolitan flair. Delight in local flavours and creative cocktails at Latitude Bar. Head to the rooftop with its panoramic Baie des Anges views, experience elevated dining at La Terrasse or awaken the senses with a dip in the outdoor heated pool.Marriott

name: Hotel Demeure Les Mouettes
address: 9 cours Lucien Bonaparte, 20000 Ajaccio, Corsica
description: Ideally located in the gulf of Ajaccio, with direct access to a small beach, Hôtel-Demeure Les Mouettes is a charming 19th-century house. Stay in one of the hotel's large rooms, some with terraces providing superb views of the gulf. For your convenience, rooms are equipped with air-conditioning and mini fridges. Take a refreshing dip in the hotel's private pool or in the clear blue waters of the Mediterranean sea before resting in the shade of palm trees. Local cold meats and cheeses are available throughout the day for those wishing to enjoy some of the best local flavours without leaving the hotel's sunny terrace.

name: Palm Beach Hotel
address: Route Des Iles Sanguinaires, 20000 Ajaccio, Corsica
description: Palm Beach features direct access to the private beach and a restaurant with a terrace overlooking the ocean "Mediterranean Sea'. This 4-star hotel offers rooms with sea views and is just 5 km from Ajaccio city centre. An LCD TV with satellite channels features in the rooms and suites at Palm Beach. All accommodation is air-conditioned and some have a separate living area. Breakfast can be served to all rooms. The continental breakfast is also served on the terrace. Guests can also relax in the bar and browse the free Wi-Fi. Free public parking is available on site and the Sanguinaires Islands are 7 km away. Guests may also choose to drive to Ajaccio Harbour, which is 10 km away.

name: La Villa Calvi
address: Chemin de Notre Dame de la Serra, 20260 Calvi, Corsica
description: This 5-star hotel is set a 5-minute drive from the centre of Calvi, in the North West of Corsica. It offers 5 different swimming pools, a tennis court, a fitness centre and a variety of beauty treatments. Each spacious room has a simple, elegant décor and includes a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an iPod docking station and a minibar. A bathrobe, slippers, a hairdryer and free toiletries are provided in each private bathroom. La Table by La Villa offers Mediterranean-inspired cuisine featuring locally-caught fish and other local produce. There is also the Pool Bar or the more intimate Jo’s Bar for snacks and drinks. Guests have access to the restaurant which has a private beach. Sunbeds are reserved for guests. Calvi beach is a 15-minute walk away. Free WiFi is available and there is free private parking on site.

name: Hôtel Le Belvédère
address: Route de Palombaggia - B.P. 56, 20537 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Hôtel le Belvédère sits among pine, eucalyptus and palm trees, just opposite the old town of Porto-Vecchio. It offers 2 outdoor hot tubs and an outdoor infinity pool with sea views, surrounded by a furnished sun deck. All of the rooms feature a private terrace with a garden view and an en suite bathroom with bath, bathrobe, slippers and a hairdryer. They are also air conditioned, have flat-screen TV and offer free Wi-Fi. A gastronomic restaurant and a grill restaurant, Mari e Tarra, are available on site, as well as a restaurant specialising in seafood. They offer outdoor seating with pleasant views of the surroundings. A bar and a wine cellar are also provided to enhance your gastronomic experience.

name: U Capu Biancu
address: Route Canetto, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: The 4-star Hotel U Capu Biancu offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Bonifacio. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, gift/souvenir shop, private check in/check out, fireplace are there for guest's enjoyment. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, sofa, separate living room, internet access – wireless (complimentary), air conditioning. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Bonifacio, Hotel U Capu Biancu will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Hotel & Spa Des Pecheurs
address: Ile de Cavallo, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: Hotel & SPA des Pecheurs is located on the island of Cavallo, between Corsica and Sardinia. The elegant hotel offers a swimming pool in its garden, a spa centre and a French and Italian restaurant. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel & SPA des Pecheurs have a view of the sea or the garden. Guests can relax in the seating area, watching TV or using the free WiFi access. The continental breakfast is included and served in the dining room, or it can be brought to your room. The elegant hotel’s bar features a terrace that provides direct access to the private beach. Other activities include a tennis court, concierge service and diving activities. Massages are available at an additional cost. The hotel is located 8 km from the coast of Sardinia. Hotel boat transfers are available upon request for an extra charge. Public boat transfers are available only from Corsica with scheduled timetables.

name: Maranatha Porto Vecchio
address: Rte de Piccovagia, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: A short distance from motor boating, fishing, and more, this pet-friendly villa lets you experience it all. With convenient onsite parking, you'll be ready to make the 11-minute drive to Santa Giulia Beach or the 10-minute drive to Palombaggia Beach. Spend a day at the nearby beach, relax by the communal pool, or sip a drink in the garden of this 700-sq-ft villa, which also features outdoor furniture. As for the great indoors, you can come inside and enjoy the WiFi and TV. This 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom rental features a BBQ grill, air conditioning, concierge services, and local meal delivery service. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, towels, and toilet paper. Prepare a home-cooked meal in the kitchen, complete with an oven, a stovetop, and a refrigerator, as well as a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave. And thanks to the washer and dryer, you'll even be able to travel light.VRBO

name: Le Golfe
address: Porto Pollo Marina, 20140 Serra-di-Ferro, Corsica
description: This 5-star Hotel is situated a short walk from the beach in Porto Pollo, south-west Corsica. All guest rooms have a terrace overlooking the sea and Valinco Bay and there is a heated swimming pool on site. Each of Le Golfe’s rooms also has air-conditioning, TV and free internet access. The Le Golfe's restaurant is open for lunch and dinner and offers Mediterranean cuisine made with local ingredients, a fresh fish of the day dish, Corsican specialties and grilled meat. Guests can relax with a drink in the bar during the evenings or enjoy jet ski sessions, available at an additional cost. Le Golfe is located a 1-hour’s drive from Ajaccio and 17 km from Propriano. Guests can enjoy water sports at the nearby beaches and hiking in the surrounding countryside.

name: Les Regalia Hotel & Spa
address: D168A Pinarello, 20144 Sainte-Lucie-de-Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Set in Sainte-Lucie de Porto-Vecchio, 600 metres from Plage de Pinarellu, Les Regalia Hôtel & Spa offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features a concierge service, a tour desk and luggage storage for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Les Regalia Hôtel & Spa provides certain units with sea views, and each room has a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the bar. Plage de Villata is 2.9 km from Les Regalia Hôtel & Spa, while Porto Vecchio Port is 18 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 37 km from the hotel.

name: Canopy by Hilton Cannes
address: 2 Boulevard Jean Hibert, 06400 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Overlooking the harbor and sandy beaches, we are just a five-minute walk from La Croisette, the world-famous Palais des Festivals and the main shopping streets. The art district is just around the corner and we’re only five minutes from the Musée des Explorations du Monde, the Tour Carrée and the church. Take in beautiful views of the city from our rooftop restaurant and bar.Hilton

name: Hotel Royal Riviera
address: 3, Avenue Jean Monnet, 06230 Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Located on the peninsula of Cap-Ferrat and offering panoramic views of Provençal gardens and the Mediterranean, this five-star 96-room hotel provides the intimacy of a private villa with the luxury and glamour of a palace. Guests have free access to the seasonal beach from mid-May to the end of September and to the heated pool, sauna, hammam and fitness room. Each air-conditioned room has a private bathroom stocked with free toiletries. Some rooms offer sea and garden views. The Hotel Royal-Riviera Hotel has a gourmet restaurant 'La Table du Royal' with a terrace and panoramic view of the sea. The poolside bar and restaurant 'Jasmin Grill & Lounge', open for lunch all year round, offers a view of Kerylos Villa. Free WiFi access and valet service are available on site. Hotel Royal-Riviera is just 15 minutes from Monaco and Nice and 30 minutes from Nice International Airport. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Royal Antibes - Luxury Hotel, Résidence, Beach & Spa
address: 16 Boulevard Marechal Leclerc, 06600 Antibes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Royal Antibes - Luxury Hotel, Résidence, Beach & Spa offers free access to Phytomer Spa, open year-round and featuring a steam bath, fitness centre and sauna and 1 restaurants with views of l’Ilette Bay. It is located on the pedestrian promenade, which in 3 minutes, leads to the old town, castle and Provençal market. This property is composed of apartments and other rooms with a city view. An LCD TV and a minibar feature in every type of accommodation at Royal Antibes. All accommodation is contemporary in style and some apartments have magnificent sea views. During the high season, Royal Beach features a terrace with sea views and offers Mediterranean cuisine. During the summer, a private beach is available for guests' use with an extra cost. The 24-hour front desk can advise guests on Cannes, just a 20-minute drive down the coast. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout.

name: Hôtel Sable et Soleil
address: 158 Rue Paul Arène, 83600 Fréjus, Var
description: Just 300 metres from the beach and 100 metres from Port Frejus and Casino de Jeu, Hotel Sable et Soleil features a hot tub. Free WiFi is available throughout. The air-conditioned rooms feature a private bathroom, a hairdryer and a flat-screen TV. A buffet-style continental breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room or on the terrace, weather permitting. Cannes is 37 km away and Sainte-Maxime is a 35-minute drive away. Free private parking is available for all guests of the Hotel Sable et Soleil, as well as bike rental.

name: Hôtel Barrière Le Gray d'Albion
address: 38 Rue Des Serbes, 06400 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Providing a private beach, Hotel Barriere Le Gray D'albion is situated in Cannes and is a short walk from Palais des Festivals et des Congres. This trendy hotel is set in the heart of the city. Hotel Barriere Le Gray D'albion offers complimentary wireless internet and public parking on site. It provides family-friendly amenities, with room designs and services for families of any size, as well as supervised child care/activities and a kids club. The air conditioned rooms at the hotel are well-appointed. They are all soundproofed and include a flat-screen TV, an in-room closet and a mini bar. Hotel Barriere Le Gray D'albion is close to Cannes's famous attractions, with Intercontinental Carlton Beach just a 10-minute walk away. Guests can tour the area using the hotel's rental bicycles.Revato

name: Hôtel Martinez Cannes
address: 73 La Croisette, 06400 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Located on the famous La Croisette Boulevard in Cannes, Hotel Martinez - in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt is a 5-star hotel featuring a private beach, which is accessible for an extra charge. Guests can enjoy a meal in one of the onsite restaurants or a drink at the Martinez bar. Entirely renovated in May 2018, guest rooms at Hotel Martinez - in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt are decorated in a contemporary Art Deco style and feature a seating area. Each air-conditioned room features a marble bathroom and some have a private terrace with views of the Mediterranean Sea. Opened in May 2018, the restaurant Le Jardin du Martinez offers seating on a terrace in the shade of palm and cypress trees, and in fine weather guests can enjoy the 1930's themed garden parties hosted at the restaurant. Guests seeking a fine dining experience are invited to dine at the 2 Michelin star La Palme d'Or restaurant, which specialises in cuisine inspired by cinema and offers a view of the Croisette. Located on the beach, the La Plage du Martinez restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine with local produce and fresh seafood. The Martinez Bar celebrates the history of the Hotel Martinez and proposes a range of cocktails and gin and tonics, in addition to a nightly live culinary show on the Teppan plancha grill. Spa services such as massages, body treatments and facials are available and guests can exercise in the fitness centre. Hotel Martinez - in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt offers direct access onto the beach and is within walking distance of the shopping area. With a secure private car park, the hotel also offers valet parking. Nice-Cote-d’Azur Airport is 20 km away.

name: Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes
address: 10, La Croisette, 06407 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Offering views of the Mediterranean Sea, Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes is located on the famous Boulevard La Croisette in Cannes, 110 meters from the Palais des Festivals and the old port. It has a heated outdoor swimming pool, a spa and a private beach. Guests have free access to the wellness area and the 24-hour gym. The Hotel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes offers air-conditioned, soundproofed rooms and suites, LCD satellite TV, free Wi-Fi and private bathroom. Most have sea views. During your stay at Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes, you can enjoy massages and relaxation therapies at the hotel spa, Spa Diane Barrière, which uses Biologique Recherche products. You can also relax on the hotel terrace or on the private beach, deck chairs can be rented on site. The hotel has 3 restaurants: The traditional French brasserie, Fouquet's, serves a menu created in collaboration with the three-star chef Pierre Gagnaire. Paradiso Nicole & Pierre serves Italian cuisine with a Mediterranean influence. The BFire by Mauro Colagreco restaurant is located on the private beach. The hotel offers a children's club, Le Studio by Petit VIP, free for children from 4 to 12 years old. The hotel is located just a minute's walk from the beach, 400 meters from Cannes train station and 27 km from Nice airport. Secure private parking is also available at an additional cost. Charging stations for electric cars are available on site. During private events or congresses, the beach may be closed. During this period, customers can access the establishment's partner beaches. Cannes is a dynamic city that hosts a multitude of cultural, professional and festive events throughout the year, which can cause some inconveniences due to the crowds, such as noise or large structures erected in all places, especially on the Croisette and the beach. Prior to arrival, the property encourages guests to check in advance for upcoming events. You can visit the site of the Palais des Festivals or that of the city of Cannes.

name: Hôtel La Villa
address: 122 Av Du Croiseur Leger Le Malin, 83120 Sainte-Maxime, Var
description: Hôtel & Spa La Villa is located on the beachfront across the road from Garonnette Beach, an 8-minute drive from the centre of Sainte-Maxime and 150 metres from Issambres Port, where guests can take the ferry to Saint-Tropez in summer. At an extra cost and upon reservation, guests have access to a private use spa with a hot tub. It offers air-conditioned and soundproofed guestrooms and suites with free WiFi. The rooms are decorated in a Provençal style and are equipped with a minibar and satellite TV. The soundproofed apartments have a living room and some offer a view of the Mediterranean sea. For stays of 3 nights or more and upon reservation, guests have access to a private kitchenette equipped with a fridge, dishwasher and microwave for an extra fee. A sweet breakfast can be served on the terrace under the olive trees in the summer months. A savory breakfast is available at an extra cost. The on-site bar is open all day and serves a variety of drinks and ice creams. Guests can also order a light meal of local tapas-style ingredients onsite, or can eat at the onsite restaurant upon reservation. An array of activities are offered in the area, such as windsurfing, scuba diving, fishing and balneotherapy. The hotel also offers free private parking.

name: Hotel Cap Estel
address: 1312, Avenue Raymond Poincaré, 06360 Eze, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Located on the Cap and facing the sea, Hotel Cap Estel features luxury accommodation and a private beach. Guests can enjoy the indoor and outdoor swimming pools, the garden and the wellness centre. All rooms offer free WiFi access, a terrace and panoramic views of the sea and the garden. They also feature a minibar with free soft drinks and a Nespresso coffee machine. The private bathrooms are complete with shower and/or bathtub and toilet. Breakfast is included and the hotel also offers a restaurant and a bar on site. Additional restaurants and bars can be found 2 km from the property. Massages are available upon reservation at an additional cost. Eze Village is 7 km away, Nice is 15 km away and Monaco is 7 km away. Free parking is available on site.

name: La Villa Mauresque
address: 1792 Route De La Corniche, 83700 Saint-Raphaël, Var
description: La Villa Mauresque is a hotel located right on the seafront with far-reaching views of the Gulf of St Tropez. Guests can enjoy free access to the hotel’s swimming pool, seafront spa with hot tub, beach and boathouse with sailing equipment. Free WiFi access is provided in all guest rooms. Most of the rooms at La Villa Mauresque have a view of the sea and some have swimming pool or garden views. The bathrooms have a shower and/or spa bath. Each is equipped with a Malongo machine, a fruit bowl and free Phytomer toiletries. The hotel serves a daily breakfast, which can be taken on the private terrace, by the sea or near the pool. The on-site restaurant, Le Bougainvillier, managed by our chef, offers culinary delights using locally sourced products and best quality ingredients with fixed menus, "à la carte" dining and daily suggestions Guests can enjoy many activities thanks to its free canoes, kayaks, snorkeling material, table tennis and children's toys. Massages, beauty treatments, babysitting, fitness and yacht hire services are available.

name: Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany
address: 19 Avenue De L'Amiral Ganteaume, 13260 Cassis, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: With views of the highest cliff in Europe and over the Mediterranean Sea, Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany is set on the beachfront in Cassis. located 30 metres away. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property. The contemporary air-conditioned rooms at Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany are equipped a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Each room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a private terrace with a sea view. During the high season, Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany has a restaurant open in summer time for dinner only and serving tapas and traditional meals. There is a lounge bar and a sun deck facing the sea. A continental breakfast is available for an extra charge and includes pastries, fruit, meat, cheese. Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany is just a 5-minute walk from the Port of Cassis and Marseille is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Marignane, 54.5 km away. Circuit Paul Ricard is 40 minutes' drive away and Train station Gare St Charles is 32 km from the hotel. A private car park is available at a surcharge and upon availability.

name: Hôtel Hermitage Monte-Carlo
address: Square Beaumarchais, Monaco 98000
description: Ideally located steps from Casino Square, the Hôtel Hermitage Monte-Carlo enjoys a fabulous location overlooking the Mediterranean, the Rock, and the Port of Monaco. Built in the early 1900s, its Belle Epoque architecture showcases the magnificent Eiffel cupola located in the Winter Garden and designed by Gustave Eiffel. Respecting its rich heritage, the hotel offers 277 rooms and suites with a perfect blend of authenticity and modernity, including 53 Junior Suites, 22 Suites, and a collection of 13 Diamond Suites, all decorated with classic furniture. Whether you have a quick lunch at the Limùn bar after a shopping spree or indulge in a fabulous dinner at Yannick Alléno's Michelin-starred restaurant Pavyllon Monte-Carlo, you will enjoy an unforgettable culinary journey. For a casual gathering, meet at the Crystal Bar. During the summer, its terrace becomes the Crystal Lounge, a spectacular spot where you can enjoy a glass of champagne under the stars. At the Hôtel Hermitage Monte-Carlo, staying with children will create lasting memories. Children are considered V.I.K. (Very Important Kids) and are offered a special attention. In summer, a playroom is available, providing a perfect opportunity for parents to spend time at the Thermes Marins Monte-Carlo, a 71,000 sq. ft. spa directly connected to the hotel. If you feel like shopping, the Monte-Carlo Shopping Promenade, located just across the street from the hotel offers more than 50 haute-couture boutiques in a chic pedestrian area. For Casino lovers, the best gambling experience is at the world-famous Casino de Monte-Carlo and at Casino Café de Paris. All guests can join our loyalty programme « My Monte-Carlo » to benefit from many advantages, ranging from free admission to the Casino de Monte-Carlo to preferential rates on golf and tennis fees.

name: Novi Resort
address: S:t Göransgatan 31, 621 55 Visby, Gotlands Lan
description: Located by Norderstrand Beach, this property offers guest rooms and apartments in Visby and just 1 km from Visby’s UNESCO-listed medieval town centre. It offers free WiFi, an outdoor pool and a large terrace. NOVI Resort’s rooms feature modern décor, designer furniture and flat-screen TVs with DVD players. All options have private patios or balconies with Baltic Sea views. Most have a kitchenette. Guest can hang out by the poolside or eat at NOVI's summer restaurant Grill & Bar between June and August.
