It offers light dishes, gourmet dining and great sea views. NOVI Resort is a 10-minute walk from Visby’s 13th-century city wall and Almedalen Park. Gotska Golf Course is less than 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Mykonos Bay Resort & Villas
address: Megali Ammos, Mykonos
description: Situated on Megali Ammos beach, the design hotel Mykonos Bay Resort & Villas is just 300m away from Mykonos town. It offers a pool with views of the sunset, the sea and the island’ trademark windmills. Each of the air-conditioned rooms is simply designed and equipped with satellite TV, hairdryer, fridge and balcony, while some of the rooms have balcony with sea view. Guests are greeted with a complimentary drink. A Mediterranean buffet breakfast prepared with fresh ingredients, such as local pies and cheese is served each morning. Guests at Mykonos Bay Resort & Villas can explore the tasty cuisine of the a la carte pool/sea side restaurant, as well as the pool lounge bar’s cocktails, while watching the sun setting in the Aegean Sea. The pool area is equipped with comfortable sun beds, serving as a great point for relaxation. There is also a free internet point and free wireless internet access in public areas. Mykonos Bay Resort & Villas is 1 km from the port and 2 km from the airport. The hotel’s shuttle bus provides complimentary transfer from the port/airport upon arrival and departure upon request.

name: Mykonos Blanc
address: Ornos 1, Ornos 846 00
description: Mykonos Blanc Hotel is a 5-star beachfront luxury boutique hotel in Mykonos, a proud member of the LVX Preferred Hotels and Resorts network. The non-color conformity of its interiors and exterior outdoor landscape acts as a soft touch to the soul, embossing the intense blue nature of the Aegean sea and the cosmopolitan lifestyle of Mykonian living, making Mykonos Blanc luxury boutique hotel, the perfect holiday canvas at the popular Ornos bay in Mykonos. Mykonos Blanc Hotel features 42 luxury seaside boutique styled rooms and suites. This dreamy luxury hotel has one and only destination, the everyday living at sea. Arched doorways and candle-lit living areas give this wonder-around feeling. Follow the path to a pool and garden wonderworld, a dreamy riviera landscape overlooking the blue waters of Ornos bay in Mykonos. Indulge in an in-room relaxing hot tubbing with a sea-view bliss, romancing or friend-mingling during evenings at their own en-suite lounging space. Yet, as an element of surprise, the secluded calm is interchanged by the upbeat Mykonian fun, a few steps further away on the coast of Ornos bay, on a choice of award winning resto’s and beach bars. Try out exotic gourmet pleasures at Kuzina Mykonos and Pasaji’s Asian Fusion cuisine and the trattoria Farina of Italian origin.

name: Myconian O Hotel
address: Ornos Beach, Ornos 846 00
description: Located in Ornos, 60 metres from Ornos, Myconian O Hotel - Adults Only provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has garden views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Myconian O Hotel - Adults Only each room comes with bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Korfos is 300 metres from Myconian O Hotel - Adults Only, while Agios Ioannis Beach is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 4 km from the hotel.

name: Mykonos Grand Hotel & Resort
address: Agios Ioannis, Agios Ioannis
description: Located right on Agios Ioannis Beach, Mykonos Grand Hotel & Resort provides 5-star, boutique accommodation set amidst cobbled paths overlooking Delos Island. It includes a health centre and offers fine dining in stylish settings. Rooms and suites at Mykonos Grand combine the cube-shaped Cycladic architecture with the restful interior décor. They are equipped with a satellite LCD TV, DVD player and iPod docking station. All units open out to balconies or patios with sea, garden or pool views. Guests can enjoy fresh seafood, grilled specialities and other Mediterranean flavours either at the open-air dining room or by the pool offering panoramic sea views. The White Bar is ideal for a glass of champagne in a minimalist setting featuring an outdoor terrace. Althea Spa Centre offers a wide variety of natural treatments based on traditional Greek techniques. Guests can spend relaxing moments by the pool featuring private areas, while a state-of-the-art gym and a tennis court are also available. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos Town is around 4 km away from the resort. The island’s port and airport are both 4.5 km away. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout and free on-site parking is possible.

name: Myconian Panoptis Escape - Small Luxury Hotels of the World
address: Elia Beach, P.O. Box 64, Mykonos 846 00
description: Set in Elia Beach, Myconian Panoptis Escape, a member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests. The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a hot tub, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at the hotel also provide guests with pool view. At Myconian Panoptis Escape, a member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World, every room includes a seating area. Myconian Panoptis Escape, a member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World offers a barbecue. Bike hire and car hire are available at the hotel. Agrari Beach is 600 metres away. The nearest airport is Mykonos, 12 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.

name: Petasos Beach Resort And Spa
address: 84600, Platis Gialos 846 00
description: Petasos Beach stands on a private peninsula between Platis Yialos and Psarou Beach. It offers a 500 square-meter spa & wellness centre, a fitness centre and a 2-level swimming pool with waterfall. The Aqua Marine Spa offers revitalizing and thalasso-therapy treatments, as well as honeymoon packages. The luxuriously renovated Petasos Beach combines aesthetically perfect premises with breathtaking nature. Its innovatively designed rooms offer stunning views of the Aegean Sea. All accommodations are equipped with Wi-Fi internet access. Deluxe and superior rooms also feature a spa bath and steam cabin. There are 2 restaurants within the premises of the Resort, with a great view of the Aegean sea.

name: Elia Mykonos Resort
address: Elia Beach, Mykonos, Mykonos 846 00
description: Located right on the sandy Elia Mykonos Resort of Mykonos, the Cycladic-style Elia Mykonos Resort features a beachfront restaurant, a boutique and a garden full of palm and olive trees. It offers free WiFi in all areas and tastefully decorated units with a balcony. Overlooking the Aegean Sea or the garden, the rooms and suites of Elia are fitted with tiled floors and beamed ceilings. Each air-conditioned unit is equipped with a minibar, a safe and a flat-screen TV. Some of the suites also include a seating area and a well-equipped kitchenette. The private bathroom is stocked with a hairdryer. Each room includes free sunbeds and towels. Featuring a wellness center contains Spa, Gym, and a swimming pool. Guests can enjoy drinks, coffee and Mediterranean dishes at the bar-restaurant offering sea views. Sunbeds and beach towels are offered. Elia Mykonos Resort lies within 10 km from the cosmopolitan Mykonos Town and 9 km from Mykonos National Airport. Psarrou Beach with its famous beach bars and clubs is at 13 km. A pharmacy store, supermarket and ATM can be found at 3 km. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Santa Marina, a Luxury Collection Resort, Mykonos
address: Ornos Bay, Ornos 846 00
description: Experience the mesmerizing magic of Santa Marina, a Luxury Collection Resort, Mykonos. Our luxury beach resort is just 10 minutes from the airport and town, Santa Marina makes it easy to explore all the island’s must-see attractions – then return to our sanctuary of authentic Aegean beauty at Ornos Bay. Choose from 102 guest rooms and suites, along with 13 villas featuring two to seven bedrooms. Beach-chic interiors offer modern, natural luxury, opening to balconies with hypnotic Aegean views. Discover the only private sandy beach on Mykonos, gorgeous infinity pools, the international-caliber Ginkgo Spa and four options for dining and drinks, highlighted by the world’s first ever Buddha-Bar Beach. Our Santa Marina resort invites you to savour the glamorous lifestyle of Mykonos in the island’s most fashionable and sophisticated setting.Marriott

name: Mykonos Ammos Hotel
address: Ornos Beach, Mykonos 846 00
description: Situated on the sandy and lively Ornos Beach, the 5-star boutique hotel of Mykonos Ammos provides trendy sun loungers and beach service. Member of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World, it features an outdoor pool, and a wellness and beauty centre. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Stylishly decorated with earth tones and white washed walls, the spacious rooms and suites are air conditioned. Each comes with a 37” flat-screen TV, DVD player, laptop safe, toiletries and hairdryer. They all open out to a terrace or balcony, while some offer sea views. Kuzina Restaurant provides fusion culinary dishes that combine Asian and Mediterranean flavours and can be enjoyed by the seaside. Farina Italian Restaurant serves genuine Italian cuisine in a stylish setting, while Mykonos Ammos Beach and Bar prepares signature cocktails throughout the day. Room service is also accessible. Guests are provided with complimentary beach towels and daily newspapers. The 24-hour front desk can arrange tours of Mykonos and concierge services upon request with surcharge. Mykonos Ammos Hotel is just 2.5 km from Mykonos Town, as well as Mykonos Airport and the port. Various restaurants, cafés and a supermarket are all within a short walking distance. Private parking can be found on site.

name: Myconian Imperial - Leading Hotels Of The World
address: Elia Beach, Mykonos 846 00
description: The 5-star Myconian Imperial - Leading Hotels of the World boasts stunning views of the Aegean Sea and a private beach area. It includes spa facilities, gourmet cuisine, hot tub and 3 swimming pools. Free WiFi is available in all areas. All air-conditioned rooms of Myconian Imperial have modern décor and balconies with superb views of Elia Beach. They are equipped with an LCD satellite TV, DVD/CD player and safety box. Some feature outdoor hot tubs or private pools. A rich American breakfast is offered at Meltemi. Fine Mediterranean dishes are served at the Celebrities a la carte restaurant. Guests also have the choice of 2 cocktail bars and a beach bar. Mykonos Airport is around 10 km away from the resort. The picturesque town of Mykonos with whitewashed, Cycladic-style houses, bars and shops is less than a 20-minute drive away.

name: Manoulas Beach Mykonos Resort
address: Main Street, Agios Ioannis, Agios Ioannis
description: Right in front Agios Ioannis Beach in Mykonos, the 4-star, Cycladic-style Manoula's Beach Mykonos Resort offers a pool and a seafront restaurant. It features accommodation with air conditioning. Free WiFi is available in public areas. All air-conditioned rooms at the Manoula's Beach Mykonos Resort are equipped with a satellite TV and fridge. The bathrooms include amenities and a hairdryer. Most units open to a balcony or terrace overlooking the Aegean Sea. An American breakfast buffet is served in the dining room with views of the sea. The restaurant serves seafood right on the beach. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the lounge offering direct sea view or at the pool bar. Other facilities include a gym. Mykonos Town is just 4 km away and the bus stop is right outside the hotel. Mykonos Port is at 5 km and the airport is 4.5 km. The hotel offers free private parking.

name: Bill & Coo Coast Suites - Adults Only
address: Agios Ioannis, Agios Ioannis 846 00
description: Located right on the beach of Agios Ioannis in Mykonos, Bill & Coo Coast Suites boasts a water's edge swimming pool and a restaurant serving traditional Greek cuisine. Blending traditional Cycladic decoration with modern minimalistic touches, every suite at Bill & Coo Coast opens to a balcony with Aegean Sea views while some also enjoy pool views. Some units feature a private pool, while others feature an outdoor hot tub. Each features a seating area where a satellite, flat-screen TV is also available. Guests may also use the iPad provided. Every suite features a state of the art bathroom stocked with a shower and free toiletries. Greek & American breakfast is served. The on-site bar features an abundance of refreshments. Massage treatments can be enjoyed on request and at extra charge. Free WiFi is available throughout the entire property. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos is located within approximately 4 km of Bill & Coo Coast Suites. Mykonos Port is 6 km away, while Mykonos Airport is at 4 km. Free private parking is possible on-site.

name: Saint John Hotel Villas & Spa
address: Agios Ioannis, Agios Ioannis Mykonos, 84600, Gree, Agios Ioannis 846 00
description: Occupying a 20,000-square-metre land, Saint John Hotel Villas & Spa features an infinity pool with open views to its private beach. Rooms with spa bath, fine dining, and famous bars await guests. The elegant rooms offer sea or garden views. They come with many comforts, such as free Wi-Fi, cable and satellite TV, CD/DVD player, and tea-and-coffee maker. A piano bar, 3 gourmet restaurants and 2 other bars offer guests different dining and drinking opportunities from casual to romantic. The Aphrodite Spa & Beauty Centre provides 5 treatments rooms. The state-of-the-art facilities include saunas, hammam and indoor heated pools. Mykonos Airport is 4 km away, and the new Mykonos Port is 6 km away. The bustling Mykonos Town (Chora) is 4 km away. Free private parking is available.

name: Hippie Chic Hotel
address: Agios Ioannis, Agios Ioannis 84600
description: Right on the beach of Agios Ioannis, Hippie Chic Hotel features a pool and elegant accommodation with free WiFi. Guests can taste Mediterranean cuisine and seafood from the on-site restaurant or sushi from the poolside bar. Built in respect with the local architecture, all rooms and suites are fitted with king-size, Coco-mat beds and relaxing interiors. Each comes with air conditioning, flat-screen TV and mini fridge. Some units also offer unobstructed views of the Aegean Sea. The majority of rooms and suites have their own private veranda. However, this does not guarantee visual privacy, as the existence of walls and partitions would prevent the beautiful scenery of Aegean sea and Delos island, you come here to enjoy. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos Town is around 4 km away from Hippie Chic Hotel. The island’s port and airport are both 4.5 km away. Free parking is available on site.

name: Myconian Ambassador Hotel Relais & Chateaux
address: Platis Gialos, P.O. Box 64, Mykonos, Platis Gialos 846 00
description: Overlooking the popular beach of Platis Gialos, the Myconian Ambassador Relais & Chateaux provides excellent spa and wellness facilities, and a huge outdoor swimming area. The stylish rooms at the Myconian Ambassador Relais & Chateaux have Aegean-Sea views. Facilities include a satellite LCD TV, CD/DVD player and minibar. Some units also feature an outdoor hot tub, or a private or sharing pool. At the spa centre, guests can pamper themselves with Pantai treatments and body massages. It also offers an indoor pool, a hot tub and Elemis products. Guests can start their day with a rich breakfast at Latitudes, while light meals and drinks are served by the pool from George’s Bar. As the sun sets, you can enjoy your evening cocktail, or have a candle-lit dinner at Efisia Restaurant. The hotel offers free shuttle service to/from the Port and to/from Mykonos Airport located 2.5 km away. The scenic main town of Mykonos is within a 10-minute drive. Guests can also join the resort’s diving club.

name: Petinos Hotel
address: Plati Yialos Beach, Platis Gialos
description: The newly renovated Hotel Petinos features accommodation just metres from Platis Gialos Beach. Mykonos Town is just a short bus ride away. Offering views of the pool, the comfortable guest rooms at Hotel Petinos are air-conditioned and elegantly appointed. Each offers a mini-fridge, TV with satellite channels and hairdryer. Some room types are located in the annex building, at a distance of 1 km. The bus connecting with Mykonos Town stops right outside the hotel. Petinos Hotel offers guests transfer from/to the the port (3km away) and the airport (5km away) at extra cost. Frequent boat rides from Platis Yialos take guests to Mykonos’ famous beaches Paradise, Super Paradise, Agrari and Elia. Greek and Mediterranean dishes are served at the Blue Myth restaurant, situated right on the beach. Special nights with dancing and singing are organised twice weekly.

name: Petinos Beach Hotel
address: Platis Gialos Beach 116, Platys Gialos, Greece, Platis Gialos
description: The Cycladic-style Petinos Beach is 200 metres from Mykonos’ Platis Gialos beach. It offers an open-air lounge, outdoor swimming pool with bar, and guest rooms with balconies overlooking the Aegean Sea. Each guestroom at Petinos Beach Hotel comes with bright décor, wooden ceilings and antique-style furnishings. Some rooms also offer work desks. The pool side restaurant Thea serves Mediterranean dishes, fresh fish and snacks throughout the day. At the a la carte restaurant Blue Myth guests can enjoy romantic candlelit dinners with spectacular views of the bay. The front desk is at the guests’ disposal 24/7, offering tourist information, laundry and ironing service. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

name: Nissaki Boutique Hotel
address: Platys Gialos P.O. Box 7075, Platis Gialos 846 00
description: Built with an exceptional view over Psarou Beach, Nissaki Boutique Hotel enjoys an ideal location in the island of Mykonos. It overlooks the blue Aegean Sea, and is within a short stroll from sandy Platis Gialos beach. The hotel provides an exterior sea-view swimming pool, an exterior hot tub, massage and water sports and an open air restaurant. Recreational amenities at Nissaki Hotel include an indoor pool and a fitness facility. Hotel Nissaki also offers a bar lounge, and a coffee shop – café. The guestrooms at the Nissaki Boutique Hotel, decorated with whitewashed walls and multi-coloured stone floor tiles, are well appointed and comfortable, each with satellite TVs, bathroom amenities, CD and DVD players and private sea-view balcony. Hotel Nissaki also has free Wi-Fi internet access, and provides arrival & departure transfer upon request (with additional cost).

name: Agia Anna Beachfront Boutique
address: Agia Anna, Platis Gialos 846 00
description: No description found

name: Branco Mykonos
address: Platis Yialos Beach,21, Mykonos 846 00
description: The 5-star Branco Mykonos offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Mykonos. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, taxi service, wheelchair accessible are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, cleaning products, clothes rack, free welcome drink, linens. Access to the hotel's fitness center, outdoor pool, massage will further enhance your satisfying stay. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Branco Mykonos.priceline.com

name: Anax Resort & Spa
address: Agios Ioannis, Mykonos 846 00
description: Boasting a seafront location in Agios Ioannis in Mykonos, Anax Resort ideally blends Cycladic architecture with modern amenities. Facilities include a superb spa centre offering an abundance of beauty treatments, infinity pool, hot tub and a restaurant serving fine Mediterranean cuisine. A private beach area is also available. Stylish and spacious, the bright units at Anax Resort and Spa open to a balcony and patio with magnificent views of the sea. Some feature their very own private pool. Each boasts an elegant bathroom stocked with a spa bath and shower, while free toiletries are also offered. A smart TV and Bluetooth access is available in every unit. Air conditioning comes standard. Guests will find a fully equipped gym within the premises. The services that can be enjoyed at the spa centre range from hammam and sauna to rejuvenating massages and facial treatments. The poolside bar offers lounge-style sunbeds and a wide variety of premium cocktails. Other options include a lobby bar and a snack bar. Free WiFi is available throughout. The cosmopolitan centre of Mykonos, boasting an array of exclusive boutiques and high-profile bars and restaurants, lies within approximately 4.5 km of Anax Resort and Spa. The lively Psarou Beach is at 4 km. Mykonos Airport is 5 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Dionysos Luxury Hotel Mykonos
address: Ornos Beach 24242, Ornos 846 00
description: Set in a prime location of Mykonos, Dionysos Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Dionysos Hotel. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include hiking trails, hot tub, fitness center, outdoor pool, diving. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Dionysos Hotel.priceline.com

name: Kivotos Mykonos
address: Ornos Bay, Mykonos 846 00
description: Kivotos Luxury Boutique Hotel is situated on Mykonos Island, and offers 5-star accommodation as well as a private beach and a saltwater swimming pool. It provides free Wi-Fi, a Turkish steam bath and squash courts. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site spa and wellness centre, Mykonos Spa Club. It is pet-friendly and has free public parking on site for those travelling with a car. Part of the premium service at Kivotos Luxury Boutique Hotel includes items such as a complimentary fruit bowl in each of the rooms. Deluxe fixtures include a flat-screen TV with cable/satellite channels and luxury linen and luxury toiletries. A mini bar, a seating area and a private balcony are also included. The chic bar is a convenient place to relax with a drink before a meal at the restaurant, which offers international and Mediterranean cuisine for dinner. Within a 20-minute drive of Paradise Beach and Mykonos Island National Airport, the hotel provides an airport shuttle service. Guests can also take an easy stroll to Agios Ioannis and Psarou.Revato

name: Nimbus My Aktis
address: Super Paradise, Mykonos
description: Perched only a breath away from the famous sandy beach of Super Paradise, Nimbus My Aktis is ideally set amongst Mykonos most popular destinations. Nimbus My Aktis offers elegantly decorated units with private or shared pools or hot tubs and free WiFi access. The cosmopolitan town of Mykonos is 5 km away. Fitted with built-in beds and sofas and minimally decorated in soft tones, every villa and suite has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a modern bathroom with a shower. Most units offer views over the Aegean Sea, while others overlook the gardens. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. The nearest airport is Mykonos Airport, 3 km from Nimbus My Aktis. Free, on-site parking is offered and car rental services can be provided.

name: Yiannaki Hotel
address: Main Street, Ornos 846 00
description: Yiannaki Hotel is situated in Ornos bay, walking distance from the beach and the bus stop. It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi. Parking is complimentary. The hotel features a beautiful pool area with a sea-water pool, pool bar and a relaxing terrace with sun beds and umbrellas. Pool towels are complimentary. All Yiannaki Hotel guest rooms have balconies, air conditioning, and in-room safes. Rooms also include marble bathroom with a hairdryer, a fridge and TV with satellite channels. Towels are changed daily. A rich buffet breakfast is served each morning. Local delicacies and International dishes are prepared with care by the family run restaurant Aleka’s. Other facilities include sauna and a small fitness centre. Massage sessions and beauty therapies are arranged upon request. A paid airport or port transfer can also be arranged by the property upon request.

name: Casa Del Mar Mykonos Seaside Resort
address: Aleomandra, Agios Ioannis 846 00
description: No description found

name: Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini
address: Ag. Paraskevi, Thera 847 00
description: The 5-star Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini is set on the beachfront in Agia Paraskeyi, 5 km from Archaeological Museum of Thera. The property features a private beach area, as well as a fitness centre and views over the Aegean Sea. In addition to free WiFi, the property also provides an outdoor pool as well as a hot tub. All stylishly outlined guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with free toiletries, while some boast sea views. Guest rooms at Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini have air conditioning and a wardrobe. The accommodation offers a continental or buffet breakfast. There is an in-house restaurant, which specialises in sophisticated cuisine and also offers vegetarian options. Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini offers a sauna, as well as relaxation and fitness experiences at Nikki Spa and Tone Gym. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the hotel. Staff at the reception can assist guests at any time of the day. Museum of Prehistoric Thera is 5 km from Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini, while Central Bus Station is 5 km from the property. Santorini International Airport is 1 km away.

name: Golden Star City Resort
address: Pavlou Kountouriotou 73, Thessaloniki 570 19
description: The Golden Star Hotel is a modern property situated on the beach of Peraia. It offers rooms with free WiFi and private balconies. The centre of Thessaloniki City is a 30-minute drive away. The air-conditioned guestrooms of Golden Star have modern décor with light wooden furniture and bright fabrics. Each has a safe box and a satellite TV. A hairdryer is included. Mpoukadoura Restaurant serves an extensive range of creative Greek cuisine in a light, modern setting. Guests may enjoy a drink or snack from the bar overlooking the gulf of Thermaikos and the city of Thessaloniki. American breakfast is daily served. Guests can relax at the sun beds and umbrellas on the private beach. A well-equipped business centre is available. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can help with advice on the hotel and surrounding. Several shops and a fitness centre are 100 metres away while the centre of Thessaloniki is a 30-minute drive away. Makedonia International Airport is 8 km, approximately 15 minutes by car.

name: Domes Noruz Chania, Autograph Collection- Adults Only
address: Strati Pantelaki 5, Agioi Apostoloi, Agioi Apostoloi (Crete) 731 00
description: Located in a dreamy seaside setting, Domes Noruz Chania is an adults-only 16+ lifestyle resort awarded for its novel design that combines modern Greek design with a wide range of experiences and a cosmopolitan view of the world. From delicious cocktails of local ingredients to moonlit live jazz events at the beach and helicopter rides at the breathtaking Samaria Gorge, guests are invited to a highly curated world where unique experiences are the forefront. By embracing the past and the present of the city Noruz offers a fresh, contemporary way for design-savvy guests to explore Chania and enjoy it differently. The hotel's close proximity to the city makes it even more ideal, as Chania is amongst Mediterranean’s ‘must see’ cultural destinations. The old town offers a blend of Ottoman, Venetian and Greek architectures creating a stunning setting. The promenade, the old light house, the Venetian castle, the port and the Turkish mosque are perfect for exploration.Marriott

name: Domes Zeen Chania, a Luxury Collection Resort, Crete
address: Apteron Street, Kato Daratso, Darátsos 731 00
description: At Domes Zeen we emphasize community, sustainability, and slow living in an elegant setting. Nestled in a protected cove, a short drive from the Town of Chania, and offering spectacular views of the town and the sea, Domes Zeen is a destination in itself. We create the ultimate sensation of togetherness right in the heart of your Cretan sanctuary. Immerse yourself in a gourmet dining experience surrounded by the splendor of nature. Retreat to your private villa for restful moments on your private terrace or balcony before falling asleep under the stars to the silence of nature. This is your Domes Zeen experience, designed to awaken all senses.Marriott

name: Avra Imperial Hotel
address: Kolymbari, Chania 730 06
description: Built within 65,000 m² of gardens, Avra Imperial Hotel features a 1,500-m² pool area with a pool bar in the middle. The resort is 100 metres from Kolimvari Beach. The ultramodern guest rooms have a large bathroom with a tub and a shower, and are fitted with parquet floors. A flat-screen TV with cable and satellite channels and free Wi-Fi are standard. Some rooms have a private or shared pool, or a spacious terrace with hot tub. The Avra Imperial Hotel offers 3 swimming pools, including a freshwater children’s pool. The spa offers 10 massage rooms and a beauty salon. A state-of-the-art gym, steam room, Finnish sauna and indoor pool are available. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are served at the main restaurant offering a pool-facing terrace. Guests can sample traditional Cretan, Italian and international dishes at the hotel’s 4 à la carte restaurants. Room service is available. The hotel is a 2-minute walk to the centre of Kolimvari and 23 km west of Chania. The hotel is 35 km from Chania International Airport. The famous Samaria gorge is a 40-minute drive (58 km).

name: Vergina Beach Hotel
address: 134 Agia Marina, Nea Kydonia
description: Set right on the sandy beach of Agia Marina, Vergina Beach Hotel offers free WiFi in all areas and air-conditioned accommodation with views over the Cretan Sea. It includes a a swimming pool by the seaside and a plunge-spa pool with waterfall. Vergina studios, suites and apartments are simply, yet tastefully furnished, with a private balcony. They include a kitchenette with electric kettle and mini fridge, as well as a flat-screen TV. At the beach restaurant, you can enjoy breakfast, lunch and snacks. The cocktail bar serves cocktails, drinks and pizzas, and it also features 8 large flat-screen TVs. Within a few metres from the property, you will find a bakery, two super markets, ATMs, a bank, as well as bars and restaurants. The town and port of Chania are around 8 km away from Vergina Beach Hotel. Chania Airport is 17 km away.

name: Minos Mare Royal
address: Lassithiou 16, Rethymno
description: Located on the sandy beach of Platanias, Minos Mare Royal offers rooms with flat screen TVs and CD/DVD players, hot tub and a spa centre with sauna and indoor pool. Surrounded by gardens, Minos Mare Royal offers rooms and suites featuring free internet. The rooms also have a balcony overlooking the pool, the gardens or the sea. The Royal Restaurant offers views of the pool and serves a rich breakfast buffet. The a la carte restaurant Poseidon serves Mediterranean cuisine in a beach-side setting. The Queen’s Wine Bar serves a large wine selection, as well as refreshing cocktails.

name: Glaros Beach Hotel
address: Bouboulinas 5, Hersonissos
description: Glaros Beach Hotel is located in a quiet area of Chersonissos, next to the beach and only a few minutes’ walk from the centre. Each room is comfortably furnished and offers individual air conditioning, mini fridge, satellite TV and en suite bathroom with hairdryer. 18-hour room service is provided. In an idyllic atmosphere, overlooking the sea, in a romantic candlelight environment, Veranda Family Restaurant is the ideal place to enjoy the special dishes of creative Mediterranean and International Cuisine.

name: Elmi Suites Beach Hotel
address: Kolokotroni 2 Street, Hersonissos
description: Peacefully situated just 10 metres from the sandy beach, the seafront Elmi Suites Beach Hotel features 4 freshwater pools. Guests enjoy free access to the on-site gym and free WiFi. Modernly decorated, all suites at Elmi come complete with a hairdryer and satellite TV. Air conditioning comes standard. Buffet-style delicacies and dishes are served at the main restaurant throughout the day. Drinks and refreshments, as well as a lighter fare are available at the pool bar. Free sun loungers and umbrellas are available around the pool. Relaxing options such as a sauna, steam bath and hot tub, and massage rooms are provided upon charge. The multilingual reception staff are on hand 24/7, and will be happy to assist you with travel information and car or bike rentals. The lively centre of Hersonissos Town is 700 metres away and Malia Village is 7 km away. Heraklion International Airport is at a distance of 27 km.

name: Lyttos Mare
address: Anissaras, Hersonissos 700 14
description: Located in Hersonissos, 500 metres from Analipsi Beach, Lyttos Mare provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Featuring a kids' club, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms are equipped with a kettle, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also offer sea views. At Lyttos Mare each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. A vegetarian, vegan or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis and darts at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for cycling. Aposelemis Beach is 2.4 km from Lyttos Mare, while Anissaras Main Beach is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Heraklion International Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

name: Radisson Blu Beach Resort, Milatos Crete
address: Resort Milatos, Milatos
description: Close to the traditional fishing village, this resort offers a private beach, a variety of water sports and leisure activities. Set on a lush, 190,000 m² plot with palm trees, olive groves and waterfalls, the complex includes 5 swimming pools, 6 restaurants and 5 bars. The elegant rooms and suites at Radisson Blu Beach Resort open to private balconies with views of the Cretan Sea or the garden and pool. A satellite TV, a fridge and a hairdryer are provided. Wi-Fi is free in all areas. A buffet breakfast is served daily in the dining area. Guests can enjoy a selection of Greek and Mediterranean dishes in the elegant restaurants or on their large terraces, prepared in collaboration with Michelin-starred chef Yves Mattagne. Leisure facilities include massage treatments, a wellness center and a gift shop. Billiards and tennis courts are available on site, while younger guests can have fun at the kids' club, which has its own pool. Toboggans are also available for teenagers. Tailor-made excursions to cultural and gastronomic attractions of Crete can be arranged, while a luxury motor yacht can be used during your stay in the resort.WebBeds

name: Elounda Peninsula All Suite Hotel
address: Main Street, Elounda 720 53
description: Overlooking the Bay of Elounda, Elounda Peninsula All Suite Hotel is set on a peninsular stretch of land, with a view of Mirabello Bay and the Aegean Sea. It features elegantly decorated accommodation opening to a balcony or terrace with sea views. Offering a living room, all air-conditioned suites and villas come with a minibar. Some units are fitted with luxurious bathrooms with steam bath, while most have a private and individually heated pool. An American-style, a la carte breakfast can be enjoyed, whilst watching views of the bay. The awarded Calypso restaurant prepares gourmet dishes by the pool, while a selection of Greek and international wine labels are available at "Kellari" wine cellar. The "Koh" Pan-Asian restaurant, located just above sea level at the very tip of the peninsula, serves Asian cuisine. Guests will find an outdoor swimming pool with free sun beds and umbrellas, paddling pool and care centre for children. A private sandy beach with beach service, as well as water-sport facilities and tennis courts are offered. A 50-seat cinema features private screenings of films. Located at the sister property, the exclusive Six Senses Spa is equipped with an authentic Turkish bath, where guests can experience holistic treatments and therapies. The seaside Agios Nikolaos Town is 10 km away and Heraklion City is at a distance of 70 km. Nikos Kazantzakis International Airport is 68 km away. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Domes of Elounda,Autograph Collection
address: Main Street, Elounda 72053
description: Overlooking turqoise waters with stunning views of the castle on Spinalonga Isle, Domes of Elounda, Suites and Villas - only, Luxury Resort captures the essence of Crete with an enchanting demeanour, finely tuned service and defining architecture. At night, our community gather at CORE, the open air, ancient Greek style agora, that blends pop-up shopping with street food, socializing, art and a unique lineup of events. Four restaurants with stellar ambience, fuse what’s local with what’s timeless to create what’s next. Montessori inspired Kids and Teen zones with fun filled activities, allow ample me time for parents to recharge in adult - only areas. Soma Spa offers renewal and outdoor connection through indigenous ritual. Βοοκ the Haute Living Selection for premium luxury, where all-inclusive becomes all exclusive. For those who seek tasteful, thoughtfully curated experiences Domes of Elounda Luxury Family Resort is ideal for bonding with loved ones and creating lifelong collective memories.Marriott

name: Porto Elounda Golf & Spa Resort
description: The 5-star Porto Elounda Golf & Spa Resort, Six Senses Spa is situated along the coast of Elounda. All rooms have views of Mirabello Bay. Guests can play golf or tennis on site, or relax at the awarded Six Senses Spa. The airy rooms have wooden floors and a sea-view veranda with teak furniture and blooming plants. Equipment includes an LDC TV with satellite and cable channels, and a furnished seating area. Porto Elounda offers the first Six Senses Spa™ in Europe, with holistic treatments, covering an area of 2,200 m². Facilities include a heated freshwater indoor pool, sauna and steam room. The 9-hole golf course is available to resort guests only. The hotel’s water sports centre includes jet-skis, wind surfing, water ski and sailing. Luxury yachts are available, as well as a PADI certified scuba diving centre. There is also a playground for infants and kids with a variety of learning activities. Breakfast and dinner are served at the sea-view Nafsika Restaurant. You can choose to have lunch at Aglio e Olio serving Italian cuisine, or the beachfront tavern Odysseus. The Porto Elounda Golf & Spa Resort is 70 km away from Heraklion International Airport. The hotel's helicopter-pad allows direct transfers from Athens or Heraklion. Transportation within the hotel is possible.

name: Porto Platanias Beach Resort & Spa
address: Platanias 1, Platanias
description: Nestled in lush green and offering a spectacular view of the Cretan Sea and the island of Agii Theodori, Porto Platanias Beach Resort & Spa features 3 restaurants, 5 bars and 5 large swimming pools. Built on a sublime area of 30,000 square metres, right next to the sea, the 5-star Porto Platanias boasts a health and fitness centre, pampering guests with an indoor heated pool, sauna, steam bath, hot tub and therapeutic massages. The elegant rooms at Porto Platanias meet the highest aesthetic standards. All rooms are fully equipped and have balcony with sea, pool or garden views. Porto Platanias Beach Resort is located in one of the most cosmopolitan areas of Crete, Platanias, 9km west of the city of Chania, and 20km from the Chania airport.

name: Atlantis Beach Hotel
address: Ari Velouchioti Street 28, Rethymno
description: This 5-star Rethymnon Beach hotel has a Blue Flag sandy beach, equipped with loungers and parasols. Atlantis Beach Hotel offers rooms with balconies, large gardens and a 170-m² swimming pool. The air-conditioned rooms have free WiFi, LCD satellite TV with 25 foreign channels and 1 Greek news channel, and a fridge. Their balconies offer sea or pool view. All rooms overlook the beautiful hotel gardens. Knossos restaurant serves Greek and Cretan cuisine. The lobby bar serves drinks in a beautiful atmosphere with views of the sea. Both the beach and the pool areas are serviced by the lobby and pool bars. The hotel offers free sun beds and umbrellas around the pools. Relaxing facilities at the Atlantis include a fitness room and a sauna. It also features a children’s playground and a games room. Atlantis Beach Hotel is located on the sandy beach of Rethymno, 1.5 km from the old town and the Venetian harbour. Private parking is available in hotel's garage with extra cost.

name: Bella Beach Hotel
address: Anissaras Beach, 2Km From Hersonissos, Hersonissos 714 09
description: Lying on the sandy beach of Anissaras, the 5-star Bella Beach offers elegant accommodation with views over the Cretan Sea or the complex’s well-kept gardens. It includes 2 swimming pools, 2 restaurants and offers extended wellness facilities. The air-conditioned rooms at Bella Beach are decorated in light olive-green tones and open out to a private balcony. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, DVD player, mini fridge, free toiletries and hairdryer. Free WiFi is available and safety boxes are provided upon charge. Pergola Restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner in buffet style, while Olive Tree Restaurant prepares Mediterranean dishes a la carte. The 3 bars, on the lobby, the beach and by the pool, are ideal for enjoying an exotic cocktail while overlooking the sea. Guests can pamper themselves at the on-site spa centre including an indoor pool, a hot tub and a hammam. The property also features a variety of sports facilities, such as 2 tennis courts, a mini-golf course and a basketball court. The lively town of Hersonissos with its many nightlife options is around 4 km from the resort. Nikos Kazantzakis International Airport is at 25 km. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Rethymno Mare Royal & Water Park
address: Skaleta, Rethymno 741 00
description: Just a few metres from Skaleta Beach, Rethymno Mare Royal features a pool with a sun terrace, a bar and a restaurant. Covering a lush 35.000-m2 area, the property also includes a tennis court, a mini market, 2 coference rooms and a games room with billiards. All rooms and suites of Mare Royal open to a balcony overlooking the pool and the Cretan Sea. Fitted with marbled floors and warm colours, each air-conditioned unit features a fridge, a safe and a Samsung Smart IP TV 43". The private bathroom is stocked with bathrobes, slippers and a hairdryer. Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast with local specialities served daily at Dionysos Restaurant. Drinks and coffees can be enjoyed at the pool bar or the beach bar, while Mediterranean flavours are served at the restaurant. Themed nights with live music are also scheduled regularly. Children can swim safely in their own pool, while there is also animation program, kids’ buffet and a mini club. Sun beds and umbrellas are available by the pool and on the beach. Other facilities include table tennis, darts, volleyball, water polo, boccia. Massage treatments can be arranged upon request, while room service is also available. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide car rental and ticket services. Free WiFi is available throughout. Rethymno Mare Royal lies within 11 km from Rethymno Town and Port and 65 km from Heraklion City. The seaside Bali Village with its sandy beach is at 21 km. Free parking is possible on site.

name: Kalyves Beach Hotel
address: Kalyves Apokoronas, Kalyves 730 03
description: Kalyves Beach Hotel lies by the sea, next to the river Xydas in Kalyves, a village located in the province of Apokoronas. It features 2 swimming pools and a beach bar serving summer cocktails. Guests enjoy free access to the gym, and free use of the sun beds and umbrellas around the pools and on the beach and free Wi-Fi throughout. A TV lounge and a playground are also at the guests’ disposal. Kalyves Beach Hotel offers modern, spacious rooms, with an excellent view, to the river, sea or the mountains. Room facilities include air conditioning, satellite TV, refrigerator and hairdryer. Safety boxes are available at an extra charge. American breakfast buffet is served at the hotel’s breakfast restaurant or at the veranda, just a stone’s throw from the waterfront. A romantic candlelit dinner with a bottle of wine from Kalyves Beach wine list will make for the perfect evening. For those preferring a casual lunch or a drink the Beach Bar and the pool bar are ideal for enjoying lunch, coffee or drinks. Kalyves Beach Hotel is 29 km from the airport of Chania.

name: Drossia Palms Hotel and Nisos Beach Suites
address: Dimokratias Street 133, Mália
description: Drossia Palms Hotel and Nisos Beach Suites is a beautiful complex set amidst delightful gardens with palm trees and located 150 metres from the Malia beach. It consists of 2 separate buildings and features a private beach area with sun loungers and umbrellas. Facilities include a snack bar, pool table and large swimming pool area with sun terrace. The rooms are spacious and tastefully decorated. They all have private balconies overlooking the complex, air conditioning and kitchenette facilities. With a location right next to Malia's entertainment district and central beach strip, Drossia Palms Hotel and Nisos Beach Suites allows you to enjoy this vibrant seaside resort. Staff can also arrange excursions on request.

name: Minoa Palace Resort & Spa
address: Palea Ethniki Odos Kissamou Chanion, Platanias
description: Experience world-class service at Minoa Palace Resort. Minoa Palace Resort consists of 2 buildings that are connected through a pedestrian overpass that provides direct access to the beach from both buildings. Built within a 35,000-m² area of landscaped gardens, in Platanias, the Minoa Palace Resort features 4 pools and a wellness centre. It offers a variety of dining options and elegant accommodation with free Internet access. The air-conditioned rooms at Minoa Palace enjoy beautiful sea, pool or garden views from their private balcony. They feature marble bathrooms and a living area with satellite TV. The hotel’s spa boasts a 250-m² indoor pool, a hot tub, hammam and sauna. Guests can pamper themselves with aromatherapy, hot stone massages and face treatments. A tennis court and a fitness room are also available. Guests can choose among the 4 restaurants of the Minoa Palace serving Italian, Greek and Cretan cuisine. 4 bars serve drinks and exotic cocktails in stylish indoor and outdoor settings. Greek breakfast is served daily. The picturesque town of Chania is within 12 km of the resort. Chania International Airport is a 30-minute drive away. Free WiFi is available in public areas and free on-site parking is possible.

name: I Resort Beach Hotel & Spa
address: Agiou Ioannou 44, Hersonissos 700 07
description: Situated right on the sandy beach of Stalida, the 5-star I- Resort Beach Hotel offers elegantly decorated rooms. It includes a spa centre and 2 restaurants. The air-conditioned rooms of I- Resort Beach Hotel Lounge feature parquet floors and light wood furnishings. They come with a satellite LCD TV, minibar and hairdryer. All rooms have balconies, while most of them enjoy Cretan Sea views. The 2 pools have wooden decks with free sun loungers and umbrellas. Facilities include 2 restaurants, as well as 2 bars, the main and the pool bar. I- Resort Beach Hotel is a few minutes’ walk from the centre of Stalida. Heraklion airport is at 35 km. Free private on-site parking is available. There is no ATM on the property but nearby.

name: Eliros Mare Beachfront Poem Hotel
address: Kavros Apokoronou - Georgioupolis, Georgioupoli
description: Offering a pool with sun terrace and a snack bar, the beachfront Eliros Mare Beachfront Poem Hotel is located in Georgioupolis Village. It features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony or terrace. Free WiFi access is available in all areas. All rooms of Eliros come with a satellite TV and views to the garden, the pool or the Cretan Sea. Each has a marble bathroom with hairdryer. A minibar and a safety deposit box can be provided upon charge. Guests may enjoy light meals and refreshing beverages at the on-site snack bar. A restaurant and a supermarket for the general supplies can be reached within short walking distance. A bus stop is 50 metres away. The scenic Rethymno Town with its scenic Venetian harbour is at a distance of 22 km and Chania International Airport is 48 km away.

name: Minos Palace Hotel Agios Nikolaos
address: 721 00, Agios Nikolaos
description: With magnificent sea views from a rocky headland above Aghios Nikolaos Bay, this adults-only resort blends together all the ingredients for a relaxing holiday. Just 1.2 mi from the town center, this hotel with a beach-side location offers you a pleasant site from which to enjoy the north-east coast of Crete and the capital of the Lasithi province. Take time out to relax by the saltwater swimming pool or rest by the lapping waves of the hotel's private beach, where you can try various water-sports. For ultimate relaxation, indulge in a beauty treatment at the spa or unwind with a gentle stroll through landscaped gardens before dinner and drinks in the evening. This is our guests' favorite part of Agios Nikolaos, according to independent reviews.VRBO

name: Aquila Porto Rethymno
address: Sikelianou & Venizelou 52a, Rethymno 741 00
description: Located on the sandy beach of Rethymno and within a short walk from the Old Town, Aquila Porto Rethymno features 3 freshwater pools, a private beach and 2 restaurants. The hotel complex offers a variety of sports and leisure activities, such as massage treatments and yoga lessons. Featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and earthy colours, the rooms of Aquila overlook the Cretan Sea or the town from their balcony. Each unit is equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV and a mini bar. The luxurious bathroom is stocked with bathrobes, slippers and a hairdryer. Guests can start their day with a continental or an American buffet breakfast. Cretan, Mediterranean and International flavours are prepared at the Piazza Di Porto Restaurant and at the main restaurant for lunch or dinner. Drinks and exotic cocktails can be enjoyed at the poolside snack bar. A welcome drink, and a welcome pack with wine and water, are offered upon arrival. A variety of happenings, such as dance shows and cooking lessons, are organized. Younger guests can also enjoy themselves playing games and taking part at competitions at the on-site fun club. Guests can also benefit from the free use of the gym and sauna, as well as sunbeds and umbrellas. Aquila Porto Rethymno is situated 600 metres from Rethymnon Port and 61 km from Chania International Airport. Heraklion International Airport is at 84 km, while Heraklion Town and Port is at 80 km.

name: Cretan Malia Park a Member of Design Hotels
address: Malia,700 07, Mália 700 07
description: Located in the midst of rich med nature, along a secluded sandy beach in Malia Village, Cretan Malia Park is a family-friendly resort, that features a sandy beach, long river pool, a main swimming pool, heated pool for the shoulder season and a children's pool. The stylish hotel includes 4 restaurants and offers a variety of activities from relaxing treatments at Cute Spa, such as yoga, meditation sessions and pilates classes to basketball, volleyball and biking. Free WiFi access is provided throughout. Elegantly decorated with tiled floors, custom-made furnishings and artwork, the light-filled rooms, bungalows and suites of Cretan Malia Park are equipped with refrigerators, air conditioning, safe and a Smart TV. Each unit features a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries based on Greek bio olive oil. Scales, bathrobes, slippers and magnifying mirrors are available in all rooms. Guests can start their day with a Mediterranean or Cretan breakfast including various cheese types, homemade pies and honey. For lunch, guests can now choose between a la carte dining in the Mediterraneo Restaurant, Italian cuisine at Almyra, tapas at the Beach Shack and levantine cuisine at the new poolside MEZZE. For dinner, guests can choose between the Mediterraneo Restaurant, Mouries Cretan Restaurant, Almyra Italian Restaurant, Mezze restaurant and The Beach Shack. An upgraded selection of wine and beverages is available. The hotel's entertainment team provides Greek cookery as well as evening shows, fun and games. The younger guests can spend their time at the Little Explorers kid's club, baking, gardening or performing, at the playground or the kid's pool. For teenagers, The Place offers cinema screenings, hot tub fun and lounging in hammocks. Labeled as a bike-friendly hotel, Cretan Malia Park also provides bike rental services. Guests may cycle around the hotel and through nearby villages and explore at their own pace the wild beauty of Crete. Other facilities include the Bostani-organic kitchen garden where pop-up garden dinners are hosted every week, and 4 bars: The Beach Shack, The Crush – a coffee & sweets corner, the Melissi Bar and the new Kafenio that serves traditional Greek coffee and Cretan mezze. The beachfront is extensive and runs for about 5 km, between Stalida and Malia. The centre of the lively Malia lies within 2.5 km from Cretan Malia Park, while Heraklion International Airport is at a distance of 34 km.

name: Grande Albergo Delle Rose
address: 4 Georgiou Papanikolaou Street, Rhodes
description: Just a 3-minute walk from Rhodes Town, the classic Grande Albergo Delle Rose, boasts a seasonal swimming pool. This beachfront hotel features a casino, while guests can pamper themselves at the spa and wellness center. The elegantly decorated rooms and suites at Grande Albergo Delle Rose offer air conditioning, flat-screen TV, a wardrobe and a desk. All units include a private bathroom with free Bvlgari toiletries, slippers and hair dryer. Some rooms at the hotel feature a balcony with sea views. Most suites are fitted with a spa bath. A continental or an à la carte breakfast is served daily at the property. Guests can enjoy their meals at the restaurant, have a cocktail on the pool bar or a beverage at the lobby bar. The on-site business centre is equipped with printing, copying and fax services and can accommodate corporate or private events. Rhodes Aquarium is 700 metres from Hotel Grande Albergo Delle Rose. The Street of Knights and Clock Tower are 900 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Rhodes International Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa
address: Rhodes, Rhodes 851 00
description: Providing free WiFi, Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa is located in Ixia. The hotel provides a spa experience, with its hot tub, sauna and fitness centre. Guests can make use of a private beach area. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. All rooms come with a private bathroom, free toiletries and a balcony. At Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa rooms come with a seating area. The accommodation offers a buffet or gluten-free breakfast. At Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa you will find Asian Restaurant. The hotel offers 4 outdoor swimming pools. You can play tennis at this 5-star hotel. With staff speaking German, English and French, round-the-clock guidance is available at the reception. Rhodes Town is 4 km from Akti Imperial Deluxe Resort & Spa, while Faliraki is 9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rhodes International Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Sheraton Rhodes Resort
address: Ialyssos Avenue, Ialysos 851 00
description: Rhodes, a city with a 2400 year history, the place that gave birth to legends and hosted significant personalities of politics, the arts and culture, with a beauty that enthralled its conquerors through the centuries, hosts the welcoming Sheraton Rhodes Resort. Our 5-star hotel is cocooned in the beauty of its attractive lush gardens with the blue expanse of the pristine waters in front of its private beach, is ideally situated in a key spot in Ixia, just 4 kilometres from the famous Medieval Town of Rhodes, the best preserved Medieval City in the world and an UNESCO World Heritage Monument. Our family friendly resort encompasses in its grounds and services the very things that Rhodes offers natural beauty, unique architecture, a variety of entertainment options, modern infrastructure and traditional hospitality.Marriott

name: Elite Suites By Rhodes Bay
address: 100 Iraklidon Avenue, Rhodes 851 01
description: 5-star Elite Suites by Rhodes Bay stands on the picturesque coastal resort of Ixia, 4 km from Rhodes Town. Guests enjoy direct beach access, and free use of the gym, sauna and steam bath. The sophisticated suites have a living area with a corner sofa bed. The bathroom has a full-length tub, separate shower, and two washbasins. They all feature expansive terraces, several with a private garden or private pool. Guests enjoy 3 outdoor freshwater swimming pools, including one located on the 11th floor with a panoramic view over Ixia bay. The 1,300-square-metre spa provides 14 treatment rooms, including a couple’s room. The Pool Deck restaurant is open for lunch, coffee and snacks, while the Varkarola Taverna serves international cuisine for lunch and dinner. Drinking outlets include a panoramic rooftop bar and a semi-submerged pool bar. Diagoras Airport is 10 km away. The famous Butterfly Valley is 20 km away. On-site parking is free.

name: Helea Lifestyle Beach Resort
address: Kallithea, Rhodes 851 00
description: Facing the beachfront, Helea Lifestyle Beach Resort offers 5-star accommodation in Kallithea Rhodes and features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and garden. Featuring room service, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The accommodation provides a business centre, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony. An American breakfast is available daily at the resort. Helea Lifestyle Beach Resort offers a children's playground. Speaking Arabic, German, Greek and English, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the reception. Agia Marina Beach is 1.9 km from the accommodation, while Kalithea Beach is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Rhodes International Airport, 17 km from Helea Lifestyle Beach Resort.

name: Rhodos Horizon Blu
address: Valaoritou, 2, Rhodes
description: Rhodos Horizon Blu-Adults Only is less than 1 km away from Rhodes Town, and only 50 metres from the Blue Flag Psaropoula Beach. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a hot tub, gym and sauna. The warmly decorated rooms at Rhodos Horizon Blu-Adults Only have luxurious private bathrooms. They include free Wi-Fi, TVs with satellite connection, a mini fridge and a well-stocked minibar. A selection of Greek and international dishes is served at the specialty Stage Cooking Restaurant and the a la carte Theme Restaurant. Refreshing drinks and exotic cocktails are served at the Lounge Cocktail Bar. A variety of treatment therapies, such as aromatotherapy, reflexology and body scrubs, can be provided at the spa centre, where guests can also relax using the sauna or the steam room. Rhodos Horizon Blu-Adults Only is 14 km from Rhodes Airport, while it is walking distance from the centre of Rhodes and its attractions. The island’s main port is only 1 km away. Parking on site is free, and car hire can be arranged through the 24-hour front desk.

name: Lindian Village Beach Resort, Curio Collection By Hilton
address: Lardos Beach, Rhodes 851 09
description: Our Lardos Beach resort features native gardens and a private beach. Outdoor spaces highlight Rhodian-style rooms, some have private pools. Enjoy local, Asian, and Italian cuisines, spa treatments, and wellness activities. We’re five kilometers from a nature reserve, and The Medieval City of Rhodes, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is an hour away.Hilton

name: Valis Resort Hotel
address: Agrias Station, Vólos 373 00
description: Valis Resort Hotel is just 4 km. from the town of Volos and offers a fitness center, indoor and outdoor pool, floating platform for swimming, pool bar, bar by the sea and 4 restaurants. It is a children friendly hotel, with experienced educators, kids cinema and play room with toys for older children. Most of the elegant rooms and suites at Valis Resort Hotel enjoy view of Pagasitikos Gulf. Free WiFi is available throughout. Free private parking is possible on site. Valis spa centre offers a lot of popular types of body massages. It also offers total therapies based on old Thailand practices, integrated facial and body treatments, sauna, steam room and gym. The hotel organizes succesfully business meetings, conferences, corporate and social events. It has several conference rooms but the Valis Grand Ballroom, is the largest and fully equipped conference area at Magnesia. Valis Resort offers Greek gastronomy, certificated Greek breakfast and American buffet breakfast. You can taste local greek “tsipouro” at the traditional Tsipouradiko by the sea with gastronomy sea food or enjoy Mediterranean cuisine at Agraia restaurant. Alternatively, you can use the one of the two private restaurants, on demand. The poolside bar offers cocktails, drinks, cold coffees and delicious snacks. Agria area is very beautiful with great beaches around and a lot of monasteries. Valis Resort Hotel is built on the seafront and it is the perfect base for visiting the famous beaches and the picturesque villages of Pelion mountain.

name: Infinity Blue Boutique Hotel & Spa - Adults Only
address: Daidalou 9, Hersonissos 70014
description: Offering the main outdoor swimming pool, pool bar and two restaurants, Infinity Blue Boutique Hotel & Spa is settled just a breath above the “Blue Flag” awarded beach of Hersonissos. The bright and spacious air conditioned rooms feature a stylish white-blue decor and large windows. Each one includes free wi-fi, flat-screen TV, safe box, mini-bar, coffee machine and private bathroom. There is a 24-hour front desk at Infinity Blue Boutique Hotel & Spa, as well as free WiFi in public areas. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. Guests may enjoy buffet or a la carte menus at the on site restaurant Wellness options includes spa, sauna, hamam, hydromassage and hairdresser salon. Their use comes with extra charge. The lively main street, boasting an array of restaurants and bars, is located within a short walking distance of the property. A supermarket can be found at a distance of 10 metres, while a bus station is 50 m away. Nikos Kazantzakis Airport is 20 km from the property and free private parking is available on site.

name: Akti Taygetos Conference Resort
address: Mikri Mantinia, 74, Kalamata
description: Located at the foot of Mount Taygetos and at the heart of the Messinian Gulf, Akti Taygetos - Conference Resort is a few metres of the beach and features a large swimming pool with hot tub, and a private beach area. The property includes 3 bars, one of which is beachfront, and 2 restaurants and offers free WiFi access throughout. The centre of Kalamata is 6 km away. Opening to a balcony with lovely views to the sea or the hotel’s lush gardens, the units at Akti Taygetos - Conference Resort feature minimal decor and soft colours. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, mini fridge, safe, hairdryer and air conditioning. Free toiletries are also included. A rich buffet breakfast including traditional products is served at Amymoni restaurant. The a-la-carte restaurant Anassa serves authentic Greek dishes and grilled steaks by the pool. At Red Roses bar, guests can choose a cigar from the wide variety offered and enjoy the oriental atmosphere. Offering unique views, Costa-Costa Bar on The Beach is ideal for a cool drink, exotic cocktail and snacks under the sound of chill-out music. Guests may enjoy rejuvenating and therapeutic massages at the on-site spa centre. A private beach lies right in front of the hotel featuring sun beds and umbrellas. Private on-site parking is provided free of charge.

name: Smy Mediterranean White Santorini
address: Kamari Beach 58272, Kamari 847 00
description: The Smy Mediterranean White Santorini in Santorini is a 4-star hotel with a wide range of services and facilities. Our unit has been constructed in a traditional Aegean style and lies 200 metres from the beach, covering an extent of 10 acres. The establishment contains gardens. It is advised for unique and unforgettable holidays, since it is a real paradise.

name: Afrodite Hotel
address: Alyki, Parikia 844 00
description: Just 100 metres from the picturesque fishing village of Aliki and within walking distance of 3 beautiful beaches, the charming, Cycladic-style Aphrodite features a pool with sun terrace and a poolside bar. Leisure and sport facilities include a sauna, a fitness centre and a massage room. Aphrodite Hotel’s well-appointed rooms are well presented; each air-conditioned room offers its own personality along with private balcony, minibar and cable TV. Guests can start their day with a Greek breakfast on request, enriched with feta cheese, rusks and olives. The bar serves refreshing drinks and snacks, which guests can enjoy by the pool or at the blossomed garden. Local cafés, traditional taverns, restaurants and shops are close to the hotel. Windsurfing, kite surfing and snorkelling, as well as many other water sports are available just a short stroll away.

name: Divani Apollon Palace & Thalasso
address: 10 Ag. Nikolaou & Iliou Str., Vouliagméni 166 71
description: Surrounded by the enchanting scenery of Athens Riviera, with magnificent sea views, Divani Apollon Palace & Thalasso features a state-of-the-art thalassotherapy centre. In a majestic environment surrounded by sea, guests enjoy 3 pools, 4 restaurants and a private beach. Divani Apollon Palace & Thalasso offers luxurious rooms with furnished sea-facing balconies. The elegantly decorated rooms, are fitted with designer fabrics, oak furniture, paintings and all share stunning views to the sea and the pools. At Papaioannou fine-dining restaurant, guests can indulge in a delicious gastronomy with treasures of the sea and culinary plates accompanied by fine wine and an intimate atmosphere just in front of the sea. At Breakfast the extensive buffet includes a great variety of Greek delicacies as well as European favorites and of course fresh fruits and juices. Casual restaurants include Anemos, with buffets and outdoor seating with views to the pool and sea, the bright and contemporary Atlantis Lounge and A&D bar, both offering light snacks, signature cocktails and live music. Meltemi poolside snack bar offers a shaded seating area that overlooks the pools and is open during the summer period. The Awarded Spa, by World Travel Awards 2014, invites guests to experience a completely different programme of rejuvenation and wellbeing with its programs. Facilities include a 270-m² indoor pool, roman baths, 2 saunas, 2 Turkish baths and a variety of more than 100 facial and body therapies. Active guests will enjoy the flood-lit tennis court and jogging route. Watersports at the property's private beach are also available. Divani Apollon Palace & Thalasso is 18 km from downtown Athens. Glyfada, famous for shopping and night life, is only 5 minutes away by shuttle bus. Glyfada Golf Club is easily reached at 3 km. The hotel has a 250-car garage.

name: Costa Grand Resort & Spa
address: Kamari Beach, Kamari 847 00
description: Perfectly located right on the cosmopolitan black sandy beach of Kamari, Costa Grand Resort & Spa offers luxury accommodation with a private beach area.The property offers sun beds and umbrellas a few steps from the lounge bar, where guests can order their drinks and enjoy them by the beach. All the air-conditioned rooms in the resort are fitted with a flat-screen TV, coffee/tea facilities, safety deposit box and a bathroom with a shower. A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the property. Guests can enjoy Mediterranean recipes to international dishes and traditional Greek specialties right on the beach at the on-site restaurant. Other facilities include a wellness centre where you can benefit from a wide range of rejuvenating face and body treatments and signature spa experiences. The accommodation can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. The nearest airport is Santorini (Thira) Airport, 4 km from the property. You can find the port 10 km from Costa Grand Resort & Spa.

name: Elounda Gulf Villas
address: Mesa Pigadia-Elounda 72 053, Elounda
description: Located just a short stroll from the sea in Elounda, the family-run property offers stylish villas with a private pool, and individually decorated luxury suites with Cretan Sea or garden views. Guests enjoy 1 a la carte restaurant. Each elegant suite features a DVD player, fully equipped kitchen with microwave and marble bathroom with hydromassage. They all boast access to the communal swimming pool. Elounda Gulf Villas by Sandglass have a spacious living room and hot tub. Breakfast is served daily at the main pool terrace. Drinks are served at the stylish bar. BBQ facilities can also be found in the premises of Elounda Gulf Villas by Sandglass. The property offers free transfer to a private Beach Club, located within a 10-minute drive, while complimentary transfer service to and from the beach is provided. Services like massage in the privacy of the suite or in the Elixir Spa Gallery, and diving lessons in the main pool can be provided upon request. An Elixir Spa Gallery is provided for those who like to work out. Heraklion City is 70 km away. The town of Agios Nikolaos is at a distance of approximately 10 km. Free private parking is possible on site, and transfer from and to Heraklion Airport is offered.

name: The Westin Resort, Costa Navarino
address: Navarino Dunes, Costa Navarino
description: Beachfront located by the Ionian Sea in Navarino Dunes area of Costa Navarino, the prime sustainable destination in the Mediterranean, The Westin Resort Costa Navarino offers limitless opportunities to energize, relax and transform. Being praised as top in Greece with Condé Nast Traveller’s 2022 Readers’ Choice Award in “The best resorts in the world”, the property is a unique escape for families with countless ways to explore and play; two innovative kids’ clubs, the one-of-a-kind Division 16 youth hub, an impressive Aqua Park, refreshing pools and the endless beach, combine with a wide variety of sports and activities including four signature golf courses, the new Mouratoglou Tennis Center, on- and under-water sports, outdoor pursuits to the breath-taking nature and more. Savor nourishing menus and locally sourced dishes in a stunning variety of venues, unwind at the Anazoe Spa with its natural, therapeutic treatments, or discover the region’s culture through a series of authentic experiences.Marriott

name: Grecotel Creta Palace
address: Missiria, Rethymno
description: Grecotel Creta Palace enjoys a prime location, right by a fine sandy beach and 5 km from the centre of Rethymnon. This exclusive 5-star resort boasts 10 restaurants and bars, 2 outdoor pools. one indoor pool and a private beach area. The elegant rooms at the Grecotel Creta Palace are air conditioned and have wooded floors. They come with a minibar, flat-screen TV comes with satellite channels and mini hi-fi. Bathrobes and slippers are complimentary. Awarded for its fine cuisine, Grecotel Creta Palace offers no less than 10 food and beverage choices. Guests can spend relaxed moments in the impressive pool area with outdoor pools, indoor pools and children’s pool with waterslides. The new sea-front Elixir Spa proposes facial and body treatments from Indian therapists. Features include an indoor pool with jet black mosaics, pool-view gym with state-of-the-art equipment and a hot tub sun patio.

name: Domes Aulus Elounda, Curio Collection by Hilton
address: Agia Paraskevi, Agios Nikolaos 720 53
description: Ideally set in Mirabello Bay, our central location offers a tranquil escape near all the city’s top attractions. The beautiful coastline, shaded beaches and crystal clear seas is mere steps from our front door. Our peaceful retreat offers onsite dining, spa, two pools and breathtaking views of the Aegean Sea and Cretan landscape.Hilton

name: Milos Cove
address: Komia Agkali Beach, Plaka 848 00
description: Boasting a private beach area and free WiFi throughout the property, Milos Cove is set in Thiorikhía Mílou. Featuring a restaurant, the property also features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. The hotel features a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, all suites and villas are fitted with either a private pool or plunge pool. Every room is equipped with air conditioning, and certain rooms at Milos Cove have a terrace. At the accommodation rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. An American breakfast is available each morning at the property. The hotel includes 2 bars, the Agkali Beach Bar and Pnoe Pool Bar and 2 restaurants, the Pathos Restaurant and The PathosPrive Restaurant & Opbisidian Spa. The hotel offers a business centre for guest use.

name: Minois - Small Luxury Hotels of the World
address: Parasporos PO Box 115, Parikia
description: Set right by the sea, 300 metres away from the beach of Parasporos, Minois - Small Luxury Hotels of the World features a modern spa and a sea-water pool. It offers elegant, 5-star accommodation with free Wi-Fi and large verandas. Decorated in light tones, all units are equipped with a 32” flat-screen, satellite TV, air conditioning and mini fridge. Free toiletries can be found in the bathroom. Start your day with a Greek buffet breakfast including local cheese and sausages, homemade pies and jams, and a variety of fresh fruit. At the bar by the pool, you can enjoy cocktails, fresh juices and snacks. Parikia, the capital and port of Paros, is 3 km away and Paros Airport is 6 km away. A bus stop can be found within 350 metres.

name: Kriti Beach
address: 18 A Papanastasiou Str, Rethymno 741 00
description: Kriti Beach Hotel lies right by a Blue Flag beach of Rethymnon, and a 5-minute walk from the Venetian Harbour. It features a heated pool, sauna and steam room and serves certified Greek breakfast in the morning. Each elegantly decorated room at Kriti Beach Hotel is air-conditioned and has private balcony with sea or mountain views. Greek breakfast is included in the room rate. Guests enjoy free WiFi and free parking. A bottle of wine is offered upon arrival. Leisure facilities include a sweet-water pool with free umbrellas and sun chairs, and water sports. A guest lounge with TV and an internet café are also available. Active guests will also find a complete fitness centre. The poolside snack bar serves a variety of Greek and other Mediterranean flavours throughout the day, while guests can also enjoy unique flavours at the a la carte "Chimera" restaurant for dinner. Breakfast includes thyme honey, traditional soups and pies, local meat delicacies and herbal beverages.

name: Brae-Mar B&B
address: 99 Coleraine Road, Portrush, BT56 8HN
description: On Northern Ireland’s North Coast, the Brae-Mar B&B is just a 10-minute walk from the centre of Portrush and the beach. It has large individually designed rooms with free Wi-Fi. Rooms at the Brae-Mar all feature TVs and private bathrooms with hairdryers. Tea/coffee making facilities are provided and some accommodation has fully-equipped kitchens and lounges. A traditional breakfast is served each morning in the charming dining room. The North Antrim Coast has many spectacular walks, and fishing and water sports are available at Portrush Bay. Free parking is available at the Brae Mar B&B. Brae-Mar has free parking onsite and is conveniently located opposite a Lidl supermarket with petrol station, post office, ATM, Off License and Fast Food within 100m

name: Crowne Plaza Antalya
address: Akdeniz Bulvari Gursu Mah. 306, Antalya 07070
description: Enjoy a fascinating holiday experience with the unique beauty of the Mediterranean Sea. We invite you to the world-renowned Konyaalti Beach surrounded by the deep blue sea and the Taurus Mountains. You can enjoy peace in the hot summer months while you swim on the clean beaches of the unique Konyaalti Beach with a blue flag. As soon as you arrive to Crowne Plaza Antalya, the smiling and professional teams will be ready to welcome you and help you have a great holiday. You can also view the matchless landscape of Antalya using the Tunektepe Aerial Tramway next to the hotel. You can watch the sunset and the Beydag Mountains on the terrace of the Neapolis Fine Dining on the 10th floor. Only 23 kilometers away from the airport, you can easily reach the hotel and discover the narrow streets of the ancient city where you can see historical monuments with a 15-minute drive. Charming everyone who loves to do sports anytime they want, Crowne Plaza Antalya offers a wide range of choices with indoor and outdoor swimming pools, gyms furnished with sports equipment, and 7 kilometers of beach and running track lying right before the hotel. The resting pool, Turkish bath and Finnish sauna in the SPA center will help you refresh yourself and relax your soul. The hotel has a car park area, and you can apply to the valet services offered by the hotel. Invite your friends to the meeting rooms in Crowne Plaza Antalya.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel 1207 Special Class
address: Barbaros Mahallesi Kocatepe Sokak No: 13 Kaleiçi, Antalya 07100
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Hotel 1207 Special Class offers accommodation in Antalya. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Every room has a flat-screen TV.
