Another distinguished spot where the guests of Sianji Well-Being Resort treat themselves is Muu Spa, which offers a set of different alternatives such as Asian massages, traditional Turkish bath, Turkish body scrubbing, foam massage, VIP bath and family bath. Guests can use VIP bath if they wish and have a chocolate, champagne bath in a hot tub in VIP massage rooms after the massage. You can benefit from Muu Spa's exclusive services upon request at a surcharge. Sianji Well-Being Resort presents a variety of different tastes. A new gourmet experience can be lived at Elani Beach Restaurant as a la carte service, On the other hand healthy food specialties and trendy raw food cuisine a la carte menu is presented at Wellness Restaurant. Nunu Restaurant is the open buffet restaurant where wide variety of both healthy and fusion dishes from all over the world chosen during summer. The resort is situated 3 km from Turgutreis town, surrounded by islands of Kos and Kalimnos. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 55 km from Sianji Well-Being Resort.

name: Asteria Bodrum Resort
address: Asarlik Mevkii Guembet, Bodrum 48400
description: Selectum Colours Bodrum features a free-form pool with a hot tub, a traditional Hammam and wellness centre offering alternative health and beauty treatments. It is 5 minutes’ walk away from Gumbet beachfront. Each room is air-conditioned and feature a TV with multilingual channels and a comfortable armchair in the seating area. Each one has a private balcony, some with panoramic sea views. At Selectum Colours Bodrum, guests can take part in diving, windsurfing and canoeing or enjoy a refreshing work-out in the fitness centre. In the evening, the hotel’s entertainment staff organises cabaret, disco evenings or live music shows. Selectum Colours Bodrum is 3.5 km away from Bodrum Amphitheatre. Attractions located in central Bodrum, such Bodrum Castle, is 5 km away.

name: MGallery The Bodrum Hotel Yalikavak
address: Yalikavak Mahallesi 91 Sokak No 6, Bodrum 48990
description: Nestled in the charming town of Yalikavak, MGallery The Bodrum Hotel is your closest destination, to the famous Marina. The hotel offers a range of designed rooms from cozy Junior Suites to luxurious Executive Suites, and spacious Two-Bedroom Family Suites, each room combines comfort and style for a delightful stay. Enjoy the hotel's amenities, including an infinity pool, a beachfront restaurant and bar, a poolside bar, and the main restaurant Bohemy. The spa features an indoor pool, hammam, gym, treatmenaccorhotels.com

name: Very Chic Hotel - Adult Only
address: Zengin Huseyin Sok no 15 Gümbet Sahili, Bodrum 48400
description: Set 250 metres from the seafront in Gumbet’s city centre, The Otium Senses Very Chic Bodrum Adult Only offers rooms with a balcony. It features a private beach and an outdoor pool surrounded by tropical gardens. Free WiFi is available in shared areas. The air-conditioned rooms are decorated with tiled floors, wooden furniture, and floor-to-ceiling windows. All rooms have satellite TV, a minibar, and an en suite bathroom. Some rooms have views of the palm gardens. Guests can get a relaxing massage at the spa, which also includes a sauna, a fitness centre, and a Turkish bath with aromatherapy. Very Chic Hotel serves à la carte meals, while the Pool Bar offers refreshing drinks. The Millionaires Beach Club hosts happy hour and has sun bathing areas. Bodrum’s city centre is a 10-minute drive from The Otium Senses Very Chic Bodrum Adult Only. The Bodrum-Milas Airport is 50 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Olira Boutique Hotel&spa
address: Yali Mevkii, Gundogan Plaji No: 66, Bodrum 48400
description: Situated in the seafront of the picturesque Gundogan Bay, Olira Boutique Hotel&SPA has stylish accommodation with a private balcony. The hotel offers a private beach with a sun terrace, an outdoor pool and spa facilities. Each of the contemporary rooms is equipped with plenty of modern amenities, including an LCD TV, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. They all offer sea or pool views. There is also a hot tub in some rooms. The restaurant of Olira offers selected dishes of Turkish and international cuisine accompanied with sea views. Daily breakfast is served as an open buffet at the hotel. You can also enjoy refreshing drinks and delicious cocktails from the bar. The spa and wellness centre of the hotel includes a sauna, steam bath and massage room. There is also a well-equipped fitness centre on site. Bodrum city centre is 20 km from the hotel. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 50 km away.

name: Mett Hotel & Beach Resort Bodrum
address: Eskicesme Mah Haremtan Sok, Bodrum 48400
description: Featuring free WiFi, a restaurant and a year-round outdoor pool and an indoor pool, METT Hotel & Beach Resort Bodrum offers a spa centre, sauna, hammam and a private beach area. Free private parking is available on site. Each room has a flat-screen TV. Certain units feature a seating area where you can relax and a terrace or a balcony. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a bidet. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. WiFi is provided in all rooms. You can start the day with A La Carte breakfast. The on-site 4 à la carte restaurants offer a variety of delicacies for the guests to enjoy. Guests can also enjoy refreshments from two bars. You will find a 24-hour front desk. The resort also offers car hire. Bodrum Castle is 3 km from METT Hotel & Beach Resort Bodrum, while Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Milas- Bodrum Airport, 39 km from METT Hotel & Beach Resort Bodrum.

name: Mandarin Oriental, Bodrum
address: Cennet Koyu Comca Mevkii, 314., Bodrum 48400
description: Offering an a private beach area, outdoor and indoor pools, Mandarin Oriental, Bodrum is located in Golturkbuku. WiFi access is available in this resort at surcharge. The accommodation provides air conditioning, seating area and a balcony. Complete with an electric kettle, the dining area also has a coffee machine. Private bathroom is equipped with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. The breakfast is served every morning at the property. A variety of dishes are available at the restaurant. The property has a spa&wellness centre where the guests can relax and replenish. There is also kids club. Evening entertainment organised by a professional staff. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 45.7 km away from the property.

name: Root Redrock Yalikavak
address: Yalikavak Mahallesi 94.Sokak Bodrum, Bodrum 48990
description: Set in Bodrum City, Root Redrock Yalıkavak offers accommodation with a terrace or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as a private beach area and pool with a view. There is a private bathroom with shower in every unit, along with bathrobes, slippers and a hair dryer. The wellness area at the villa is comprised of a hammam, a spa facilities and a fitness room. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Root Redrock Yalıkavak. Yalikavak Public Beach is 1.1 km from the accommodation, while Bodrum Marina Yacht Club is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 58 km from Root Redrock Yalıkavak, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Yelken Mandalinci Spa & Wellness Hotel
address: Belediye Cad No 19/1, Turgutreis, Bodrum
description: Boasting a 100 m private beach, Mandalinci Spa&Wellness Hotel in Turgutreis offers water sports facilities for windsurfing and canoeing. Guests can benefit from a sea-view pool and spa with a Turkish bath. Mandalinci Spa&Wellness Hotel has air-conditioned room equipped with a flat-screen TV and a mini refrigerator. Each room has a balcony and a private bathroom. Featuring both indoor and outdoor dining areas, the main restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner in open buffet style. The bars offer a variety of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. Bodrum city centre with its harbour and marina are 18 km from Mandalinci Spa&Wellness Hotel. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 53 km and can be reached within 30 minutes by car.WebBeds

name: Doria Hotel Bodrum
address: 1410 Sokak Gündönümü Mevkii, Bodrum 48400
description: Doria Hotel Bodrum, situated in a dramatic hilltop location inBitez, is the hippest boutique hotel in this historiconce-upon-a-time fishing village that has evolved into a jetsetheaven. The open and airy hotel features an extensivecollection of contemporary art as well as innovative cuisineand spectacular views of the Aegean, all just 10 minutes drivefrom vibrant Bodrum and an easy half-hour trip from theMilas-Bodrum International Airport. While you are soakingup the stunning views and being caressed by the Bodrum sun,you will also want to set out on an exploration of thePeninsulas historic and natural treasures, including theMausoleum, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World,and the Crusader Castle of Saint Peter, now home to theMuseum of Underwater Archaeology.Dining and Entertainment at BluCombining the regions exceptional freshproduce with its equally superior olive oil,adding the catch of the day from Gumbet Bayand Bodrum, Blu by Doria Hotel Bodrumoffers contemporary Mediterranean cuisine.The Club House serves a combination ofsnacks and refreshments and the poolsidebar is the perfect place to wind down with atempting cocktail as the sun sets overGumbet Bay.iHotelier/iStay

name: Bodrium Hotel & Spa
address: Buyuk Iskender Caddesi No: 13, Bodrum 48400
description: This stylish hotel is built around a notable outdoor pool with a state-of-the-art spa. It features a fitness centre, traditional Turkish hammam, steam room and sauna. Parking and Wi-Fi are free. The elegant and modern rooms of Bodrium Otel & Spa are fitted with hi-tech ‘Tempur’ beds. They are all air-conditioned and include flat-screen satellite TVs and a balcony. Guests can enjoy a varied breakfast buffet every day. Traditional and international cuisine is available at the Elysion restaurant. Located close to the Myndos Gate, Bodrium Otel & Spa is within a 20-minute walk from the beaches and Bodrum Marina. Bodrum-Milas International airport is less than 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Salmakis Resort & Spa
address: Bardakci Koyu, Bodrum 0
description: Situated right next to the beach, this Mediterranean-style resort offers a large pool complex with panoramic views over Bodrum Bay. Salmakis features an extensive spa with hot tub, hammam and massage facilities. Free WiFi and satellite TV are available in the spacious, air-conditioned guestrooms of Salmakis Resort & Spa. They also include a bathroom with a bathtub, a balcony and a seating area. Salmakis Resort’s Ottoman restaurant serves appetizers and traditional kebabs. The Mediterranean restaurant specialises in sea food. Guests can enjoy a drink at one of 5 bars, which include a beach bar and a vitamin bar. The Salmakis Resort & Spa also offers a high-tech gym with cardio-fitness activities, diving facilities and tennis courts. Bodrum city centre with its marina and castle is 15 minutes away on foot from the resort. Milas-Bodrum International Airport is less than 30 minutes by car. Private parking is available for free.WebBeds

name: Isis Charm Beach Hotel
address: Kemer Mevkii Akyarlar Turgutreis, Bodrum
description: Situated in Akyarlar, 700 metres from Karaincir Beach, CHARM BEACH HOTEL features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting a shared lounge, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The accommodation provides a sauna, evening entertainment and room service. At the hotel, all rooms include a balcony with a garden view. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, some rooms at CHARM BEACH HOTEL also boast a sea view. At the accommodation rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A buffet, Full English/Irish or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At CHARM BEACH HOTEL guests are welcome to take advantage of a Turkish bath. You can play billiards at this 4-star hotel. Staff speak English and Turkish at the 24-hour front desk. Akyarlar Beach is 700 metres from the hotel, while Aspat Beach is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 62 km from CHARM BEACH HOTEL.

name: Smart Stay Beach
address: Gümbet Mahallesi 1510 Sokak No 8, Bodrum 48400
description: With a stay at Smart Stay Beach Bodrum in Bodrum (Bodrum City Center), you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Bodrum Beach and Oasis Mall. Featured amenities include express check-out, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Bodrum? This property has facilities measuring 1076 square feet (100 square meters), including conference space. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: No 81 Hotel
address: Kelesharimi Mevkii. Mimoza Sk. No:10, Bodrum
description: Overlooking the marina and Aegean Sea, this hotel is located in Bodrum Golturkbuku. It boasts a spacious seaside sun deck and has and a terrace with sun loungers. Rooms at the No81 Hotel have stylish modern furnishings and balconies with panoramic views. They come equipped satellite TV and a minibar. Some rooms have hardwood floors and a large work desk. Daze Restaurant serves traditional breakfast with coffee, omelette and it also offers dinner. You can sample cocktails and lighter fare from the beach bar. Daze turns into a night club in the evening, which serves special cocktails. No 81 guests can visit the fitness centre. There hotel’s tour desk assists with car hire and provides information on local attractions. No81 Hotel is located 29 km from Milas Airport. It offers 24-hour front desk service and free on-site private parking along with valet service.

name: Susona Bodrum, LXR Hotels & Resorts
address: Torba district Kaynar street No15, Bodrum 48420
description: Susona Bodrum lies in the heart of Torba District, Turkiye overlooking the Aegean Sea. The hotel offers on-site dining, meeting space, and a full-service spa. The refined resort also features a tennis court, two pools, and four restaurants and bars. Guests can enjoy a spacious green landscape, coastal views, and a private beach with a sun deck. Find the ultimate relaxation in one of the poolside and beachside cabanas. All rooms are air-conditioned and include free WiFi, a mini-bar, and tea and coffee making facilities. Upgrade to a suite for more space to work and relax. Nearby attractions include wine tasting and vineyard visits, Etrim Carpet Village, the ancient city of Bodrum, and the Mausoleum of Halicarnassus.Hilton

name: Family Life Bodrum Imperial Hotel
address: Bankev Cad. No:39, Bodrum
description: Set in Akyarlar, 17 km from Bodrum Marina Yacht Club, Kairaba Bodrum Imperial offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Featuring a restaurant, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a kids' club, room service and currency exchange for guests. The units come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The hotel provides certain units with sea views, and the rooms are fitted with a balcony. At Kairaba Bodrum Imperial every room includes bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Kairaba Bodrum Imperial offers a hammam. You can play billiards, darts and mini-golf at the hotel, and car hire is available. Languages spoken at the reception include German, English, French and Turkish. Bodrum Windmills is 14 km from Kairaba Bodrum Imperial, while Pedasa Antique City is 15 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum Airport, 57 km from the accommodation.

name: Kuum Hotel & Spa
address: Map Mahallesi Ataturk Cad. No: 150, Bodrum 48400
description: Kuum Hotel & Spa Bodrum is conveniently located in the popular Golturkbuku area. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, gift/souvenir shop are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, fireplace, smoke detector, internet access wireless, internet access wireless (complimentary). Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including boats, watersports equipment rentals, private beach, fitness center, sauna. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Bodrum has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Kuum Hotel & Spa Bodrum.priceline.com

name: Royal Asarlik Beach Hotel
address: Asarlik Mevkii, Adnan Menderes Cd, Bodrum 48400
description: This hotel is situated on a relaxed beachfront for your immediate convenience, with a short walk to the main services, activities and night life of Bodrum. Royal Asarlik Hotel is an excellent place to loosen up with its combination of good location and entertainment. The hotel has its own entertainment team that organizes day time activities and theme nights 7 days a week. During summer, the Royal Asarlik Hotel has a main terrace restaurant, a la carte restaurant, pool bar, terrace bar and lobby bar open for guests. A children's playground is offered as well. Royal Asarlik Hotel is great for a beach holiday and you can experience a number of water sports and outdoor activities on the coast. The night life in Bodrum is also very vibrant, with the closest bars and clubs a walk away. Free WiFi is accessible in the lobby area. There is also a computer room with an additional charge. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 39 km from the property.

name: Parkim Ayaz
address: Ayaz Cad. No:22, Bodrum 48400
description: Situated in the heart of Gumbet, with a private beach and water park, Parkim Ayaz Hotel offers free private parking, a host of leisure facilities and a great pool scene. Parkim Ayaz Hotel's comfortable guest rooms are well-presented and have air conditioning and a private balcony. The resort offers plenty of children's facilities, with a pool slide, kids club and playground. Guests can also make free use of the games room, with pool tables and tennis tables. For full relaxation, there is a fully equipped gym and a Turkish bath for the adults. Parkim Ayaz provides a relaxing beachfront base, within walking distance to Bodrum. The resort is also well-connected by regular bus services. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 38 km away.

name: Hotel Ambrosia
address: Haci Ahmetler Mevkii Bitez Yalisi 1, Bodrum
description: Boasting the biggest private beach in Bitez, Hotel Ambrosia offers numerous water sport facilities along with a swimming pool, children's pool, 3 restaurants and 5 bars. It is 7 km from Bodrum city. A Turkish bath, sauna and hot tub are provided for relaxation, while a full menu of treatments includes aromatherapy, medical massage and shiatsu. For those who would like to stay fit, there is a modern gym. Rooms at the Ambrosia are air conditioned and offer private balconies. Free WiFi is available in the hotel’s public areas. The Ambrosia Hotel offers a seaside restaurant, where guests can experience romantic sunsets over the Bitez Bay. In addition to Turkish cuisine, guests can choose from a rich snack menu, have drinks at the beach bar or pool bar. It is located 40 km from Bodrum International Airport offering an airport shuttle service and private transfers to Bodrum. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Casa Nonna Bodrum - Adult Only
address: Icmeler Mevkii, PK 357, Bodrum 48400
description: Located on the seafront among palm trees, Casa Nonna Bodrum - Adult Only offers a private beach and an outdoor pool. The resort has a spa centre, and luxurious rooms with stunning views of the Aegean Sea. Tastefully decorated in contemporary style, all rooms include a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Some rooms also offer a private terrace, a small private pool or a spa bath. The restaurants of Casa Nonna Bodrum - Adult Only serves meals a-la-carte style. The pool and beach bars offers a variety of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. The spa centre includes a sauna, Turkish bath and massage facilities. Bodrum city centre and Bodrum Castle are within 5 km from Casa Nonna Bodrum - Adult Only. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 40 km from the Casa Nonna Bodrum - Adult Only.

name: Labranda Tmt Bodrum
address: Atatürk Cad. No: 180, Bodrum 48400
description: Labranda TMT Bodrum Resort is conveniently located in the popular Kumbahce area. The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. To be found at the property are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, babysitting, restaurant, laundry service. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find flat screen television, bathroom phone, mirror, internet access wireless, air conditioning. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort make Labranda TMT Bodrum Resort the perfect choice for your stay in Bodrum.priceline.com

name: Shark Club Hotel
address: Gumbet Mah.Gara Hasan Cad.No:4 Gumbet, Bodrum 48400
description: Only 350 metres from the sandy beach, this hotel is located in the heart of Gumbet, the popular district of Bodrum with many bars, restaurants and shops. It offers a triangle-shaped outdoor pool, a spa centre and shuttle service to/from the beach during the day. Sun beds and parasols are also provided for your comfort. The elegant rooms of Club Shark Hotel are decorated with modern furniture in light colours. They all include air conditioning, LCD TV and a minibar. Free Wi-Fi is also provided in the rooms. The restaurant serves a variety of delicious dishes in open buffet style. Guests can choose to have their meals indoors or outdoors. The hotel’s bar offers refreshing drinks at the pool side. You can also enjoy refreshing drinks, snacks and meals at the beach area at a surcharge. The spa centre includes a sauna and a Turkish bath. There is also a well-equipped fitness centre. Guests can relax with massages after a workout. Bodrum city centre is 2 km from Hotel Club Shark with numerous shops, bars and popular nightclubs. Bodrum Milas Airport is 42 km away.

name: La Blanche Resort & Spa
address: Bahçelievler Cad. No 69 Pk, Bodrum 48960
description: La Blanche Resort & Spa is located in Turgutreis by the beach. It offers spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi and elegant furnishings. Rooms at La Blanche Resort have floor-to-ceiling windows and flat-screen TVs. They also have en suite bathrooms with luxury amenities. Some rooms have a private spa bath. Le Mangal serves traditional Turkish cuisine and La Merla offers fresh seafood. At La Blanche guests can enjoy a relaxing massage, facial, or body treatment. The hotel also has a Turkish bath and a spacious outdoor pool. The resort is located 55 km from the Milas-Bodrum Airport and a 25-minute drive from the centre of Bodrum.

name: Life Butiq Hotel
address: Balyek Caddesi, No. 7/75, Bodrum 48990
description: Situated in Yalıkavak and with Miya Beach reachable within 1.9 km, Life Butiq Otel features a garden, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. 2.4 km from Villa Azur Beach Club and 18 km from Bodrum Marina Yacht Club, the hotel provides a private beach area. Some units at the property have a balcony with a garden view. At the hotel, the rooms include a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, some rooms at Life Butiq Otel also feature a sea view. All rooms in the accommodation are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, halal and gluten-free options. Pedasa Antique City is 16 km from Life Butiq Otel, while Myndus Gate is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 55 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Blue Dreams Resort & Spa
address: Torba Mah., Heredot Bulv., 11, Bodrum 48400
description: Club Blue Dreams is located in Torba, Bodrum. This is a modern building. Club Blue Dreams is a five-star holiday village located on Zeytinlikahve, one of the most beautiful bays of Bodrum as Homeros called?Immortal Blueness Land?. It is only 10 km to Bodrum and 23 km to the airport.WebBeds

name: Peda Sun Club Hotel
address: Ayaz Cd., 6, Bodrum 48400
description: Guests of this hotel will appreciate the seclusion of its private beach and on-site spa and wellness center, all just a short car ride from the center of Bodrum. It also offers a Turkish steam bath and an outdoor pool. This 3-star hotel provides a safe, a 24-hour reception and a sun deck. Honeymoon suites are available for those looking for some added luxury. Rooms feature an in-room closet, a private bathroom and a refrigerator. They are also equipped with a hair dryer, a shower and cable/satellite channels. For those wanting to stay nearby, the elegant restaurant is a convenient dining option, providing a range of international cuisine. Hotel Sun Club provides an ideal place to discover Bodrum Castle and Mausoleum at Halicarnassus, as well as everything the local area has to offer. Bodrum Beach is only a short car ride from the hotel.HotelsCombined

name: Hapimag Sea Garden Resort
address: Çiftlik Mahallesi, Yalidag Caddesi No:40, Bodrum 48400
description: Hapimag Sea Garden is a luxurious 5-star resort located amidst a pine forest on the southern coast of Bodrum Peninsula. It has a private beach, outdoor pool and rooms with balconies. Featuring flat-screen TVs, all rooms are air conditioned and equipped with minibars. Each spacious room has a seating area with free Wi-Fi. Guests can dine at the hotel’s romantic restaurant with views of the Aegean Sea and mountains. A variety of drinks can be enjoyed at the bar and there is a night club for entertainment. Hapimag Sea Garden Resort has an indoor pool, fitness centre and a steam bath. Water sports facilities are available at the beach and there is a separate kids pool with waterslides. Mini clubs and activities are available for younger guests.

name: west coast boutique hotel
address: Turgut Özal Caddesi turgutreis mah no 409, Bodrum 48400
description: West coast boutique hotel features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and restaurant in Bodrum City. Among the various facilities are a bar, water sports facilities, as well as a private beach area. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen, room service and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Each room includes a kettle, while some rooms will provide you with a patio and others also provide guests with city views. At west coast boutique hotel every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. West coast boutique hotel offers a hot tub. Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Speaking Arabic, German, English and Farsi at the reception, staff are always at hand to help. Soytas Beach is 1.1 km from the hotel, while Fener Beach is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Milas-Bodrum, 61 km from west coast boutique hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sheraton Grand Samsun Hotel
address: Liman Mahallesi Ataturk Bulvari No:55, Samsun 55100
description: With its unique location, the Sheraton Grand Samsun Hotel enjoys magnificent views of the black sea. The hotel is within walking distance of the city’s business, shopping and entertainment districts and the transportation network. It is an ideal choice for both business and leisure travelers alike who value the hotel’s personalized service. Our 1,750 square meter spa and fitness facilities offer you a sauna and steam room, yoga and Pilates room, relaxation parlor, 7 treatment rooms, indoor pool, fitness center and a spa terrace. At our on-site Feast Restaurant, enjoy local and intercontinental flavors with a magnificent sea view located on the lobby floor. The restaurant, Ristorante Fora, overlooks the Black Sea and the ancient light house and will offer you delicious flavors.Marriott

name: Sunprime C-Lounge Hotel - Adults Only
address: Ahmet Tokus Cad. No:7, Sok. No:1, Alanya 07400
description: Featuring free WiFi, a spa centre, indoor pool and a seasonal outdoor pool, Sunprime C-Lounge - Adult Only offers accommodation in Alanya. The hotel has a sauna and fitness centre, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. All rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms include a seating area where you can relax. You will find a coffee machine in the room. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bath robes and slippers. There is a 24-hour front desk, concierge service and hairdresser's at the property. This hotel has a private beach area and bike hire is available. Car hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Alanya Ataturk Square is 4.1 km from Sunprime C-Lounge - Adult Only, while Alanya Red Tower is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gazipasa Airport, 34 km from Sunprime C-Lounge - Adult Only.

name: Peninsula Gardens Hotel
address: Andifli Sokak, Kaş
description: Situated in Kas, 5.2 km from Lycian Rock Cemetery, Peninsula Gardens Hotel features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as an indoor pool. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms have a kettle, while some rooms are fitted with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. At Peninsula Gardens Hotel the rooms include bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or halal options. Kekova Sunken City is 37 km from the accommodation, while Myra Rock Tombs is 49 km from the property. The nearest airport is Kastellorizo Airport, 15 km from Peninsula Gardens Hotel.

name: Ladonia Adakule
address: 9400 Bayraklidede Mevkii Kusadasi, Kusadasi 09400
description: Situated in a private cove, flanked by rocky shores, the elegant hotel Adakule sits on 52,000 m2 of land close to the popular holiday resort of Kuşadası, overlooking the shimmering waters of the Aegean Sea. The antique city of Ephesos is only 15 km away, while the Adnan Menderes Airport and the city of Izmir are at a distance of 75 km and 90 km, respectively. The hotel with its distinctive architecture offers a wide variety of services and amenities, such as an Aquapark with water slides and various outdoor pools. Sports facilities include a football pitch, tennis and basketball as well as a gym and several water sports facilities including a diving school. The restaurants offer a range of dishes from Aegean and Turkish food over Italian food to international cuisine. Some of the restaurants and bars have fantastic views, so that guests can enjoy the beautiful sunsets. An ideal place for couples and families with children.FarePortal

name: Oludeniz Turquoise Hotel
address: Carsi Cad. no:18, Fethiye 48340
description: Located only 600 metres from Oludeniz Beach, Oludeniz Turquoise Hotel offers an outdoor pool, sauna, hammam and a fitness centre. The hotel has a private beach area. The rooms of Oludeniz Turquoise Hotel include a flat-screen TV, electric kettle and a minibar. All rooms have a balcony. The restaurant serves dishes from Turkish and international cuisine. Breakfast and dinner are served in open buffet style. Terrace Restaurant also offers an à la carte menu. Fethiye city centre is 15 km from the hotel. Dalaman Airport is 65 km away.

name: Side Star Resort
address: Sancak Mh. Feslegenli Sk.,11/A, Side
description: This renovated beachfront hotel in Side offers 2 pools, a disco and various spa facilities. The rooms are elegantly decorated and have garden or sea views from their private balcony. With free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV, all of the elegantly decorated rooms offer lots of daylight and a small seating area. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. After a dip in the indoor or outdoor pool, guests can relax in the hammam or play tennis. Using the hotel’s watersport facilities, guests can go windsurfing or canoeing from the private beach. The property also offers an aqua park and a mini club. The main restaurant serves international dishes from morning till late evening. In addition, there are 3 bars and a pool bar serving afternoon cakes. The lounge with its dome-shaped ceiling offers a luxurious setting for a mint tea. The 24-hour reception staff can arrange car rentals and shuttle services to Antalya International Airport, 64 km away. Antalya’s lively city centre is a 1.5-hour drive from the hotel.

name: Duja Didim
address: Altinkum Mah. 240 Sokak, No 13/2, Didim 09270
description: Offerring a private beach area, fitness centre and an outdoor pool, Duja Didim Resort is located in Didim. Free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk are available. Each room features air conditioning, a balcony, seating area and a minibar. Equipped with a shower, private bathroom includes a hairdryer. Views of the garden and the sea are also available. The hotel offers all-inclusive service including open buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner at on-site restaurant. Local and imported drinks are included. Guests can relax at the sauna or hammam. Bicycle and car renting services are available on site. Kid's can play safely in the childrens' playground or enjoy their time in the kids' club. Babysitting services are also offered. The property is 6.1 km from Didim town centre and 6 km from Didim Bus Terminal. Milas-Bodrum Airport is 92.9 km away.

name: Novia Lucida Beach Hotel
address: Aga Ceylan Caddesi No:8, Kemer 07990
description: Providing an indoor pool and a private beach, Lucida Beach is a deluxe place to stay in Kemer. It also offers a Turkish steam bath and a sauna. There are a range of amenities available to those staying at the hotel, such as a kids club, a beauty centre and a kids pool. It also provides family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families of any size, as well as a playground and babysitting/child services. Rooms at Lucida Beach offer a stylish space to unwind, complete with a mini bar. There are also a number of rooms geared towards families. Antalya Airport is a 75-minute drive from Lucida Beach. The hotel's multilingual staff are available to ensure that every traveler has a comfortable stay.HotelsCombined

name: Ricosta Hotel
address: Alipasa Mahallesi Sahil Caddesi #1, Rize 53870
description: Located in Rize, 8.3 km from Rize Museum, Ricosta Hotel provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. This 5-star hotel offers a kids' club and room service. There is a spa and wellness centre with a terrace, indoor pool and sauna, as well as a hot tub. At the hotel every room comes with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a sea view. All units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. At Ricosta Hotel you will find a restaurant serving French, Mediterranean and Turkish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. The accommodation offers a children's playground. Activities such as hiking, fishing, cycling can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. The property has an on-site hammam, hairdresser's and business centre. Speaking Arabic, German, English and Turkish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Rize University is 8.7 km from Ricosta Hotel, while Atatürk House Museum is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Trabzon, 64 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Venn Boutique Hotel
address: Cumhuriyet Mah. Adnan Menderes Bulvari No:325 Atakum, Samsun 55200
description: This hotel has a seafront location, only a few steps from the sandy beach. Venn Boutique Hotel offers a terrace with spectacular views of the Black Sea and stylish rooms with air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. The rooms of Venn Boutique feature light interiors and modern furniture. The bathrooms come with special lightings. Some rooms also offer a private spa bath in their bathrooms. The restaurant serves a rich menu with unique tastes of world cuisine. The hotel also has a café in the garden, equipped with comfortable sofas. Guests can enjoy refreshing drinks or warm up with hot beverages, while admiring the sea views. Archeology Museum and Ataturk Museum are both 6 km from Venn Boutique Hotel. Samsun Airport is 30 km away.

name: B&C Hotel
description: Located in Atakum, 1.7 km from Atakum Sahil Beach, B&C HOTEL provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 5 km from Mayis University. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The units include a safety deposit box. A halal breakfast is available daily at the hotel. The area is popular for fishing and cycling, and bike hire is available at this 4-star hotel. Denizkizi Park is 5.8 km from B&C HOTEL, while Ondokuz Mayıs University is 6.7 km away. The nearest airport is Samsun Çarşamba Airport, 38 km from the accommodation.

name: Alesta Yacht Hotel
address: Yacht Harbour no:17, Fethiye 48300
description: Featuring an outdoor pool and a private beach, this design hotel is located just opposite the Fethiye Yacht Marina. Property offers a spa and wellness centre, sauna and a hammam. Modernly designed, the rooms of Alesta have wooden floor and are decorated in soft colours. The rooms include a satellite TV, air conditioning, seating area and a desk. Some rooms also have a private spa bath and a balcony with sea views. Guests can savour various dishes from open-buffet style restaurant. The à la carte restaurant serves different specialties from the Mediterranean cuisine. Delicious cocktails can be enjoyed from the hotel's bar. Alesta offers a spa centre with a Turkish bath and a sauna. Guests can also get massages or relax in the spa bath. Alesta Yacht is only a 5-minute walk from the city centre and just 100 metres from the amphitheatre. The hotel is less than 15 km from the famous Blue Lagoon Beach. Paragliding is very popular in this area. Babadag where you can do paragliding is only 50-minute drive from Alesta Yacht Hotel. Famous Lycian Trail Way is 17 km away

name: Armas Gul Beach
address: Yeni Mah, Ataturk Blv No. 81, Kemer 07980
description: Just a few steps from the seafront, the all-inclusive Armas Gul Beach Resort has an outdoor pool, a small water park and a terrace overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. It provides a direct access to the private beach area. Free on-site parking are possible. All units of the Armas Gul Beach Resort offer air conditioning, flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a shower, a bath, a hairdryer. Some balconies come with land views, whereas some have sea views. The resort includes a fitness centre, sauna and a Turkish bath. You can relax with the massage services and beauty treatments, or have fun with leisure facilities like darts and table tennis. The little ones can enjoy the children’s playground. The all-inclusive services include buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner. You can also taste various dishes at the à la carte restaurant or sample various beverages at the bar. Antalya’s city centre is 40 km from the property, and Antalya Airport is 50 km away.

name: Xperia Saray Beach Hotel
address: Saray Mah. Ataturk Caddesi No: 151, Alanya 07400
description: Enjoying a private stretch of the Cleopatra Beach, this hotel features a seasonal outdoor pool. Relaxation facilities at Xperia include a Turkish bath, hot tub and massage rooms. Private balconies are featured in all air-conditioned rooms. Each comes with satellite TV, free WiFi and a minibar with free soft drinks. Individual bathrooms include hairdryers and toiletries. Xperia Saray Beach Hotel has 2 a la carte restaurants with indoor and outdoor areas. There is also a patisserie, 4 bars and free snack service at the beach. Guests can enjoy live Turkish music and beach parties at Xperia Saray. The hotel is located in Alanya, 40 km from Gazipasa Airport and 120 km from Antalya Airport.

name: Jiva Beach Resort
address: Calis Plaji 1104 Sokak No: 14, Fethiye
description: This attractively designed hotel lies within metres of Calis Beach and is surrounded by a natural lagoon, enjoying cooling sea breezes and superb sunsets. The centre of Calis is just less than 2 km away, while the market town of Fethiye just is 5 km and both can be easily reached by means of public transport. Cafe bars and restaurants can be reached by taking a pleasant 10 -15 minute walk along the beach and promenade. The resort is sure to impress visitors with spacious surroundings, beautiful décor and excellent services. The modern and beautifully designed rooms, some of which have direct access to the sparkling outside pool, guests can benefit from a good range of facilities and entertainment amenities in spacious surroundings. Patrons may enjoy delicious dishes at the hotel restaurant, which might be followed by a drink from the bar. Those who seek relaxation may balance body and soul at the on-site spa.FarePortal

name: Lukka Exclusive Hotel - Adult Only
address: Cukurbag Yarimadasi Oteller Bolgesi Bulent Kalkavan Sok. No. 16, Kaş 07580
description: With its own beach, this hotel is located on a rocky cliff in Kaş. Overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, it features an outdoor pool and hot tub. All rooms have balconies. Each with a chic décor, the airy rooms at Lukka Hotel include flat-screen TVs and free WiFi. They come with beautifully tiled bathrooms and views of either the sea or flower garden. Guests can swim in the Olympic-sized pool or enjoy snorkelling in the sea. Lukka’s 24-hour tour desk can help arrange rafting and canoe tours, paragliding or safaris. The hotel is an 8-minute drive from the centre of Kaş. Free parking is possible on site.

name: Belcekiz Beach Club
address: Oludeniz Mah. 227 Sok. No:2A, Ölüdeniz 48340
description: This beachfront hotel enjoys a garden setting on the Turkish Riviera. Just 14 km from Fethiye, it offers spacious 5-star accommodation with pool, mountain and garden views. Private balconies and parquet floors are featured in all air-conditioned rooms at Belcekiz Beach Hotel. Each is equipped with a flat-screen TV, minibar and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Guests can enjoy playing tennis, exercise in the gym or play a game of darts in the bar. The hammam offers a welcoming treat after a busy day, just as the refreshing outdoor pools and the sea. The Belcekiz Beach has a buffet-style main restaurant and 3 à la carte restaurants serving Italian, Indian and Thai cuisine. The hotel boasts 5 bars and its own nightclub with regular DJ nights. Belcekiz Beach Hotel offers free parking and a 24-hour reception that can help guests arrange car rentals.

name: Aydinbey Famous Resort
address: Bogazkent Mah. 33.Sokak, No.51 Bogazkent, Serik, Antalya, Belek 07300
description: Featuring a private blue flag beach, Aydinbey Famous Resort has a seafront location on the Mediterranean coast. The property includes 2 outdoor pools, an indoor pool, water slides, and spa facilities. The bright rooms of Aydinbey are tastefully decorated in warm colours. They all include a TV, air conditioning and a minibar. All rooms have a balcony with sea, pool or garden views. With indoor and outdoor dining options, Famous Restaurant offers breakfast, lunch and dinner in buffet style. You can enjoy selected dishes of Turkish and international cuisine. The à la carte restaurants offer Turkish and Far East cuisine, and seafood. There are also 5 bars serving a variety of alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. Sports facilities include a tennis court, fitness centre and beach volleyball on site. For relaxation, you can enjoy the sauna and Turkish bath. Antalya city centre is 50 km from the property. Antalya Airport is 42 km away.

name: Yacht Classic Hotel - Boutique Class
address: 1 Karagozler No:24, Fethiye 48300
description: Located in the heart of Fethiye, this boutique seafront hotel offers a swimming pool, a sauna, a Turkish bath and free private parking. Most rooms have spacious balconies, some with sea views. Free WiFi is available in public areas. Rooms at the Yacht Classic Hotel have modern décor and include TV with satellite channels. Guests can enjoy local and Mediterranean cuisine at Mori Restaurant or taste delicious Turkish wine selection at the Skyfall Bar. The hotel also has a Blue Pool bar, which serves a wide range of cocktails. Paragliding is very popular in this area. Babadag where you can do paragliding is 50-minute drive from Yacht Classic Hotel. Famous Butterfly Valley is just 21 km from the Yacht Classic while Lycian Way Trail is 17 km away. The property is 1 km from Fethiye city centre and 3.5 km from Calis Beach. Oludeniz Beach is a 20-minute drive away. The nearest airport is Dalaman Airport, 49 km from Yacht Classic Hotel.

name: Transatlantik Hotel & Spa
address: Goynuk Mah G. Mustafa Kemal Ataturk Cd., Göynük 07994
description: Designed to resemble a ship, this 5-star resort in Kemer enjoys a long stretch of sandy beach and an amazing pool scene with an aquapark. Personalised spa treatments include exotic massages. Rooms at Transatlantik Hotel & Spa have a light, neutral décor. Each features a spacious seating area with a satellite LCD TV. In addition to water sports you can play tennis and squash, go bowling or even ice skating. The fitness centre provides a state-of-the-art equipment along with a sauna, jacuzzi and Turkish bath. Annual events in the area include Phaselis Art Festival, Turkey Offshore Championship and Kemer Carnival. Special theme nights and entertainment shows are also held at the Queen Elizabeth Elite Hotel. Children can enjoy fun-filled days at the on-site kids club.

name: Side Star Elegance
address: Kumkoy Mevkii, Side
description: Located nearby the beachfront, Side Star Elegance Hotel - Ultra All Inclusive has spa facilities and outdoor pools. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV and balcony. The rooms at Side Star Elegance Hotel - Ultra All Inclusive come with modern furnishings. They all feature a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer. The minibar is filled with sof drinks and beer everyday. You can taste local and international dishes at the buffet restaurant. There are also 4 à la carte restaurants: Italian, Turkish, Chinese and seafood. By making a reservation, guest can enjoy a complimentary meal at the à la carte restaurants once. The bars serve refreshing drinks. Spa facilities include a Turkish bath, sauna and a fitness room; massage services can also be provided. There is also a children’s playground. Only 1.8 km to Side town centre, Side Star Elegance Hotel - Ultra All Inclusive is 63 km from Antalya Airport. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Antmare Hotel
address: Alacati Mah. 18000, Sok. No. 28, Alacati 35937
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 35 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages and facials. You can soak up the sun at the private beach or enjoy other recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and an indoor pool. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services. Property Location With a stay at Antmare Hotel in Cesme, you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Ilica Beach and Alacati Marina. This beach hotel is 2.6 mi (4.2 km) from Alaçatı Çarşı and 6.3 mi (10.1 km) from Boyalık Beach. Dining Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:30 AM to 11 AM. name: Side Star Beach
address: Selimiye Mah P K 99, Side 07330
description: Facing a blue-flagged beach on the Mediterranean Sea, this comprehensive hotel is situated a 10-minute walk from Side Archaeological Site. Facilities include 2 pools, an extensive spa and water-sport equipment. Stylish rooms at Side Star Beach open out onto private balconies, some overlooking the sea or the pool area. They all include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and are fitted with wooden floors. Guests can work-out in the well-equipped gym or benefit from holistic treatments at the spa, featuring massages and a traditional Turkish hammam. An on-site bike rental helps exploring the hotel’s surroundings. Specialities from the Antalya Province and a varied menu of international classic dishes are offered at the restaurant. Outdoor dining is made possible on the large terrace by the pool or at the panoramic bar. Free private parking is available.

name: Akra Fethiye The Residence Tui Blue Sensatori – Adults Only
address: Ciftlik Kargi Koyu, Dutdibi Mevkii 226 Sk. No:4/2, Fethiye 48300
description: Situated in Fethiye, 90 metres from Akmaz Beach, Akra Fethiye The Residence Tui Blue Sensatori - Ultra All Inclusive - Adults Only features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting room service, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The hotel offers an indoor pool, sauna, evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, bed linen and a balcony with a garden view. Rooms have a coffee machine, a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while certain rooms are fitted with a patio and some have city views. The rooms at Akra Fethiye The Residence Tui Blue Sensatori - Ultra All Inclusive - Adults Only have air conditioning and a wardrobe. Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. Akra Fethiye The Residence Tui Blue Sensatori - Ultra All Inclusive - Adults Only offers a hammam. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at this 5-star hotel, and car hire is available. Calis Beach is 1.9 km from the hotel, while Fethiye Marina is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dalaman, 45 km from Akra Fethiye The Residence Tui Blue Sensatori - Ultra All Inclusive - Adults Only, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Lykiaworld & Linksgolf Antalya
address: Denizyaka Mh. 1 Denizyaka Kamisligol, Side 07600
description: Situated in Denizyaka, a few steps from Denizkent Beach, Lykia World Antalya features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting a shared lounge, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The hotel has an indoor pool, sauna, karaoke and a kids' club. At the hotel, the rooms include a balcony. All rooms in Lykia World Antalya are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast is available each morning at the property. The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at this 5-star hotel, and car hire is available. The property has an in-house hammam, hairdresser's and business centre. Speaking German, English, Russian and Turkish, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. Aspendos Amphitheatre is 15 km from Lykia World Antalya, while The Land of Legends Theme Park is 30 km from the property. The nearest airport is Antalya Airport, 51 km from the hotel.

name: Fengo Hotel & Spa
address: Gulyali Mah. Rize Cad.No:107, Trabzon 61000
description: Located at the seafront, Fengo Hotel offers 24-hour front desk service and free private parking on site. The hotel has a hammam and air-conditioned rooms with sea views. The rooms of Fengo Hotel include a LED TV, air conditioning and an electric kettle. All rooms have a private bathroom. Daily breakfast is served as an open buffet at the hotel. For lunch and dinner, the restaurant offers an à la carte menu. Ataturk’s Mansion is 15 km from the hotel. Trabzon Airport is 2 km away.

name: Amenity Hotel & Resort Lipno
address: Lipno Nad Vltavou 999, 382 78 Lipno nad Vltavou, South Bohemia
description: Amenity Hotel & Resort Lipno is located in Lipno nad Vltavou right at the lake shore, with a beach situated in front of the hotel. Free WiFi access is available. The property offers two types of accommodation, hotel rooms and apartments. Hotel rooms come with a flat-screen TV, a minibar, bathrobe, slippers, free toiletries, and a private bathroom fitted with a bath or a shower. Certain rooms feature a balcony with lake views. Apartments then feature an outside seating area, living room, satellite TV, fully equipped kitchen, bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities and a safety box. Breakfast is served every morning. Guests can dine at the restaurant in the resort 100 metres away. The resort also features a wellness centre with a sauna, hot tub and steam bath, a fitness centre, a bowling alley, and a sports centre with facilities for tennis, squash, badminton and table tennis, as well as a climbing wall. All facilities in the resort can be used by hotel guests at a surcharge. In addition, guests can take advantage of a 20 metre-long salt-water swimming pool. It is accessible free of charge daily until 13:00 for guests staying at the hotel, chalet, apartment or Deluxe Villas. For other, access can be purchased at the property. Free parking is available on site. Amenity Hotel & Resort Lipno is situated 3 km from Lipno Treetop Walkway and 2 km from the Kramolín Ski Area.

name: Hotel Hermitage
address: Seeburgstrasse 72, 6000 Lucerne, Luzern
description: Situated on the shores of Lake Lucerne, the Hermitage stands alone, but is still very close to the busy centre of Lucerne. All the rooms, restaurants and function rooms look out onto the lake and to the mountains beyond. Guests are also welcome to relax on the loungers scattered underneath the trees in the park. Furthermore, the hotel offers you different outdoor activities, a gym and a wellness corner.iHotelier/iStay

name: Romantik Hotel Beau Rivage
address: Gotthardstrasse 6, 6353 Weggis, Luzern
description: Newly renovated in 2014, the Hotel Beau Rivage Weggis is located right on the shore of Lake Lucerne. It offers a restaurant with a lakeside terrace, free parking and free WiFi, and from March to October an outdoor pool and a spa centre are available. Our Hotel has no aircondtion From every room in the Hotel Beau Rivage you can enjoy panoramic lake or mountain views. The seasonal heated outdoor pool (26 °C) is open between mid March and mid October. The sunbathing lawn, and the wellness centre including a steam bath and a hot tub invite you to unwind. The restaurant serves fine Italian and international cuisine including fish specialities.

name: See & Wellnesshotel Gerbi
address: Hertensteinstrasse 48, 6353 Weggis, Luzern
description: The See & Wellnesshotel Gerbi in Weggis is located right on the shore of Lake Lucerne. It offers panoramic lake views, indoor and outdoor pools and free parking. All of the spacious rooms and apartments have a cable TV and a balcony. The 1500 m² spa area include various steam baths and saunas, a Laconium and private spa suites. Fine Swiss and international cuisine and a wide range of wines are served in the restaurant of the See & Wellnesshotel Gerbi.

name: Park Hotel Vitznau
address: Seestrasse 18, 6354 Vitznau, Luzern
description: The luxurious Park Hotel Vitznau right at the banks of Lake Lucerne has been entirely renovated in 2012 and 2013 and features its own private beach, 2 restaurants, a large spa area and free garage parking. Each of the suites and residences has been individually designed and offers 24-hour room service, free WiFi, a Nespresso Coffee Machine and a tea maker. Spa facilities include various saunas and steam baths, an ice grotto, a hot tub, as well as indoor and outdoor pools. A wide range of gourmet dishes is served in the 2 restaurants of Park Hotel Vitznau, which have an inviting lake-view terrace. Moreover you can select from fine wines from all over the world stored in 6 wine cellars on site. A free shuttle service to the Rigi Cable Car is provided by the hotel. The Küssnacht Train Station is 13 km and Lucerne is 26 km away.

name: Grand Hotel Villa Castagnola
address: Viale Castagnola 31, 6906 Lugano, Ticino
description: Right on the shores of Lake Lugano and within walking distance of the Old Town of Lugano, the 5-star Grand Hotel Villa Castagnola is set within a private, subtropical park. The hotel offers an indoor pool, a tennis court, 3 restaurants, and free WiFi. The 2 gourmet restaurants, Le Relais and Gallery Arté al Lago, and the La Rucola offer Mediterranean dishes from the freshest seasonal ingredients and selected wines from the well-stocked cellar. Once the home of a noble Russian family, the impressive mansion was transformed into a hotel in 1885. Rooms and suites in the Grand Hotel Villa Castagnola are individually decorated and have stunning park and/or lake views, a balcony, a terrace or loggia. Bus stops, the boat pier and the funicular to Monte Brè can be found in the immediate vicinity. Several cafés, shops and restaurants can be found in the city centre, only a few steps away.

name: Villa Principe Leopoldo
address: Via Montalbano 5, 6900 Lugano, Ticino
description: Villa Principe Leopoldo - Ticino Hotels Group can be found amid a large park above Lugano, offering panoramic views of Lake Lugano and the mountains, and featuring leisure, sport and wellness facilities, as well as exquisite dining options. WiFi is available for free. A Member of Relais & Chateaux, Villa Principe Leopoldo - Ticino Hotels Group is a harmonious blend of Italian charm and Swiss excellence. The historical villa, once a prince's residence, provides views of the lake and the garden, and the nearby park The DOT SPA offers a relaxing ambience made with personalised treatments based on the Villa Principe's own top-quality cosmetic line. Hot tub, sauna and steam bath facilities are also featured. The Principe Leopoldo Restaurant received excellent reviews in the most important international guides. The Piano Bar & Lounge offers an exclusive selection of cocktails and wines, champagne and malt whiskies, all accompanied by live music. A breakfast room is located in each building. The spacious and stylishly decorated guest rooms are all air-conditioned. Bathrobes and slippers can be found in the luxurious bathrooms. Villa Principe Leopoldo - Ticino Hotels Group is 2 km from the city centre of Lugano. Private outdoor parking is available on site for free. Garage parking is possible at an additional cost. A charging station for electric and Tesla vehicles is available on site.

name: Belvédère Strandhotel
address: Schachenstrasse 39, 3700 Spiez, Bern
description: Belvédère Strandhotel is a 4-star superior hotel in Spiez, right on the shore of Lake Thun. It includes a spa area, an outdoor pool, a private beach, and a gourmet restaurant overlooking the lake. The elegant rooms at the Strandhotel Belvédère feature a flat-screen cable TV, a minibar, a Nespresso coffee machine, and a bathroom. Bern can be reached in a 30-minute drive.

name: Eventhotel Pyramide
address: Parkallee 2, 2334 Vienna, Vienna
description: Directly opposite the SCS, Austria’s largest shopping centre, Eventhotel Pyramide features a large spa and recreation area with indoor and outdoor pools and free access for guests. Free WiFi is available in public areas and some rooms. The air-conditioned rooms offer a safe, minibar, satellite TV, and bathroom with a hairdryer. Featuring a 42-metre pyramid, which hosts an event centre for up to 4,000 people, Eventhotel is surrounded by 45,000 m² of greenery. The restaurant includes a garden and a bar with a terrace. An 18-hole golf course in Brunn am Gebirge is only 5-minute drive away and offers discounted green fees to guests of Eventhotel Pyramide. The Badener Bahn railway line stops right in front of Hotel Pyramide and takes you to Vienna’s State Opera, as well as to the centre of Baden, within 25 minutes. Free parking is possible on site. The A2, A21 and A23 motorways can be reached within a 5-minute drive.

name: Hotel Gabi
address: Steinerstrasse 1, 5071 Salzburg, Salzburg
description: Located in Wals on the green outskirts of Salzburg, Hotel Gabi has an outdoor pool and offers rooms with free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a balcony. Parking is free of charge. Hotel Gabi features a spa area with a sauna, a steam bath, an infrared cabin, and a modern fitness room. A rich breakfast buffet with many regional products is served in the morning. In summer, guests can have breakfast on the terrace and enjoy the views of the Untersberg Mountain. A children’s playground is only a few steps away from Hotel Gabi. All rooms feature air conditioning and guests can use the indoor pool. Additionally, a private beach is available 500 metres away. The centre of Salzburg, the airport, and the motorways can be reached in a few minutes’ drive from Hotel Gabi.

name: Hallstatt Hideaway - Adults only
address: Dr. Friedrich-Morton-Weg 24, 4830 Hallstatt, Oberosterreich
description: No description found

description: Set in a large park with a private beach directly on the shore of Lake Hallstatt, Park am See offers unique accommodation in historic, restored trailers decorated with books, paintings, works of art, and curiosities. The centre of Hallstatt is a 4-minute drive away. The Park am See complex features a restaurant, a bar, a sauna (available at a surcharge), and a playground. Public areas provide free WiFi access. Small dishes and homemade cakes are available at Salon de Thé. A collection of fine arts and antiques, including original African sculptures, is featured at the property. Free private parking is available on site. The centre of Obertraun and the train station are a 3-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Bürglstein
address: Schwarzenbach 19, 5360 Sankt Wolfgang im Salzkammergut, Oberosterreich
description: Situated 2.5 km from the centre of Sankt Wolfgang and 400 metres from the beach at Lake Wolfgang, which guests can use for free, the smallest 4-star hotel at Lake Wolfgang offers free WiFi, a spa area, and a restaurant with a beer garden. Garage parking is possible on site. The modern rooms and suites at Hotel Bürglstein offer lake or mountain views, a flat-screen satellite TV, parquet floors, and a bathroom with a hairdryer. The Bürglstein Hotel’s restaurant serves Austrian cuisine prepared with seasonal products, as well as a wide range of fine wines, brandies and organic juices. The 100m² large spa area includes a Finnish sauna, and infrared cabin and a relaxation room. A storage room for skis and bicycles, as well as free outdoor parking spaces are available on site. Garage parking spaces are available at a surcharge. Hiking trails start right outside, and a large children's playground is only 50 metres away. There is a bus stop right in front of the hotel. Bad Ischl is only 12 km away, and it is 40 km to Salzburg. Both cities can be reached by an hourly bus connection. At a surcharge, the hotel's own taxi and shuttle service takes guest to the train station and to Salzburg Airport.

name: Hotel Rösch
address: Wörthersee Süduferstraße 55, 9073 Klagenfurt, Carinthia
description: Hotel Rösch is located in green surroundings, 1 km from Lake Wörthersee and the Alpen-Adria University. It offers free WiFi, free parking, a restaurant, and a spa area. You can easily reach the centre of Klagenfurt, the university and the train station from the bus stop right in front of the Hotel Rösch. The spacious rooms at the Rösch Hotel have cable TV and a private bathroom. Some also feature a balcony. In summer the hotel's own private beach, located on the shore of a small river close to the lake, is available to hotel guests free of charge. A bath house and a free pedalo rental are located there. The restaurant serves seasonal delicacies and steak specialities. The spa centre features a Finnish sauna, a steam bath, infrared cabins, a sun bed, a large relaxation room, and a garden. In summer the hotel's own private beach "(2-minute walking distance away)".

name: Flairhotel am Wörthersee
address: Quellenweg 97, 9220 Velden am Wörthersee, Carinthia
description: Directly located on the quiet southern shore of Lake Wörthersee, 3.5 km from the centre of Velden, the Flairhotel features a private beach with deck chairs and sunshades, an indoor pool with a conservatory, and free WiFi access in the entire property. The Flairhotel’s rooms offer a full HD flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safe, and a bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer. All rooms are accessible by lift. Spa facilities include a combined Finnish and bio sauna and an infrared cabin. Massages are available on request and should to be ordered in advance. The Kerzenstüberl restaurant serves Austrian and international cuisine, as well as a rich breakfast buffet featuring organic products. In fine weather, meals are served on the large terrace overlooking the lake. At the hotel, guests can rent a selection of different bicycles for exploring the surrounding lake district. Electric bikes and mountain bikes are also available. Free private parking is available at Flairhotel am Wörthersee. The Wörthersee Plus Card, offering various discounts in the region, is included in the rate.

name: The Unbound
address: Tom Schreursweg 40, 1076 HR Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Set in Amsterdam, 8.1 km from Anne Frank House, The Unbound Amsterdam offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel has a terrace and a bar. The property is non-smoking and is located 8.6 km from Royal Palace Amsterdam. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a wardrobe. All rooms have a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms also offer a kitchen fitted with a dishwasher. At The Unbound Amsterdam every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at the accommodation. Leidseplein is 8.8 km from The Unbound Amsterdam, while Van Gogh Museum is 8.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

name: Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin
address: Kon. Astrid Boulevard 5, 2200 AB Noordwijk, Zuid-Holland
description: Facing the beachfront, Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin offers 5-star accommodation in Noordwijk aan Zee and features a fitness centre, garden and shared lounge. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin each room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and vegetarian options. The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at the accommodation. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the bar. Noordwijk aan Zee Beach is 200 metres from Grand Hotel Huis ter Duin, while Keukenhof is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 29 km from the hotel.

name: Coral Level at Iberostar Selection Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulkán KM 17 B, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Cancún, 1.6 km from El Rey Beach, Coral Level at Iberostar Selection Cancun offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property features a hot tub, evening entertainment and a concierge service. At the resort, rooms are equipped with a balcony. All rooms are equipped with a coffee machine, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while some rooms come with a terrace and some have sea views. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. You can play table tennis and tennis at the 5-star resort. Playa Marlin is 1.6 km from Coral Level at Iberostar Selection Cancun, while La Isla Shopping Mall is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 19 km from the accommodation.

name: Iberostar Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan, Km. 17, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Cancún in the Quintana Roo Region, 5 km from La Isla Shopping Mall, Iberostar Selection Cancun \features a private beach area and water sports facilities. There is a restaurant and guests can have fun at the water park. Every room at this resort is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV and DVD player. You will find a coffee machine in the room. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a bath. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. There is a 24-hour front desk, hairdresser's and gift shop at the property. You can play tennis at the resort. It also offers car hire. Coco Bongo is 8 km from Iberostar Selection Cancun, while Cancun Government Palace is 11 km from the property. Cancun International Airport is 10 km away.

name: Trs Coral Hotel
address: Boulevard Vialidad Paseo Mujeres Smz No. 3 Mz 1 Vialidad Paseo Mujeres, 77400 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Hilton Cancun Mar Caribe
address: Kukulcan Km 17, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Cancun, the resort is a short walk from Iberostar Cancun Peninsula Convention Centre and offers a private beach, free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. It is a short drive from Hard Rock Cafe Cancun and provides free public parking on site. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. It provides family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families of any size, as well as a kids pool and a kids club. Those staying at the property can also hire a bicycle to explore Cancun and its surrounds. After a day of discovering the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. Each have a flat-screen TV, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Hilton Cancun Mar Caribe boasts convenient dining options, including Mediterranean and Italian dishes at La Luce and Mexican meals at Maxal. Eateries at the resort include Azulinda and Noriku. A selection of dining options are also available in the area. The resort is less than a 20-minute drive from Cancun International Airport and Iberostar Cancun Golf Course is a brief stroll away. The staff at the tour desk are available to book and organize activities in Cancun.HotelsCombined

name: Grand Fiesta Americana Coral Beach Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km. 9.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Location This excellent luxury hotel is situated directly beside the fine sandy beach on the Mexican Caribbean coast. The hotel lies in the tourist centre of Cancún, just a few minutes' walk from the town centre where guests will discover shops, boutiques, cafés, bars, restaurants and nightlife venues. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 602 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. A lift can be used to access the upper floors. Services such as a cloakroom, a safe and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access (for a fee) and wireless internet access (for a fee) are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room, a café and a bar. The grounds of the establishment feature a playground and an attractive garden. Additional features of the establishment include a newspaper stand and a playroom. Guests arriving by car can park their vehicles in the garage (for a fee) or car park (for a fee). Among the additional services available are medical assistance, room service, a laundry and a hairdressing salon. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. A balcony or terrace comes with most rooms as standard. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. Each accommodation unit features a double bed or a king-size bed. Among the amenities are a safe and a minibar. Tea and coffee making equipment is included as standard. An ironing set is also available to guests. Most accommodation units are equipped with internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a CD player and an alarm clock. Wheelchair-accessible rooms are also bookable. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub, a spa bath and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. The poolside bar serves a selection of refreshing drinks. For those wishing to enjoy some exercise, tennis and beach volleyball are offered onsite. The establishment offers indoor sporting activities such as table tennis, or for a fee, a gym. The establishment offers various wellness options, including a spa and a sauna, or for a fee, a steam bath and massage treatments. An entertainment programme, an entertainment programme for adults, an entertainment programme for children and a kids' club provide guests with recreational options during their free time. Meals The establishment offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA, Diners Club, JCB and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

name: Atelier Playa Mujeres
address: Lote 13, Rth-4, SM003, Mz.001, 77400 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: General description: The hotel Atelier Playa Mujeres (adults only) is located right on a sandy beach. At the beach, there are sun loungers and sun umbrellas free of charge. The town Cancun is around 14 km away (Playa del Carmen around 80 km, Tulum around 143 km). For mobility there is a car rental company. The airport (CUN) is approx. 28 km away. Amenities: The 5-storey beach hotel consists of a main building and an adjoining building, and has 429 rooms in total. It offers its guests a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby with bar, 6 lifts, air conditioning, a safe (for free), a shop, theater, a free parking area and a money changing facility. For the meals, there are 8 restaurants (air-conditioned). In a total 7 bars, you can relax in good company. WiFi is available for free. Room service is free of charge. Room cleaning, laundry / ironing service, concierge service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one fresh water pool. Here, there are sun umbrellas and sun loungers for free available. Refreshing beverages can be consumed directly at the pool bar. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Table tennis (where applicable, for a fee) and fitness. Spa area, sauna, solarium and massages available for a fee. Entertainment for adults: activity programme. Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Accepted methods of payment: Euro / MasterCard, Visa and American Express. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

name: Hyatt Zilara Cancun - Adults Only
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 11.5 HZ, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Hyatt Zilara Cancun Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Cancun. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, bathroom phone, separate living room, internet access – wireless, private pool. Take a break from a long day and make use of hot tub, fitness center, sauna, golf course (on site), golf course (within 3 km). For reliable service and professional staff, Hyatt Zilara Cancun Hotel caters to your needs.FarePortal
