name: Dreams Vista Cancun Golf & Spa Resort
address: Lote I-03 Manzana 12 Supermanzana 84, 77520 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Dreams Vista Cancun is an all-new, all ocean view, family resort! Set beachfront along the Caribbean Sea, there’s activities for the kid in everyone—a beautiful beach, four pools and watersports galore. The resort’s prime location is close to the wonders and ruins of the Mayan Riviera, and right next door to the Puerto Cancun Golf Club The brand new, modern rooms and suites at Dreams Vista Cancun all offer ocean views from a private, furnished balcony or terrace, an in-room mini-bar and more. Connecting rooms, family suites, and Sun Club upgrades are also available. All rooms and suites are non-smoking.WebBeds

name: Nizuc Resort and Spa
address: Kukulcan Boulevard Km 21 Punta Nizuc, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Offering panoramic views of the Caribbean Sea, Nizuc Resort & Spa is located on the secluded Punta Nizuc and features an outdoor pool, private dock and spa. Free Wi-Fi and free private parking are available to guests. The air-conditioned rooms offer Nespresso coffee makers and flat-screen TVs. The spacious bathrooms feature a bath tubs with rainfall showers. The 6 on-site restaurants serve modern Mexican dishes, Peruvian ceviches as well as Asian and Mediterranean food. Tours and activities can be arranged by the concierge. Nizuc Resort & Spa has event and meeting facilities. Guests can enjoy a variety of massages or treatments in the luxurious on-site spa. The Nizuc Thermal Experience is a feast to awaken the senses through a guided circuit of hydrotherapy. Laguna Nichupté can be reached 6.9 km. Cancun International Airport is a 10 minutes’ drive from Nizuc Resort & Spa. The center of Cancun can be reached within 25 minutes by car.

name: The Westin Cancun Resort Villas & Spa
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Km 20.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Plan an unforgettable getaway at The Westin Cancun Resort Villas & Spa. Tucked away between the Caribbean Sea and a peaceful lagoon, our beachfront vacation ownership resort offers the perfect destination for family vacations or getaways with friends. Unwind at one of the sparkling pools or on the white-sand beaches at our Cancun beach resort. Soothe tired muscles after an exciting day of Cancun adventures with a relaxing beauty treatment at The Heavenly Spa. Savor delicious cuisine and libations at our Cancun villa resort's restaurants and bars. Recharge in a spacious ocean-view or lagoon-view villa with a balcony and fully equipped kitchen, or select a comfortable studio with views of the water. All accommodations include Westin Heavenly® Beds and free Wi-Fi. Best of all, we do not charge resort or per person fees.Marriott

name: Hard Rock Hotel Cancun
address: Blvd Kukulcan KM 14.5, Hotel Zone, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The property is located in Cancun's popular hotel zone. The resort sits on the beach looking out at the beautiful Caribbean Sea. The hotel is modern with beautiful pools, swim up bars and multiple lounges and restaurants. The resorts fine chefs create unique dining experiences for the entire family in our specialty restaurants, featuring a mix of International, Mexican, Asiatic, Italian, and a Steakhouse cuisines. Guests can spend the night dancing to one of our live DJ's. Not only the lavish spacious rooms and suite amenities include a double hydro spa tub, but you can enjoy the stunning ocean views from your private balcony. Customers can choose from one of the wonderful opportunities from the area: visiting the Pre-Colombian Tulum City, take a jungle tour, a thrilling ride on the AquaTwister, snorkelling, or just enjoy the wonderful sun set while sailing. Here, you have all the possibilities to feel the real bliss.FarePortal

description: The award-winning, adults-only Le Blanc Spa Palace is regarded by many as one of the best hotels in the world. Pure luxury and elegance meet an incredible location, more than 20,000 m2 between the Caribbean Sea and the Nichupté Lagoon, enjoying stunning views. The hotel offers an excellent spa, various exceptional restaurants and a wonderful infinity pool, making it the ideal place for an unforgettable stay. SMOKE FREE PROPERTYFarePortal

description: Offering direct access to Cancún Beach, Live Aqua Cancun Beach Resort Cancun. Only features an outdoor swimming pool overlooking the Caribbean Sea. It has attractive rooms with balconies, 9 restaurants, 5 bars and a spa. Each spacious, air-conditioned room at the Live Aqua Beach Resort Cancun has stylish décor with tiled floors. All rooms include a TV, coffee maker, aromatherapy products, a safety-deposit box and a minibar which is refilled daily. The stylish Siete Restaurant serves a range of Mexican cuisine, while European and Asian dishes are on offer in the mb Restaurant. The Azur serves international options set by the pool and overlooking the sea. The Aqua’s extensive spa offers hydrotherapy treatments, massage and aromatherapy. There are also hot tubs and steam baths. There is a gym available, while yoga classes are also available. Located in Cancún’s Hotel Zone, the Live Aqua is set next to Nichupte Lagoon and in front of the popular La Isla shopping centre. Please note this is an adults-only hotel.

The airport (CUN) is approx. 32 km away. Amenities: Recently renovated in 2019, the 10-storey beach hotel consists of a main building and an adjoining building, and has 559 rooms in total. It is equipped with a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby, a lift, an air conditioning, a shop, discotheque, a theater as well as a parking area (for free). You will be warmly welcomed in both the hotel’s bars. WiFi can be used by hotel guests for a fee. Room cleaning and concierge service are free of charge. Hotel Maya Caribe Faranda Cancun is conveniently located a short drive from Cancun city centre. Guests can also easily discover restaurants, marinas, shops and a nightlife. A variety of water activities are also easily accessible. Relax in the beautiful surroundings in the Maya Caribe's spacious pool, overlooking the ocean. Enjoy a traditional Mexican dinner at the on-site restaurant and bar or plan the day's activities with help from the knowledgeable concierge staff. Rate does not include an eco-tax of US$1.55 per room per night, which must be paid upon arrival. By provision of the local municipality, the hotel charges a mandatory tax of $72.62 MXN or $3.9 USD per room, per night, payable directly at the property.

And let's not forget the on-site amenities; a week is simply not enough time to sample them all. There are freshwater pools for adults and children, a full- service spa, fitness center, beach, terrace and villa massage service, tennis courts with floodlighting for evening play, two restaurants and a snack bar, to name just a few. As an added benefit, guests are allowed access to amenities at all our Royal resorts in the Cancun area, with a free shuttle service between them. The beautiful villa sleeps 6 people and has a full kitchen and two balconies. description: Find the perfect getaway at The Westin Lagunamar Ocean Resort Villas & Spa, Cancun in Mexico. Situated on the Caribbean Sea in the Cancun Hotel Zone, the studio and villa rentals at our beachfront vacation ownership resort boast endless amenities designed to make your stay exceptional. Explore popular Cancun attractions such as Tulum, Chichén Itza and more from our resort. Go for a swim in our infinity pool, spend the day on our white-sand beach, indulge at our spa or play a round of kid-friendly mini golf. Satisfy your vacation cravings at our resort restaurants or relax poolside and let us bring snacks and drinks right to you. If you've come to Mexico for a wedding, let our team make planning your event a success in an outdoor space on the beach and with our custom catering services. At the end of the day, settle into your Cancun vacation rental featuring a fully equipped kitchen and a balcony with ocean views. We look forward to welcoming you to our family-friendly Cancun beach resort in Mexico.Marriott

description: Excellence is the word that describes this magnificent adults only resort, situated right on a lovely beach of the Mexican's coast, between the vibrant city of Cancun and the beautiful Playa del Carmen. Cancun International Airport is only a 20-minute drive away and the staff of the hotel might help guests to arrange transport service. All the accommodation units offer a little world of luxury featuring top-notch amenities to provide an unforgettable stay in Riviera Maya. The establishment boasts an incredible range of dining and wining options, offering exquisite international cuisine in different types of ambiances. Guests can enjoy many activities and leisure options, such as volleyball or tennis, and spend relaxing moments in the exclusive wellness area or at one of the many swimming pools available in the resort. Those who choose to stay in this accommodation will live a unique holiday experience.FarePortal

That’s the spirit that courses through our luxurious accommodations and villas. Ease into pure relaxation and bliss with complimentary Wi-Fi, free phone calls, smart TV, a bottle of wine upon arrival, double whirlpool tub, 24-hour room service. You don’t simply enter one of our suites—you get swept away by the possibilities. RESORT CREDIT: A WORTHY EXCUSE TO SPOIL OUR GUESTS It’s not just another day in paradise, it could mean $1,500. name: Dreams Sands Cancun Resort and Spa
address: Blvd. Kukulcan km. 8.5 Lote B, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Situated upon a white-sand beach in the heart of Cancun's hotel zone, Dreams Sands Cancun Resort & Spa is also 10 minutes' drive from the city centre. Guests are offered with gourmet dining, bars and nightlife entertainment, plus 2 swimming pools. The elegantly decorated rooms offer stunning views of the Caribbean Sea and Isla Mujeres. They include a full, spacious bathroom with luxury toiletries, a daily stocked minibar that offers beers, soft drinks and bottled water, and amenities including an iPod dock. Dreams Sands Cancun Resort & Spa boasts an equipped spa and fitness centre, and for children's amusement there is the Explorer's Club. The resort also features an outdoor hot tub, plus non-motorized water sports activities can be arranged by the Dreams Entertainment team. Guests will be able to choose between 9 different restaurant options, all offering gourmet cuisine. Four festive bars and lounges will serve a wide menu of unlimited top-shelf spirits. Guests can also perfect their swing at a nearby golf course with complimentary greens fees. Cancun International Airport can be reached in a 25-minute drive. Family friendly hotel, please see fine print for additional information.

name: Hyatt Ziva Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Manzana 51, Lote 7, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This stunning beachfront resort is set on the beautiful strip of Punta Cancun and framed by the Caribbean Sea, where you can enjoy a white sand beach and clear-blue waters. All rooms at Hyatt Ziva Cancún include a flat-screen TV, mini bar and a coffee machine. Rooms feature a private bathroom equipped with a shower as well as bath robes and slippers. Hyatt Ziva Cancun offers a variety of activities, from theater shows to water sports to tequila tastings and a microbrewery. Choose to lounge in a beach cabana, sip a margarita and enjoy diving, snorkeling, sailing, and swimming in the Caribbean. Soak up the sun at cascading pools overlooking the sea, including the pool bar. Enjoy the oceanfront spa, with a massage, holistic body treatments, hydrotherapy and a fitness center. Hyatt Ziva Cancun is located 300 metres from Coco Bongo while La Isla Shopping Mall is 3.4 km away. Cancun International Airport is 17 km away.

description: Situated in Costa Mujeres, 19 km from Cancun Bus Station, Punta Blanca Beach House features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a private beach area. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a microwave, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Punta Blanca Beach House provides some rooms with sea views, and the rooms include a balcony. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels. Continental and American breakfast options are available each morning at Punta Blanca Beach House. Cancun Government Palace is 20 km from the hotel, while Beto Avila Stadium is 21 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 36 km from Punta Blanca Beach House, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

address: Boulevard Kukulcan KM 20, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Visit paradise at The Westin Resort & Spa, Cancun. Nestled on the beach between the Caribbean Sea and a tranquil lagoon, our Cancun beach resort offers the perfect destination for business trips and vacations in Mexico. Just six miles from CUN Airport, our Cancun Quintana Roo resort is a short ride to the aquarium, museums, waterparks, Isla Mujeres and water activities. Unwind at one of our sparkling pools or on the white-sand beaches then schedule a relaxing beauty treatment at The Heavenly Spa. Find adventure with a snorkeling trip to the coral reef or other activities. Savor delicious cuisine and libations at our on-site restaurants and bars. If you're in Mexico for a conference or family gathering, take advantage of our indoor venues, custom catering, planning services and event spaces. Kick back in a comfortable guest room or suite with views of the water. All rooms include Westin Heavenly® Beds and free Wi-Fi. Best of all, our Cancun property does not charge resort or per-person fees.Marriott

address: Boulevard Kukulcan Km.8.5 Lote 3, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo

Fiesta Americana Cancn Villas is situated on Punta Cancn, the heart of the hotel zone, very close to the main shopping malls, restaurants and bars in the city and just a few hours from archeological sites and theme parks. Inside the hotel, you will find a wealth of activities for every member of the family, whether for fun or relaxation. Please be advised that from now on, an official Sanitation tax of 79.88 MXN per night will be charged in our hotels located in Benito Jurez, Quintana Roo (Cancn).iHotelier/iStay

name: Beachscape Kin Ha Villas & Suites
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km 8.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This Cancun resort is a 3-minute drive from Pok-ta-Pok Golf course, in northern Cancún. This hotel offers an outdoor pool, children’s pool, convenience store and salon with massage services. The Beachscape Kin Ha Villas and Suites provide guests free Wi-Fi in public areas, a tour desk and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can work out in the gym or use the laundry facilities. Suites come with cable TV and a private balcony. A full private bathroom, cable TV, balcony and full kitchen are also some of the features offered by these accommodations. Kin Ha Villas and Suites offers 2 on-site restaurants that include breakfast and lunch, while à la carte options are available for dinner. Guests can also dine at La Palapa, a beach bar and grill. There is a wide range of restaurants and bars within a short walk. The hotel offers direct access to the beach, which is popular for snorkelling and swimming. The property also boasts convenience stores and spa services on site. Beachscape Kin Ha Villas is 12 miles from the Cancun Airport.

name: Kempinski Hotel Cancún
address: Retorno del Rey #36, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This Grand Hotel Cancun - Managed by Kempinski features 2 outdoor swimming pools, a spa and a private beach. It offers modern rooms equipped with an iPod docking station, CD player and cable TV. The centre of Cancun is 18 km away. Kempinski spa and Salon offers a wide range of massage therapies, body treatments and facials. There is also a gym and tennis court. Cabanas are available on the hotel’s private beach. The Grand Hotel Cancun - Managed by Kempinski elegant rooms feature a mini bar and work desk. All rooms have a balcony with ocean views. The private bathroom includes a bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer. Dining options range from traditional Asian specialties at The Sushi Bar to Mediterranean cuisine at Fantino. Indoor or outdoor dining is available and cocktails are served at the Lobby Lounge. Just 20-minutes from Cancun International Airport, the Grand Hotel Cancun - Managed by Kempinski can arrange airport and area attraction transportation. Aquaworld, offering boat trips, is 2 km away.

description: Located in beautiful Playa Mujeres, complete with famous white sandy beaches and stunning ocean views in a privileged gated community. This brand new, AAA Four Diamond award winning, adults-only, all-suite resort is only 35 minutes from the Cancun International Airport and 10 minutes from downtown Cancun, in an 18-hole signature Greg Norman golf course. Featuring 424 suites, 9 restaurants and 7 bars; open air spaces make it ideal to enjoy the warm ocean breeze and get a tropical feeling. It features two protected flora and fauna areas where some of the region's flowers and birds can be seen and photographed. Each of the luxurious, comfortable suites are finely appointed with wood elements and spacious terraces.  All Secrets Playa Mujeres guests have the opportunity to enjoy Exchange Privileges (Free flow access) to Dreams Playa Mujeres, located next door, adding 10 restaurants and 13 bars options. description: Located on the beachfront on Kukulkan Boulevard, Rantree’s Club Regina has an outdoor pool, private beach area, and a specialized staff that works to entertain the guests. Parking is possible on site. Rooms feature modern minimalist décor and include a flat-screen TV, telephone, alarm clock and ironing facilities. Some rooms also have a sofa bed. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer, free toiletries and towels. The property has its own restaurant and bar on site. You can also find a good variety of options along Kulkulkan Boulevard. La Isla Shopping Village is 15 minutes’ drive away, while Plaza Caracol Shopping Centre, the Plaza Forum by the Sea and Coco Bongo Club are within a 20-minute drive. Cancun International Airport is 12 km away.

name: Secrets Playa Blanca Costa Mujeres
address: Carr Punta Sam - Isla Blanca,Mz 2, Lt 10, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Secrets Playa Blanca Costa Mujeres offers the perfect backdrop for romantic relaxation and exploration, situated along a secluded strip of idyllic oceanfront coast, only 12 miles north of Cancun and a short drive to championship golf and a variety of historical local attractions. This all-adult, luxury property resides on an expansive and pristine white-sand beach with crystal-clear waters and features 507 modern suites each embellished with handmade art and furnishings crafted from organic, locally sourced materials, providing a truly authentic experience. The elevated Preferred Club accommodations provide an extra level of luxury with upgraded amenities and exclusive access to the Preferred Club Lounge, an oceanfront Beach Bar and a unique pool surrounded by lush vegetation. Indulge with Unlimited-Luxury®, where everything is included. Astonish your palate with limitless gourmet dining, sip top-shelf spirits served at our elegant bars and lounges and enjoy a wide variety of entertainment offered both day and night. From calming beachfront infinity pools overlooking the ocean to an engaging activities pool offering excitement throughout the day, there is something for everyone. Wind down with a specialty treatment at the Secrets Spa by Pevonia®, delight in evening shows at the theater or try one of our culinary experiences from wine and tequila tastings to cooking classes.Sembo

name: All Ritmo Cancun Resort & Water Park
address: Km. 1.5 Carretera a Puerto Juarez, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Boasting a privileged location in a beautiful corner of the Caribbean, this charming complex is the perfect choice for families travelling with children. Guests will find themselves just 22 kilometres from Cancun International Airport and just a few steps from a white sandy beach ideal for those looking for peace and tranquillity. The comfortable and spacious accommodation options offer all the necessary services and amenities to enjoy an unforgettable holiday experience. Standard suites have been decorated in a contemporary style and offer views over the garden or to the pool. The suites include vibrant colours and come with a balcony or terrace and a cosy living room ideal to share moments with the family. Visitors will be delighted by the wide selection of dining options including national and international specialities and the youngest guests may appreciate the complete entertainment programme.FarePortal

name: Margaritaville Island Reserve Riviera Cancun
address: Carr Chetuma Km 27 5, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: This sophisticated hotel, which can be found in North Riviera Maya, is a great option for families. The total number of rooms is 148. Wi-Fi internet connection is available for further comfort and convenience. All guests staying at this property can enjoy the convenience of 24-hour reception. Margaritaville Island Reserve Riviera Cancun does not offer cots on demand. Common areas are suitable for wheelchair-disabled people. The car park may be useful to those arriving by car. Margaritaville Island Reserve Riviera Cancun follows environmentally sustainable practices. Those who stay at this establishment may take advantage of its catering options. Visitors may appreciate the health and wellness services offered at the hotel. Some services may be subject to additional charges.FarePortal

name: GR Caribe by Solaris
address: Blvd Kukulcan Lote 64 Bis 2da etapa seca, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This resort is conveniently situated in the southern part of Cancun's hotel zone, directly on the fine white sandy beach and close to the turquoise waters of the Caribbean Sea. It has a modern Mediterranean-style architecture and boasts an elegant interior design. The international airport can be reached within a 10-minute drive and the main shopping malls are about 15 minutes away. This family-friendly establishment offers a choice of different room types ranging from Deluxe rooms to Luxury Oceanfront Rooms featuring a wide range of top quality amenities, such as an IPod docking station and satellite TV. As for dining choices, the hotel offers two restaurants including international specialities and vegetarian menus. It also provides beachfront hot tubs, ideal to enjoy a moment of relaxation every time of day.Ticket Package

name: Paradisus Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulkan Km 16.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Perfectly situated on the soft white sand beaches of Cancun, this exclusive beach resort provides the perfect accommodations for your vacation getaway. Paradisus Cancun is a chance to experience the stunning beauty that has made Cancun an international destination in the comfort of a luxury resort on par with the highest standards of excellence. This commitment to quality is why Paradisus Cancun has been awarded Four Diamond honors since 2006 by AAA. Luxurious, spacious and elegantly decorated rooms on a pristine beach that is short 15 minutes from the airport. Whether you are on the beach, at one of the four lagoon-inspired pools, or dining in any of our nine on-site restaurants, our goal is your total satisfaction. Indulge yourself with upgraded The Reserve service, an exclusive experience for adults, families and groups with skilled concierge service, private areas and a complete list of upgraded amenities. YHI SPA with authentic wellness activities and treatments. Romance by Paradisus offers six packages meticulously designed to meet every dream.FarePortal

name: JW Marriott Cancun Resort & Spa
address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Km 14.5, Lote 40-A, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Indulge in a revitalizing retreat at one of the best Cancun luxury resorts JW Marriott Cancun Resort & Spa, where you'll discover numerous upscale amenities including spacious, sand-toned accommodations, on-site dining and premier access to alluring destinations. Dedicate a day to exploring the historical Mayan ruins and experience the area's lively clubs and bars, dancing your nights away. Watch the sunrise over the blue Mexican Caribbean Sea, unwind with a dip in the infinity pool, retreat to a beachfront Bali daybed or pursue a little wellness at the world-class Mayan-inspired spa Sens-yah. JW Marriott Cancun Resort & Spa offers five international restaurants Sasi Thai, Gustino Italian Grill, Bella Candela, Bravio Spanish Cuisine & La 16 Mexican cuisine. The only thing left to do is toast to it all with creative craft cocktails offerings from the JW Lobby Bar’s 150 Margaritas Menu and delight exquisite shareable plates at Bella Candela. Check out our Cancun resort deals today.Marriott

name: The Royal Cancun All Suites Resort
address: Kukulcan Boulevard Km 4.5 Hotel Zone, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 201 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and ovens. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters and premium bedding. Rooms have private balconies. 32-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Amenities Treat yourself with massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools, outdoor tennis courts, and a fitness center. Additional features at this aparthotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the complimentary area shuttle. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at The Royal Cancun All Suites Resort in Cancun (Zona Hotelera), you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Tortuga Beach and La Isla Shopping Mall. This 4-star aparthotel is 0.8 mi (1.2 km) from Playa Tortugas and 2.2 mi (3.5 km) from Puerto Cancun Marina Town Center. Dining Satisfy your appetite with American cuisine at La Palapa Restaurant, one of the aparthotel's 4 restaurants. Relax with a refreshing drink at the beach bar, the poolside bar, or one of 4 bars/lounges. name: Riu Palace Las Americas
address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Km 8.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: A slice of Spain on the Caribbean is on display at Riu Palace Las Americas, in the heart of the hotel zone and near shops and night clubs. This beachside resort is 8.5 km (less than 6 mi) from downtown Cancun. The resort features 6 restaurants, 5 bars, 2 outdoor pools, an outdoor spa tub, and a swimming pool. Room rates include 24-hour room service, spa, gym, water-sports equipment, daily activities, and RIU evening programs. Most Riu Palace guestrooms feature balconies with ocean or lagoon views. All suites feature minibars, satellite TVs, turndown service, WIFI, in-room safes, and bathroom amenities.WebBeds

name: Sandos Cancun Luxury Resort
address: Km 14 Mz 53 Lote 37-1 ZH, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: The Fives Oceanfront
address: Av. Javier Rojo Gomez SM 002 Mza 25 LT 1, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Puerto Morelos, a few steps from Playa Puerto Morelos, The Fives Oceanfront offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Italian cuisine. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. The Fives Oceanfront features certain units with city views, and all rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels. Guests at The Fives Oceanfront can enjoy a continental breakfast. You can play table tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for cycling. Cancun Underwater Museum is 30 km from the hotel, while ADO International Bus Station is 36 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 25 km from The Fives Oceanfront.

name: Hideaway at Royalton Riviera Cancun, An Autograph Collection Resort, Adults Only
address: Carretera Federal 307, 77500 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Reignite meaningful connections at an adults-only aged 18+ resort where elevated experiences create memories to last a lifetime. Located only 15 minutes from Cancun International Airport, your every desire is tailor-made. From exclusive dining to private beach and pool access and luxury accommodations, our resort-within-a-resort offers a premium Riviera Cancun getaway that also affords you access to all our neighboring Royalton Riviera Cancun has to offer.Marriott

name: Ocean Coral & Turquesa
address: Super Manzana 12, Lote 1-05, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Special check-in instructions Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Know Before You Go Reservations are required for massage services and spa treatments. Reservations can be made by contacting the property prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. A fee for a mandatory Christmas Eve gala dinner is included in the total price displayed for stays on December 24. A fee for a mandatory New Year's Eve gala dinner is included in the total price displayed for stays on December 31. Children 2 years old and younger stay free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding. Only registered guests are allowed in the guestrooms. No pets and no service animals are allowed at this property. This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place. Disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F. Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; a shield is in place between staff and guests in main contact areas; periodic temperature checks are conducted on staff; temperature checks are available to guests; guests are provided with hand sanitizer. Fees Late check-out is available for a fee (subject to availability) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.Ticket Package

name: Intercontinental Presidente Cancun Resort
address: Boulevard Kukulkan KM 7.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Enjoy breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea from one of our 300 equipped rooms and suites in the best 5 star hotel in Cancun. Located in the hotel zone and the best beach in Cancun, a wide beach with a calm sea and no waves. 15 minutes from the city and nightlife and 30 minutes from the airport. Relax in our spa in a peaceful environment while your children have fun in our kids club with professional staff.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Oasis Palm
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km 4.5, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This property is a beachfront, 11 km away from Cancun town center, and 11 km away from Cancun International Airport. Facilities and services include 24 hr reception, air conditioning, babysitting services, bar, car parking, banquet facilities, garden, fitness facilities, non smoking property, outdoor pool, restaurant, safe box, spa and TV. Rooms feature airconditioning, safe box, alarm clock, TV, cable channels, free toiletries, shower, toilet paper. Address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km 4.5, Hotel Zone, Cancun, Mexico, 77500.WebBeds

name: Flamingo Cancun Resort
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km. 11, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Please do NOT book Instantly please enquire for latest rates and availability before booking,as pricing is dynamic,we will get back to you straight away. This hotel is next to the beach, only 20 minutes from downtown Cancun. The hotel features 2 outdoor pools, a restaurant and rooms with satellite TV. Flamingo Cancun Resort also features air conditioning and a private bathroom in every guest room. The rooms offer a view of the lagoon or a view of the Caribbean Sea. Guests can enjoy music, activities and a swim-up bar at the main pool. The Flamingo also offers an oceanfront pool with a relaxing atmosphere. A gym is available. La Fuente Restaurant serves international cuisine with views of the Caribbean Sea. The beachfront Albatros Restaurant and Bar is open for lunch and dinner. Cocktails and music are available at the Palenque Lobby Bar. This is our guests' favorite part of Cancún, according to independent reviews. Couples in particular like the location - they rated it 8.8 for a two-person trip. We speak your language! Flamingo Cancun Resort has been welcoming  guests since Sept 13, 2010 Most popular facilities 1 swimming pool Spa Fitness center Room service Restaurant Facilities for disabled guests Non-smoking rooms Bar Good Breakfast Beachfront ATM & Currency Exchange: Need cash? There's an ATM and a currency exchange service at this property.VRBO

name: Krystal Cancun
address: Paseo Kukulcan Km 9 Lotes 9 y 9 A, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This resort is on the ocean and across from the Cancun Convention Center. It features a sauna, hot tub, an oceanfront pool, while rooms include a minibar and cable TV. Each room at Krystal Cancun provides air conditioning. A safety deposit box is available in every room. The Krystal offers on-site car rental services. Other services include event organization, laundry facilities and a tour desk. Hacienda El Mortero restaurant is on-site at Cancun Krystal. It provides traditional Mexican cuisine and live mariachi music. The resort also offers a buffet breakfast and on-site bars. Only a short walk from the Krystal Cancun are numerous shops and restaurants. Guests at the resort will also find easy access to a variety of recreational activities including snorkeling, sailing and fishing.

name: Sunset Royal Beach Resort
address: Blvd. Kukulkan Km. 10 Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The charming beach hotel is strategically located in the heart of the hotel zone in Cancun. It is surrounded by the most famous nightclubs in the city as well as several restaurants and shops. The hotel is located just 25 km from Cancun International Airport. Renovated in 2011, the hotel has 204 well-equipped rooms as well as 4 restaurants and 3 bars offering gourmet food and imported drinks. The air-conditioned club resort welcomes its guests in a lobby with 24-hour reception, currency exchange facilities and lift access to the upper floors. Further facilities include a children's playground, kids' club and a cafe. Each of the well-equipped guest rooms features an en suite bathroom and a private terrace or balcony. Further room amenities include an LCD cable TV, a minibar and Internet access for a comfortable and relaxing holiday.FarePortal

name: Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort
address: Lote Rth-7-pm-ii, Lte1, Mz 1, Smz 3, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Perfectly situated in the exclusive gated community of Playa Mujeres, within a world-famous golf course, rests the stunning AAA Four Diamond Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort. This all-suite resort boasts 502 graciously appointed and luxuriously equipped suites, surrounded by secluded white sand beaches and the turquoise Caribbean Sea. Three levels of swimming pools spanning over 65,000 square feet, including two infinity pools with breathtaking ocean views, six hot tubs, a children’s pool, a water park for little ones, a water park for all ages. Located just 10 minutes from downtown Cancun and 35 minutes from Cancun International Airport, this luxurious resort provides an ideal vacation setting for couples and couples with children. At Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort, guests will enjoy the benefits of Unlimited Luxury®, where everything is included and no wristband — unlimited premium drinks at any of our 13 bars and lounges, gourmet à la carte dining, room service, daily refreshed mini-bar, pool and beach wait Service. All adult guests (+18 years old) from Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort will have free flow access to Secrets Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort, located next door. With 9 additional restaurant options, 7 additional bars, 2 additional pools and more! If Preferred Club room category is reserved, status and inclusions are provided in both properties!

name: Ocean Dream Cancun by GuruHotel
address: Boulevard Kukulcán km 9, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: With 2 outdoor pools, an on-site dive centre and à la carte, international restaurant, Ocean Dream BPR is located in Cancún, right on a beautiful white-sand beach. It is just 100 metres from restaurants and nightlife. Each spacious, modern room here includes a cable TV, safety-deposit box and free WiFi. They also boast a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. At Ocean Dream BPR Condo Hotel you will find a private beach area. Cancun Convention Centre, plus small stores, banks and bars, is just a 5-minute walk away. Plaza Caracol shopping centre is just 850 metres from the hotel, while Cancun International Airport can be reached within 25 minutes by car. The property offers free parking.

name: Gr Solaris Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulkan KM. 19.5, Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This family-friendly beach hotel is ideally situated directly on the seemingly endless white sandy beach, overlooking the azure waters of the Caribbean Sea. The El Rey archaeological zone is only a few steps away, and Cancun International Airport can be reached within 15 minutes by car. The resort features four restaurants and three bars offering both local and international specialties. Guests might make use of the fitness centre and a spa area, and families will delight in the kids' club and nightly entertainment including theme nights, magic shows, karaoke and a casino. Guests can also enjoy courses and daily activities such as cooking and Spanish classes, yoga, and beach volleyball, all during a wonderful, sunny family retreat in Cancun.Ticket Package

name: Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa (Adults Only)
address: Calle 12 Mza. 41 Lote 2-04, Bahia Petempich, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa, nestled between the Caribbean Sea and the Lagoon of Bahia Petempich, is a vibrant, chic, and modern all-suite resort for adults seeking a sophisticated and lively getaway. The resort’s layout consisting of two horseshoe-shaped buildings and sections, each with its own unique personality and vibe, offers singles, couples, and friends the perfect balance of excitement and relaxation. Mix and mingle at a water aerobics class or relax with a curated cocktail in hand by the energy pool or become immersed in entertainment and dance to the music of international DJs in the Xcelerate zone. Enjoy the Unlimited-Luxury® inclusions of boundless gourmet dining and premium brand beverages at 9 trendy options; including five à la carte restaurants, a tapas option, one buffet, a grill on the beach, a snack area by the Xcelerate pool and The Nook café. Guests can enjoy bites at Spoon and nine bars and lounges, along with 24-hour room and concierge services, a captivating Events Calendar, and more. There is a 24-hour front desk, a cash machine and hairdresser's at the property. Free use of bicycles is available at this resort and the area is popular for snorkeling and diving. Playa del Carmen is 38 km from Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa, while Cozumel is 45 km away. Cancún International Airport is 16 km from the property.

name: Cyan Cancun Resort & Spa
address: Km 20.5, Blvd. Kukulcan, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This property is 1 minute walk from the beach. Set in Cancún, 700 metres from Playa Punta Nizuc, Cyan Cancun Resort & Spa offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a bar and a private beach area. The property is located 1.2 km from Playa Delfines, 2.8 km from San Miguelito Beach and 7 km from La Isla Shopping Mall. The hotel provides a terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The units feature a wardrobe. Cyan Cancun Resort & Spa offers a hot tub. Coco Bongo is 10 km from the accommodation, while Beto Avila Stadium is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 10 km from Cyan Cancun Resort & Spa.

name: Sky Business Hotel
address: ul. Zlotoryjska 30, 59-220 Legnica, Dolnoslaskie
description: Set in Legnica, 300 metres from Art Gallery, Sky Business Hotel offers accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The accommodation provides nightclub and an ATM. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at Sky Business Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Legnica Cathedral is 300 metres from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Copernicus Wrocław Airport, 67 km from Sky Business Hotel.

name: Vislow Resort
address: 3A Czarne, 43-460 Wisła, Slaskie
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a rainfall showerhead, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop. Other amenities include designer toiletries, laundry facilities, a freezer, and towels.Expedia

name: Hotel Warszawa Spa & Resort
address: Ul. Zdrojowa 1, 16-300 Augustów, Podlaskie
description: Located a picturesque setting of Augustów overlooking Lake Necko, Hotel Warszawa Spa & Resort offers plenty of activities to make use of its beautiful surroundings. It offers rooms with free wireless internet access. Each of the rooms at Hotel Warszawa has modern amenities, including satellite TV. Each also has a spacious bathroom with a shower. At guests’ request, a children’s bathtub can be added to the room. Guests will enjoy a professional treatment at Hotel Warszawa’s spa centre with massages. Breakfast can be served in the hotel restaurant or brought to the room at the time of choosing. Restaurant also offers international cuisine. Restaurant boasts a wonderful panorama of Lake Necko from an observation deck. Hotel Warszawa Spa & Resort has a quiet, private beach. Guests can rent a bike and explore the beautiful forest of Augustów or tour the banks of Netta River. Necko Lake also has watersports facilities, like water skis. You can enjoy a boat trip or a gondola.

name: Przystan Hotel&spa
address: Zeglarska 4, 10-160 Olsztyn (Warminsko-Mazurskie), Warminsko-Mazurskie
description: Przystań Hotel&Spa is located by Lake Ukiel in Olsztyn. It offers a free Wellness Centre, which features a swimming pool, saunas, a hot tub and a gym, Free WiFi access is available. Each room here is air conditioned and will provide you with a TV with cable channels and a minibar. The private bathrooms come with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a safety deposit box, linen and towels. Guests can benefit from a number of facilities, such as a private beach area and a business centre. Cycling and water sports are some of the activities that can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings. The hotel restaurant serves Asian cuisine, while the well-known Przystań restaurant next door serves regional specialities. Przystań Hotel&Spa is located 3 km from the Olsztyn Old Town and 4.6 km from the Olsztyn Planetarium.

name: Hotel Robert's Port
address: Stare Sady 4, 11-730 Mikołajki, Warminsko-Mazurskie
description: Located in a quiet place in the beautiful Masurian Lake District, the 4-star Hotel Robert's Port offers free access to an indoor pool, a kids' pool and saunas. Rooms are carpeted, air-conditioned and classically decorated. There is a TV with satellite channels, air-condition and a refrigerator in each room. Every room includes a private bathroom with a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. The hotel has a 24/7 reception. There are two hotel restaurants, where guests can enjoy Polish and international cuisine, and a patio café. The property also features a garden, gym and fitness room. Guests can rent out bicycles, Nordic walking sticks or angling equipment. Kayaks, pedalos and boats are also available. The youngest guests can enjoy themselves in the kids' club, vide games room and a safe outdoor playground. Hot tub and spa treatments for body and face are available at a surcharge. The popular Mikołajki resort is 4 km away and Hotel Robert’s Port is located right on the Tałty Lake.

name: Hotel Aurora Family & Spa
address: ul. Boh. Warszawy 17, 72-500 Międzyzdroje, Zachodniopomorskie
description: Overlooking the pier, Hotel Aurora Family & SPA offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The hotel houses an extensive spa area. The rooms at the Aurora Family & SPA come with a 32-inch LCD TV and a safety deposit box. All feature a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Aurora’s spa features a 20-metre swimming pool, a sauna, a gym and a massage parlour. Guests can also book a range of beauty treatments. There also is a special swimming pool for children, as well as activities for children are organised by the hotel. The hotel has a restaurant serving traditional Polish dishes, as well as fresh fish and seafood. In the morning guests can enjoy breakfast buffet.

name: Sheraton Sopot Hotel
address: Powstancow Warszawy 6, 81-718 Sopot, Pomorskie
description: Sheraton Sopot Hotel is a 5 star spa hotel located, right at the beach, next to the longest wooden pier in Europe and just 30 minutes away from Gdansk city center and the airport. Our spa hotel offers 189 elegant rooms and renovated suites. The Sheraton Sopot hotel is the ideal destination for every occasion, from family getaways to business stays. Our large Conference Center with 3000 square meters of space divided between 14 conference rooms and 2 foyers can accommodate up to 1100 delegates. After a day of the conference or an active family day out the guests can relax in Sheraton Sopot Spa, which includes a fitness center, swimming pool, Spa Experience Zone with a wide range of saunas, and treatment rooms.Marriott

name: Metro Mirage Hotel Newport
address: 2 Queens Parade West, Sydney, NSW 2106
description: The Metro Mirage Hotel Newport is situated on the tranquil shores of Pittwater, just 45-minutes north of Sydney's CBD. The hotel features well-equipped rooms and a large outdoor pool. Palm Beach is less than 20-minutes' drive away. All of the rooms at the Metro Mirage Hotel Newport are well decorated and come with air-conditioning and a cable TV. Guests can relax in the outdoor pool and spa. The property's ideal location on Sydney's Northern Beaches offers activities including access to beaches, surfing, hiking, cruises, deep sea fishing and sailing. The Metro Mirage Hotel Newport is less than 35 km from the airport. Limited free parking is available on-site (spaces are limited and cannot be guaranteed).

name: JW Marriott Gold Coast Resort & Spa
address: 158 Ferny Avenue, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Unwind at a five-star resort in the town of Surfers Paradise. JW Marriott Gold Coast Resort & Spa boasts luxurious rooms, award-winning service and a covetable hotel location on Ferny Avenue. Attend events at Gold Coast Convention Centre, treat the family to Sea World Gold Coast and stroll the beautiful beaches of Surfers Paradise. Our redesigned hotel rooms and suites offer an ideal setting to relax, complete with high-speed Wi-Fi, plush bedding and pristine marble bathrooms. Wake up feeling refreshed and ready for adventure in Surfers Paradise. We offer family-friendly resort facilities, from peaceful saltwater lagoons and an outdoor freshwater pool with a slide to a fitness centre and Sport Court®. One-of-a-kind experiences at our hotel include culinary cooking classes, JW Garden herb planting and guided tours, daily fish feeding, snorkeling in the saltwater lagoons and much more. Leave your family vacation to Surfers Paradise richer than when you arrived at JW Marriott Gold Coast Resort & Spa.Marriott

name: Surfers Aquarius on the Beach
address: 4-12 Old Burleigh Road, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Surfers Aquarius offers easy direct beach access. Guests can have a game of tennis or squash, try their hand at the putting green, work out in the fitness centre and then sit back and relax in one of the 3 swimming pools, 2 spas and 2 saunas while the kids play in the play ground or cool down in the children's wading pool. Surfers Aquarius is 1.6 km from Gold Coast Convention and Exhibition Centre. Jupiters Casino is 2 km from the property. Pacific Fair Shopping Centre is 2.3 km from Surfers Aquarius. The nearest airport is Gold Coast Airport, 19 km from the property. The property also features a large B.B.Q. area setting for up to 48 people, and an 8-seat gazebo overlooking the ocean, all set within 2 acres of tropical gardens. All accommodation offers a fully equipped kitchen, a dining setting and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Free secure parking is available on site.

name: Hope Harbour Hotel
address: 11 John Lund Drive, Hope Island, QLD 4212
description: Located in Gold Coast, Ramada by Wyndham Hope Harbour is an easy drive from Warner Bros. Movie World and provides free public parking on site. It has a gym, as well as a sauna, an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. For a quick and effortless check-in and departure experience, guests can benefit from the express check-in/check-out feature. The 70 air conditioned rooms have living and dining areas. An in-room safe, a refrigerator and a walk-in closet are also available to guests. Ramada by Wyndham Hope Harbour's in-house restaurant, The Pier, is a popular spot to enjoy a meal. For those with day trips planned, the hotel provides packed lunches if required. Gold Coast Airport is just a 40-minute drive from Ramada by Wyndham Hope Harbour, and a shuttle service is provided for those staying at the property. The staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Gold Coast.Revato

name: Oceana On Broadbeach
address: 100 Old Burleigh Road, Broadbeach, QLD 4218
description: Located at the beachfront near Broadbeach, these luxurious apartments have spacious balconies with panoramic views of the ocean. The property is a 5-minute drive from Surfers Paradise. Guests enjoy a spa, fitness centre and a barbecue area with a gazebo. All apartments at Oceana On Broadbeach are self-catering units set in an expansive layout. Each one has modern comforts such as a well-equipped kitchen and laundry facilities. Guests can relax at the elegantly designed lap pool is 30m long. The other pool is 20m long and heated. Oceana On Broadbeach is a 3 minute walk to the Gold Coast Convention and Exhibition Centre.

name: Sofitel Gold Coast Broadbeach
address: 81 Surf Parade, Broadbeach, QLD 4218
description: A breathtaking 5 star hotel on the Gold Coast, Sofitel Broadbeach has an amazing location just 300m away from the beach. Our Broadbeach accommodation offers the ideal base for both business & leisure travellers. This spectacular luxury Gold Coast hotel is within easy reach of Broadbeach's many restaurants, bars and shops, as well as The Star Casino and Gold Coast Convention & Exhibition Centre. Sofitel Gold Coast Broadbeach is minutes from Surfers Paradise and a short drive away from Gold Coast airport.accorhotels.com

name: Nirvana By The Sea
address: 1 Douglas Street, Coolangatta, QLD 4225
description: Nirvana By The Sea is situated on the white sandy beaches of Kirra Beach, and offers luxurious self-catering apartments with fully equipped kitchens and Pacific Ocean views. The elegant rooms of Nirvana By The Sea are well-equipped with air conditioning and plasma TVs. All the rooms have a balcony where guests can enjoy panoramic views of Queensland’s most famous beach. Guests can relax by the heated outdoor swimming pool, or unwind at the gym with spa and sauna facilities. There is also a private cinema and a sculpted Zen garden with a covered barbecue area. The retail area overlooking the beachfront consists of shops, restaurants and coffee shops. It is only a 5-minute drive to Gold Coast Airport.

name: Mantra Towers of Chevron
address: 23 Ferny Avenue, Surfers Paradise, QLD 4217
description: Situated in the heart of Surfers Paradise, Mantra Towers of Chevron offers comfortable and relaxing Gold Coast resort-style accommodation. Mantra Towers of Chevron features 1, 2 and 3 Bedroom Self-Contained Apartments as well as 3 Bedroom Sub Penthouses. Whether you have a small or large group, we have accommodation options to suit you. All apartments have large kitchens, fully equipped laundry rooms and spacious living areas. It has everything you need for a comfortable stay.accorhotels.com

name: Couran Cove Island Resort
address: Gold Coast, South Stradbroke Island, QLD 4216
description: Located on idyllic South Stradbroke Island and on the water’s edge, surrounded by beaches and natural forest, Couran Cove Resort features a large lap pool, children's pool, children's playground, fitness centre and on-site café and restaurant. All accommodation offers a balcony with views, a fully equipped kitchen and a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathrooms include a hairdryer, iron, ironing board and free toiletries. Guests can enjoy a variety of recreational facilities including beach volleyball, basketball, tennis and mini golf as well as an activities program, inflatable water toys, kayaks, stand-up paddle-boards, trampolines and water slides in the lagoon. The extended boardwalk is where you can explore the tropical gardens and treehouse between the surf beach and the marina, and you can also pick up your supply of groceries at the general store. Portside café and Marlin Bar overlooking the marina are popular spaces for relaxation and refreshment. The Poolside Café is open daily for lunch and dinner and offers a range of cosmopolitan meals. Ferries operate regularly to Couran Cove Resort to the Gold Coast, 35 minutes' away.

name: The Rocks Resort - Official
address: 828 Pacific Parade, Currumbin, QLD 4223
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a hydromassage showerhead, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a dishwasher. Other amenities include towels, table tennis, a portable fan, and a dining area.Expedia

name: Sand Castles on Currumbin Beach
address: 31 Teemungum Street, Currumbin, QLD 4223
description: Offering direct beach access and a large swimming pool with a hot tub, Sandcastles On Currumbin Beach is surrounded by tropical gardens. All apartments feature a private balcony. Located on the beach and next to a large park, Sandcastles is a 2-minute walk from Currumbin Bird Sanctuary. It is a 5-minute drive from Coolangatta Airport. Each of the 2 or 3 bedroom apartments feature 2 bathrooms, laundry facilities and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher. The lush garden includes an outdoor sundeck offering BBQ facilities and ocean views. Theme park tickets are available from the tour desk. Free secure parking is provided.

name: Argosy on the Beach
address: 119 Arlington Esplanade, Clifton Beach, QLD
description: Boasting an outdoor pool, a private beach and a sauna, Argosy on the Beach is located in Cairns and provides comfortable accommodation. It also offers a ticket service, luggage storage and a tour desk. Argosy On The Beach Apartments Cairns provides a garden to unwind in, as well as free public parking on site. There is also a BBQ area available for guests to enjoy. The rooms are air conditioned and include a kitchen, a private balcony and a flat-screen TV. Guests can relax in the welcoming seating area. Cairns Airport is less than a 25-minute drive from Argosy on the Beach. Kuranda Scenic Railway is just an easy drive from the resort.Revato

name: Melaleuca Resort
address: 85-93 Williams Esplanade, Palm Cove, QLD 4879
description: Located in Palm Cove’s beachfront, this 4-star accommodation offers self-contained apartments, a lagoon-style pool, complimentary Wi-Fi and parking. William Esplanade Bus Stop is less than 5 minutes’ walk. Spacious and set in a minimalist décor, each apartment is equipped with air conditioning, a well-equipped kitchen and a large balcony with views of the tropical garden and swimming pool. Guests can also relax using any of the 3 in-pool spas at Melaleuca Resort. Other leisure amenities include barbecue facilities and a guest library. Cairns International Airport is a 25-minute drive away from the resort. Paradise Palms Country Club is 6 km away.

name: Coral Sands Beachfront Resort
address: Cnr Trinity Beach Road & Vasey Esplanade, Trinity Beach, QLD 4879
description: Featuring a private beach and a swimming pool, Coral Sands Beachfront Resort is situated in Cairns and provides modern accommodation. Guests also have access to free Wi-Fi and on-site parking. There are a variety of facilities available to those staying at Coral Sands, such as a tour desk, luggage storage and an airport shuttle. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. The rooms at Coral Sands Beachfront Resort Cairns are air-conditioned and include a refrigerator, an in-room dining area and a private terrace. For guests who like to cook their own meals, there is a kitchen that is conveniently equipped with a microwave, a dishwasher and an oven. Coral Sands Resort is within a 20-minute car trip of Cairns Airport and Kuranda Scenic Railway.Revato

name: Drift Palm Cove
address: Cnr Veivers Rd Williams Esp, Palm Cove, QLD 4879
description: Situated in the beautiful beach side village of Palm Cove, these luxuriously appointed apartments offer comfortable accommodation with many overlooking the Coral Sea. The resort offers a stunning lagoon-style pool, manicured tropical gardens, a poolside BBQ area and a fitness centre. Free WiFi access is available in each apartment. Drift Palm Cove is a 2-minute walk from a range of shopping and dining options in Palm Cove. The location allows you to quickly access Daintree Rainforest using the Skyrail. Cairns is just 40 minutes away by bus, which stops right outside the hotel. Each of the apartments is elegantly designed and features climate controlled air-conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen and laundry facilities. Your modern, private bathroom boasts a relaxing walk in shower. All apartments above ground floor are accessible via elevator.

name: Peppers Beach Club & Spa Palm Cove
address: 123 Williams Esplanade, Palm Cove, QLD 4879
description: Your relaxing getaway, the Peppers Beach Club and Spa Palm Cove is an iconic resort comprised of lush green gardens, a rainforest rock pool and signature lagoon pool with sandy beaches. Perfect for a romantic weekend or a relaxing family holiday, wake up to majestic ocean views, a tranquil pool surrounded by lush gardens, or rainforest-clad mountains in stylish Spa Rooms, Suites, Penthouses. Dine on the catch-of-the-day near the Coral Sea, or book a tour to explore world-class attractions.accorhotels.com

name: Alamanda Palm Cove By Lancemore
address: 1 Veivers Road, Palm Cove, QLD 0
description: Overlooking the Coral Sea, Alamanda Palm Cove features 3 swimming pools, a day spa and a hot tub. A private balcony with ocean or pool views is standard in all apartments. Free parking is available on site. Alamanda Palm Cove is 30 minutes’ drive from Cairns International Airport and Kuranda Scenic Railway. The Daintree Rainforest is a 1-hour drive away. All air-conditioned apartments have laundry facilities and a kitchen with a dishwasher and microwave. Each apartment has a living room with Smart TV's with streaming functionality. The tour desk can book trips to the Daintree Rainforest and the Great Barrier Reef. The resort also offers barbecue facilities.

name: Wollongong Surf Leisure Resort
address: 201 Pioneer Road, Wollongong, NSW 2519
description: Set on 30 acres of lawns and landscaped gardens, Wollongong Surf Leisure Resort features an indoor heated swimming pool, 1 tennis court and 2 half basket-ball courts. Each apartment includes a fully equipped kitchen. All apartments at Surf Leisure Resort Wollongong include a lounge area with TV and sofa. Some rooms have a private terrace or balcony, while most rooms feature air conditioning. Barbecues with outdoor seating are located around the resort. Guests have access to mini golf. There is also a children’s playground and bicycles are available for hire. Situated behind a long stretch of beach between Fairy Meadow and Towradgi Beaches, Wollongong Surf Leisure Resort is a 30-minute drive from Jamberoo Recreation Park. It is less than 10 minutes’ drive to the shops and restaurants in Wollongong city centre.

name: Comfort Resort Blue Pacific
address: 26 Bourke Street, Mackay, QLD 4740
description: Offering a beachfront location and two swimming pools, Comfort Resort Blue Pacific is a 15-minute drive from Mackay city centre, Mackay Harbour and Blue Water Trail. It is set on a long stretch of beach in Mackay with approximately 6 km of golden sand. Guests enjoy free WiFi, beachfront BBQ facilities and a half tennis court. Mackay Airport is a 30-minute drive away. All accommodation at Comfort Resort Blue Pacific Mackay offers air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, DVD's as well as a microwave, fridge and stove. Most units have a fully equipped kitchen and laundry facilities. Guests can enjoy a game of table tennis or billiards in the games room and arrange activities at the tour desk. There are a range of dining options and a convenience store within walking distance.

name: Le Méridien Phuket Beach Resort
address: 29 Soi Karon Nui, Tambon Karon, Amphur Muang, Phuket City 83100
description: A luxurious beach getaway like no other awaits you on a secluded cove against a canvas of sand and sea in Thailand. Le Méridien Phuket Beach Resort offers bold new discoveries with top-rated hotel and resort facilities for land and water adventures, a rejuvenating spa, inspired cuisine and forward-thinking services exceeding your wildest desires. The resort's 416 rooms and 54 luxury suites blend the creative and the elemental with authentic Thai accents against a soothing tropical setting. Style coupled with superb amenities allows for a stay of limitless exploration and renewal on the beach. All rooms and suites at our beach resort in Phuket offer unique views, and 67% offer either pool or ocean views.Marriott

name: The Westin Siray Bay Resort & Spa, Phuket
address: 21/4 Moo 1 T.Rasada A.Muang, Phuket City 83000
description: Five-star luxury awaits in Phuket, Thailand at the Westin Siray Bay Resort & Spa, Phuket. Overlooking Siray Bay near Phuket Town, our luxurious Phuket beach resort provides an ideal locale for quiet getaways, romantic holidays and corporate retreats. Find us moments from pristine white-sand beaches and local watersports. Take advantage of our WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio, three outdoor pools, the Westin® Kids Club and Heavenly Spa by Westin™. Sample tantalizing cuisine and refreshing beverages at our six Phuket resort restaurants and bars, many of which boast water views. If you are planning an event in Phuket, choose one of our elegant indoor or outdoor venues. Enjoy room amenities like Heavenly® Beds, rainforest showers, spacious desks, free Wi-Fi and LCD televisions. Admire panoramic sea views or relax on a furnished balcony. Select suites and resort villas include plunge pools and generous entertaining spaces. Find your sanctuary on the beach at the Westin Siray Bay Resort & Spa, PhuketMarriott

name: Amari Phuket
address: 2 Meun-Ngern Road, Patong 83150
description: A stone’s throw from Patong Beach, the luxurious Amari Phuket enjoys spectacular views of the Andaman Sea from its private beach. It boasts 2 outdoor pools, a first-class spa and 2 dining options. Free Wi-Fi is available in the public areas. Located in southern Phuket, 1.5 km from Bangla Road and Jungceylon Mall, Amari Phuket provides free shuttle services to Kata Beach. It is a 55-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Bright and airy, rooms come with private balconies and beautiful views. Amenities include a satellite TV, DVD player and tea/coffee making facilities. Breeze Spa features a wide range of beauty treatments. Relaxing massages and therapies can be enjoyed from sea-facing pavilions. The hotel also provides an outdoor spa pool and a fitness centre. La Gritta serves Italian dishes featuring gourmet pizzas, fresh pasta, delectable desserts along with an extensive wine list. Seaside international dining is available at Rim Talay and the spectacular Jetty Restaurant. Drinks and quick bites are served at both the Rim Talay Pool and Samutr Bars.

name: Cape Sienna Gourmet Hotel & Villas (SHA Plus+)
address: 18/40 Moo 6, Nakalay Road, Kamala 83150
description: Located on Kamala Beach, Cape Sienna Phuket Gourmet Hotel & Villas - SHA Extra Plus features stunning sea views. It has 4 dining options, fitness center and an outdoor pool. Wi-Fi and parking are free. Spacious guest rooms feature modern interiors. They are equipped with air conditioning, a private shower room and flat-screen TV. Some rooms are fitted with a spa bathtub. Guests of Cape Sienna Gourmet can dine at the Poolside Bar & Restaurant, which serves both Asian and international dishes. Plum Prime Steak House at the center of your experience is the charcoal oven. Sienna Rocks Cafe serves Italian Coffee specialties, creative sandwiches & salads. Probably the Best ‘Egg Benedict’ and ‘Oeuf a la cocotte with Gruyere’ can be found. Drinks can be sipped while playing a game of snooker at Vanilla Sky Bar & Lounge, which offers views of Kamala Bay. Facilities provided include manicure, pedicure, spa treatment rooms and 2 swimming pools. Travel arrangements can be made at the hotel’s tour desk. Airport shuttle and car rental services are also available. Cape Sienna Phuket Gourmet Hotel & Villas - SHA Extra Plus is a 1-hour flight from Bangkok City, followed by a 40-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. The hotel provides free shuttle services to Kamala Beach.

name: Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa (SHA Plus+)
address: 555, Moo 3, Mai Khao 83110
description: Indulge yourself at Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa on Phuket Island, Thailand. Our Phuket beachfront resort offers a variety of on-site restaurants and bars. Sample exquisite Thai cuisine, global comfort food and specialty coffee drinks or sip handcrafted cocktails at our beachfront bar and eatery. Cap off a day at the beach with a rejuvenating massage or wellness treatment at the famous Quan Spa. Maintain your workout at our luxury resort in Phuket's fitness center or swim in our refreshing resort outdoor pool. If you're planning a business, wedding or social gathering in Phuket, host your event in one of our contemporary venues with help from our dedicated planning and catering teams. Retire to a luxury hotel room or beachfront villa that features stylish decor, plush bedding and sleek bathrooms with robes, slippers and deluxe toiletries. Unwind under the warm Phuket sun in tropical resort villas with private plunge pools. Your next great adventure awaits at Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa.Marriott

name: Hyatt Regency Phuket Resort
address: 16/12 Moo 6, Kamala 83150
description: Nestled along the picturesque Kamala Bay, Hyatt Regency Phuket Resort cascades down a lush tropical hillside, offering a serene and idyllic setting for a seafront getaway. With breathtaking views overlooking the Andaman Sea, our resort provides a tranquil ambiance that invites relaxation and rejuvenation. Featuring 201 spacious and contemporary rooms and suites, each offering private balconies with spectacular sea and sunset views, our resort ensures a memorable stay. Indulge in culinary delights at our three restaurants and bar: Pool House Kitchen, an all-day dining venue with international and Asian cuisine; Mizu, offering a premium Teppanyaki experience; 180 Degrees, a poolside bar with private cabanas and sun loungers; and Casa Boho, a clifftop three-story restaurant and bar with its own entertainment lounge and infinity pool. At Casa Boho, immerse yourself in the bohemian ambiance, witness breathtaking sunsets at Kamala, and indulge in bold Latin American flavors and expertly crafted cocktails. Experience three unique dining options, including a rooftop bar with stunning views of Kamala Bay, poolside dining, and a gaming Den, all set amidst our distinctive boho-style design. Our resort offers a range of recreational facilities, including the Nahm Spa, Camp Hyatt poolside kids club, a dive center with sustainability initiatives, snorkeling and diving at the house reef, a hilltop Regency Club, a 24-hour fitness center with wellness activities, and the largest seafront infinity pool in Phuket. For meetings and events, we provide modern facilities such as White Canvas, the only fully air-conditioned, seafront glass marquee event space in Phuket, offering beautiful sea views.

name: The Boathouse Phuket
address: 182 Koktanode Road, Kata Beach, Karon 83100
description: The Boathouse Phuket is located at Kata on Phuket's west coast. Boasting an outdoor pool, a restaurant, bar and a 24-hour front desk, It provides free WiFi and parking. The Boathouse Phuket come with both guestrooms and suites. Some units feature views of the Andaman Sea. All air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a minibar, an expresso coffee machine as well as tea making facilities. There are also a working desk, a flat screen TV and and en suite bathroom. Guests at this hotel can relax at a swimming pool or engage in water recreations like surfing. The hotel offers beachfront Thai cooking classes and a tour desk. Arrangements can also be made for an airport shuttle, babysitting and dry cleaning. The seafront restaurant, Boathouse, is an award winning restaurant, serving local and international cuisines with matching wine choices from The Boathouse's wine cellar. Boathouse is a 60-minute drive from Phuket Airport and a 20-minute drive from the stunning sunsets at Promthep Cape.

name: Sala Phuket Mai Khao Beach Resort (Sha Plus+)
address: 333 Moo 3, Mai Khao 83110
description: Situated along quiet Mai Khao Beach, SALA Phuket Resort features lush garden, 2 beachfront pools and villas with private pools and sundecks. A spa with sauna and steam bath facilities is offered. SALA Phuket Resort & Spa is a 20-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. The scenic Phang Nga Bay is a 25-minute ride away. SALA’s rooms and villas offer flat-screen cable TVs and DVD players. Its villas offer outdoor bathrooms with free-standing tubs overlooking the pool. Free Wi-Fi is provided. SALA Spa features 3 beachfront massage terraces which provide respite for tired bodies. A gym is available for fitness-conscious guests. SALA Phuket offers rooftop dining featuring panoramic beach views. Seafood, international and Thai cuisine is served. Guests can sip cocktails and wines at the beachbar and lobby bar while soaking in the calming atmosphere.

name: The Surin Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: 118 Moo 3 Pansea Beach, Choeng Thale 83110
description: The Surin Phuket offers a tropical getaway on Pansea Beach’s white sands. This beachfront property offers cottage-style accommodation surrounded by coconut trees. It features an outdoor pool and a spa. Guests enjoy free welcome drink and complimentary use of non-motorized sport facilities. Our hotel’s design is classy and elegant. Built into the tropical bay and verdant environment, while no elevators are installed, guests can appreciate the nature through a series of stairs and walkways that connect the resort Patong’s vibrant nightlife is a 30-minute drive from the hotel. Phuket Town is a 40-minute drive away. Rooms come with spacious outdoor lounge areas with garden and beach views. Amenities include a satellite TV. Guests can try various water sports. The sundeck on the beach offers a beautiful view of the Andaman Sea, especially at sunset. The hotel’s dining outlets offer Thai, Western and Asian menus. Barbecue and seafood specialities are also available.

name: Amatara Welleisure Resort - Sha Extra Plus
address: 84 Moo 8 Sakdidej Road, Wichit 83000
description: Amatara Welleisure Resort presents a timelessly fresh, effortlessly Thai and bespoke resort experience, and features one of South-east Asias best ocean-view spa and wellness facilities. With a personality all of its own and benefitting from one of the regions most incredible locations, Amatara Wellness Resort offers an unrivalled way to explore and enjoy Southern Thailand, an endlessly popular and world renowned leisure and tourism destination.iHotelier/iStay

name: Bandara Villas, Phuket (Sha Plus+)
address: 96 Moo 8, Wichit 83000
description: Located on Panwa Beach and 2.5 km from Panwa Cape, Bandara Villas, Phuket offers private villas with sea views. Most of the villas here boast a private pool, while some come with a shared infinity pool. This property features a restaurant and a fitness centre. During the stay, guests have access to free WiFi. Within a short drive, guests can find Phuket Aquarium (2.1 km), Khaokhad View Tower (2.5 km) and Chalong Bay (5.17 km). For outdoor enthusiasts, head to Phuket Shooting Range (6.50 km). Phuket International Airport is located 34 km from the property. Offering sea and pool view through the glass wall, each villa is complete with a flat-screen TV, a DVD player and a sofa set. A terrace with outdoor furniture is available. Featuring a shower, en suites bathroom are equipped with a bathtub, a hairdryer and free toiletries. At Bandara Villas, guests can make use of the shuttle service from or to the airport at additional costs. For the guests' additional convenience, the property provides room service. The on-site restaurant serves local and international cuisine, whilst the bar can cater for fine selection of specials cocktails and drinks.

name: The Naka Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: The Naka Phuket -SHA Plus Certified is a 10-minute ride from the white sands of Patong Beach and various entertainment options. Offering unique-designed villas with private balconies, the property also boasts an outdoor pool and a restaurant. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the residence. Phuket Town is approximately a 20-minute drive from The Naka Phuket -SHA Plus Certified. A 40-minute drive takes guests to Phuket International Airport. Stylish villas are tastefully decorated and offer modern facilities such as a flat-screen cable TV, a refrigerator and a safety box. En suite bathrooms come with a bathtub and shower facilities. Guests of The Naka Phuket -SHA Plus Certified can laze by the pool or enjoy pampering massage treatments at the spa. For convenience, the residence offers a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk and meeting facilities. For meals, sample a variety of both Thai and international cuisines served at The Wiwa, an all-day dining restaurant located just 5 steps away from the beach. With particular views of the sea and the sunset, The Nana offers refreshing beverages until late night. The Meka provides guests with a wide range of healthy dishes and drinks.

name: Phuket Marriott Resort & Spa, Merlin Beach (Sha Plus+)
address: 99 Muen-Ngoen Road, Tri-Trang Beach, Patong 83150
description: Plan a luxury escape to Phuket Marriott Resort & Spa, Merlin Beach. Whether you’re visiting Thailand for a family holiday, couple’s getaway or business trip, our five-star resort in Phuket’s location on the sands of Tri-Trang Beach provides a spectacular backdrop. Stay minutes from the entertainment hub of Patong Beach and Phuket Old Town. Take advantage of family-friendly resort amenities, including a 24 hour fitness center, three pools, children's activities and a day spa. Relax at our swim-up bar and sample delicious cuisine at one of the ten restaurants and bars at our Phuket, Thailand, resort. If you're hosting a meeting, choose from over 8,000 square feet of event space, including poolside and beachside settings and one of the largest ballrooms in Phuket. Unwind in rooms and suites featuring plush bedding, flat-screen TVs, mini-refrigerators, work desks, free Wi-Fi and private balconies with pool, garden, beach or sea views. A sophisticated stay awaits at Phuket Marriott Resort & Spa, Merlin BeachMarriott

name: Marriott's Phuket Beach Club (SHA Plus+)
address: 230, 232 Moo 3, Maikhao, Talang, Mai Khao 83110
description: Marriott's Phuket Beach Club welcomes you to Thailand with contemporary comfort and style. Our family-friendly vacation ownership resort is ideal for relaxation, with a great location on Phuket Island and full access to all the luxurious facilities at the adjacent JW Marriott Phuket Resort and Spa. Explore the area from our beachside resort, where we place you minutes from notable attractions and the pristine sands of Mai Khao Beach. Relax with your family by one of the resort pools or break a sweat in the on-site fitness center before spoiling yourself with a spa treatment or drink at the beachfront bar. Satisfy your appetite at our resort's array of restaurants, including a modern steakhouse, Japanese fare and an Italian eatery with pizza delivery. Our spacious two-bedroom apartments feature complimentary Wi-Fi, full kitchens, master suites with soaking tubs, washers, dryers and furnished balconies so you can spread out during your time in Thailand. Your dream getaway awaits at Marriott's Phuket Beach Club.Marriott

name: Zenmaya Oceanfront Phuket, Trademark Collection by Wyndham
address: 6/181 Moo 6, Kamala 83150
description: Thank you for choosing our Wyndham hotel. Wyndham Hotels and Resorts® is an upscale, full-service brand with properties located in key business and vacation destinations across the world.  It offers the comfort and amenities you would expect in a world-class hotel, including beautifully appointed public areas, thoughtfully detailed guestrooms and distinct dining options. Business locations feature meeting space flexible for large and small meetings, as well as business centers and fitness centers. Many resorts offer golf, tennis, beautiful beaches, spas and more.Wyndham

name: Novotel Phuket Kamala Beach (Sha Plus+)
address: 118/16 Moo 3, Kamala 83150
description: Located on Kamala Beach, Novotel Phuket Kamala Beachis a 3-minute drive from Phuket FantaSea.
