Offering modern air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony, the hotel is equipped with a spa, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Situated in the quiet end of the beach, the hotel is only a 3-minute drive from Kamala Village and a 15-minute drive from Patong Beach. Phuket International Airport is a 30-minute drive away. Rooms at Novotel Phuket Kamala Beachare fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. An electric kettle and a hairdryer are provided. An en suite bathroom comes with free toiletries and shower facilities. Children can enjoy different activities at Kid’s Club. The hotel features a business centre, a 24-hour front desk and concierge service. It also provides luggage storage facilities and currency exchange service. International dishes (Western, Thai and Indian) are served at Soul Kitchen. Drinks can be order at The Bar or at the swim up bar called Lilo. For light snacks and cocktails, guests can head to On the Roof Bar. Room service can be arranged upon request.

name: Sri Panwa Phuket Luxury Pool Villa Hotel (Sha Plus+)
address: 88 Moo 8, Sakdidej Road, Wichit 83000
description: Sri panwa enjoys an idyllic setting within 40 acres of lush tropical rain forest, perched high atop Cape Panwa. With each private pool villa carefully designed to showcase the true beauty of its coastal environment, this secluded resort has been hailed as one of Thailands greatest venues, situated 40 - 60 meters above the sea level, commanding breathtaking views of the surrounding Phuket islands and Andaman Sea.All the luxurious pool villas offer panoramic ocean views, while some boast full and uninterrupted 300-degree ocean views, a total of 52-pool villas range from one to five bedrooms. The interiors embrace the essence of Tropical Contemporary design by integrating its natural jungle and ocean surroundings with the modern comforts of luxury living.Services and facilities include a panoramic sea-view Beach Pool set just over Sri panwas beach, gym & fitness facilities, play room, business center & library, steam rooms, tennis courts, Cool Spa, Baba Dining Lounge and Baba Poolclub.iHotelier/iStay

name: Phuket Marriott Resort and Spa, Nai Yang Beach (SHA Plus+)
address: 92, 92/1 Moo 3, Tambol Sakoo, Amphur, Talang, Phuket City 83110
description: Expect the ultimate comfort at Phuket Marriott Resort and Spa, Nai Yang Beach. Ideal for families, couples and business travelers, our Nai Yang beach resort inspires relaxation with beachfront rooms and private villas, each featuring plush bedding, marble bathrooms, mini-refrigerators, flat-panel TVs and complimentary Wi-Fi. Elevate your stay in a scenic beach villa with a private garden and a 400-meter pool. Relax on our resort's private beach or try out the exciting water activities at Yacht Haven and Royal Phuket Marinas. Reserve one of our dynamic meeting venues, enhanced by cutting-edge AV services, custom catering and skilled event planners. End your day in Phuket, Thailand, with a swim in our lagoon pool, a rejuvenating treatment at our resort spa or delectable fare and creative cocktails at our restaurants and bar. Set on the sands of Nai Yang Beach, minutes from Phuket International Airport, our scenic resort offers guests a serene haven in one of the world's most beautiful destinations.Marriott

name: Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: 683 Patak Road, Karon Beach, Karon 83100
description: Offering a private beach and an outdoor pool, this 5-star hotel is located in Karon. Its premium amenities include a sauna and a fitness centre. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site spa and wellness centre, SPA Cenvaree. There is also free private parking on site for guests travelling with a car. The rooms are air conditioned and feature a mini bar, a telephone and an in-room safe. There are also several rooms especially for families. Guests are able to enjoy a drink at Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket SHA Plus+'s bar and try international and Asian cuisine in the restaurant. Dining options at the hotel include Lobby Lounge and COAST Beach Club & Bistro. Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket SHA Plus+ is just a stone's throw from Karon Beach and a short car ride from Patong Beach and Kata Beach. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Karon.Revato

name: Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas (Sha Plus+)
address: 888 Moo 3, Mai Khao 83110
description: Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas is set on Phuket, and offers 5-star facilities, including an infinity pool and a private beach. Popular facilities, such as outdoor tennis courts and free Wi-Fi, ensure a satisfying stay in Mai Khao. The property offers a garden to unwind in, as well as free private parking on site. Facilities include facial and body treatments, plus a beauty centre and a kids club. Villas at Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas feature a rain shower, a complimentary fruit bowl and a coffee maker. All are air conditioned and offer a private terrace, a marble bathroom and an iPod docking station. They also have a private garden, luxury linen and a pillow menu. Surrounded by the natural beauty of Sirinat National Park, the property provides a selection of outdoor activities, such as fishing, canoeing and snorkeling. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Mai Khao.Revato

name: Anantara Layan Phuket Resort (Sha Plus+)
address: 168 Moo 6, Layan Beach Soi 4, Choeng Thale 83110
description: This modern hotel in Thalang provides free wireless internet, as well as a butler service and a saltwater swimming pool. A swimming pool and a limousine service are just some of the deluxe amenities on offer to guests during their stay. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the pool bar. There is an in-house day spa to relax at, which features a beauty centre and a sauna, as well as a range of body treatments. The hotel also has its very own gym, Lakeside Pool. The rooms are air conditioned and include slippers, a mini bar and an in-room dining area. All offer an in-room safe, a ceiling fan and a seating area. Guests of Anantara Layan Phuket Resort SHA Plus+ are invited to sample Thai and local cuisine at Dee Plee, or try Japanese dishes at Zuma Pop-up Restaurant. Room service is also available any time of the day. Anantara Layan Phuket Resort SHA Plus+ offers free private parking on site for guests with a car. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Thalang.Revato

name: Pullman Phuket Arcadia Naithon Beach (Sha Plus+)
address: 22/2 Moo 4, Sakhu 83110
description: "Located just 12 minutes from Phuket International Airport, this Phuket resort commands panoramic views of the Andaman Sea, a peaceful paradise offering ultimate privacy. Pullman Phuket Arcadia Naithon Beach Hotel is situated on Naithon Beach and surrounded by Sirinat National Park, a beautiful harmony of nature and 5-star luxuries. Lounge by one of our two pools, or pamper yourself at the hotel's award-winning Spa. Dine at our restaurants, bars and deli offering a fusion of Thai and Western cuisine. "accorhotels.com

name: Kamala Beach Estate
address: 33/6 Moo 6 Kamala Beach, Kamala 83120
description: Only a 5-minute walk from Kamala Beach, Kamala Beach Estate Resort - SHA Extra Plus offers spacious suites with private balconies which overlook the Andaman Sea or garden. It has three pools and a private beach for you to choose from. Free WiFi is available in rooms and the lobby. Suites at Kamala Beach Estate Resort - SHA Extra Plus feature a living room, kitchen and dining room. Each suite is equipped with air conditioning, a private bathroom and satellite TV. A seating area and sundecks are provided. Although Kamala Beach Estate Resort does not have a restaurant we provide grocery shopping services. The team can also order quickly from many of the restaurants nearby, for breakfast, lunch or dinner to suit any budget. Guests can rent a kayak or take a dip in Kamala Beach Estate Resort - SHA Extra Plus's garden pool. The resort offers laundry services and free parking. Staff can arrange trips and activities for guests. Located between Bang Tao Beach and Patong Beach, Kamala Beach Estate Resort - SHA Extra Plus is 35 km from Phuket International Airport.

name: Maikhao Dream Villa Resort and Spa Centara Boutique Collection (SHA Plus+)
address: 138/21 Moo 4, Mai Khao 83110
description: Situated in Mai Khao, Maikhao Dream Villa Resort and Spa Centara Boutique Collection SHA Plus+ provides stylish 4-star accommodation, as well as a private beach, a swimming pool and a sauna. The air-conditioned rooms feature plasma TVs and free Wi-Fi access. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or have a drink at the lounge bar. Guests can also enjoy free public parking on site. It also has a fitness centre with a swimming pool. The hotel provides 22 rooms, each with a private balcony, a spa bath and slippers. Each has a bathroom that offers bathrobes and a hair dryer. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. In the evening, guests can relax in the cosy lounge bar. Phuket International Airport is a 25-minute drive from Maikhao Dream Villa Resort and Spa Centara Boutique Collection SHA Plus+. Those wishing to explore the region can also visit Sa Khu, situated an easy drive from the property.Revato

name: JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa (SHA Plus+)
address: 231 Moo 3, Mai Khao 83110
description: Plan an unforgettable escape to our Phuket, Thailand beach hotel. JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa is a 5-star, family-friendly resort just steps from Mai Khao Beach. From our beachfront resort in Phuket, Thailand, enjoy easy access to the islands of Phang Nga Bay, Old Town Phuket and the Royal Phuket Marina. Resort guests are treated to an award-winning spa, three outdoor pools, a modern fitness center and activities such as Thai cooking classes. Plan your special occasion in our beachfront hotel in Phuket, Thailand's indoor and outdoor venues with advanced technology, custom catering and dedicated event planners. Relax in family-friendly hotel rooms, suites and villas filled with five-star amenities like plush bedding, marble bathrooms, 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi and outdoor space overlooking tropical gardens or the ocean. Select resort rooms have whirlpool tubs, extra living space and private pools. Create lasting memories at JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa in Thailand.Marriott

name: V Villas Phuket - MGallery (Sha Plus+)
address: Moo 8 Ao Yon Road Vichit Muang, Phuket City 83000
description: Located 39 metres above pristine and secluded Ao Yon Bay and immersed into nature, an exclusive pool villas resort with 24 hours butler service, European and Thai Coastal cuisine, world-class rooftop bar with panoramic view as well as Spa & wellness program. V Villas Phuket offers guest unparalleled privacy and indulgence.accorhotels.com

name: The Slate (Sha Plus+)
address: 116 Moo 1 Tambol Sakhu, Talang, Phuket, Sakhu 83110
description: The Slate, Phuket presents industrial chic design set against the beautiful natural backdrop of Nai Yang Beach and Andaman Sea. Offering beachfront rooms, it also has a rainforest spa and 3 outdoor pools, one is open for family while the other 2 pools are for adults only. Uniquely decorated with original art pieces and locally crafted furnishings, the air-conditioned rooms feature rich wood and cool stone accents. A flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and bottled water are included in all rooms. The Slate, Phuket is just 5 minutes' drive from Phuket International Airport. It is a 10-minute drive from Blue Canyon Golf Course and Mission Hills Golf Club. Coqoon Spa offers ultimate relaxation with body massage and facials in The Nest, a private treatment room suspended mid-air like a bird nest. For a refreshing workout, the fitness centre provides yoga, pilates and Muay Thai classes. Guests may experience the charm of Thailand with the hotel's Thai cooking classes, language lessons and Weekend Market day trips. There is also a dive centre and kitesurfing centre next to the hotel. Five dining options leave guests spoilt for choice, serving everything from a breakfast buffet to fresh seafood barbecue dinners. Tongkah Tin Syndicate provides a snooker hall and international whiskeys.

name: Pullman Phuket Panwa Beach Resort (Sha Plus+)
address: 44/5 Moo 8 Sakdidesh Road, Wichit 83000
description: Nestled on the picturesque shores of Markham Bay, the resort offers sweeping views of the Andaman Sea. With the airport just 45 minutes away and 20 minute-drive to Phuket Town, the hotel is ideally located to explore the many attractions on Phuket island.accorhotels.com

name: SAii Laguna Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: Laguna Phuket, 323 Moo 2, Choeng Thale 83110
description: SAii Laguna Phuket is located on Bangtao Beach. It offers rooms with a private balcony and free Wi-Fi. The resort is an outdoor pool and fitness centre. A kid’s club and babysitting service are available. The property is a 20-minute drive to Patong Beach and Phuket International Airport. It is a 25-minute drive to Phuket Town. For Club, Suite and Villa room types, Club Lounge Access with VIP check-in, gourmet breakfast and afternoon snack, happy hour with beer and wine including chef's tasting menu is included. Rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. It also has a coffee maker and a hairdryer. A bathtub is included in an en suite bathroom. Guests can arrange daytrips at the tour desk while staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist guests with luggage storage and shuttle service. The hotel is equipped with a business centre and meeting facilities.

name: The Naka Island, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: 32 Moo 5, Phuket City 83110
description: Escape to a hidden paradise. The Naka Island, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Phuket is tucked off the east coast of Thailand and offers unsurpassed privacy in the Andaman Sea as the only property on Phuket Island. Journey to our oceanfront beach resort in Phuket by a short speedboat ride and immerse in enchanting coconut groves, beaches and limestone cliffs. Unwind with a cocktail at waterfront Z Bar or the unexpected flavors at our three beachside restaurants. Luxuriate at Spa Naka with a revitalizing massage, facial or wellness service, and stay active with daily hotel happenings, eco-friendly experiences such as planting mangrove trees or fitness center with Technogym® equipment. In your hotel room, suite or villa, discover the same level of refinement and attention to detail. Accommodations are distinct and radiant, boasting scenic views of the garden, sea, beach or terrace. Together with our vacation packages, curate an unforgettable stay at The Naka Island, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Phuket.Marriott

name: Mövenpick Resort Bangtao Beach Phuket (Sha Plus+)
address: 35 Moo 4, Choeng Thale 83110
description: Here the best of classic Thai and contemporary designs blends in 40 inviting residences. Our bright and breezy accommodation offers living and dining areas, fully-equipped kitchens and over-sized balconies for the ultimate blissful experience. Located a few steps away from Bangtao Beach, this exclusive luxury resort of penthouses and suites treats you to unparalleled relaxation. Experience soothing treatments at Blossom Spa, relax in the pool, or walk along the endless, white Thai sands of Bangtao Beachaccorhotels.com

name: Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: 6/2 Moo6, Nakalay Bay, Kamala 83150
description: Featuring a private beach, a sauna and a swimming pool, Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Phuket SHA Plus+ is located in Kamala and provides comfortable accommodation. Guests also have exclusive access to the Chann Wellness Spa and Lagoon Swimming Pool. There are a variety of facilities at the resort, including complimentary wireless internet and free private parking on site. It offers family-friendly amenities, with room designs and services for families of any size, as well as a kids club and a kids pool. It also features a sun deck with impressive pool, sea and garden views. Offering 5-star accommodation, the rooms at Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Phuket SHA Plus+ feature a private balcony. They are air conditioned and offer a mini bar, slippers and a refrigerator. To start the day, guests are invited to have breakfast at Thavorn Beach Village Resort & Spa Phuket SHA Plus+'s on-site restaurants, then later experience international, Thai and Chinese meals at Marisa Terrace or international cuisine at Thai Sala Cafe. The resort is a convenient place to discover nearby Patong Beach and Kamala Beach. Patong and Phuket Town are located a short drive away.Revato

name: Cape Panwa Hotel (SHA Plus+)
address: 27, 27/2 Mu 8, Sakdidej Road, Wichit 83000
description: Cape Panwa Hotel where a long, sandy, private beach and the nearby shade of the hillside coconut plantation enhance a truly tropical feel. Relaxing in the generous comfort of your fully-appointed suite or simply strolling hand-in-hand next to gently rippling wavelets, feel the stresses and strains of everyday life just melt away. Cape Panwa Hotel, a former haunt of royalty and current favorite of ‘A’-listers, retains the warmest of welcomes where everyone can feel treated like a very special visitor, thanks to the care and attentions of a staff of whom we are truly proud. A short hop from Phuket town, Cape Panwa Hotel offers all the services and facilities you would expect of a Cape property, with a range of restaurants to suit all tastes and the renowned Cape Spa. It is also an ideal venue for weddings or other celebrations under the caring and expert guidance of our dedicated Function Planner and the team. This is the venue to get back in touch with nature, with each other or just with yourself. Whether for a short family break or a working holiday, Cape Panwa wins hands-down every time.

name: Rosewood Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: 88/28 Muen-Ngern Road, Tri-Trang Beach, Patong 83150
description: Located in Tri Trang Beach in Phuket, Rosewood Phuket features an outdoor pool and water sports facilities. The resort boasts views of the sea, and guests can enjoy contemporary dining experiences at an Italian inspired restaurant. Rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain units include a seating area for your convenience. You will find a coffee machine and a kettle in the room. Every room has a private bathroom equipped with a bath. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Free use of bicycles is available at this resort and the area is popular for cycling. Emerald Bay are 600 metres from Rosewood Phuket, while Jungceylon Shopping Center is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 40 km from Rosewood Phuket.

name: Varana Hotel Krabi
address: 258 Moo 3 Tambol Nongtalay Amphur Muang, Krabi 81180
description: No description found

name: Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi
address: 396-396/1 Moo 2, Ao Nang, Muang, Krabi 81000
description: Set in Ao Nang, this traditional hotel provides a swimming pool, a sauna and a private beach. It offers 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. There are a range of facilities available to guests of Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi, including fitness classes, a kids club and free Wi-Fi. The hotel's amenities, such as photocopier, airport shuttle and business centre, babysitting services and children's play area, and massage make this an ideal choice for business travellers, families and couples alike. The comfortable rooms at Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi include a private balcony, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. There are also a number of rooms especially designed for families. A cooked breakfast is available at Lotus Court and Suan Bua every morning before guests venture off to sightsee in the local area. For guests on the go, Hagi offers breakfast, or for those travelling at a more leisurely pace, COAST Beach Club & Bistro serves a sit-down lunch. A wide variety of dining options are also found in close proximity to the property. Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi is surrounded by the area's popular sightseeing attractions, including Ao Phra Nang, which is a short walk away. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Krabi.Revato

name: Zeavola Resort
address: 11 Moo 8 Laem Tong, Krabi 83000
description: Zeavola is the definition of barefoot luxury and one of the most sustainable hotels in Thailand: This charming retreat is a jungle resort and themed to be a Thai Village from over 30 years ago, without missing all the amenities and services of a typical 5 Star Hotel. Grass-roofed teakwood villas blend with traditional Thai influences and a charming feel rustic. You won't find golden faucets and white marble here. Together with the tropical jungle, its sand paths, and the authentic Zeavolians is what will spark the magic. Zeavola is located on Phi Phi Don’s northeast coast and is only reachable by boat. Away from the hustle and bustle of Tonsai, the main village, and pier of Phi Phi Islands. There are no streets, cars, or motorbikes. Zeavola’s, Zann Zanook Activity, and 5 Star Padi Dive center offer professional diving. They also guided island-hopping and snorkeling tours. The Activity Center provides complimentary sports equipment so guests can play volleyball or frisbee on the beach or enjoy free kayaks. Before booking, ensure that your flights are in line with our boat transfers. The resort recommends that international travelers plan a day before and after departure on the mainland. This will help to ease your travel stress and any weather-related timeline changes. Insider Tip: Stay a minimum of two nights to get the feel and the understanding of what the Zeavola is trying to create What to bring: Mosquito spray, sun blocker, your positive energy For more information, please visit our official website or contact us directly. Emails and messages on online platforms will be replied to within 24 hours. In urgent matters call +66 75 627 000

name: Vacation Village Phra Nang Inn
address: 119 Mu 2 Ao Nang Beach, Krabi 81000
description: Experience a tropical paradise at Phra Nang Inn, located on Ao Nang Beach. Surrounded by tropical gardens, it has an outdoor pool, spa and open-air bar offering views of the Andaman Sea. Featuring hardwood flooring and furnishings, the air-conditioned rooms at the Phra Nang Inn are decorated with seashells. A satellite TV, safe and minibar are included. Traditional Thai herbal massage and other body treatments are offered at the Wareerak Hot Spring Spa. A tour desk and transport services are available for guests. A wide selection of Thai and European dishes are featured at Phra Nang Kitchen, steps away from the beach. Fresh seafood and steaks are offered as well. Guests enjoy cocktails served at Beach Bar. Phra Nang Inn is a 30-minute drive from Krabi Airport. It is just a short stroll from the shopping and dining strip of Ao Nang Beach.

name: Tup Kaek Sunset Beach Resort
address: 109 Moo 3, Nong Talay, Krabi
description: Tup Kaek Sunset Beach Resort-SHA Plus is located along Tab Kaek Beach in Krabi, about 14 km from Phra Nang Cave. The resort offers an outdoor pool and restaurant. The tropical cottage-style rooms at Sunset Resort Tup Kaek come with a TV and minibar. En suite bathrooms and amenities are provided. The hotel features 3 spacious suites with an outdoor Thai steam room and rain shower facilities. Guests can swim at the outdoor pool with spa pool or enjoy water sports by the beach. Sunset Restaurant serves fresh seafood, Western and local Thai dishes. The beachfront Red Leaf Bar serves snacks and drinks. Tup Kaek Sunset Beach Resort-SHA Plus is approximately 26 km from Krabi Airport.

name: Rayavadee
address: 214 Moo 2, Tumbon Ao-Nang, Amphur Muang, Krabi 81000
description: Luxurious beachfront accommodation along Krabi's Andaman Coast is provided at the 5-star Rayavadee- SHA Extra Plus, just next to Krabi Marine National Park. It has a full-service spa, 4 dining options and an outdoor pool. Surrounded on all sides by tropical gardens and beaches, Rayavadee- SHA Extra Plus features free-standing 2-storey pavilions and beachfront pool villas. Each room has a terrace, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Via speedboat, Rayavadee- SHA Extra Plus is a 25-minute journey from Bamboo Island and a 35-minute journey from Phi Phi Island. It is less than 2 hours’ driving from Phuket International Airport. Guests can enjoy the resort’s natural setting, which is home to wildlife like monkeys and exotic birds. Massages, facial and body treatments are available at The Rayavadee- SHA Extra Plus Spa. Designer items and souvenirs are available at Rayavadee- SHA Extra Plus Boutique. Fresh lobster and Western dishes are served at the Raya Dining Restaurant, while Krua Phranang offers traditional Thai fare. Raitalay Terrace features international dishes and views of Railay Beach.

name: Le Passe-Temps
address: 73 Moo 3, Ao Tha Lane, Ban Thalane, Ban Tha Lane 81000
description: Situated in Tha Lane Bay, a few steps from Thalane Beach, Le Passe-Temps features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can make use of a bar. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Rooms have a safety deposit box, while certain rooms are fitted with a terrace and others also boast sea views. At Le Passe-Temps all rooms come with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or Asian breakfast. At Le Passe-Temps you will find a restaurant serving Asian cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and gluten-free options can also be requested. Tha Pom Klong Song Nam is 18 km from the hotel, while Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 28 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 35 km from Le Passe-Temps, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Railay Great View Resort
address: 588 Moo 2, Tambol Ao Nang, Ao Nang 81000
description: Railay Great View Resort and Spa is located on the beaches of East Railay, 26 km from Krabi Airport. It features free Wi-Fi, a restaurant and rooms with flat-screen TVs. All rooms at the Railay Great View features wooden furnishings and are equipped with a safety deposit box and minibar. The en-suite bathrooms come with hot shower facilities. A hairdryer and slippers are also provided. The resort provides massage and sea kayaking activities. Other good relaxation activities include taking a stroll along the private beach. Guests can enjoy outdoor dining at the Lae Lay restaurant, which serves a variety of traditional and contemporary Thai and Western dishes. Railay Great View Resort and Spa is a 10 minute boat ride to Ao Nam Mao Pier.

name: The Elements Krabi Resort
address: 189 Moo 3, Klong Muang Beach, Krabi 81000
description: Located beside Klong Muang Beach, Elements Krabi Resort offers 4-star rooms with air conditioning and private balconies. It boasts an outdoor swimming pool and sauna. Free Wi-Fi is available. The Elements Krabi Resort - SHA Plus has well-appointed rooms with tea and coffee makers, satellite TVs and bathrobes. Room service is available. The Sea-Breeze Restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. It serves a mix of Thai cuisine and international dishes. Meals can be enjoyed outside while overlooking the turquoise swimming pool. Elements Resort Krabi is situated approximately 20 minutes’ drive from Ao Nang Beach, the Princess Lagoon and Phra Nang Cave. It is also located approximately 37 km from Krabi International Airport and an airport shuttle can be arranged by request.

name: The Parlour Krabi
address: 66 Moo 3, T. Nongthalay, A. Mueang Krabi, Ao Nang 81180
description: Facing the beachfront, The Parlour Krabi offers 2-star accommodation in Klong Muang Beach and has a garden, bar and private beach area. Located around 200 metres from Koh Kwang Beach, the hotel with free WiFi is also less than 1 km away from Klong Muang Beach. The accommodation offers room service, babysitting service and currency exchange for guests. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or Asian options. Laem Bong Beach is 1.7 km from the hotel, while Dragon Crest Mountain is 5.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 32 km from The Parlour Krabi, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Melina Beach Front Bungalows
address: 108/1 Moo 3 Ao Thalane Tumbol Khaotong, Ban Tha Lane 81000
description: Set in a prime location of Krabi, Melina's Beach Front Bungalows puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The property has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, grocery deliveries, private check in/check out are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Take a break from a long day and make use of the boats, canoe, dart board, badminton court, hiking trails. Friendly staff, great facilities, and close proximity to all that Krabi has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Melina's Beach Front Bungalows.Agoda

name: Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort
address: 155 Moo 2, Nong Thale, Krabi 81180
description: Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort offers a modern setting while in Krabi. It provides 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. The resort boasts luxurious amenities, including a limousine service and Spa Krabi. It also includes family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families both large and small, plus a kids club and a kids pool. The rooms at Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort offer a mini bar, a private balcony and a refrigerator. All provide slippers, an in-room dining area and a kitchenette. Those staying at Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort can indulge in a drink at Cocovida Pool Bar, before savouring a meal at Mangosteen’s. Places to dine at the resort include Toh Kin Khaw and Limoncello Italian Restaurant. Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort is within walking distance of Khlong Muang Beach. Ao Phra Nang and Tup Kaek Beach are within an easy car ride from the resort.Revato

name: Anyavee Tubkaek Beach Resort
address: 146 Moo 3, Nongthale, Muang, Krabi 81000
description: Located along Tubkaek Beach, Anyavee Beach Resort offers rooms and villas with views of Ao Nang Bay from the balcony. It also features a swimming pool and beachfront restaurant. Rooms at Anyavee Tubkaek are decorated in a modern Asian design. Offering an LCD TV, they also have a coffee/tea maker, minibar and large bathroom with hairdryer. Guests can have a refreshing swim in the pool, which also has an attached children's pool. To relax, massage services are available. Anyavee Tubkaek Beach Resort- SHA Plus is a 40-minute drive from Krabi International Airport. The tourist centre of Ao Nang Beach is just 20 minute drive away. Half and full day tour arrangements can be made at Anyavee, along with car rentals. Free private parking is offered.

name: Railay Bay Resort And Spa
address: 145 Moo2 Tambol Aonang, Krabi 81000
description: Stretching across the white sands of Railay Beach, Railay Resort & Spa offers spacious cottages set in tropical landscapes. It features free WiFi throughout, a beachfront outdoor pool and a restaurant. Offering free parking on the mainland at Ao Nam Mao Pier, Railay Bay Resort & Spa-SHA Extra Plus is a 20-minute boat trip from Ao Nam Mao Pier or Ao Nang Beach to Railay Pier. Featuring private balconies, tropical-style cottages at Resort Railay feature casual cane and wood furnishings. In-room comforts include DVD player, a safe and a spacious bathroom with a bathtub. For leisure, guests can relax with soothing massage at Railay Spa or try activities like paddle canoeing and rock climbing. A tour desk offers help with trip planning. Cool sea breezes accompany seafood and pizza specialities at Railay’s restaurant. Room service is also available.

name: The Tubkaak Krabi Boutique Resort
address: 123 Moo 3, Tubkaak Beach, Krabi 81000
description: Nestled within abundant greenery, The Tubkaak Krabi Boutique Resort - SHA Extra Plus offers beachfront accommodation on Tubkaak Beach. Offering spacious rooms, it also features a full-service spa and an outdoor pool. Tubkaak Boutique Resort’s rooms feature wooden interiors, giving them a cosy feel. Guests can sit and enjoy mountain views from the balcony. Each room has an outdoor, tropical-style bathroom. With oversized armchairs and a collection of books and magazines, the library is great for quiet reading. Sun loungers are provided on the beach and by the pool. The resort also offers tour arrangements and cooking classes. The Arundina restaurant serves Thai and European dishes. Surrounded by water lily ponds, it boasts a relaxing atmosphere with ocean views. Private meals on the beach can also be arranged, while drinks are available at the library’s bar. The Tubkaak Krabi Boutique Resort - SHA Extra Plus is 20 minutes’ drive from Ao Nang Beach. Krabi Airport is a 45-minute drive away.

name: Krabi Resort
address: 232 Moo 2 Ao Nang Beach, Krabi 81000
description: Located on Ao Nang Beach, Krabi Resort- SHA Extra Plus provides direct beach access and charming rooms with private terraces. It has a large outdoor pool and a restaurant offering beautiful sea views. Conveniently situated near Krabi’s spectacular diving sites and limestone cliffs, The Krabi Resort- SHA Extra Plus is also just 4 km from Phra Nang Cave. It takes 30 minutes by car from the hotel to Krabi International Airport. Fitted with fine furnishings, rooms present a traditional Thai decor or contemporary designs. Each room has a cable TV, a minibar and ample seating space. Most rooms come with a luxurious bathtub. Recreation facilities include rock climbing, scuba diving and snorkelling. The resort also provides tour services, airport transfers and wireless internet access for a fee. The Boat, the resort’s all-day dining restaurant, serves Thai and international cuisine. Fresh seafood barbeque dishes are also available. Guests can enjoy refreshing beverages at the Beach and Pool Bar.

name: Amari Vogue Krabi
address: 149 Moo 3 Tubkaak Beach Nong Thale, Krabi 81000
description: The exclusive Amari Vogue Krabi offers a private beachfront along Tub Kaek Beach. Personalised service starts with a welcome drink at check-in. Beautiful rooms are fitted with polished wooden flooring, traditional Northern Thai artwork and carvings, as well as free internet. Luxuriously furnished, each room has a satellite TV, DVD player and minibar. Amari Vogue Krabi is a 20-minute drive from Aonang Beach and a 30-minute drive from Krabi Town. Krabi Airport is about 40 minutes' away by car. Guests can enjoy total relaxation at Breeze Spa with private steam rooms, massages and beauty treatments. Wellness facilities include a fitness room and spa baths. International cuisine is served at the Lotus Restaurant. Marcos Restaurant and Bar offers Mediterranean and Asian cuisines. Drinks and snacks are available at the Voyager Lounge.

name: Beyond Krabi
address: 98 Moo 3 Tambon Nongtalay, Ban Khlong Muang 81000
description: Inspired by nature, the luxurious Beyond Krabi offers a tropical escape on a private stretch of Klong Muang Beach. With an outdoor pool, it also has a fitness centre and restaurant. Featuring relaxed yet modern Thai design, air-conditioned rooms enjoy beautiful views of the gardens, pool or sea. All come with a flat-screen cable TV, minibar and personal safe. En suite bathrooms have hot showers and a hairdryer. Guests can indulge in a relaxing Thai body massage, or arrange day trips at the tour desk. Currency exchange and ticketing services are available at the 24-hour front desk. Thai and international cuisines are served at the hotel's restaurant. A daily breakfast buffet is also offered. Beyond Krabi is 7 km from Ao Nang Beach and 11 km from Railay Beach. It is a 45-minute drive from Krabi Airport. Free parking is available.

name: The L Resort
address: 31 Moo 2 - Ao Nang Beach, Ao Nang 81000
description: The L Resort is located in the Ao Nang Beach area of Krabi. The eco-friendly resort features cushioned sun loungers on the terrace and a large outdoor pool with a waterfall. It is just a 40-minute drive from Krabi Airport. The chic and non-smoking units are decorated with bright colours and feature white linens on the beds. A 40-inch flat-screen TV, tea/coffee making facilities and a minibar are offered in all air-conditioned rooms. The 4-star resort offers free Wi-Fi access and room service from 07:00-23:00 hrs. On-site, private parking is available free of charge. Day excursions can be arranged for guests as well. The Thai-Swiss restaurant, Wanna's Place serves a great selection of Thai and international dishes as well as Swiss cuisine.

name: Arawan Krabi Beach Resort
address: 107, Moo 5, Ao Nam Mao, Ao Nang 81000
description: Boasting views of the Andaman sea and limestone cliffs, Arawan Krabi Resort features outdoor swimming pools overlooking a private beach of Ao Nam Mao. Ao Nang beach is only a 12-minute drive away from the resort. Guests are also offered with complimentary shuttle services by Tuk Tuk. Featuring air conditioning, rooms at Arawan Krabi Resort are spacious and and fully equipped with flat screen satellite TVs and a seating area. En suite bathrooms include refreshing showers, toiletries and slippers. Guests can enjoy on-site restaurants serving Thai cuisines. There is an on-site free parking and bike rental available. Koh Phi Phi Don is 32 km from Arawan Krabi Beach Resort,while Railay Beach is 17 km away. The resort is only a 45-minute drive from Krabi International Airport.

name: Hyatt Regency Koh Samui
address: 99/11 Moo 5, Koh Samui 84320
description: Situated in Chaweng, 1.9 km from Choeng Mon Beach, Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers a kids' club and room service. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Rooms include a shared bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, while certain rooms have a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher. At Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Seafood and Thai cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus offers a children's playground. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Chaweng, like snorkelling and canoeing. Chaweng Beach is 2.5 km from Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus, while Big Buddha is 4.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International, 2 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ampersand Resort
address: 9/132 Moo 5 Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Set in Bophut, 500 metres from Thongson Bay Beach, Ampersand Resort offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Among the various facilities of this property are a garden, a shared lounge and a terrace. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Ampersand Resort all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Italian and American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Mexican and Middle Eastern cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and vegan options can also be requested. The area is popular for canoeing and cycling, and car hire is available at this 5-star resort. Plai Laem Beach is 500 metres from Ampersand Resort, while Naturism Beach is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Samui International, 4 km from the resort, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Renaissance Koh Samui Resort & Spa
address: 208/1 Moo 4, T. Maret, Lamai Beach, Koh Samui 84310
description: Relax in a boutique resort by the beach where five-star service and opulent amenities abound. Renaissance Koh Samui Resort & Spa is set amidst manicured gardens, nestled along the shores of Koh Samui Island. Our hotel's prime location places you steps away from Lamai Beach, Chaweng Beach and Fisherman's Village. After a day on the beach in Thailand, rest well in an elegant hotel room with plush bedding, high-speed Wi-Fi and outdoor whirlpool. Or select one of our resort's lavish villas, each featuring a private pool. Satisfy your hunger at our delicious hotel restaurants with classic dishes from Thailand, locally sourced seafood or tasty international fare. Stay fit in Koh Samui with a workout in our fitness center or recharge with a swim in our hotel pools or a gentle massage at Quan Spa. If you're planning an event in Thailand, take advantage of stylish venues supported by on-site catering. We look forward to making your visit to Renaissance Koh Samui Resort & Spa a memorable one.Marriott

name: W Koh Samui
address: 4/1 Moo 1, Tambol Maenam, Koh Samui 84330
description: Savor boundless tranquillity by day. Then, ramp it up at night. Situated on a 30-square-mile tropical island in the middle of the Gulf of Thailand, overlooking stunning beaches and lush forests, W Koh Samui resort awakens as the sun goes down, igniting the unexpected. Life is done right. Hotel guests can start the day at our Koh Samui resort with a workout at FIT or dip at WET before unwinding with a locally inspired therapy at AWAY Spa. Then light up the evening with signature cocktails at WOOBAR and dinner at our hotel's on-site restaurants, Namu and The Kitchen Table. Surrounded by verdant foliage, each of our resort's 74 luxury, pet-friendly villas boasts a private outdoor pool and infinite island views. Inside, premiere technology meets signature W pillow top beds, Away Spa amenities and Whatever/Whenever service. Relax and take it easy in Thailand at W Koh Samui Hotel.Marriott

name: Vana Belle, a Luxury Collection Resort, Koh Samui
address: 9/99 Moo 3 Chaweng Noi Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Surrounded by tropical forests, mythical gardens, crystal clear blue ocean water and pristine white sand beach. Vana Belle, A Luxury Collection Resort, Koh Samui is located at Chaweng Noi Beach. This Koh Samui hotel is moments away from attractions such as the Elephant Sanctuary, Wat Phra Yai, and Chaweng Beach. Discover the unsurpassed services, unrivaled location and comfort of our Koh Samui, Thailand, resort. Each of our suites and villas boasts private pools. Bring to light the luxurious rooms that feature signature Luxury Collection Bed and pillows, remarkable marble bathrooms and extra amenities. Unwind by the infinity-edge pool at the beachfront with the pool bar or experience the authentic Southern Thai cuisine at Panali or tasteful international cuisine at Kiree. Complete the holiday at Vana Spa with a Spa treatment featuring our signature Siam Boran massage.Marriott

name: Napasai, A Belmond Hotel, Koh Samui
address: 65/10 Moo 5 Baan Tai, Koh Samui 84330
description: The luxurious Napasai, A Belmond Hotel, Koh Samui offers a 5-star tropical getaway in Ko Samui, with its very own beachfront, beautiful sea view infinity pool, and pampering spa services. Overlooking Ban Tai Beach, it has 4 dining options. Spacious air-conditioned villas feature modern Thai decor and large patios with views of the sea. Equipped with free Wi-Fi, each has a DVD player, TV and a Thai-style sofa. En suite bathrooms present a terazzo bathtub and rainshower. Napasai, A Belmond Hotel, Koh Samui is located along Mae Nam Beach and is about 25 minutes' drive from Samui Airport. Free parking is available. Guests can take PADI-certified diving and snorkelling lessons, or even take part in elephant trekking tours. An 18-hole championship golf course is just a 5-minute drive away. Boasting 180° views of the ocean, as well as outdoor seating, Lai Thai Restaurant serves authentic Thai cuisine all day. Fresh seafood barbecue and international dishes are offered at the casual Beach Restaurant. Drinks can be enjoyed at the 2 bars.

name: Banyan Tree Samui
address: 99/9 Moo 4 Maret Koh Samui, Koh Samui
description: Overlooking the sapphire waters of scenic Lamai Bay, Banyan Tree Samui is nestled in a series of cascading terraces on a private cove on the Southeastern coast of Koh Samui. The luxury all-pool villa resort combines the best elements of a tropical getaway with a pristine beach, blissful spa escapes, bespoke dining experiences, locally-infused elements and an unparalleled view of the Gulf of Thailand.accorhotels.com

name: Silavadee Pool Spa Resort
address: 208/66 Moo4, Maret, Koh Samui 84310
description: Set upon a hill in Koh Samui, Silavadee Pool Spa Resort enjoys a private beach and an outdoor infinity pool. Aside from free WiFi, it also has a free DVD library. Overlooking the Gulf of Siam, Silavadee Resort offers free shuttle services to Lamai and Chaweng. Samui Airport is about 9 km from the resort. Spacious and decked with luxurious teak wood furnishings, the Thai-style rooms feature modern amenities like a flat-screen TV, iPod dock and minibar. En suite bathrooms are equipped with bathtubs and hairdryers. The peaceful Silavadee Wellness Spa has a relaxing menu of massage treatments and beauty therapies. The resort also arranges a business centre and laundry services. Fresh seafood, traditional Thai and international dishes are served at The Height Restaurant, which has open-air seating overlooking stunning views of the Gulf of Thailand. The pool has a bar offering cocktails and fruit juices.The Moon Restaurant provides all guests with all day dining, serving varieties of International and Mediterranean dinner a la carte.

name: Samui Resotel Beach Resort
address: 17 Moo 3 Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Sitting on the white sands of Chaweng Beach, the breathtaking Samui Resotel Beach Resort offers beautiful accommodation with ocean or tropical garden views. It is a 15-minute drive from the airport. Soak up the sun on your private terrace complete with daybeds, or relax with a DVD on the flat-screen TV. All rooms and villas at Samui Resotel are equipped with a tea/coffee machine and high-speed internet access. Lazy afternoons by the pool and indulgent massages await guests at Samui Resotel. There is also a well-equipped gym and a dive centre. Capriccio Restaurant offers authentic Italian and Thai dishes, and a great selection of wines. Samui Resotel Beach Resort also has 3 bars where guests can enjoy refreshing beverages. Room service is available. The resort offers car rental facilities, as well as, a tour desk which organises day trips and island exploration excursions. The Thai Boxing Stadium is about 1.2 km from the hotel.

name: Santiburi Koh Samui
address: 12/12 Moo 1 Mae Nam Beach, Koh Samui 84330
description: Santiburi Koh Samui is located along beautiful Mae Nam Beach in Koh Samui. Featuring luxurious villas and suites, it offers a tropical outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. Surrounded by greenery, the spacious accommodations at Resort Santiburi Beach feature polished wooden floors and traditional Thai furnishings. In-room entertainment is provided with the flat-screen cable/satellite TV and DVD player. Guests can relax in the hot tub or indulge in a pampering massage at the spa. An 18-hole championship golf course is just a 5-minute drive from Santiburi. For a good workout, water sports facilities are also available. Regarding "Authentic Thai dishes and Mediterranean food can be enjoyed under the stars at The Beach House. Refreshing evening drinks are served at the cozy Lounge." The Thai Food would be served at the Sala Thai. Description of that as below Indulge in true Thai flavours with innovative presentation. Take your seat for a fine-dining experience as authentic Thai cuisine is served with flair in a tropical garden setting. Ancient recipes, passed down through generations are reimagined with contemporary techniques and infused with creative influences from global gastronomy. Spectacular set menus take diners on a journey of exquisite flavours and unique creations are available a la carte. Our expert team will be delighted to welcome you at Sala Thai. Santiburi Koh Samui is about 8 km from Samui Airport.

name: Casa De Mar
address: 154/16 Moo 2, Bo Phut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Fronting glittering water of the gulf of Thailand, Casa De Mar offers an outdoor pool and a restaurant. This modern resort is just a few steps from the sandy beach of Chaweng, 1.5 km from Ark Bar and 2 km from Samui Airport. Guests can enjoy free WiFi throughout the stay. Offering a choice of private villa to cosy rooms, all units are fully air-conditioned and comes with a flat-screen cable TV, a seating area and a safety deposit box. Some rooms boast outdoor furniture and a coffee machine. Two bottles of drinking water is provide, daily. A shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries are standard in all en suite bathrooms. Tasty local and international cuisines are served at The Journey Terrace. A breakfast buffet is served daily from 07:00 – 10:30 hrs. Guest can enjoy special drinks or mingle with the other guests at the bar. Alternatively, a range of dining outlets can be found within a 5-minute walk of the property. For guests’ convenience, Casa De Mar provides luggage storage, car hiring and laundry service. Guests can enjoy themselves at the luscious garden or at the sun terrace. Within a short drive from the accommodation, guests can find KC Beach Club Chaweng (2.5 km), Chaweng Walking Street (2.8 km) and Big Buddha (3.7 km). For ferry, Bangrak Pier is located 3.5 km from the property; whilst Bo Phut Pier can be reached under 5 km.

name: Saii Koh Samui Choengmon
address: 63/182 Moo 5, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Located on its very own beach at Hanuman Bay, SAii Koh Samui Choengmon provides a luxurious tropical getaway. An outdoor pool, yoga classes, and free WiFi are provided. All accommodation comes with a private pool. Fitted with high ceilings and antique furnishings, the chic air-conditioned villas and suites have a flat-screen TV. High-quality cotton bedsheets, and spa toiletries are included. The en-suite bathroom has either a shower or bathtub. SAii Koh Samui Choengmon is a 7-minute drive from Samui International Airport and Chaweng Beach. Cheong Mon Beach is a 4-minute ride away. Free parking service are available. Airport transfers can be arranged at an extra charge. Guests can exercise at the fitness room, shop at the stylish Galleria boutique, or lounge at the book and music library. There are also relaxing body massages the spa. Water-front international dining is available at Miss Olive Oyl Restaurant. Drinks can be enjoyed at The Wet Bar.

name: Sala Samui Choengmon Beach
address: 10/9 Moo 5, Baan Plai Lam, Koh Samui 84320
description: Located along Koh Samui's Choeng Mon Beach, SALA Samui Choengmon Beach Resort offers modern facilities complemented by traditional Thai architecture. It boasts an 80-metre private beach and 2 beachfront pools. SALA Samui Choengmon Beach Resort is a 10-minute drive from both Samui Airport, Fisherman's Village and Chaweng Centre. Rooms come with private balconies or terraces and outdoor bathrooms. Amenities include cable TV, a DVD player and tea/coffee making facilities. Some villas feature a private pool with a sundeck. Guests can enjoy a massage in one of the spa pavilions, or exercise in the fitness centre. SALA Samui Resort also has a tour and activities desk, a library area and a business centre. Both SALA Samui Restaurant and Pangaea Restaurant & Bar serve Thai and international dishes. The beach bar offers indoor, outdoor and beach seating. In-villa dining is also available.

name: Four Seasons Resort Koh Samui
address: 219 Moo 5 Tumbon Angthong, Koh Samui 84140
description: Surrounded by tropical gardens, Four Seasons Resort Koh Samui - SHA Extra Plus is situated on the island’s northwestern tip, a quiet oasis on Laem Yai Bay. Windsurfing, golf and a spa are featured. Each room is fitted with a private infinity pool, private bar and iPod dock. Guests can enjoy views of the gardens or Gulf of Siam on the outdoor day bed. The bathroom’s glass doors open onto the private deck for an al fresco bathing experience. Chilled towels are offered at Koh Samui Four Seasons’ beachside infinity pool. Guests can recharge with a game of tennis, a variety of beach sports or a workout at the fitness centre. A large book and DVD library is provided. The hotel’s SIAMSEAS cruising boat offers access to Marine National Park and a variety of other locations. The resort is about a 30-minute drive from both Big Buddha and Koh Samui International Airport. The Four Seasons’ restaurant serves fresh local seafood seasoned with exotic herbs from nearby gardens. Both Thai and International cuisine are offered. The Beach Bar serves a variety of tropical cocktails.

name: Six Senses Samui
address: 9/10 Moo 5, Baan Plai Laem, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: On the northern tip of Samui Island, the luxurious Six Senses Samui enjoys panoramic views of the Gulf of Siam. Boasting a beautiful infinity pool, it has a spa and private beach. Air-conditioned villas feature large open spaces and wooden flooring which give rooms a bright and airy feel. Fitted with a cable/satellite TV, villas also come with free internet and large daybeds. Six Senses Samui is a 10-minute drive from Samui International Airport. It is around 800 metres from Bo Phut Pier and Fisherman's Village. The elegant Six Senses Spa provides relaxing massage therapies and yoga classes. The hotel's tour desk can help organise jungle treks, island boat trips and diving excursions. Dining on the Rocks offers a farm-to-table cuisine with stunning ocean views. Dining on the Hill features authentic Thai dishes and fresh barbecued seafood.

name: Coco Palm Beach Resort
address: 26/4, Maenam Beach, Koh Samui 84330
description: Our swimming pool will be closed from 16th-31st October 2023 due to renovations. During this period you still enjoy our beach activities. Set on peaceful Maenam Beach, Coco Palm Beach Resort boasts beautifully landscaped grounds away from Samui’s bustle. Offering free WiFi and parking, it boasts a beachfront outdoor pool and beachside restaurant. Coco Palm Beach Resort is about 10 km from Samui Airport and Nathorn Pier. It is 5 km from lively Bophut and is a 1-minute walk from Lomprayah Pier. Featuring Thai-style designs and wood furnishings, air-conditioned bungalows are set amidst tropical greenery. They come with satellite TV, heated showers and bathrobes. Leisure afternoons can be spent with a Thai massage or relaxing stroll in gardens. Added conveniences include a business centre, tour desk and water sports facilities. A delicious selection of Thai, Asian and international dishes can be enjoyed at Palm Terrace Restaurant while Thai Lantern offers panoramic views of the gulf. A poolside bar serves refreshing cocktails.

name: Conrad Koh Samui
address: 49/8-9 Moo 4, Hillcrest Road, Amphur Koh Samui, Suratthani, Koh Samui 84140
description: Experience complete luxury at this stylish resort in your own villa with infinity-edge pool. Conrad Koh Samui is situated on the south-western tip of the island, overlooking the azure reefs of the Gulf of Thailand from its unique position on a scenic hillside. Set only a few steps from an idyllic white-sand beach, the resort features stunning sunset views. Ride in one of a variety of our luxury limousines from Koh Samui airport, only 45 minutes from the resort, and to destinations throughout the island. The resort's secluded location is home to 65 free-standing one bedroom villas overlooking the pristine Aow Thai beach and sprawling across 25 acres of dramatic hillside. All villas have private terraces and a minimum 10m infinity-edge pool. This incredible resort boasts unobstructed ocean views and a range of sumptuous amenities and modern conveniences guaranteed to please the most discerning travellers. Two and three bedroom luxury pool villas are also available at the exclusive residential wing, Conrad Koh Samui Residences. Plan an unforgettable celebration or design the wedding of your dreams at the exclusive Conrad Koh Samui. Hold the ceremony on the powder white sands of the beach as the sun sets over the iconic five islands or celebrate with an evening gala dinner in the resort's function room. Enjoy a variety of on-site recreation activities and water sports during your stay. Energize in the contemporary 24-hour Fitness Centre and practice yoga outdoors on the sun-soaked, wooden deck. Experience Thailand's legendary snorkelling and incredible views of the coast at our on-site diving and sailing booking centre, sunbathe on the resort's beach or the sea terrace, or in an over-water hammock. Soothe mind and spirit with a relaxing holistic beauty treatment in our opulent spa.Hilton

name: Aloha Resort
address: 128 Lamai Beach, Maret, Koh Samui 84310
description: LOCATION Discover the endless possibilities to exhilarate your senses and creating memories to last a lifetime. Aloha Resort is located directly on the beach and within 500 m of plenty of shopping opportunities and nightclubs. Links to the public transport network lie about 2 km away. Koh Samui airport is approximately 22 km away. ROOMS All elegantly appointed rooms feature air conditioning and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. A minibar is also available. Features include a fridge and tea and coffee making equipment. A telephone, a TV and wireless internet access are provided as standard. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. RESTAURANT Gather with your friends and family in the romantic evening setting restaurant. Enjoy local and European cuisine at Aloha Resort's 2 restaurants. AMENITIES Guests of the hotel are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. Amenities include a safe. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. The hotel offers a range of amenities for a comfortable stay, including gastronomic options such as a restaurant, a café and a bar. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. A TV room is also among the amenities at the hotel. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage and a car park. Additional services include room service and a laundry. The hotel offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. Sun loungers and parasols on the sun terrace offer a great way to relax. The hot tub offers revitalization. Various refreshing drinks are available from the poolside bar. Leisure options at the hotel also include golf, pool/billiards, a spa, a sauna, a steam bath and massage treatments.WebBeds

name: Muang Samui Spa Resort
address: 13/1 Moo2, Chaweng Beach, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: A relaxing destination in Koh Samui’s east coast, Muang Samui Spa Resort is located by the white sand of Chaweng Beach. It features an outdoor pool and a beachfront restaurant. Decorated with traditional Thai furnishings, each room at Muang Samui Spa has cable TV, a DVD player, and tea/coffee making facilities. A work desk and a safety deposit box are provided. Private bathrooms feature a spa bath and separate rain shower facilities. Guests can visit Rai-Ra Spa for a massage or aromatherapy treatment, or exercise at the fitness room. Muang Samui provides tour arrangements and car rental. Wi-Fi is free in public areas. Lare Lae Restaurant and Bar serves a variety of international specialities, including Thai and Italian choices. Located across the road, Samui Seafood Grill and Restaurant offers seafood and Italian dishes in a fine dining setting. The Muang Samui Spa Resort is only a 10-minute drive from Samui International Airport. It is 25 km away from Nathon City and its ferry pier.

name: Rummana Boutique Resort
address: 124/10 Moo 3, Koh Samui 84310
description: Located along the the southern-end of Lamai Beach, Rummana Boutique Resort - SHA Plus features rooms surrounded by tropical gardens. An indulgent massage or a refreshing swim awaits guests at the spa and outdoor pool. Free WiFi is provided. The property is a short 5-minute walk to the famous Grandfather and Grandmother Rocks. Just 1 km away is Lamai Shopping Town. Rummana Boutique Resort - SHA Plus is 18 km from Samui Airport. All air-conditioned rooms at Rummana feature a patio with garden views. Rooms are equipped with a minibar and tea/coffee maker for guests’ convenience. Safety deposit boxes and an electric kettle are available. The en suite bathroom comes with a shower, bathtub and free toiletries. The resort offers sunbeds with umbrellas by the pool and on the beach during low tide. Tour, car and motorbike rental services are available. There is also free parking and luggage storage. Guests can enjoy happy hour drinks at Green Bar and international dishes at the Horapa Restaurant.

name: Sheraton Samui Resort
address: 86 Moo 3 Chaweng Noi Beach, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Find premium beachfront accommodations at Sheraton Samui Resort. Our hotel in Koh Samui offers a stylish blend of modern and Mediterranean décor in every room. Take in stunning views from your spacious in-room balcony overlooking our tropical Garden Pool and Beachfront Pool, just steps from sparkling turquoise waters. Our beach resort delivers a one-of-a-kind Star Kids Club for families with young children, and our partnership with the Koh Samui Blue Swimmer Crab Bank offers guests a hands-on opportunity to learn about seafood sustainability. We are 15 minutes away from Samui International Airport and a short ride to well-known Koh Samui attractions. Savor authentic Thailand cuisine and signature alfresco dining at our hotel restaurants. Other resort amenities include a Balinese-inspired Glow Spa, mindfulness beach yoga and the 24/7 Sheraton Fitness and outdoor tennis court, perfect for an energizing workout before exploring Koh Samui. Sheraton Samui Resort welcomes you to the timeless serenity of Thailand.Marriott

name: Tango Luxe Beach Villa Samui
address: 79/100 Moo 5 T. Bopud A., Koh Samui 84320
description: Tango Luxe Beach Villa, Koh Samui - SHA Extra Plus offers tropical villas with a private pool. It has a main infinity pool and two on-site restaurants with the most romantic sunset view on Koh Samui. Luxurious private villas are well-furnished, with air-conditioned, well-stocked mini-bar, electric kettle and outdoor seating area on a private balcony or terrace, flat-screen Smart TV (Netflix, Youtube, Amazon Prime), iPod dock, wooden flooring and sun loungers. Spacious en suite bathroom has a separate bathtub and shower stall. Tango Luxe Beach Villa, Koh Samui located on peaceful coast of Cheongmon area with 5-minute drive from Samui International Airport, and 10 minutes drive to Fisherman's Village and Chaweng Center The two on-site restaurants, Qi Oriental Cuisine and Sea La Vie Bar and Bistro, serve Thai authentic cuisine and selection of seafood. Sea La Vie Bar and Bistro also offering exceptional cocktails. Variety of breakfast will be served in the villas for guests' comfort. Cielo Spa provides a variety of treatments, including aromatherapy, hydrotherapy and Thai massages. The spa is equipped with a sauna, a spa bath and a steam room. Hotel offers concierge services and laundry services. Free parking bicycle and kayak are also available free of charge.

name: Chaweng Cove Beach Resort
address: 17/4 Moo 3, Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui 84140
description: Chaweng Cove Beach Resort offers several accommodation types along Chaweng Beach in Koh Samui. The resort features an outdoor swimming pool, a beachfront restaurant and a beach bar overlooking the ocean. Free W-Fi is available throughout. Chaweng Cove Beach Resort is around 20 minutes’ drive from Samui International Airport. It is a 15-minute walk from Chaweng’s town centre. Featuring wooden furnishings, the air-conditioned rooms come with a flat-screen TV and a DVD player. A minibar and tea/coffee making facilities are provided. Some rooms have a private balcony with sitting area. Guests can relax on the sun loungers provided on the beach. Samui Wellness Spa offers massages, facials and body treatments. The resort has a small fitness room, a tour desk, and a library area. Fresh seafood, Thai and international dishes are served at the restaurant. Cocktails and traditional Thai refreshments are available at Sea Almond Beach Bar.

name: Escape Beach Resort
address: 5/1 M.1 Maenam, Koh Samui 84330
description: Located in Mae Nam on Koh Samui, Escape Beach Resort boasts a beachfront location and has an outdoor pool the overlooks the sea and complimentary WiFi access in all area. Offering a choice of bungalows to cosy guestrooms in the main building, all rooms are air-conditioned and comes with views of the sea or garden. The private bathroom is fitted with a hand/rain shower and complimentary toiletries. Other amenities include a flat-screen TV, a fridge and a safety deposit box. Activities including sunset tours, island day trips and fishing can all be arranged for an additional charge. Other services such as motorbike/car hire & transportation are all available. Complete the day after a long day out with a traditional Thai massage and relaxing treatments, which can be booked at the front desk. Open from 07:00 - 22:00 hrs, Castaway Restaurant & Bar offers a wide selected of Thai and international dishes. Guests can sit back by the pool while enjoying refreshing drinks and cocktails from the bar. It is 30 metres to Mae Nam Beach. Samui Airport is 8 km from the resort. Guests can visit nearby attractions in Bophut including the Fisher Man Village (2 km) and Wat Phra Yai (7 km).

name: Peace Resort Samui
address: 178 Moo 1, Bophut Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Situated on Bo Phut Beach, Peace Resort offers 1 outdoor pool and an outdoor restaurant. Its spacious bungalows feature a private terrace with sea or garden views. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, bungalows at Peace also come with a tea/coffee maker and a minibar. Private bathrooms feature a spacious layout and include a hairdryer. The Sea Wrap Restaurant serves International and Thai dishes, with the option of dining outdoors right on the beach. Guests may also enjoy a refreshing drink at the pool bar. Room service is provided. Guests can take a dip in the spa pool or have a quiet read in the resort’s library. Day trips can be arranged at the tour desk, which also assists with car rentals. Peace Resort is a 7 minutes walk from Walking Street at Bophut's Fisherman's Village. It is within a 14-minute drive from popular Chaweng Beach and Samui Airport. For added convenience airport transfers can be arranged for an additional charge.

name: Anavana Beach Resort
address: 28/1 Moo 3, Koh Samui 84320
description: Anavana Beach Resort offers a tropical boutique retreat along southern Chaweng Beach on Koh Samui. Overlooking the Gulf of Siam, it boasts an outdoor pool and Thai-style cottages with free Wi-Fi. Set within landscaped gardens, cottages at Anavana Beach Resort feature private terraces and stylish open-air bathrooms. Equipped with both air conditioning and a ceiling fan, each room has a flat-screen cable TV and a DVD player. Guests can enjoy a relaxing massage at the spa or borrow a complimentary movie at the hotel’s library. Anavana Beach Resort also provides a gift shop and a helpful tour desk. Anavana restaurant serves fine Thai cuisine and a vegetarian menu. Beautiful pool and sea views can be enjoyed throughout the entire meal. Anavana Beach Resort is a 20-minute drive from Samui Airport.

name: Aura Samui Best Beach Hotel
address: 125 M.3, Koh Samui 84310
description: Set in Lamai, 90 metres from Lamai Beach, Aura Samui Best Beach Hotel - SHA Plus offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Aura Samui Best Beach Hotel - SHA Plus features some units with pool views, and every room comes with a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options. At Aura Samui Best Beach Hotel - SHA Plus you will find a restaurant serving American, Dutch and British cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Rocky's Beach, Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks and Lamai Viewpoint. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 14 km from Aura Samui Best Beach Hotel - SHA Plus.

name: Nora Beach Resort and Spa
address: 222 Moo 2, Chaweng Beach, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Nora Beach Resort and Spa is set on Koh Samui and offers 4-star accommodation as well as a ski school and free Wi-Fi. There is also a fitness centre with fitness classes, a saltwater swimming pool and a garden terrace. Guests of Nora Beach Koh Samui can enjoy a variety of relaxation amenities at Anodas Spa, which features a swimming pool and a sauna. There is also free private parking on site for guests travelling with a car. Nora Beach Resort & Spa features 113 air conditioned rooms. A refrigerator, an in-room safe and bottled water are also included. Serving international, Thai and seafood dishes, Nora Beach Resort & Spa Koh Samui's contemporary brasserie provides a convenient dining option for those who wish dine on site. Room service is also available during certain times. For those who enjoy exploring local restaurants and cafés, there is a wide range within walking distance. For guests travelling by car, parking is available on site and Chaweng is within easy driving distance of the hotel.Revato

name: Royal Muang Samui Villas
address: 89 Moo 5 Choengmon Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Located on the white sands and clear waters of Choengmon Beach, Royal Muang Samui Villas offers rooms, villas and pool villas with free WiFi. This beachfront property also features an outdoor pool and 24-hour front desk. Suites and pool villas feature an LCD television, CD and DVD player and en-suite bathroom with a large spa bathtub. Room service is provided. Guests can experience aromatherapy and a variety of treatments at Cave Rai Ra Beach Spa. Other facilities include a fitness centre and a tour desk. Samui Sailor Bar & Grill serve Thai and Italian favourites with fresh seafood. Guests can enjoy wines and cocktails at Spice Beach Restaurant. Royal Muang Samui Villas is a 10-minute drive from Chaweng's shopping and nightlife area. Bophut, Big Buddha Beach and Maenam are nearby, while Samui Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Garrya Tongsai Bay Samui
address: 84 Moo 5 Bophut Tongsai Road,Ko Samui (Suratthani), Koh Samui 84320
description: Surrounded by tropical gardens, Garrya Tongsai Bay Samui offers luxurious seaside accommodation and a 200-metre private beach. A spa and 2 outdoor pools aside, it also has 3 restaurants and free Wi-Fi. Elegantly decorated with wooden furnishings, the air-conditioned rooms at Tongsai Bay feature cable TV and minibar. Each has an ocean-view terrace with sun loungers, and some terraces come with an outdoor bathtub. Garrya Tongsai Bay Samui is a 10-minute drive from Samui Airport and a 15-minute drive from popular Chaweng Beach. The hotel provides airport shuttle service at an additional charge. Guests who are driving can enjoy free parking privileges. 8LEMENTS Spa features a relaxing menu of herbal baths and massage treatments. For a refreshing workout, guests may exercise at the gym or play a game of tennis. The resort also provides on-site water sport facilities for guests' enjoyment. Guests can enjoy meals at Rhoy Rhoy! restaurant, Fish Tales restaurant, EVOL restaurant and at the Po Lad Beach Bar and Bistro. There is also a themed restaurant which is open during high season. Drinking water is provided all-day.

name: The Hive Hotel Samui
address: 124 / 264 Moo 3, T.Maret, Koh Samui 84310
description: Boasting an infinity pool facing a 60-m² beachfront,The Hive Hotel sits on the golden sands of Lamai Beach in Koh Samui. It offers rooms set within quiet tropical gardens. Featuring private balconies, The Hive Hotel's rooms have simple interiors with tiled flooring and dark wood furniture. Each room has cable TV, a DVD player, and a safety deposit box. The en suite bathroom provides a hot shower and bath toiletries. Guests can relax on the sun loungers by the pool or on the beach, or take a stroll through the landscaped botanical gardens. The resort offers the convenience of a 24-hour reception and a tour desk, as well as laundry services and currency exchange. The beachfront Restaurant serves Thai and Western dishes in an outdoor setting. It is also connected to the pool terrace, so guests can sip refreshments whilst enjoying the sun. The Hive Hotel is within walking distance of local shops, banks, restaurants and bars.

name: Chaweng Garden Beach Resort
address: 162/8 Moo2, Tambon Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Directly situated on Chaweng Beach, this intimate family-run property is a minute’s walk from Chaweng’s nightlife and lively shops. It features buffet breakfast and a beachside restaurant offering evening grills. Featuring spacious interiors, air-conditioned rooms are tastefully furnished with dark wood fittings and local fabrics. They open out to tropical views and boast a bathroom with shower facilities. Chaweng Garden Beach Resort is just a minute's stroll from the restaurant and bars lining Beach Road. It is a 15-minute drive from Koh Samui Airport and provides free parking. Leisurely afternoons can be spent with a massage by the outdoor pool. Other conveniences include water sports facilities, tour desk and free Wi-Fi in public areas. Shaded by palm trees, Sukulaya Restaurant offers fresh seafood grills and international dishes by the seaside.

name: Baan Samui Resort
address: 14/7 Moo 2, Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui
description: Located on a private area along Chaweng Beach in Koh Samui, Baan Samui Resort offers rooms steps from the beach. The resort features an outdoor pool and offers Thai massages by the beachfront. Baan Samui Resort is a convenient 15-minute drive from Samui Airport. The Thai Boxing Stadium is 500 metres away. Colourful rooms offer a balcony and come with cable TV channels and tea and coffee-making facilities. It features wooden furnishings that complements its tropical surroundings. The resort has a library. A variety of watersports including scuba diving and jet skiing can be enjoyed by the beach. The beachside Moon Dance restaurant offers fresh seafood and international cuisine accompanied by live entertainment.

name: Cape Fahn Hotel Samui
address: 24/269 Moo 5, T. Bo-Phut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Situated in Choeng Mon Beach and with Bang Rak Pier reachable within 2.7 km, Cape Fahn Hotel Samui offers a private beach area, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi and water sports facilities. Each accommodation at the 5-star resort has pool views, and guests can enjoy access to an outdoor swimming pool. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar or a meal in the restaurant. All guest rooms at the resort come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a bath. Featuring a terrace, all rooms are fitted with a kettle, air conditioning and a desk. At Cape Fahn Hotel Samui guests are welcome to take advantage of a fitness room. Snorkelling is among the activities that guests can enjoy near the resort. For any tips on how to get around or what to do in the area, guests can ask at the reception. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 3 km from the property.

name: Bandara Resort and Spa, Samui
address: 178/2 Moo 1, Bophut, Koh Samui
description: Steps from peaceful Bophut Beach, Bandara Resort and Spa offers 4-star rooms with free Wi-Fi private balconies overlooking tropical landscapes. It features 4 pools, a fitness centre and free parking. Resort Bandara is a 5-minute walk from Walking Street at Bophut’s Fisherman’s Village. It is within a 15-minute drive from popular Chaweng Beach and Samui Airport. Modern Thai-style rooms at Bandara Resort are spacious and feature an entertainment system. They are fitted with a safe, fridge and ironing facilities. Large bathrooms have a bathtub, hairdryer and toiletries. Guests can lounge by the large outdoor pool or indulge with traditional Thai massages at Bandara Spa. A tour desk helps with trip planning and travel arrangements. Bandara Resort also has a kid club and a gift shop. A range of Asian and European dishes can be enjoyed on the beachfront or in the tropical garden. Chom Dao Restaurant also offers fresh seafood, steaks and barbecued dishes.

name: Kanok Buri Resort
address: 84 Moo 2, Lipa Noi, Koh Samui 84140
description: Located along the sands of Lipa Noi, Kanok Buri Resort is within walking distance from Niki Beach Club and offers spacious villas with a spa bath and free Wi-Fi. Kanok Buri's villas are decorated with a blend of western and Thai design. They are fitted with tea/coffee maker and satellite TV. For guests' convenience, there are a hairdryer, a safety deposit box and free toiletries in the room. Guests can have fun with a swim in the pool. Rentals for a car and motorbike as well as a tour desk are available. Kanok Buri Resort, Romantico beachside restaurant offers beautiful sunset views and serves Thai and Western food. Local restaurants can be found within the area along the street. A 45-minute drive brings guests to Chaweng Beach and Samui Airport, it takes a 15-minute drive to Nathon Pier and a 5-minute drive to Lipa Noi Pier.

name: Samui Buri Beach Resort
address: 26/24 Moo 4, Mae Nam Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Samui Buri Beach Resort is a beachfront resort on Koh Samui’s Maenam Beach. Featuring traditional Thai architecture, it offers an outdoor infinity pool. Free Wi-Fi access is also available throughout. The resort offers villas with private pools, as well as rooms built around the main pool.
