All rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV, a DVD player and a safety deposit box. The bathrooms have a shower and a double vanity sink. Samui Buri Beach Resort is a 25-minute drive from Samui Airport and a 20-minute drive from Nathon Pier. The centre of Chaweng Beach is 25 minutes’ drive away. Guests can enjoy a relaxing massage at the spa, or exercise in the fitness centre. A kid’s club offers activities for younger guests, while adults can take Thai cooking classes. The resort also has a tour desk and a business centre. International dishes are served at the open-air Seetawaree Restaurant, where meals are prepared with fresh ingredients from the resort gardens. Drinks are available at 3 bars.

name: Nora Buri Resort & Spa
address: 111 Moo 5, Chaweng Beach, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Set in a prime location of Samui, Nora Buri Resort & Spa puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, are at hand. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea, free welcome drink, mirror. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as private beach, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, spa. Convenience and comfort makes Nora Buri Resort & Spa the perfect choice for your stay in Samui.priceline.com

name: Saree Samui
address: 135 Moo 4 Baan Tornsai, Tumbol Mae Nam, Amphur Koh Samui, Surathani, Koh Samui 84320
description: Presenting a blend of traditional Thai and Balinese decor, Saree Samui provides luxurious villas with free Wi-Fi. Its outdoor infinity pool overlooks the sandy shores of Mae Nam Beach. Spacious and elegant, all villas are fitted with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Guests can lounge at the private sundeck, in the comfortable living room, or even by the private pool in some villas. Semi-outdoor bathrooms come with a bathtub and rainshower. Saree Samui is a 20-minute drive from shopping and dining at popular Chaweng Beach. It is a 30-minute drive from Samui International Airport. Saree Rarom Spa provides relaxing herbal steam baths, Thai massage and morning yoga sessions. Staff at the tour desk can help arrange day trips to Angthong Marine National Park, the Crocodile Farm and The Samui Aquarium. Surya Chandra Restaurant serves local and international dishes, with the choice of al fresco beachfront dining. Drinks can be enjoyed by the Beach Bar.

name: Avani+ Samui Resort
address: 53/5 Moo 4, Phang Ka, Taling Ngam, Koh Samui 84140
description: Avani+ Samui Resort is located on Koh Samui, and offers 5-star facilities, including an infinity pool and a private beach. Guests also have exclusive access to the AvaniSpa and AvaniFit. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the bar. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. Free Wi-Fi is also provided. Rooms are air-conditioned and have premium amenities such as a mini bar and a flat-screen TV. They feature a desk, a seating area and an in-room safe. In-house dining options include Essence Restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. Breakfast is available each morning and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. Avani+ Samui Resort is situated next to Pang Ka Bay. The resort also offers complimentary bicycle rental so guests can easily discover the surrounding sights.Revato

name: Shasa Resort & Residences, Koh Samui
address: 116/1 Moo 2 Tambon Mared, Laem Set, Koh Samui 84310
description: Nestled in a tropical hillside, this 5-star property boasts 3 beachfront pools and spacious suites overlooking the beautiful Gulf of Thailand. It offers attentive service, hearty buffets and free Wi-Fi. Located away from the crowds of Samui, ShaSa Resort & Residences, Koh Samui - SHA Extra Plus & Residences, Koh Samui offers shuttles to the Chaweng and Lamai beaches. It is 45 minutes’ drive from Samui International Airport. Bright and airy, well-designed suites feature modern interiors with fully furnished kitchens. They come with a flat-screen cable TV, laundry facilities and spacious bathrooms with a large bathtub. Guests can take relaxing dips in the hydro-therapy pool or get a Thai massage at the spa. The resort also houses fitness facilities, a library and games room. Beyond The Sea Siamese Brasserie offers a spread of fine Thai and international dishes. It also features an extensive wine list and gourmet coffees.

name: The Sea Koh Samui Resort & Residences by Tolani
address: 7/64 Moo 5, Bang Por, Koh Samui 84330
description: The Sea Koh Samui is located along the sandy shores of Mae Nam Beach, a 10-minute drive from Nathon. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. The contemporary rooms feature a flat-screen cable TV and a spacious living area. A kitchen area with microwave is provided. Rooms come with an indoor or outdoor hot tub. The Sea Koh Samui is a 20-minute drive from Chaweng Town. Samui Airport is about 11 km away. A fitness centre is available for guests wishing to keep up with their regular work-out. The spa features massage treatments. A tour desk and car rentals are available. Drinks and cocktails are available by the pool. Guests can dine in-room with room service.

name: Samui First House Hotel
address: 4 Moo 3 Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Located between Chaweng and Chaweng Noi beaches, Samui First House is just 1 km from Chaweng’s shopping and nightlife spots. It features a restaurant, an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi in the lobby area. Rooms at First House Samui feature wooden furnishings and large windows. Each room has cable TV and a minibar. Private bathrooms come with a bathtub and shower. Some rooms also have a private balcony with pool views. Guests can enjoy a relaxing massage. Safety deposit boxes are provided at the front desk. The hotel also has a tour desk, a minimart and an internet corner. Located beside the pool, the restaurant serves a selection of Thai and international dishes throughout the day. Drinks are available at the bar. Samui First House is approximately a 20-minute drive from Samui Airport. Samui Ferry Pier is about 33 km away.

name: Ammatara Pura Pool Villas
address: 128/75-76 Moo 3, T.Maret, Koh Samui 84310
description: This boutique resort features contemporary Thai villas with living area, kitchen and a balcony overlooking Lamai Beach. Offering free Wi-Fi, it houses a multi-cuisine restaurant with 24-hour room service and an outdoor pool with whirlpool. Fitted with tiled flooring, the spacious villas at Ammatara Pura feature classic and natural beige and brown interiors, decorated with influences from traditional Thai palaces and temples. Equipped with a dining area and a washing machine, they offer a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Each has a private pool. Situated on Ko Samui, Ammatara Pura is 20 km from Samui International Airport. It is an hour by flight from Bangkok City. Guests can play a game of table tennis or enjoy a soothing massage. The on-site tour desk can help arrange transport rentals and an airport shuttle service.

name: Samahita Retreat
address: Yoga Retreat (th) Co.,Ltd 55/20-24 Moo 4, Koh Samui 84140
description: Samahita Retreat offers a variety of yoga, fitness and wellness programs. Healthy buffet meals can also be enjoyed at the property. Located on the beach, this retreat features a salt water pool, restaurant and free WiFi. There is also an herbal steam room right by the pool. Set overlooking the garden, all rooms have air conditioning. A fridge and electric kettle is also included. The private bathrooms come with a shower and free towels. Other facilities offered include a children's playground, a fitness centre with sea views and on-site shops. Guests can relax at the beachfront lounge, meditate in the garden or have a drink at a coffee bar. The retreat also offers cooking classes at an additional cost. Laemsor Pagoda is 2.3 km from Samahita Retreat. Na Mueang Waterfall is at a distance of 6.5.km, while Samui Airport is 18 km away. Free parking is offered on site.

name: Centara Villas Samui
address: 111 Moo 2, Maret, Natien Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Centara Villas Samui is situated on Koh Samui, and offers 4-star accommodation as well as a private beach. There is also a fitness centre with a swimming pool. Guests of Centara Villas in Koh Samui can begin their day at SPA Cenvaree, or enjoy the many leisure facilities, including an outdoor pool. There is also free private parking on site for guests travelling with a car. The rooms are air conditioned and include a mini bar, a private balcony and tea and coffee making facilities. All offer an in-room safe and a telephone. Every morning, breakfast is available at Reef Café. In the evening, guests can relax in the comfortable lounge bar. The hotel is a short walk from Laem Set Beach, and an easy drive from Maret. It is also perfectly located close to a range of cafés and restaurants.Revato

name: Bhumlapa Garden Resort
address: 175/52 Moo1 Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Stretching over 3 acres of landscaped grounds, Bhumlapa Garden Resort offers standalone accommodation, a 5-minute walk from Bo Phut Beach. It features an outdoor pool, a spa, and free Wi-Fi. Overlooking the pool or surrounding tropical gardens, villas present an Oriental-style décor with flat-screen TVs, minibar and DVD players. Luxurious and decorated with artworks, they provide well-equipped kitchenettes with cooking facilities. The restaurant serves both Thai and European food. Meals can also be enjoyed in the comfort of guests’ villas. Local eateries are only a 5-minute walk from Bhumlapa Garden Resort. It offers a shuttle service from Koh Samui Airport, located a 10-minute drive away. Various water activities are available, including diving, snorkeling and fishing. Alternatively, enjoy relaxing massages at the spa.

name: Melati Beach Resort & Spa
address: 9/99 Moo 5, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Melati Beach Resort and Spa is situated on Koh Samui and offers 5-star facilities in addition to free Wi-Fi. Popular amenities, such as a swimming pool and a sauna, make for a satisfying stay in Bo Phut. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site spa and wellness centre, Melati Spa. It also includes family-friendly amenities, with room layouts and services for families both large and small, plus a kids pool and a kids club. It also has a fitness centre with a swimming pool. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with cable/satellite channels, a rain shower and a mini bar. All offer slippers, a flat-screen TV and tea and coffee making facilities. Those staying at Melati Beach Resort and Spa can indulge in a drink at See View Bar, after sampling a meal at The View Restaurant. A buffet breakfast is available each and every morning. Samui International Airport is a 10-minute drive from the resort. It is also a short drive from Chaweng and Maret.Revato

name: The Bay Samui
address: 6/14 Moo 5, Plailam Soi 7, Koh Samui 84320
description: Unwind in tranquil surroundings and comfortable accommodation with traditional Thai hospitality at Arayaburi Boutique Resort located in Koh Samui. Just a short stroll away from the white sands and blue waters of Samrong Bay, villas are decorated in a contemporary style with a Thai touch. They are also equipped with all the amenities needed for a pleasant stay. Kick-back and relax by the large swimming pool, which also has a children's section. For those looking for adventure, enquire with the helpful staff at the tour desk for day trips and activities. You can take part in diving, sea kayaking and a whole host of other water sports available. Other facilities include a fitness centre and Thai traditional massage that will leave you feeling rejuvenated. Once you've worked up an appetite, head on over to the sea view restaurant or bakery for some local delights or sweet treats.

name: Idyllic Samui Beach Villa Resort
address: 6/16 Moo 5, Ban Plai Laem, T. Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Idyllic Samui Beach Villa Resort at Samrong Bay is an ocean front resort, with direct access to the beach. Located on a peaceful area of Koh Samui, vibrant Chaweng Beach is accessible within a short 15-minute drive away with shuttle bus and taxi service provided by the property. Free WiFi is available. All villas have access to a private pool, and most villas have a children pool. All villas come with a private parking and tropical garden. Guests staying in the apartment and studio types can make use of a shared swimming pool. All room types come with an en suite kitchen, separate seating area and a dressing room. Cable TV, a DVD player and BBQ facilities are also available. Guests staying in the villas of Idyllic Samui Beach Villa Resort have access to barbecue facilities. Guests can request to have their massages in the villa or in front of the sea. Airport shuttle is provided. Idyllic Samui is 10 minutes by car from Fisherman Village where there are many restaurants and small shops. Samui Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Bo Phut Resort & Spa
address: 12/12 Moo 1, Tambol Bo Phut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Bo Phut Resort and Spa - SHA Plus is 8 minutes walk from the beach. Boasting Thai accommodation, Bo Phut Resort and Spa - SHA Plus offers outdoor pools and a golf course. Located on Bo Phut beach, the resort is about 1.5 km from the Fisherman's Village and 5 km from Samui International Airport. It offers airport transfers for convenience. All rooms and villas come with private balconies and windows with garden views. En suite bathrooms have separate shower and bathtub, while facilities like a satellite TV, DVDs and a CD player are provided for guests’ entertainment. Massages and other personalised spa treatments are also provided at Bo Phut Resort’s spa. Guests also have the luxury of a sauna and spa tub. Recreational activities include canoeing, and table tennis. Alternatively, there is a small library on site for a quiet day indoors. The restaurant offers local and international dishes. Cocktails and lights snacks are served by the pool or at the Beach Bar.

name: Prana Resort Nandana
address: 14/3 Moo 4, T. Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Prana Resort Nandana boasts a stunning beachside infinity pool and a second pool surrounded by shaded palms with a swim-up bar. It also features the Tropikana Beach Club & Bistro, a poolside café, rooftop spa, fitness centre, 24-hour reception with concierge, and free WiFi for all guests. Stylish, spacious air-conditioned rooms have private balconies or terraces with seating. All are equipped with a 42-inch flat-screen TV, tea/coffee making facilities, hairdryers, and a safety deposit box. Suites include a separate living area with sea views, while some rooms feature direct pool access or their own plunge pool. Additional services include a kid's club, meeting facilities, and an outdoor spa bath. Free on-site parking is provided and a shuttle can take guests to the city centre or Fisherman's Village. Prana Resorts Samui (SHA Certified) is a 10-minute drive from Samui Airport and a 3-minute drive from both Fisherman's Village and the Big Buddha. Chaweng Beach and Central Festival Samui are also a short drive away. Koh Phangan, with its monthly full moon party, is just 30 minutes by ferry from the nearby port. From personal beach bags and delicious candy treats to super comfy beds and fresh flowers, it’s the little touches that make a difference at Prana. Perfect for couples, singles, groups, and families — rated 8.5 for a two-person trip.

name: At Samui Haus
address: 58/15 Moo2 Lipanoi, Koh Samui 84140
description: Located in Lipa Noi, @Samui Haus is a beach front accommodation boasting an outdoor pool, a terrace and free bikes. Free WiFi access is available throughout the area. It is 1.1 km from Niki Beach Samui and 1.4 km from Racha Ferry Pier. Each air-conditioned unit comes with a cable TV, a safety deposit box and a seating area. Complete with an electric kettle, the dining area also has a refrigerator and a minibar. En suite bathroom is equipped with shower facilities, bathrobes and free toiletries. A bath tub is available in some units. For convenience, @Samui Haus can arrange ticketing, car hire and shuttle services. Other facilities include barbeque facilities, room service and massage. For outdoor enthusiasts, snorkeling, canoeing and cycling are available in the surroundings. This resort is 27 km from Chaweng Beach. Samui Airport is 30 km away. Guests can sample Thai and international cuisines at the on-site restaurant or enjoy special drinks and cocktails at the bar.

name: Kirati Beach Resort
address: 24/85 Moo 5 Tambol Bophut, Koh Samui District, Suratthani, Koh Samui 84320
description: Kirati Beach Resort is situated in the centre of Chengmon Beach, a 5-minute drive from Chaweng Beach and a 15-minute drive from Maenam beach. It offers massage services, a tour desk, and a 24-hour reception. Throughout the stay, guests can enjoy free WiFi. Surrounded by greenery, each air-conditioned room at Kirati Beach Resort comes with a private balcony. Room amenities include a TV, a fridge, and a safety deposit box. Kirati Beach Resort offers laundry services and car rental. Guests can enjoy quiet moments in the garden or on the terrace. The seaside restaurant serves fresh seafood dishes as well as Thai and international specialties. Alternatively, a range of dining outlets can be found within a 5-minute drive from this property. Kirati Beach Resort is a 10-minute drive from Samui Airport. Transfers can be arranged.

name: Seaview Paradise Mountain Holiday Villas Resort
address: 206/1 Moo 4, Lamai, Koh Samui 84310
description: Seaview Paradise Holiday Resort offers villas and rooms with stunning sea views. It also has accommodation in its Mountain Estate, which features an infinity edge pool. Mountain Villas are perched 150 metres above beautiful Lamai. The spacious air-conditioned villas come with a balcony, living room and kitchen. They are furnished with satellite TV, a DVD player and a minibar. Guests can arrange a day trip at the front desk, or arrange babysitting services at the concierge. The hotel also provides an airport shuttle and laundry services. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Silver Beach, Sunday Lamai Night Market and Wat Lamai Folklore Museum. The nearest airport is Samui International, 11.8 km from Seaview Paradise Mountain Holiday Villas Resort.

name: Conrad Koh Samui Residences
address: 49/8-9 Moo 4 Hillcrest Road, Koh Samui 84140
description: Conrad Koh Samui Residences are situated within Conrad Koh Samui Resort & Spa on Thailand's third largest island, Koh Samui, surrounded by the azure waters of the Gulf of Thailand. The idyllic luxury resort island is highly accessible from key gateway cities in Southeast Asia and only a 60-minute flight from Bangkok. Located on the south-western tip of the island, the residences showcase dazzling sunset views from all 15 of its two- and three-bedroom Oceanview Pool Villas. These deluxe villas are set over two levels. Separate living and dining rooms with kitchenette are located on the upper level, and bedrooms, private pool and outdoor deck are on the lower level. The villas are perfect for families and friends who wish to share the ultimate vacation experience. The 25-acre property consists entirely of beautifully decorated, free-standing contemporary Thai-style villas built along the rocky peninsula to ensure the greatest level of privacy and unobstructed ocean views. Conrad's array of world-class facilities cater to every need - from incredible culinary delights at three restaurants, two lounges and bar, private wine cellar and in-villa dining experience to beach-side activities and water sports – and enable guests to keep to their routines, discover new experiences, or just relax at the award-winning spa. Young families will be delighted with the large, infinity-edge main pool with an ocean view, and the Kid's Club, which also offers babysitting services and fun activities. Guests will find basic items at the resort shop. For those who wish to shop for local goods, the DoiTung Lifestyle Shop sells Thai handicrafts and momentos made by hilltribe people in the north of Thailand. Conrad Koh Samui Residences is an ideal choice for conferences, intimate meetings and celebrations. From spectacular gala events to informal celebrations or a private beachfront wedding, the resort offers a unique variety of indoor and outdoor locations to create the wedding of your dreams.Hilton

name: Adarin Beach Resort
address: 18/1 Maemam Beach, Koh Samui 84330
description: Standing along the shores of Koh Samui, Adarin Beach Resort enjoys scenic views of Koh Phangan and offers guests spacious suites and villas. Adarin Beach Resort is located on Koh Samui’s Mae Nam Beach, a stretch of unspoiled white, sandy beach that is almost six kilometres long. The crystal clear water next to Adarin Beach Resort is perfect for snorkelling, diving and fishing. A cool breeze can be enjoyed on the beach all day long. Decorated with Thai-style furnishings, each suite and villa is spacious, bright and airy. Some villas are located on the beachfront, with the sea right at their doorsteps. Other suites and villas are set in a rich, tropical garden, offering you a natural and peaceful setting. From Thai dishes and seafood specialities to Mediterranean and European creations, Adarin Beach Resort’s restaurant offers a wide range cuisine. Dine on the beach under the blue sky or enjoy a romantic candlelight dinner under the stars.

name: Kirikayan Boutique Resort
address: 88/8 Moo 3 Bophut, Chaweng, Koh Samui 84320
description: Situated in the countryside, Kirikayan Boutique Resort is just a short drive from Samui Crocodile Farm. Featuring beach views, 4-star rooms and a private beach, it provides a superb setting for a luxurious retreat. Kirikayan Boutique Resort provides a wide range of state-of-the-art amenities, including free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. It provides babysitting services, a currency exchange and a reception that operates 24/7. This hotel provides rooms with an en suite bathroom, air conditioning and a TV. They all include an in-room safe, slippers and a seating area. Those staying at Kirikayan can dine on local and international cuisines at the in-house restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. Breakfast is available each morning and can be enjoyed in the comfort of the rooms. A variety of dining options can also be found nearby. Samui International Airport is a 10-minute drive from Kirikayan Boutique Resort Koh Samui. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Chaweng.Revato

name: Banana Fan Sea Resort
address: 201 Moo 2, Chaweng Beach Road, Koh Samui 84320
description: Banana Fan Sea Resort is located on the tranquil southern tip of Chaweng Beach, within a stroll of its entertainment and shopping spots. The resort provides well-appointed rooms, an outdoor pool with hot tub and free Wi-Fi. Each air-conditioned room comes with satellite TV, a mini bar and coffee/tea making facilities. They have an en suite bathroom, large mirrors and toiletries. Guests can enjoy a traditional Thai massage outdoors, by the pool and on the beach, or in the comfort of their rooms. For an exciting day outdoors, visit the many sports centre offering diving and boating trips, located along the beach. Banana Fan’s beachfront Baitong Restaurant offers an open-air dining concept and serves both local and international dishes. Room service is available. Banana Fan Sea Resort is a 15-minute drive from Samui Airport. Bo Phut Pier is about 5 km from the resort.

name: The Sarann
address: 95-96 Moo 3, Chaweng Noi Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Nestled on the tip of Koh Samuis pristine Chaweng Noi beach, The Sarann is an intimate oceanfront villa resort offering a distinctive level of relaxation and luxury. The name 'The Sarann' refers to a state of mind where all worries drift away and one's spirit is at peace. A stones throw from Koh Samuis main dining and nightlife area, and just 20 minutes from the airport, the resort offers a beautiful balance between quiet and convenience.iHotelier/iStay

name: Fair House Villas & Spa
address: 39 Moo 1, Maenam, Koh Samui 84330
description: A tropical and relaxing getaway along Mae Nam Beach can be enjoyed at Fair House Villas & Spa, Koh Samui. Aside from a private beach, it has an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi throughout the property. A chargeable airport shuttle is also available upon request. Fair House Villas & Spa is 10 km from Koh Samui’s city centre and Chaweng Beach. Samui Airport is 15 km from the resort. Spacious and elegant, rooms feature classic wooden furnishings and floor-to-ceiling windows which let in natural light. A cable TV and minibar are included in all rooms. Some come with ocean views. Lazy afternoons can be spent at Pandanus Spa with its relaxing massage therapies. With panoramic views of the ocean, the fitness centre provides a refreshing setting to exercise. Delicious Thai and European dishes are served at the resort’s restaurant. Every night, a special barbecue dinner with fresh seafood is available.

name: Homm Chura Samui
address: 99/9 Moo 2 Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Featuring a beach area, Chura Samui boasts relaxing massage treatments and a white marble infinity pool overlooking Chaweng Beach. This hotel offers free WiFi in all areas. Decorated in earth tones, the contemporary air-conditioned rooms overlook the tropical garden and feature a lounge area. A flat-screen TV and DVD player are provided. Private bathrooms feature double sinks. Chura Samui is a 5-minute drive from bars and restaurants and a 10-minute drive from Samui International Airport. For meals, fresh seafood awaits guests at this property. Alternatively, sip on a cocktail whilst enjoying views and refreshing sea breeze at the bar. Guests can have breakfast, prepared to order, and served at KAN Restaurant. Guests may exercise in the gym or make travel arrangements at the tour desk.

name: The Lamai Samui
address: 146/24 Moo4 Lamai Beach, Koh Samui 84310
description: The Lamai Samui is situated on Koh Samui, and provides 5-star accommodation as well as a private beach. Boasting views of Gulf of Thailand (Thailand), it also offers a wide range of facilities, including complimentary Wi-Fi, private parking and an outdoor pool. This luxury hotel provides a gym, a concierge and a 24-hour reception. Forming part of the hotel are the beautifully manicured grounds, designed for taking a relaxing walk. The rooms at The Lamai Samui are air-conditioned and offer slippers, a refrigerator and a mini bar. They come with bottled water, an in-room safe and tea and coffee making facilities. The Lamai Samui provides a variety of places to have a meal, including The Plate and The Lounge. There is a range of breakfast options on offer every morning. The hotel is an ideal place to discover nearby Koh Taen and Chaweng Noi Beach, as well as everything the local area has to offer. Chaweng and Bo Phut are also a brief car ride from the property.Revato

name: Celes Samui
address: 175/3 Thaveerat-Pakdee Road, Koh Samui 84320
description: Admirably located right next to the beach, Celes BeachFront Resort - Koh Samui offers stylish accommodation. The resort building is designed to allow natural light in the lobby area. The outdoor pool directly faces a panoramic view of the sea and has comfortable relaxing areas and shades. Guests can enjoy drinks at the poolside bar. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and free private parking is offered on site. With a private balcony overlooking the refreshing views, all spacious rooms at this property feature an air conditioning and wooden floor. Each room provides a seating area for guests to relax in and a flat-screen TV to enjoy. Extras include an electric kettle, complimentary coffee/tea and bottles of water. The en suite bathroom comes with a shower and premium amenities. Guests can indulge in pampering spa treatments or work out at the fitness centre. Staff are 24-hour available at the front desk. Surcharged airport shuttle service can be arranged upon request. Fisherman Village is 2.2 km from the property, while Bo Phut Pier is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Samui Airport, 8 km from Celes BeachFront Resort - Koh Samui.

name: Cielo Boutique Hotel & Spa Samui
address: 180/5 Moo1, Koh Samui, Suratthani, Koh Samui 84320
description: Located right on Bophut Beach, Cielo Boutique Hotel & Spa Samui - SHA Extra Plus is a 5-minute drive from Fisherman’s Village. It offers non-smoking modern suites and villas with private terraces and pools and free Wi-Fi. The property features a pool, tour desk and massage service. Free public parking is possible on site. We also have a brand new beach restaurant proposing Mediterranean & Asian organic homemade food. You'll also enjoy a brand new yoga hub. The property is a 15-minute drive from Chaweng Centre and Samui Airport. It is a 30-minute drive to Lamai Beach. Suites are fitted with a minibar and safety deposit box. Free toiletries and shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. For guests’ convenience, the property provides car rental and shuttle services. Laundry and daily maid service are available. Koh-Co Beach is a 100% Seafood restaurant supplied by local producers. Our menu offers a mix between Asian & Mediterranean flavors. Payments by Credit Cards are subjected to a 3% fee.

name: Anahata Resort
address: 95/70 Moo 2, Lipa Noi, Koh Samui 84140
description: Anahata Resort is located on Lipa Noi Beach on the western coast of Koh Samui. This Eco-friendly, traditional Thai tropical beachfront hideaway boasts 2 accommodation areas, connected by a beach front path. All guests rooms are air-conditioned and include a tea/coffee maker. Free drinking water is available throughout your stay when you purchase the Trash Hero bottle or if you have your own recyclable bottle. Guests staying at Anahata Resort can enjoy traditional Thai massages and spa treatments at a pavilion by the beach or in the indoor treatment rooms, with experienced therapists and products that are chemical free. You can watch the the sunset, at the beachfront restaurant, Alchemy Cafe and Juice Bar, which offers an extensive selection of raw, vegan, vegetarian and healthy Flexitarian Thai and fusion foods. The property selects local, natural and organic ingredients to create delicious and nutritious dishes. Many of the ingredients used are grown in the properties garden. The helpful staff can also provide assistance in motorbike and car rentals. For those looking for more activities, the on-site tour desk can arrange day trips and other activities. Yoga classes and group activities on site are available at an additional charge. Anahata Resort is just steps away from Niki Beach Samui. The resort is a short 10-minute drive from Lipa Noi Pier and a 15-minute ride from Nathon Town. Samui Airport is approximately 29 km away.

name: Sea Valley Resort
address: 123/3 Moo 2 Lipa Noi, Koh Samui, Suratthani, Koh Samui 84140
description: Overlooking the sandy shores of Lipa Noi Beach, Sea Valley Resort offer private air-conditioned villas and most with a private pool. Apart from its sea-front outdoor pool, the hotel also provides pampering spa services. Hiding behind landscaped gardens, villas feature a private terrace which enjoys beautiful sunset views. Fitted with wooden flooring and free Wi-Fi, Free Netflix in all the rooms, DVD player and a lounge area. En suite bathrooms come with glass roofs and hot-water showers. Located opposite popular Chaweng Beach, Hotel Sea Valley & Spa is a 5-minute drive from the white sands of Nathon Beach and a 45-minute drive from Samui Airport. Staff at the tour desk can help arrange trekking and diving trips, where guests can explore the natural beauty of Koh Samui. Alternatively, traditional Thai massages can be enjoyed at the spa. Overlooking the beach, Sea Valley’s restaurant offers an intimate dining experience at its outdoor seating area. After meals, relax with a cocktail and sports programmes at the bar.

name: Zazen Boutique Resort & Spa
address: 177 Moo 1, Bophut Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: The award-winning Zazen Boutique Resort & Spa, which means "finding inner peace" in Japanese, is located on a private beachfront on Bo Phut Beach. This peaceful sanctuary features an outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi and 3 dining options. The luxurious non-smoking bungalows and villas feature modern Thai decor, high ceilings and large living spaces. All are equipped with a flat-screen TV, DVD player and an open-air bathroom with a rainshower. Zazen Boutique Resort & Spa is about a 15-minute walk from Fisherman Village. The resort provides free parking and is a 10-minute drive from the Big Buddha Temple. Guests can relax with a massage at the garden spa, take a yoga class or go windsurfing. A hot tub and water sports facilities are also available. Travel and sightseeing arrangements can be made at the tour desk. Thai and international dishes can be enjoyed at the beachfront Zazen Restaurant. Refreshing cocktails are offered at Rouge Lounge, while Le Salon de Ti serves high tea.

name: Am Samui Resort Taling Ngam
address: 39 Moo 3, Tambon Taling Ngam, Koh Samui 84140
description: This tropical Thai-style beach resort features an outdoor pool and a private beach. It offers a range of bungalows with free Wi-Fi and beautiful views of the garden or sea. Relaxing Thai massage is also available. Fully air-conditioned, bungalows at Am Samui Resort all come with a satellite TV, minibar and personal safe. A private balcony and private bathroom are provided. Am Samui Resort is a 45-minute drive from Chaweng Beach. Transfers to the airport are available at an extra charge. Guests can arrange day trips at the tour desk, or request for room service. The resort also provides laundry and ironing services. Thai cuisine and fresh seafood are served at the resort's restaurant. Refreshing cocktails accompanied by colourful sunset views can be enjoyed at the bar.

name: Mimosa Resort & Spa
address: 32/2 Moo 5, Maenam, Koh Samui 84330
description: Mimosa Resort is located along Baan Tai Beach, about 11 km from Samui Airport. The resort offers a peaceful retreat away from the city, free Wi-Fi and an infinity pool. Rooms at Resort Mimosa feature traditional décor and come with private balconies. A flat-screen satellite TV, DVD player and minibar are included. The Mimosa Spa & Wellness Centre offers massage and beauty treatments. Activities include canoeing, cycling and snorkelling. A quiet library is provided for guests. The resort also has a garden where guests can take a leisure stroll. The hotel’s beachfront restaurant serves Thai, Asian and Western food. Guests can enjoy a refreshing drink or cocktail by the bar with views of the sea. Mimosa Resort is about 3.5 km from Maenam Pier, where speedboats heading to Koh Phangan and Koh Tao are available.

name: The Beach Samui
address: 30/23 Moo 5, Thong Krut Village, Koh Samui 84140
description: Ideally located in the Taling Ngam area, The Beach Samui promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. To be found at the property are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as flat screen television, clothes rack, complimentary instant coffee, free welcome drink, linens. Entertain yourself with the property's recreational facilities, including outdoor pool, massage. Convenience and comfort make The Beach Samui the perfect choice for your stay in Samui.priceline.com

name: Nikki Beach Resort & Spa
address: 96/3 Moo 2, Lipa Noi, Koh Samui 84140
description: Steps from Lipa Noi’s beautiful sunset coast, the luxurious Nikki Beach Resort & Spa offers relaxing stays with an exclusive beachfront and modern bungalows. This chic boutique resort features a beachfront pool, fitness facilities and soothing massages. A short drive from various attractions, Nikki Beach Resort & Spa is 15 km from Nathon Pier and 10 km from beautiful Namuang Waterfall. It offers free parking and is a 45-minute drive from Samui Airport. Featuring tasteful dark wood furnishings, bungalows open out to sweeping views of Thailand’s Gulf or tropical greenery. They have a 42-inch flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Lazy afternoons can be spent on day beds by the landscaped pool or with a soothing massage in the outdoor pavilion. Staff are on hand to help coordinate daily activities and tours. The spa centre offers a copious variety of treatments ranging from body massages, scrubs, facials and steam room sessions. Tropical garden views accompany seafood, Thai and international specialities at Nikki’s restaurant. After-meal drinks and signature cocktails can be enjoyed at the bar, which features a DJ and Nikki Beach’s signature brand of music and entertainment.

name: Hansar Samui Resort & Spa
address: 101/28 Moo1, Koh Samui 84320
description: Located on Bophut Beach, Hansar Samui features sea view rooms. Less than 500 metres away from Fisherman’s Village, it also offers dining outlets, a fitness centre and an infinity pool. The resort’s spacious rooms feature handmade furniture, wooden floors and stone basins. Each room has a living area with a daybed. Modern amenities include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and free WiFi access. Hansar Samui’s H-Bistro serves local and Western dishes and seafood. To sip drinks with views of the sea, guests can head to the resort’s Pool and Beach Bar or the Chill Lounge. Guests of Hansar Samui can work out at the fitness centre or enjoy body treatments at the spa. A tour desk can assist with travel and sightseeing arrangements. Hansar Samui Resort & Spa is a 10-minute drive from Koh Samui Airport.

name: Chaba Samui Resort
address: 19 Chaweng Beach Road, Bo Put, Koh Samui 84320
description: Chaba Samui Resort is situated on Koh Samui, and offers 3.5-star facilities, including a private beach. This modern resort also features free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool, and is within easy driving distance of Bo Phut and Maret. Chaba Samui Resort has a gym with a swimming pool. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. Chaba Samui Resort provides 93 air conditioned rooms equipped with all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. Each has a bathroom that offers a shower and bathrobes. Chaba Samui Resort's in-house restaurant provides Thai-inspired meals, which can enjoyed on the terrace. Alternatively, there are a variety of other eating options nearby. Samui International Airport is within a 10-minute drive of Chaba Samui Resort, as is Chaweng Noi Beach. Lamai Beach and Wat Phra Yai are just a short car ride from the resort.Revato

name: The Privilege Hotel Ezra Beach Club
address: 5/1 Moo 4, Bangrak Beach, Koh Samui 84310
description: Located in Bangrak Beach, 1.7 km from Big Buddha, The Privilege Hotel Ezra Beach Club features an outdoor pool and sun terrace. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. The popular Fisherman's Village is a 5-minute drive away. All fully furnished rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Some units include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Views of the sea, pool or garden are featured in certain rooms. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. This hotel has a secluded beach area and car hire is available. A range of activities are offered in the area, such as snorkelling and diving. The Chaweng Beach area is a 15-minute drive away, while Samui Airport is is a 10-minute drive from the property.

name: New Star Beach Resort
address: 83 Moo 3 Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Situated on Chaweng Beach in Koh Samui, New Star Beach Resort offers luxurious beachfront accommodation. It features an infinity-edge pool and 2 dining options. Free parking is provided. Rooms and villas are decorated in a tropical style with wooden furnishings. Each room has a private balcony, TV and minibar. Treat yourself to a massage at Akiira Spa, or go on a dive trip or an elephant trek. Other facilities include laundry service and car rental. Breakfast buffet is served at Lime Restaurant, which offers indoor and al fresco seating. Sip afternoon tea at the Lobby Lounge or arrange for a meal by the pool. New Star Beach Resort is a 15-minute drive from Samui Airport.

name: Thai Fight Hotel
address: 26/1-3 moo3 Tambol Maret Lamai Beach, Koh samui, Koh Samui 84310
description: Situated in Lamai, 200 metres from Rocky's Beach, Thai Fight Hotel features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting room service, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and a terrace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Thai Fight Hotel the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an Asian breakfast. Thai Fight Hotel offers 4-star accommodation with a hot tub. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Lamai Beach, Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks and Lamai Viewpoint. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 14 km from Thai Fight Hotel.

name: Samaya Bura Beach Resort - Koh Samui
address: 171/4-9 Moo 4, Lamai, T Maret, Koh Samui 84310
description: The 3.5-star Samaya Bura Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Samui. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, babysitting. Television LCD/plasma screen, slippers, towels, umbrella, separate living room can be found in selected guestrooms. Access to the hotel's hot tub, fitness center, outdoor pool, pool (kids), garden will further enhance your satisfying stay. Discover all Samui has to offer by making Samaya Bura Hotel your base.Agoda

name: Buri Rasa Village Samui
address: 11/2 Moo 2 Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui 00000
description: Located northwest of Koh Samui on the beachfront of Chaweng Beach, Buri Rasa Village offers an outdoor pool, spa and a hot tub. Rooms feature a private terrace and free Wi-Fi. Buri Rasa's spacious rooms are of a blend of traditional Thai decor with modern facilities. It provides a private bathroom, four-poster bed and cable TV with DVD player. Tea/coffee maker and a minibar are provided. Guests can enjoy a beach side dining at the Beach Club @ Buri Rasa. The lobby and beach bars serve drinks. For relaxation, guests can have traditional Thai herbal spa and therapy or soak up the sun at the outdoor pool or Chaweng Beach. Buri Rasa Village offers airport shuttle and car rental services. Parking is free. Buri Rasa Village is a 15-minute drive from Samui Airport.

name: Beyond Samui
address: 20 Moo 2 Chaweng Chongmon Road, Koh Samui 84320
description: Set in Choeng Mon Beach, 300 metres from Chaweng Beach, Beyond Samui offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, this 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. All guest rooms come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a wardrobe. An American breakfast is available every morning at the hotel. Big Buddha is 4.4 km from Beyond Samui, while Fisherman Village is 6.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 2 km from the accommodation.

name: The Ritz-Carlton Koh Samui
address: 9/123 Moo 5, Tambon Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Surrounded by the crystal-clear waters of the Gulf of Thailand, our Koh Samui resort is located in a world-renowned island paradise that boasts turquoise waters and perfect beaches with a more laidback and authentic lifestyle. The Ritz-Carlton, Koh Samui - nestled within the private bay at the island’s northern tip and set in a 58 acres of a former coconut plantation – features a variety of suites and private pool villas that suit every guest's needs. It is perfect for wellbeing and leisure with its unique facilities, guest activities and experiences embracing the southern Thai culture and tradition within the resort. Highlights at our Koh Samui 5-star hotel include Muay Thai boxing classes, local-inspired treatment at Spa Village Koh Samui and a vibrant culinary journey at restaurants and bars as well as southern Thai cooking classes.Marriott

name: Samujana Villas
address: 63/154 Moo 5, Baan Plai Laem, Koh Samui 84320
description: Samujana Villas is located on Koh Samui, and offers 5-star facilities, including a private beach, an infinity pool and a butler service. It has a gym, as well as outdoor tennis courts, free Wi-Fi and a private cinema. The property provides a garden to unwind in, as well as free private parking on site. It offers body treatments and a sun deck, as well as fitness classes. All the villas at Samujana Villas include direct pool access, plus all the essentials for an enjoyable stay. They are air conditioned and offer a marble bathroom, a coffee maker and a private garden. A mini bar, a private terrace and a private balcony are also provided to guests. Samujana Villas has easy access to Choeng Mon Beach. Those wanting to explore the area can also visit Chaweng, located within an easy drive of the property.Revato

name: The Fair House Beach Resort & Hotel
address: 124-124/1-2 Moo 3, Bo Put, Koh Samui 84320
description: Sitting on Chaweng Noi Beach, Fair House Beach Resort & Hotel boasts a spa pavilion and free WiFi. It has a beachfront freshwater swimming pool and another pool with tropical theme located on a hill. Fair House Beach Resort is located 8 km from Samui Airport and 25 km from Nathorn Pier. The hotel provides car and bike rental facilities, making trips to tourist attractions easy. Airport shuttle service can be arranged at an additional cost. Rooms are elegantly decorated in Contemporary Thai design and all feature private balconies. They are equipped with a satellite TV, minibar and fridge. A hairdryer is also provided. Some rooms offer views of tropical gardens or the ocean. Guests can enjoy Thai and European dishes at the Sea Paint beach-side restaurant, or sip drinks at the Rim Lay Bar. Room service is available. The resort offers traditional Thai massages at the Sala Spa. There are also lounge chairs along the beach for guests who wish to soak up the sun while admiring the ocean.

name: Samui Paradise Chaweng Beach Resort & Spa
address: 49 Moo 3, Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Samui Paradise offers luxurious suites and villas with private terraces on a quiet strip of Koh Samui. The beachfront resort features an outdoor pool with 2 spa baths, a spa and 2 restaurants. Chaweng Centre is located just 500 metres from Samui Paradise Chaweng Beach Resort, SHA Plus. It is a 20-minute drive from Koh Samui Airport and 6 km from Lamai Beach. Rooms are charming with wooden flooring and furnishings. They enjoy great views of the sea or tropical gardens. All accommodation comes with free bottled water, cable TV and a minibar, while select rooms have a private outdoor spa bath. Guests can enjoy traditional Thai massages and body treatments at the resort’s spa or enjoy the sun on the many lounge chairs located throughout the property. For a quiet day, enjoy Wi-Fi in rooms. Fresh seafood, Thai and international cuisines are served at Paradise Restaurant, which boasts spectacular views of Chaweng Bay. Papa Sam’s Bar offers cocktails and chilled beer along the beach.

name: Monsane River Kwai Resort & Spa
address: 27/2 M.2 Sangchoto Road, Kanchanaburi 71000
description: Surrounded by lush mountains and the beautiful River Kwai, Monsane Resort provides a peaceful retreat from the city with affordable accommodation, charming service and a relaxing spa. Monsane River Kwai Resort & Spa is situated on a beautiful peninsula in the Kanchanaburi Province, 2 hours away from Bangkok. Rooms at Monsane River Kwai are cosy and are decorated in a contemporary style with a touch of Thai. They are also fitted with ample workspace, television and en-suite bathroom. Relax with a swim in the outdoor pool, which overlooks the river or pamper yourself with a spa treatment and massage. For those more adventurous, have fun kayaking or jet-skiing. You can also explore the historical sites of the province by speedboat. Enjoy a sunset dinner as you overlook the river when dining at the Sky River Restaurant or have fun at Monsane's pub and karaoke restaurant. You can also unwind at Rabeangnam bar with a cool drink and amazing views.

name: Wora Bura Hua Hin Resort And Spa
address: 83/199 Soi Talay 12, Nonggare-Khao, Hua Hin 77110
description: Wora Bura offers spacious rooms with LCD TVs, a large free-form pool with a hot tub, and 5 restaurants and bars. It is 75 metres from Hua Hin's beaches along the Siam Gulf. Guests enjoy a herbal welcome drink and fruits upon arrival. A 5-minute walk from Cicada Night Market, Wora Bura Hua Hin Resort & Spa - SHA Plus PLUS consist of low-rise buildings of Thai-Colonial style surrounding the outdoor pool and garden. The resort is 50 metres from Jedeeluang Temple and 70 metres from Walking Street. It is 100 metres from Way Prasri. Guests have a selection of luxurious rooms and villas that feature spectacular views of the outdoor landscape from private balconies. Guests can relax at the resort's Wora Spa, which offers an extensive spa menu, and children can play at the kid's club. Shuttle bus transfers heading to Hua Hin town are provided as per hotel's schedule. Boasting both outdoor and indoor seating areas, Chulamongkut Restaurant offers international buffet breakfast and mount-watering dishes from around the world. Rak Talay restaurant serves delectable dinner, such as homemade pasta and grilled seafood, at open-air terraces with panoramic views of the Hua Hin Bay as a background. A light lunch menu and refreshments are provided at The Chonlamark Pool Bar set in a tropical surrounding at the resort's curved pool.

name: Rawi Warin Resort and Spa
address: 139 Moo 8, Ko Lanta 81150
description: Rawi Warin Resort And Spa - SHA Extra Plus offers 5-star luxury with 4 large outdoor pools, fitness centre. Boasting 5 dining options, it offers stunning views of Klong Tob Bay. Featuring spacious layouts and private balconies, modern Thai-style rooms have fine wood furnishings and flooring. They are fitted with cable TV. A fridge and tea/coffee making amenities are provided. For relaxation, there is a library and games room with numerous facilities. Leisure activities can be planned at the tour desk. Specialising in seafood dishes, The Watermark offers diners a memorable outdoor dining experience. Hearty breakfasts and international dishes are available at The Golden Pond. The Wave Bar serves light refreshments. Rawi Warin Resort And Spa - SHA Extra Plus is a 2-hour car and ferry transfer from Krabi Airport. From Krabi Airport, it is about an hour’s flight from Suvarnabhumi International Airport.

name: Dusit Thani Pattaya
address: 240/2 Pattaya Beach Road, Pattaya 20150
description: Located in Pattaya, Dusit Thani Pattaya offers relaxed 5-star accommodation, as well as an outdoor heated pool, a private beach and outdoor tennis courts. Guests also have exclusive access to the Devarana Spa and DFIT and Wellness Facilities. Dusit Thani offers free wireless internet, as well as a garden for guests to relax in. The hotel's amenities, such as meeting rooms, executive floor and photocopier, kids pool, kids club and playground, and massage make this an ideal choice for business travellers, families and couples alike. The rooms at Dusit Thani in Pattaya are air-conditioned and include slippers, a mini bar and a refrigerator. They come with an in-room safe, a flat-screen TV and a telephone. Dusit Thani Pattaya Hotel provides a range of places to have a meal, including Cascade and The Lobby Lounge. Places to dine at the hotel include Dusit Gourmet and The Bay Restaurant. Guests can also enjoy a drink at Chaba Pool Bar. Dusit Thani Pattaya Resort is located in the heart of Pattaya’s entertainment district with restaurants, cafés and nightlife on the doorstep. The hotel's multilingual staff will ensure that every guest has an enjoyable visit.Revato

name: The Yana Villas Hua Hin
address: 122/138 Soi Mooban Takieb, Nongkae, Hua Hin
description: Located in Hua Hin, a few steps from Khao Takiab Beach, The Yana Villas Hua Hin provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a terrace and a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. Guest rooms at the resort come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Each room has a kettle, while selected rooms come with a patio and others also offer sea views. The units will provide guests with a fridge. A continental, American or Asian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near The Yana Villas Hua Hin include Hua Hin Beach, Khao Takiap Temple and Cicada Market. The nearest airport is Hua Hin Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Intercontinental Hua Hin Resort, An IHG Hotel
address: 33/33 Petchkasem Road, Hua Hin 77110
description: InterContinental Hua Hin Resort blends Eastern and Western design heritage set alongside sparkling gulf waters for a truly alluring destination. Two accommodation wings feature spacious rooms and suites as well as a swimming pool at each wing. Facilities and amenities include a spa, a fitness centre, versatile event spaces and wide-ranging food and drink venues. Club InterContinental accommodation level, meanwhile, provides guests with more benefits and highly personalised service.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Rest Detail Hotel Hua Hin
address: 19/119 Soi Hua Hin 19, Hua Hin 77110
description: Overlooking the Gulf of Siam, Rest Detail offers relaxing stays in chic beachfront accommodation with free Wi-Fi. Featuring a spa, it features a sparkling turquoise pool that meets the beach. Offering modern décor with colourful touches, spacious rooms fresh white linen and classic furnishings. In-room comforts include a flat-screen cable TV, DVD player and electric kettle. An en suite bathroom comes with bathtub and separate shower. Just 5 km from Hua Hin Airport, Rest Detail Hotel Hua Hin is within a 15-minute walk from Hua Hin Night Market. It provides airport transfers and free parking. Pampering massages and beauty treatments await at Restfully Yours Spa. Alternatively, guests can go on hiking and cycling trips with the travel services available. Featuring buffet breakfast in a garden setting, pool views accompany Thai and Mediterranean dishes at the hotel’s restaurant.

name: Anantasila Beach Resort Hua Hin
address: 33/17 Soi Mooban Huadon, Petchasem Road, Hua Hin 77110
description: A lovely beachfront property just outside Hua Hin Town, Anantasila Beach Resort Hua Hin offers a relaxing getaway with an outdoor pool and sea-facing restaurant. Rooms and villas are nestled amidst tropical gardens. Decorated with Thai-style furnishings and beddings, Anantasila’s rooms feature floor-to-ceiling windows with views of surrounding greenery. Each room comes with cable TV, a DVD player and a safety deposit box. Private bathrooms have a bathtub and shower. Guests can play a round of mini golf, or relax on the sun loungers provided on the beach. Massages can be enjoyed on the beach, by the pool, or in the privacy of guests’ rooms. Beach views accompany meals at the restaurant, which serves Thai, Western and Italian specialities. Cocktails are available at the beach bar. Anantasila Villa is a 15-minute drive from Hua Hin’s town centre. It provides a free shuttle to a bus stop where guests can catch a minibus to the town centre.

name: Layana Resort & Spa
address: 272 Moo 3 Saladan, Ko Lanta 81150
description: Layana Resort and Spa is located in Ko Lanta and offers free Wi-Fi. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Linger Longer Spa and Wellness Pool. Guests staying at Layana Resort and Spa can enjoy taking a dip in the outdoor pool, working out in the fitness centre or unwinding with a drink in the bar. Guests can try out the recreational facilities on offer, such as a sauna and a playground. There is also free private parking on site for those travelling with a car. Each room is equipped with an iPod docking station, a mini bar and a refrigerator. All are air conditioned and provide slippers, an in-room dining area and a flat-screen TV. Layana Resort houses Seasky, which serves breakfast, lunch and dinner and provides guests with all they need for an enjoyable night within the resort. Located within a short walk of Layana Resort And Spa Koh Lanta is Serenity Massage and Spa. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Ko Lanta.Revato

name: The Cabin Beach Resort
address: 130/63, Moo 6, Leela Coco Beach, Ko Pha Ngan 84280
description: Situated along the secluded Leela Beach on Koh Phangan, The Cabin Beach Resort offers beachfront accommodation decorated with an industrial loft theme. Free WiFi is available throughout. All rooms are fully furnished and come with air conditioning, a seating area and a TV. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower, complimentary toiletries and a hairdryer. Cabin Beach Resort is about 700 metres away from Haad Rin Beach where the famous Full Moon Party takes place. The property also offers a free pick-up service from Haad Rin Pier, which is about 1 km away.

name: Santhiya Tree Koh Chang Resort
address: 8/15 Moo 4, Klong Prao Beach, Ko Chang 23170
description: Santhiya Tree Koh Chang Resort is set on Ko Chang and provides 4-star facilities in addition to free Wi-Fi. There is also a fitness centre with a swimming pool. This traditional resort provides a kids pool, porters and valet parking. Additionally, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide local information. Guests can also enjoy ocean views from the property's day spa. The rooms are air conditioned and include a mini bar, a refrigerator and a coffee maker. They each offer a private bathroom, an in-room safe and slippers. Guests of Santhiya Tree Koh Chang Resort are invited to experience international and Thai cuisine at Chantara Restaurant, or try Thai and international meals at By The Sea Restaurant and Bar. In the evening, guests can relax in the lounge bar. Santhiya Tree Koh Chang Resort provides an ideal place to discover nearby Lonely Beach, as well as everything the local area has to offer. It also borders Mu Ko Chang National Park.Revato

name: Mai Holiday by Mai Khao Lak
address: 9/17 Petchkasem Rd., Moo 1 Kuk Kak, Khao Lak 82190
description: Situated in Khao Lak, 2.8 km from Bang Sak Beach, Mai Holiday by Mai Khaolak - Adult Zone features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting room service, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and luggage storage for guests. The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The units will provide guests with a desk and a kettle. An American breakfast is available each morning at Mai Holiday by Mai Khaolak - Adult Zone. You can play table tennis and tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for canoeing. Tsunami Memorial - Rue Tor 813 is 20 km from the accommodation, while Sairung Waterfall is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 91 km from Mai Holiday by Mai Khaolak - Adult Zone.

name: SYLVAN Koh Chang
address: 63 Moo 4 Koh Chang, Ko Chang
description: SYLVAN Koh Chang is situated on Ko Chang, and offers 5-star accommodation in addition to a private beach. Guests also have exclusive access to the Rainforest Spa and Swimming Pool. Those staying at the resort can begin their day at Kids Area, or use the various leisure amenities, including an outdoor pool. There is also free public parking on site for guests travelling with a car. A kids club, a kids pool and free Wi-Fi are also available. The rooms at SYLVAN Koh Chang are air-conditioned and offer a mini bar, a coffee maker and a refrigerator. Each includes a private bathroom with slippers, bathrobes and a shower. Guests of the resort can wake up to breakfast daily at Sunset Restaurant, plus dinner at Sea View 1989 in the evening. For those wishing to dine out during their stay at SYLVAN Koh Chang, there are a selection of restaurants located nearby. It is conveniently situated just moments from Mu Ko Chang National Park.Revato

name: Phi Phi The Beach Resort
address: 177 Moo 7 Phi Phi Island, Ko Phi Phi 83000
description: Offering hillside accommodation with beautiful ocean views, Phi Phi The Beach Resort- SHA Certified is located on Phi Phi Island’s Long Beach. It features snorkelling and kayaking facilities, and an outdoor pool. Phi Phi The Beach Resort- SHA Certified is a 2-hour 30-minute journey from Phuket and Krabi Airports. The trip includes land and sea transfers. Featuring teak wood furnishings and private balconies, rooms at The Beach Resort Phi Phi come with satellite TV and tea/coffee making facilities. Private bathrooms provide hot and cold water. Guests can sign up for an excursion at the tour desk, then enjoy a traditional Thai massage after a day of sightseeing. Laundry service is available. An American buffet breakfast is served daily at the coffee shop. Thai, Western and seafood dishes can be sampled at the resort’s restaurant. The beach bar offers cocktails.

name: Saii Phi Phi Island Village
address: 49 Moo 8, Ko Phi Phi 81000
description: Escape to SAii Phi Phi Island Village, a dream-like tropical resort on a private 800-metre stretch of pristine white sandy beach lapped by the turquoise waters of the Andaman Sea. The resort is set amid 70 acres of coconut palm plantations, in the privacy of Loh Ba Gao Bay on the peaceful northeast coast of beautiful Phi Phi Island. Accommodations include 189 traditional Thai-style bungalows and 12 exclusive Hillside Pool Villas. Each villa has its own private pool overlooking the island’s magnificent scenery. Resort facilities include five restaurants, three bars, a spa, gift shop, recreation centre, 5-Star PADI dive centre, fitness room, two large swimming pools and tennis courts. At the Marine Discovery Centre, experts educate and inspire guests and locals with sustainability efforts including raising baby sharks and clownfish. Having been off-limits to the public for three and a half years to allow for environmental rejuvenation, Maya Bay in Ko Phi Phi National Park has now officially reopened to tourists and, as one of Thailand’s true national treasures, is a must-visit destination.

name: Sai Kaew Beach Resort
address: 8/1 Moo 4 Tumbon Phe, Amphur Mueang, Ko Samet
description: Sai Kaew Beach Resort sits on the adjacent Pineapple and Sai Kaew beaches on Koh Samet. It offers 3 outdoor pools, 2 beachfront restaurants and a variety of water sports. The resort is located within Khao Laem Ya National Park. It is a 2.5-hour drive from Bangkok or Rayong. Boat transfers are provided from Ao Prao Pier on the mainland or from Koh Samet. Modern rooms at Sai Kaew Resort feature sea or garden views. Each air-conditioned room comes with satellite TV, a DVD player, and a fridge with minibar. Attached bathrooms provide shower facilities. Guests can enjoy a traditional Thai massage on the beach, or exercise in the fitness centre. The Zea Restaurant on Sai Kaew Beach serves Thai and international dishes, while La Luna on Pineapple Beach offers Italian specialities. The Mango café and bakery provides an internet corner.

name: Le Vimarn Cottages & Spa
address: 40/11 Moo 4, Tambol Phe, Amphur Muang, Ko Samet 21160
description: Lazy days by the infinity outdoor pool and luxurious massages await guests at Le Vimarn Cottages & Spa. It offers charming bungalows along Ao Prao Beach in Rayong. Bungalows are beautifully decorated with traditional woven fabrics and wooden furnishings. A satellite TV, DVD player and minibar are provided in all units, while select ones offer large private balconies with spa bath. Dhivarin Spa offers indulgent massage treatments and beauty therapies. Guests can also exercise at the fitness centre or simply enjoy the sun by the pool. Water sports such as diving and canoeing are provided for guests’ enjoyment. The beachfront O Restaurant at Le Vimarn Resort serves a daily breakfast and Italian food. Buzz Restaurant serves authentic Thai favourites with breathtaking views of the ocean. Hotel shuttle boat service (chargeable), please contact a hotel staff at Ao Prao Pier (Ban Phe, mailand) Tel. +66 38 651 134. From Ao Prao Pier (mainland) at 11AM / 1:30 PM / 4PM From Na Dan Pier (Koh Samet) at 10AM / 12:30PM / 3PM Remarks: -To avoid any delay upon transfer to Koh Samet, please standby at Ao Prao Pier (Ban Phe) 30 minutes before departure time for pre-check. -To avoid any delay upon transfer to mainland, please be ready at the lobby 30 minutes before departure time for check-out -Routing from Ao Prao Pier to Na Dan Pier, Koh Samet. (Hotel will provide ground transfer from Na Dan Pier to Resort) -Parking fees at Ao Prao Pier at THB 100 per car per night.

name: Santhiya Koh Yao Yai Resort & Spa
address: 88 Moo 7, Phunai, Ko Yao Yai 83000
description: Santhiya Koh Yao Yai Resort & Spa is set on Ko Yao Yai, and provides 5-star facilities, including an infinity pool and a waterfall pool. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Ayurvana Spa and Swimming pool. This cosy resort offers valet parking, a beauty centre and free Wi-Fi. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to provide local information. The rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a refrigerator, a mini bar and a private balcony. All feature their own bathroom with robes and amenities. Guests of Santhiya Koh Yao Yai Resort & Spa are welcome to experience seafood, Thai and international cuisine at By The Sea Restaurant and Bar, or try Thai dishes at Chantara Restaurant. A buffet breakfast is served each morning.Revato

name: Baan Bayan - Hua Hin - Sha Extra Plus
address: 119 Petchkasem Road, Hua Hin 77110
description: Just 320 metres from Hua Hin Market Village, the 4-star beachfront Baan Bayan has an outdoor swimming pool with sun loungers. Offering free Wi-Fi and parking, it has a massage room and a restaurant. Overlooking the courtyard, garden or sea, air-conditioned rooms are spacious and feature a TV and DVD player. For a quick bite, a minibar and tea/coffee making facilities are available in all rooms. Baan Bayan - Hua Hin is within a 10-minute drive to the golf courses of Hua Hin. It is about 7.8 km from Hua Hin Airport. The 24-hour front desk provides helpful services like daily newspapers and car rentals. Enjoying views of the Gulf of Thailand, The Cafe Bayan serves authentic Thai cuisine and Western dishes. The resort also provides grilled seafood barbecue by the beach, as well as drinks at the open-air Poolside Bar.

name: Haadtien Beach Resort
address: 19/9 Moo 3, Koh Tao, Ko Tao 84360
description: Haadtien Beach Resort is a boutique resort nestled on a secluded beach in Koh Tao Island. Set on Thian-Org Bay (Shark Bay), it is surrounded by palm groves and offers spacious villas with private balconies. Free wired internet is available at the public areas. Haadtien Resort is a 15-minute drive Mae Haad Pier and 1 km from the nearest village and local shops. Villas offer much comfort and privacy with ample outdoor seating area and a private bathroom. They are fitted with rustic wooden furnishings and equipped with a TV, a minibar and a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy traditional Thai massages at the resort. Arrangements for activities such as hiking, canoeing, mountain biking and yoga classes can be made at the tour desk. Snorkelling equipment is available at reception. InSea Beach Bar & Grill offers a beachfront setting and dreamy views of Haad Tien Bay with delicious Thai dishes. Fresh seafood and organic produce also feature on the menu.

name: Mövenpick Siam Hotel Na Jomtien Pattaya
address: 55 Moo 2, Pattaya 20250
description: Welcome to Na Jomtien Beach, a burgeoning district on Thailand's eastern seaboard, home to Moevenpick Siam Hotel Na Jomtien Pattaya. Offering direct beach access, luxurious facilities, and a warm sense of Swiss hospitality, Mövenpick Siam Hotel Na Jomtien Pattaya has everything guests need for a relaxing and enjoyable stay.accorhotels.com

name: Hua Hin Marriott Resort and Spa
address: 107/1 Phetkasem Road, Hua Hin 77110
description: Gazing out over one of the most magnificent beaches in Thailand, Hua Hin Marriott Resort & Spa offers luxury services and accommodation, gorgeous landscaping, upscale amenities and direct access to the sand and surf. The Night Market and other Hua Hin attractions are just a few moments away from our hotel. Our strikingly manicured grounds include a lagoon that winds through the resort, five pools and several superb restaurants, highlighted by a seafood eatery right on the beach. Stretch out in spacious accommodations with a blend of contemporary convenience and unique Thai design. Our rooms feature featherbed mattresses, marble bathrooms and high-speed internet access. Quan Spa is a tranquil oasis offering soothing treatments and our fitness center offers everything resort guests need to stay healthy during your stay in Hua Hin. For those planning a romantic wedding or important business event in Hua Hin, our hotel’s versatile event spaces include a ballroom, boardrooms and picturesque outdoor spaces.Marriott

name: Ao Prao Resort
address: 60 Moo 4, Tumbol Phe, Ko Samet 21160
description: Surrounded by tropical vegetation, this resort is located on the beaches of Ao Prao. It offers accommodation with a private balcony overlooking the sea. Guests of Ao Prao Resort can take a dip in the outdoor pool or engage in water sports such as canoeing or snorkelling. Hiking and biking trails are also available. Fitted with wooden flooring, air-conditioned rooms at Ao Prao Resort feature Thai décor. In addition to tea/coffee making facilities and a minibar, a TV with satellite channels and a DVD player are included. Private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. Open until midnight, the resort’s restaurant serves Thai delights and international dishes, accompanied with views of the sea. In-room dining is possible. A wine cellar and a bar are also available. Situated on the west coast of Koh Samet Island, Ao Prao Resort is an hour’s drive from Pattaya City and a 2.5-hour drive from Bangkok City.

name: Laksasubha Hua Hin
address: 53/7 Naresdamri Road, Hua Hin
description: Sunset views over a private beachfront can be enjoyed at the 4-star Laksasubha Hua Hin. It has a free-form outdoor pool surrounded by sun loungers, a spa and free Wi-Fi throughout the property. The Thai-Victorian style Klai Kangwon Palace is situated 2.5 km away. Guests can reach Hua Hin Airport with a 15 minutes’ drive from Laksasubha Hua Hin. All-white guest rooms feature private outdoor balconies, traditional Thai accents and high-quality duvet covers and linens. Each also comes with a cable TV, DVD player and minibar. Zaanti Spa is housed in a Balinese-style villa, providing flower baths, Thai massage and herbal therapies. Guests can also join Thai cooking classes or go horse riding by the beach. The beachfront Oceanfront Restaurant serves Mediterranean, Italian and Thai-fusion cuisine. A daily buffet breakfast is also available there.

name: Paradee
address: 76 Moo 4, Tumbol Phe, Amphur Mueng, Ko Samet 21160
description: Located on the palm-fringed beaches of Koh Samed Island, Paradee hotel offers teak and Thai silk decorated villas with a private balcony and free internet connection. It features an on-site library. Paradee features thatched-roof villas with a separate living area and spacious bathroom. All villas have private pools and a patio. They are equipped a flat-screen television, DVD player and mini-bar. Rejuvenating massage treatments can be enjoyed at Paradee's spa or head out to the sea for windsurfing and snorkelling. Island day trips and diving lessons are available at the hotel. Cocktails are served at Sunset Bar. Guests can also enjoy Paradee's on-site restaurant, which serves a delicious selection of Thai and international dishes.

name: Sailom Hotel Hua Hin
address: 29 Petchkasem Road, Hua Hin 77110
description: Boasting views of calming sea and lush gardens, Sailom Hotel Hua Hin offers an outdoor pool and a famous beachfront restaurant. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Cicada Market is only a 3-minute drive from the hotel, while Hua Hin Night Market can be reached within a 15-minute drive. The property has an electric vehicle charging station. Spacious air-conditioned rooms at Sailom Hotel provides private bathrooms, hairdryer and satellite TV. A safe and a fridge are also provided for the convenience of guests. Set overlooking the sea, Sailom Seafood Restaurant offers local Thai and Western dishes with live music entertainment. The beachside barbecue serves grilled seafood. Guests of Sailom Hotel Hua Hin can relax with Thai massage or pamper themselves at the beauty/barber shop. Sailom Hotel Hua Hin is a 3-hour drive from Suvarnabumi International Airport in Bangkok.

name: Hotel Victor
address: 1144 Ocean Drive, Miami Beach, FL 33139
description: This luxury South Beach hotel features a pool overlooking the Atlantic Ocean. The rooms include flat-screen TVs and MP3 docking stations. Modern bathrooms with bathrobes are standard in the rooms at Hotel Victor South Beach. The rooms also include plush white bedding and windows with tropical views. Guests can relax in the hammam spa, which is a Turkish style bath house with massage services and other spa treatments. The property also offers bike rentals to explore South Beach. Hotel Victor South Beach is 5 minutes' walk of the Art Deco District. Lincoln Road Mall is within 5 minutes' drive of the property. The Versace Mansion is adjacent to the property.

name: Hilton Bentley Miami/South Beach
address: 101 Ocean Drive, Miami Beach, FL 33139
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Guest internet access: beach services (2 chairs, 2 bottles of water, 1 umbrella, towels): 15% discount on Spa & Salon services: 2 in-room bottles of water: small sunblock: turndown services on request: Pressreader.Experience the beautiful Hilton Bentley Miami/South Beach hotel at world-famous 101 Ocean Drive of South Beach, Miami. Discover a luxurious beachfront paradise in an intimate, elegant world-class setting. The Hilton Bentley hotel offers a stellar walk-to-anything location in South Beach's 'Sofi', a refined and sophisticated enclave of Miami Beach. Guests are footsteps to Miami Beach's playground of the finest restaurants and nightlife, one mile away from Lincoln Road and the Miami Beach Convention Center, three miles away from the Port of Miami, and only seven miles from Miami International Airport. Relax in style in the amenity-rich suites of Hilton Bentley. Offering modern elegance, each of our studio, one-bedroom, two-bedroom and penthouse suites have been designed to exquisite detail. Enjoy contemporary European furnishings, Italian marble floors,50-inch LCD TVs, and stainless steel gourmet kitchens and kitchenettes. Experience the majestic views of the Atlantic Ocean and Miami Beach.Hilton

name: Acqualina Resort & Residences On The Beach
address: 17875 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: Reminiscent of a Mediterranean villa, Acqualina invites you to step into a world of luxury with unprecedented accommodations and service, world-class dining destinations with four restaurants including the new Avra Miami and Il Mulino New York, three oceanfront swimming pools, Acqualina Spa, spacious meeting rooms, and AcquaMarine, an innovative marine biology-based children's program. Recent introductions to the resort include a new Adult Pool experience and a Floridian-meets-Mediterranean menu at the beachside Costa Grill. The luxury seaside haven is located on 4.5 beachfront acres in Miami’s Sunny Isles Beach, and conveniently located between Miami International Airport and Fort Lauderdale Airport. Designed to offer a sense of modern luxury with classic furnishings and finishes, the richly appointed accommodations are the hallmark of the guest experience at Acqualina. Offerings include 54 guest rooms and 44 suites, all offering expansive floor plans and breathtaking views from private balconies. One, Two and Three Bedroom Oceanfront Suites are available. Only 10 minute drive from the Acqualina Resort are the luxury shops and restaurants of Bal Harbor. The vibrant South Beach area as well as the legendary Art Deco district is also within driving distance. A family owned and operated property, Acqualina is a recipient of the coveted Forbes Travel Guide Five-Star Award for both the hotel and spa, as well as the AAA Five Diamond Award. Acqualina is also named the #1 Best Resort in the U.S. and the #1 Best Hotel in the U.S. by U.S. News & World Report.USA Today named Acqualina Best Destination Resort in the U.S.

name: Dream South Beach
address: 1111 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33139
description: Welcoming guests with pets, this hotel is located in Miami Beach and features an infinity pool and a private beach. It also provides a coffee bar, valet parking and a rooftop terrace. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. After a long day exploring the area, Shala Spa provides an ideal place to relax with massage services. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a mini bar, cable/satellite channels and an iPod docking station. All provide an alarm clock, a flat-screen TV and a laptop safe. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. A wide selection of eating options can also be found in the area. Miami Beach's attractions, such as Ocean Drive and Miami Beach Architectural District, are easily accessible on foot from Dream South Beach. Located within a five-minute walk are the Wolfsonian-FIU and Lummus Park.Revato

name: The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort
address: 9703 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33154
