description: The St. Regis Bal Harbour Resort welcomes you to savor an exceptional experience at our exquisitely appointed retreat in Miami Beach, FL. Rising 27 stories over fashionable Collins Ave and a brilliant white-sand beach, our luxury hotel resides at the intersection of art, fashion and design. Prestigious Forbes Five-Star and AAA Five-Diamond accolades set the stage for unparalleled service and amenities. Step into spacious guest rooms and suites with direct ocean views from expansive private balconies. Then, luxuriate in superb resort amenities including 14,000 square feet of indulgence at The Spa at St. Regis, Oceanfront Day Villas and gourmet dining options. An oasis of pampering and privilege at the northern tip of Miami Beach, FL, Bal Harbour is one of the most distinguished addresses in South Florida, and our hotel has long been a favorite destination for jet-setting travelers worldwide.Marriott

name: DoubleTree Resort & Spa by Hilton Ocean Point-N. Miami Beach
address: 17375 Collins Avenue, North Miami Beach, FL 33160
description: Daily Resort Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: guest internet access: two beach chairs: two beach towels: 25% discount on food in restaurant outlets: two bottles of water: 15% salon discount: local and toll-free calls. The Doubletree Ocean Point Resort & Spa - Miami Beach North is a full service, beachfront resort hotel and spa situated between the Bal Harbour and Aventura areas of the northern section of Miami Beach. Ideally located in sunny south Florida, the Ocean Point Resort hotel is less than 30 minutes from either Miami International Airport (MIA) or Fort Lauderdale / Hollywood International Airport (FLL). This exquisite resort hotel features spacious guestrooms and one- or two-bedroom apartment-style suites with fully equipped kitchens. Our luxurious accommodations include refrigerator, wet bar, microwave, washer and dryer, high-speed internet access (wired and wireless), and panoramic ocean views from all guest rooms. Most rooms and suites have a balcony. At the Ocean Point Resort, we believe in pampering. Indulge yourself with full-service European-style spa and beauty salon treatments. Have a massage in one of our hotel oceanside cabanas - you're worth it. We recommend that you call 786-528-2900 in advance of your arrival for Spa reservations and treatment details. Dine overlooking the Atlantic Ocean in The View restaurant, serving Continental cuisine and fresh seafood with a Miami flair. Or, try The Market Coffee Shop & Deli for lighter fare in casual surroundings just steps from the pool and beach. For special events or social occasions, our versatile meeting rooms and outdoor terraces can accommodate up to 300 guests. Allow our talented professionals to create your dream wedding reception in the most spectacular atmosphere. Go snorkeling or sport fishing. Relax under a beach umbrella. Explore the exclusive Bal Harbour Shops or Aventura Mall. Enjoy sightseeing and gallery-browsing along Miami Beach's historic Art Deco District. Take the family to Miami Seaquarium or Parrot Jungle. There is so much to see and do in the Miami area - or opt to do nothing at all. Our attentive, caring hotel staff looks forward to welcoming you to the Doubletree Ocean Point Resort & Spa with our special, signature warm chocolate-chip cookie at check-in.Hilton

name: Kimpton Surfcomber Hotel
address: 1717 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33139
description: As part of the candy-colored historic Art Deco District, Kimpton Surfcomber Hotel welcomes you to the sea-and-be-seen revelry of Miami’s South Beach. Famed nightlife, shops, cafes and galleries are a stroll away. But even without leaving the hotel you can soak up the fun with Kimpton Surfcomber’s playful “Daylife.” Think ice cream sundaes by our glorious pool, bocce ball tournaments at a private sandy oasis and beach side food and beverage service on the beach. Some say we’re the most social hotel around. To that we say, SoBe it.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Edition Miami Beach
address: 2901 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33140
description: With luxury hotel accommodations and an oceanfront setting, The Miami Beach EDITION is an ideal escape. Local venues and iconic attractions, including Miami Beach Convention Center, the Fillmore and Perez Art Museum Miami, are minutes away. Return from the beach and experience exceptional dining at our restaurants developed by Michelin-starred Chef Jean-Georges Vongerichten. This Miami Beach hotel boasts two ocean-facing pools, a wellness spa with a gym, a nightclub, a bowling alley and an ice-skating rink, as well as chic indoor and outdoor event space. Decorated in sophisticated style, every hotel room features large windows and views of the city, pool or ocean. Unwind from the Miami Beach scene in your pet-friendly room that showcases plush bedding, a marble bathroom, a desk and free Wi-Fi. Revel in the living and dining areas of our oceanfront suites, ideal for entertaining family and friends. Our luxury bungalows promote a sense of privacy and well-being with their plunge pools and serene terraces.Marriott

name: The Savoy Hotel & Beach Club
address: 425 Ocean Drive, Miami Beach, FL 33139
description: Each spacious suite at this hotel in Miami Beach offers Wi-Fi. This European-style hotel offers direct beach access and features 2 outdoor pools and private beach access. The suites at The Savoy Hotel include tea and coffee-making facilities. Each suite also provides a spacious seating area. Secluded in a 2-acre courtyard, the Hotel Savoy includes a restaurant that serves American cuisine indoors or outside on the patio. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are available. Guests can relax on the raised sun decks that overlook the ocean at the hotel. Lummus Park is within a 5-minute walk from Savoy Hotel. Marjory Stoneman Douglas Ocean Beach Park is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Newport Beachside Hotel & Resort
address: 16701 Collins Avenue, Sunny Isles Beach, FL 33160
description: No description found

name: The Alexander Ocean Front Resort
address: 5225 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33140
description: The Alexander Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Miami Beach (FL). The property has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at The Alexander Hotel. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as air conditioning, heating, wake-up service, desk, balcony/terrace. The property offers various recreational opportunities. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Miami Beach (FL), The Alexander Hotel will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: Royal Palm South Beach Miami, A Tribute Portfolio Resort
address: 1545 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33139
description: Reflecting the vibrancy and culture, Royal Palm South Beach Miami, A Tribute Portfolio Resort, is a trendy downtown resort in Miami Beach, where Ocean Drive and Collins Avenue intersect. Renowned among South Beach resorts, we connect you with the area’s popular attractions. Arrive in style at our opulent hotel lobby, which retains elements of the building’s original design, including a compass rose on the terrazzo floor, a green-glass reception desk and porthole windows in the lounge. After browsing Miami Beach, unwind with a vitalizing dip in one of the two resort-style pools at our South Beach resort hotel. We also boast a 24-hour fitness center and direct access to our own stretch of sand and surf in Royal Palm Beach. If you’re here for a meeting or wedding, our beachfront venues and attentive service break the mold of Florida events. Relax in luxe hotel rooms and suites inspired by the colorful spirit of Miami. Our boutique resort near Miami Beach beckons you to write your own compelling narrative.Marriott

The casual-elegant restaurants offer author cuisine, which features unique courses designed by a renowned chef; world cuisine, Italian, Caribbean, Mexican. The bars include a place specialized in mojitos, cantina-style venues and a lounge serving international drinks. The hotel’s stylish suites have typical Mexican décor. Each suite has a furnished terrace, a seating area, minibar and safety deposit box. Bathrooms include amenities and a hairdryer. The restaurant serves Mexican cuisine made with local produce, including freshly caught fish. Guests can also enjoy the sea views and sunsets from the terrace bar. Staff at the Ana y Jose’s 24-hour reception can organize a range of excursions and activites. These include visits to Mayan temples, trekking in the rainforest, diving courses or fishing trips.

At the hotel, every room includes a desk. The rooms include a coffee machine, while some rooms are fitted with a terrace and others also feature sea views. At Hotel Ma'xanab Tulum each room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mexican cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Tulum Archeological Site is 10 km from Hotel Ma'xanab Tulum, while Parque Nacional Tulum is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 84 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Dos Ceibas Tulum Feel Good Hotel
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila Km 10, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo

Set on a private area of Tulum Beach, this eco-resort offers a typical Temazcal sauna, yoga classes and a range of massages. It is located next to the beautiful Sian-Ka'an Biosphere Reserve. The thatched bungalows have fans, bathroom and views of the gardens. The bungalows are powered by solar panels and wind energy. They have traditional décor and come with mosquito nets. Dos Ceibas Posada Ecológica is surrounded by tropical gardens, including 2 Ceiba trees, known as the sacred trees of the ancient Mayas. As an activity, the hotel organizes lessons of sacred dance, meditation and full moon Mayan ceremony. The lobby offers a free WiFi zone and a 24-hour reception. Staff can arrange hiking or diving trips and organize transfers to Cancún Airport, a 90-minute drive away. The Dos Ceibas’s open-air restaurant serves home-cooked food. Continental breakfast is included.

At the hotel, the rooms come with a wardrobe. Rooms include a safety deposit box, while some rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature lake views. At Wakax Hacienda - Cenote & Boutique Hotel the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. At Wakax Hacienda - Cenote & Boutique Hotel you will find a restaurant serving Mexican and international cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Tulum, like hiking, snorkelling and canoeing. Bus station Tulum Ruins is 8.3 km from Wakax Hacienda - Cenote & Boutique Hotel, while Xel Ha is 9.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 70 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bahia Principe Luxury Sian Ka'an - Adult Only Hotel
address: Km 250 Carr Federal a Chetumal, 77729 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a restaurant, Bahia Principe Luxury Sian Ka´an - Adults Only - All Inclusive is located in the Riviera Maya town of Akumal. Free WiFi access is available in this resort. The accommodation will provide you with air conditioning and a balcony. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a bath and a hairdryer. Extras include a seating area. At Bahia Principe Luxury Sian Ka´an - Adults Only - All Inclusive you will find a tennis court and a fitness centre Other facilities offered at the property include entertainment staff, a nightclub and luggage storage. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including snorkelling. The property offers free parking. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Xcacel-Xcacelito (5.5 km) and Kantenah Bay (23 km). This resort is 95 km from Cancún International Airport.

name: Bahia Principe Grand Coba
address: Carretera Chetumal - Cancun Km 250, Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: This exclusive beach hotel is located amidst tropical vegetation and besides a 1 km long untouched sandy beach of the Mayan Riviera with a protective coral reef. The center of Akumal is some 3.5 km away and offers a range of shops and numerous restaurants, bars, cafes, and other entertainment venues. The toursitic zone of Tulum is 15 km from the hotel. Playa del Carmen is 35 min away and Cancún Airport is 60 min away. Xel-ha and Xcaret theme parks are 15 - 30 min of the hotel. Car rental is available nearby.WebBeds

name: Diamante K - Inside Tulum National Park
address: Crta. Boca Paila Tulum Ruinas Km 2.5, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Facing the beachfront, Diamante K - Inside Tulum National Park offers 3-star accommodation in Tulum and has an outdoor swimming pool, garden and terrace. The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Mexican cuisine. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a concierge service and free WiFi. Each room has a safety deposit box and certain rooms are fitted with sea views. At the hotel rooms have bed linen and towels. Diamante K - Inside Tulum National Park offers a continental or American breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Las Palmas Beach, South Tulum Beach and Paraíso Beach. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 81 km from Diamante K - Inside Tulum National Park.

name: Casa Malca
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila Km 9.5, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Special check-in instructions Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Know Before You Go Reservations are required for massage services and spa treatments. Reservations can be made by contacting the hotel prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Only registered guests are allowed in the guestrooms. No pets and no service animals are allowed at this property. This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place. Disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F. Personal protective equipment, including masks and gloves, will be available to guests. Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; periodic temperature checks are conducted on staff; temperature checks are available to guests; guests are provided with hand sanitizer. Contactless check-in and contactless check-out are available. Individually-wrapped food options are available through room service. Each guestroom is kept vacant for a minimum of 48 hours between bookings. This property affirms that it adheres to the cleaning and disinfection practices of Safe Travels (WTTC - Global). Fees Early check-in fee: USD 120 (subject to availability) Late check-out is available for a fee (subject to availability) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.Ticket Package

name: Tulum casa cenote
address: Fraccionamiento Tankah Caribe 32, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Tulum, a few steps from Tankah Bay Beach, Tulum casa cenote offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, all rooms have a balcony with a sea view. All guest rooms feature a desk. An American breakfast is available every morning at Tulum casa cenote. Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Soliman Bay Beach is 2 km from the accommodation, while Tulum Archeological Site is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 70 km from Tulum casa cenote, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Cabañas Tulum Beach Hotel & Spa
address: Carretera Cancun-Tulum Bocapalia Km 7, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel is located on one of the nicest beaches in Tulum, Mexico. The hotel offers a secluded location, guest rooms with free WiFi, an on-site restaurant and the Ziggy's Beach Club. Rooms at Cabanas Tulum include hammocks on the private terrace. Some rooms are located directly on the beach. Some rooms feature a private rooftop terrace with hot tub. Fresco's offers international cuisine and has children menu. Hotel guests can enjoy the beach club amenities, as well as cocktails and beers. The bilingual staff at Cabanas Tulum can arrange tours to nearby eco-friendly attractions like Sian Ka'an, a natural biosphere, or tours to sightseeing the cenotes, the natural underground pools, or travel to the archaeological sites nearby including Cobá, Chichen Itza and Ek Balam. Cabanas Tulum has Naj Naay Spa. Our guests minimum age is 14 years.

name: Encantada Tulum
address: Km 8.7 Carretera Tulum Boca Paila, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Situated on an unspoilt beach between the Sian Ka’an Biosphere Reserve and Tulum National Park, Hotel Encantada offers tropical gardens, a free Wi-Fi zone and stylish rooms with sea or garden views. Decorated with local textiles and artwork, each charming room has sliding glass doors which open onto a private terrace. All rooms have a ceiling fan, mosquito nets and a private bathroom. A varied continental breakfast is provided, including home-baked bread, fresh fruit, yogurt and granola. Mexican and international dishes are available for lunch, served in the bar or on the beach. You can book a relaxing massage or hot stone treatment on the beach at Hotel Encantada. The 24-hour reception also includes a concierge and free bicycle rental service. Free private parking is available on site, and Cancún is a 90-minute drive away. Airport transfers can be arranged on request.

name: La Valise Tulum
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila Km 8.7, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Tulum's best Boutique Hotel, the two-wing property offers the best of the tropics, spanning eleven beachside accommodations and eleven jungle-side suites across the street. – La Valise is the perfect beach and jungle getaway with its beautiful rooms and stunning beachfront views it makes for the most picturesque stay on the beach in Tulum. Heated infinity pool overlooking the jungle on one end and breathtaking views of the Caribbean ocean on the other side. Beds directly on the beach for lounging in the day or laying beneath the stars at night. All rooms have handcrafted furnishings, free Wi-Fi, safes, and tea and coffee making facilities. Rustic jungle bungalows have open-air showers, and terraces with jungle views. Airy seafront rooms include en-suite bathrooms and hammocks. Room service is available and daily breakfast is included for all guests.

name: Akumal Bay Beach & Wellness Resort
address: Km 104 Carr. Cancun-Chetumal, 77760 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Located on Akumal Bay, this 4-star beach resort is only a 20-minute drive to Tulum. This resort features 2 beach-side pools and 3 restaurants serving international cuisine. Every room at the Akumal Bay Beach & Wellness Resort offers a full ocean view and a private balcony or terrace. The air conditioned rooms offer color TV and an in-room safety deposit box. On-site activities at the Akumal Bay Beach & Wellness Resort include fitness classes, beach volleyball and snorkelling. A Kid’s Club provides supervised fun activities for children. Guests can enjoy drinks and snacks at the Pool Bar. Downtown Akumal is within walking distance of the resort and Cancun is within an hours’ drive.

name: Lula Tulum
address: Km 8.2 Carretera Boca Paila, 77790 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Designed to accommodate, Sanar was created with options for intimate relaxation or social interactions with like minded individuals. In 2017 Sanara Tulum was selected #3 in the 150 Greatest Hotels in the world by Harpers Bazaar. The hotel also won the 2015 National Competition in the category of Architecture and Interiors for Hotels from the Asociacion de Arquitectos e Interioristas, Mexico. A space that harmonizes with the beauty of its surroundings. The sleek and simple architecture is nestled in-between wildly sprouting Coconut Palms and Mayan Cheet trees while the ocean provides ample breeze and the serenading sounds of crashing waves.Lula 19 AC rooms, suites and villas, Wellness Center, and Studio are built on the coveted white sand beaches of Tulum, Mexic. Overlooking the crystal clear turquoise sea, the curative boutique hotel offers both Beachside & Sanara Jungle Poolside rooms. Each Lula beach room offers a private balcony, luxurious bathroom, and wardrobe. Dressed with imported bamboo cotton from Italy, both the super king size and additional day bed make for the ultimate luxury in sleeping, and accommodate up to two or three people.The stunningly appointed Sanara Villa, situated in our beachside garden, has one opulent master suite downstairs with a large living room, and upstairs an additional 2 bedroom suite. The Villa can sleep up to 8 adults. +Our Jungle provides 4 gorgeous jungle rooms nestled around a private pool and waterfall, each with a King bed, air conditioning and private bathroom. In addition we offer a Jungle Villa with 2 Suites, each comprising of 1 spacious bedroom and 1 living room. Our Jungle villa also has a stunning Jungle roof terrace which delivers stunning sunsets over the canopy of trees. Sanara Jungle is very popular with groups and more economic travelers who wish to come and enjoy Sanara's stunning yoga facility, the acclaimed cuisine inside The Real Coconut, and of course the priceless Tulum beach. Our restaurant has become a global hit with people traveling just to eat with us. Created by Daniella Hunter, The Real Coconut's philosophy of eating is a regimen for sustainable living, both personally and for the planet. Built on the foundational belief that plants form the key to our vitality and that gut health and digestion are paramount to optimum well being, The Real Coconut is dedicated to all that is conscious living. Daniella integrates key elements of paleo, gluten & grain-free, and vegan diet practices, ultimately creating a menu that is universal without compromising taste. The Real coconut products are now sold in Whole Foods Markets, Costco and thousands of stores stores across the United States, Canada and EnglandThe menus are gluten free; grain free, dairy free; refined sugar free; soy free; and cashew freeIn a coconut shell.our philosophy is plant based food with options to include sustainably sourced animal proteins.The hotel also features one of the most stunning yoga studios on the planet, where Tulum's finest teachers provide three classes a day. And finally you can encounter "care" and "service" in the Sanara Wellness Center, which has also been consistently listed in top wellness lists in thew world, offering a comprehensive menu to help you take away any stress and support your total rejuvenation.iHotelier/iStay

name: Villa Las Estrellas Tulum - located at the party zone
address: Carretera Boca Paila Km 8, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Villa Las Estrellas Tulum - located at the party zone is located on a secluded beach on the Mayan Riviera, just 7 km from the Tulum Archaological Site. Its stylish rooms offer free Wi-Fi and terraces with sea views. Rooms at Las Estrellas are located in traditional thatched cabins, with wooden floors and mosquito nets. Each elegant room has a laptop safe, a fan and a private bathroom with free toiletries. Villas Las Estrellas has a seafront restaurant, which serves a fusion of Mexican and Italian cuisine. You can also relax with a cocktail on the beach. The hotel can arrange bicycle rental, diving and snorkelling trips and visits to the nearby Sian Ka’an Biosphere Reserve. Cancun Airport is a 90-minute drive away, and airport transfers can be organized on request.

name: Chiringuito Tulum
address: Carretara Tulum Boca Paila Km 9.3, 77728 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Chiringuito Tulum is located in Tulum, within 2.3 km of Tulum Archeological Site and Cesiak. Around 5 km from Parque Nacional Tulum, the property is also 8 km away from Tulum Bus station and offers free WiFi. The property is non-smoking throughout and is situated 9 km from Bus station Tulum Ruins. At the hotel every room includes a terrace. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at Chiringuito Tulum also provide guests with a garden view. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property. The accommodation offers a year-round outdoor pool. Ziggys is 1.6 km from Chiringuito Tulum. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 69 km from the hotel.

name: Alquimia Hotel Boutique
address: Carretera Boca Paila Km 7.5, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Located on the heart of Tulum beach, you can appreciate the breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea from the comfort of our beach cabanas. Our Eco-Chic decor rooms are all the Tulum vibes you need; Suites, Cabanas and Container Rooms have air conditioning, hot and cold water for a great shower, daily cleaning, room service and access to our private Beach Club where you can enjoy our Infinity Pool, Volley ball net, Kayaks, Swings, Beach Bar with great Mixology, delicious Mexican Food, among other amenities. We are a Pet Friendly Hotel, so your best friend is more than welcome. Our fantastic location allows us to be 5 minutes away from all the main attractions, exclusive boutiques, beach clubs, Restaurants and Night life of Tulum’s Hotel Area.

name: Mereva Tulum
address: Frac. Tankah III No. Mza 3 Lote 35, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Offering Two outdoor pools and gourmet food, Mereva Tulum by Blue Sky is located 10 minutes' drive from Tulum town and 15 minutes’ drive from the Tulum Mayan Ruins. It has a private dock and offers kayaking and snorkelling, complimentary paddle board. The air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi, an HDTV with satellite channels and a balcony with sea views. All with private bathrooms, most of them count with double rain shower, twin sinks and mirrors. A la carte American breakfast is included. At Mereva Tulum by Blue Sky you can enjoy romantic dinners or spa treatments with wonderful Caribbean Sea views on the 45-metre dock. The Manati Cenote is located right across from Mereva Tulum by Blue Sky. This Boutique Hotel is 10 minutes’ drive from Xel-Há Eco-Theme Park and 90-minutes’ drive from Cancún International Airport. Free parking is available on site.

name: Amansala
address: Carretera Tulu-Boca Paila km 5.5, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Offering a beautiful setting on Tulum Beach, Amansala Resort features charming accommodation 5 minutes’ drive from the famous Mayan ruins. This peaceful resort is set in gardens and has a spa. Each room at the Amansala Resort has attractive décor with tiled floors and some are set in huts with thatched roofs. All accommodation comes with a safety deposit box and a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy a range of healthy local food in the Amansala Resort’s restaurant. There is also a bar and lounge area offering impressive sea views. The resort’s spa offers a range of treatments including wraps and massage. There are also yoga classes and fitness programmes: front desk offers information about costs and vailability. Set on the Mayan Riviera, the Amansala Resort has a picturesque location surrounded by coves and lagoons. The centre of Tulum is approximately 3 km away, while Playa del Carmen is a 50-minute drive from the resort.

name: Playa Canek Beachfront Eco Hotel
address: Carretera Boca Paila Km 8.3, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Offering a private beach area, Playa Canek Boutique Eco Hotel is a rustic-style property set in the beaches of Tulum, 10 minutes’ drive from the town centre. The bright rooms here will provide you with air conditioning, a balcony and a seating area. Featuring a shower, the private bathrooms also come with free toiletries and towels. Some rooms have sea and garden views. Bed linens and a fan are also included. Some units have hammocks. Guests will enjoy fresh seafood on site. The property’s staff will prepare the seafood in an open fire and serve it to the guests. Tulum town also offers restaurants, most of them offering typical dishes of the region and international-style cuisine. At Playa Canek Boutique Eco Hotel you will find an airport shuttle, a garden, plus water sport facilities on site. There is also a shared lounge and a tour desk. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling and snorkelling. The hotel is 7.6 km from Tulum Archaeological Site, the ADO Bus Station is 12 minutes’ drive away and Playa del Carmen can be reached in 1 hour by car.

name: Papaya Playa Project
address: Km 4.5 Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Papaya Playa Project is a sustainable boutique hotel complex of beachfront cabins and cottages, located on Mayan Riviera in Tulum. Set on a 900-metre stretch of private beach, it offers rustic accommodation with panoramic views of the Caribbean Sea. a 24-hour front desk is available. The eco-friendly cabins at Papaya Playa Project are modestly decorated, with high ceilings, a private bathroom and lots of natural light. Some have sea views or views of the tropical gardens. Papaya Playa Project organises events every saturdays and once a month a full-moon party. All the events feature music from international DJs at its beach bar.There is also a spa specializing in Mayan Shaman therapies. Water sports and fishing are all available on the nearby beaches. The Tulum ruins are located 1 km from the Papaya Playa Project. Cancún International Airport can be reached by car in 1 hour and 30 minutes.

name: Las Villas Akumal
address: Carretera Cacun-Tulum Mz 11 K104 Lote 1, 77780 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop, as well as free WiFi and a plasma TV. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, dial-up Internet, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Suenos Tulum
address: Zona Hotelera Tulum Km 8.5, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Located right on the beach, Sueños Tulum offers guests an outdoor swimming pool, spa treatments, yoga classes and free Wi-Fi. This hotel is only a 10-minute drive from the Mayan ruins. The tropical-style suites at this beachfront hotel feature a balcony with sea views, a fan and private bathrooms with a shower, toilet and free toiletries. Sueños Tulum features an on-site bar and restaurant serving local cuisine for guest only, and there are other dining options a walking distance and bike or car ride. The Coba archeological site is a 1-hour drive from this property, and the Siaa Kaan biological reserve is 1 km away. Cancun’s International Airport is a 1.5-hour drive from this property.

name: Xcacel Dreams
address: Sak Nicte MZ10 Lote 10, 77774 Chemuyil, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Chemuyil, 19 km from Tulum Archeological Site, Xcacel Dreams offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, all rooms have a wardrobe, bed linen and a balcony with pool view. Xcacel Dreams offers an à la carte or continental breakfast. Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 46 km from the accommodation, while ADO International Bus Station is 46 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 60 km from Xcacel Dreams, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Be Tulum Beach & Spa Resort
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila Km.10, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel in Tulum Mexico offers 64 elegant suites. The hotel features 3 on-site restaurants, one bar and two outdoor swimming pools. Children from 13 and above are welcomed on this property. Be Tulum offers easy access to the Caribbean Sea and many recreational activities. Guests can go swimming with dolphins, snorkeling and fishing near the hotel. There are also many theme parks nearby, including Xcaret and Xel-Ha. Guest suites at the Be Tulum feature iPod docking stations and private balconies. Some suites are also equipped with private pools or hot tubs.

name: Nomade Tulum
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila Km 10.5, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Conrad Tulum Riviera Maya
address: Carretera Cancun Tulum 307, 77774 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Experience the magic of Tulum with views of the ocean from every room and suite, approximately a 2-hour drive from Cancun International Airport. Uncover your sense of wonder in our resort with five pools, 11 restaurants, and magnificent views. Our personalized concierge can help you unwind or fill your day with beach activities, spa treatments, and excursions to nearby attractions. Tulum is a Magical Town with an eco-chic atmosphere that provides a spiritual and relaxing sensation. Tulum city center, underwater caves, amusement parks, and more are all within 30 minutes. The ultimate place for an unplugged beach vacation, explore historic ruins and the Sian Ka’an Biosphere Reserve, as well as shops and restaurants. Enjoy beautiful white-sand beaches, lagoons, cenotes, and caverns that show the beauty of nature in all its splendor.Hilton

name: Hotel Poc Na Tulum
address: Carretera Tulum-Bocapaila, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Located inside the Tulum Archeological Site in Tulum, Hotel Poc Na Tulum features a restaurant, bar and free WiFi in the restaurant. Free private parking is available on site. Certain rooms have views of the sea or garden. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. American breakfast is offered with options such as coffee, tea, juice, milk, cereal, fruit and eggs. The area is popular for snorkelling and diving. Hotel Poc Na Tulum is inside Parque Nacional Tulum is, while Bus station Tulum Ruins is 1.4 mi from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 39 mi from the property.

name: Our Habitas Tulum
address: Carretera Tulum-Bocapaila Km. 4.0, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Tulum in the Quintana Roo Region, 3.5 km from Tulum Archeological Site, Our Habitas Tulum boasts a year-rond outdoor pool and a private beach area. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Our Habitas Tulum is an Eco-resort hotel. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and free toiletries. Our Habitas Tulum features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Parque Nacional Tulum is 400 metres from Our Habitas Tulum, while Tulum Bus station is 3.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 65 km from Our Habitas Tulum.

name: Del Sol Beachfront Hotel and Condos
address: Lot 41a Section G, 77710 Akumal, Quintana Roo
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a restaurant, Del Sol Beachfront is located in Akumal. Each room here is air-conditioned and includes a fridge and a private bathroom The apartments include a kitchen and seating area. At Del Sol Beachfront you will find a garden, a bar. The property is just 2 km from Akumal town centre and Yal Ku Lagoon. Free parking is available on-site.

name: Grand Sirenis Riviera Maya Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Federal Cancún - Tulúm, Zona Costera, Km 256.3, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Overlooking the Caribbean Sea, Grand Sirenis Riviera Maya Resort & Spa is a modern hotel featuring 3 outdoor pools, a spa and a private beach area. It offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms. The hotel’s stylish rooms offer spectacular garden and sea views and feature a separate seating area equipped with a flat-screen TV. The bathroom features a whirlpool tub and includes a bathrobe and slippers. Grand Riviera Maya offers a variety of dining options, including Mexican, Italian, Mediterranean, Brazilian, Thai, Japanese and French cuisine. There is also a poolside bar, coffee shop, several bars and an on-site souvenir shop. The property offers a dolphinarium with extra cost. Guests can relax in the gardens or enjoy a number of water sports including snorkelling, and kayaking. The Mexican-themed eco-archaeological park, Xcaret Park, is 26 km away. Playa del Carmen is 30 km away. There is an ATM machine at the resort and on-site parking is available.

name: Dreams Tulum Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Chetumal-Puerto Juarez KM 236.7 No.1, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Among acres of tropical gardens and jungle, Dreams Tulum Resort & Spa is located just minutes' from the ancient Mayan ruins and the trendy and bohemian town of Tulum. Dreams Tulum is a AAA Four Diamond award-winning resort, with all the benefits of Unlimited-Luxury® - where everything is included. Dreams Tulum’s magnificent Mexican colonial architecture blends tastefully with an up scale contemporary design where every room offers a private and furnished terrace or balcony, marble bathroom, daily refreshed mini-bar and 24-hour room service. Dreams Tulum also offers a secluded adults-only section and swim out suites for direct access to a pool. Additionally, there is a splash park for kids located near the Explorer’s Club. The pools are heated from December and March depending on climate conditions. Dreams Tulum sits on 2 miles of powdery white sand with activities to make the whole family happy including on-site watersports and dive shop, discounted greens fees at the nearby Riviera Maya Golf Club, an Explorer’s Club for Kids and a Core Zone Teens Club. The Dreams Spa by Pevonia® offers serene jungle and beach cabins, a spa pantry for guests to create their own spa products and a Temazcal for a traditional Mayan spa ceremony experience. With authentic and gourmet dining options, unlimited top-shelf spirits and nightly entertainment, guests can enjoy a Dream vacation at Dreams Tulum Resort & Spa.

name: Gardenia Collective
address: M27 L9 Calle Sol Oriente/ Escorpion Sur, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Gardenia Collective features a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Tulum. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, evening entertainment and a shared lounge. With a private bathroom, some units at the hotel also feature a city view. Gardenia Collective offers an à la carte or American breakfast. Tulum Archeological Site is 3.1 km from the accommodation, while Tulum Bus station is 1.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 77 km from Gardenia Collective, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Posada Lamar Tulum Beach Front And Pool
address: Carretera Tulum - Boca Paila Km. 6, 72780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: This Eco-friendly and charming hotel is set on the beach, just 6 km south of the Tulum Beach road. It features beautiful decorated bungalows offering stunning sea views. Each room at Posada Lamar Tulum Beach Front and Pool is decorated using local handicrafts and colourful fabrics. All bungalows offer a terrace with hammocks and have palapa thatched roofs. The Tulum Ruins are less than 15 minutes’ drive from Posada Lamar Tulum Beach Front and Pool. You can also visit Tulum Pueblo, only 10 minutes’ drive away. Here you will find a variety of shops, bars and restaurants. Staff at the front desk can also provide tourist information about the area. The beaches in Tulum are ideal for diving and snorkelling.

name: Kanan Tulum - Adults Only
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila, Km 8, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Kanan Tulum is a unique eco-friendly spa hotel in Mexico's Caribbean coast. Located on the beach amid the Mayan jungle, it is placed in the middle of the bustling music and art scene, offering a wide range of events in and around the hotel. This adults-only hotel is an experience in its own right, marrying rustic elements with the finest woods and rich textiles.The labyrinth of treetop corridors, wooden staircases, nature portals and branch-woven walkways and nests, all create a sensation of a hidden jungle temple. Get pampered at Kumaru Spa, featuring a full menu of organic services, find adventure on the Caribbean Sea, with an array of beach activities available on-site or enjoy a delightful yoga class at our wooden yoga shala. Indulge in authentic gastronomy, locally sourced dining and drinks, including cocktails at our swim-up pool bar and drinks on our rooftop lounge. Stay tuned for our music events on weekends at our beach club featuring the finest DJs lineups. When you’re ready to explore and experience the magic of Tulum, you’ll find everything from the ancient Mayan ruins and scenic cenotes to unforgettable nature reserves and adventure parks within minutes of our hotel. Take the vacation you deserve at Tulum’s best environmentally conscious, adults-only Caribbean escape at Kanan Tulum

name: Hilton Tulum Riviera Maya
address: Carretera Cancun Tulum 307, 77774 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: The hotel facilities and services include air conditioning, free WiFi, car parking, gym/fitness facilities, spa facilities (extra charge), conference room, 24hr reception, restaurant, bar, swimming pool, kids pool, children playground and elevator. The room amenities include room service, air conditioning, free WiFi, safe box, TV, balcony/terrace, mini bar, coffee/tea maker, hairdryer and telephone. Please note that some of the above facilities may be closed due to weather / seasonal conditions Address: Carretera Cancun Tulum 307, Tulkal Chemuyil, 77774, Tulum, Mexico.Ticket Package

name: Cielo Maya Beach Tulum
address: Tankah Iii, Mza 3, Lot. 36, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Situated north of Tulum, 7 km from Tulum Archeological Site and 10 km from Tulum town; Cielo Maya Beach Tulum boasts an outdoor pool and views of the sea. The hotel has a terrace and views of the garden, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. Free private parking is available on site. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area for your convenience. You will find a coffee machine in the room. description: Azulik is a private, adults-only beach resort and Mayan Wellness Centre. It features a secluded, clothing-optional beach which is perfect for sunbathing or swimming. Each spacious tree house is made from Mexican-royal-ebony Khatalosh and features floor-to-ceiling windows providing natural daylight, mosquito nets. The tree house's also have a private deck with outdoor day beds, seating areas and views of the lush jungle and the Caribbean Sea. The rooms are free of TV's, phone or electricity so you can relax and reconnect with nature. Azulik offers a magical experience, serving breakfast and lunch. Also a beach bar, a wonderful spa & beauty center. We also provide traditional Mayan massage and healing therapies, medicinal herbal baths and the traditional Mayan-sweat-lodge temazcal treatment. The units have a unique Mayan mosaic bath tub where you can have a special invigorating bath in rich mineralized cenote’s water, which is considered as sacred water within Mayan culture. Azulik is 3 km south of Tulum Archaeological Site and 4 km from Tulum town centre. Our Cancun International Airport is about a 90 minutes drive to Azulik's location.
