During the day, a variety of beverages and snacks are available to enjoy by the pool or beach. After dinner, guests can dance the night away in the nightclub.

name: Hotel Esencia
address: Carretera Cancún-Tulum Km. 265, 77750 Xpu Há, Quintana Roo
description: Offering direct access to Xpu-Ha Beach, Hotel Esencia offers beautiful rooms and suites with terraces set amongst attractive gardens. It features a spa, 2 large outdoor swimming pools and an à la carte restaurant. All air-conditioned accommodation has bright, attractive décor. Each suite and room has a flat-screen TV and an iPod docking station. The Garden Restaurant serves a selection of regional and international cuisine. The hotel also offers Mexican cookery classes. The Esencia’s spa features a plunge pool, sauna and hot tub. Treatments include massage and facials. The Riviera Maya coastline is ideal for diving and snorkelling. Guests can visit the Mayan ruins at Tulum, as well as the resort of Playa del Carmen, which can be reached within 15 minutes by car.

name: Hacienda Tres Rios Resort Spa & Nature Park
address: Carretera Cancún-Tulum, Km. 54, 77760 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Heaven at Hard Rock Hotel Riviera Maya - Adults Only
address: Km. 72 Carretera Cancun-Tulum, 77710 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: This stylish holiday resort is located in one of the most impressive and inspiring places of the world, right next to the beach and facing the warm waters of the Caribbean Sea. The resort offers an authentic rock star lifestyle experience for adults only and has its own private beach as well as various swimming pools. The guest rooms are tastefully decorated and feature high-quality amenities, such as a relaxing hydro spa tub for couples, which will ensure an unforgettable stay on the Riviera Maya. Travellers who stay in this hotel may enjoy exquisite national and international cuisine choosing between different on-site restaurants and bars. The establishment boasts a wide range of activities and leisure options during the day, and when the sun goes down guests may enjoy fantastic parties with professional DJ's. The spa, with its huge variety of treatments, is the best place to relax and recharge batteries after being dancing all night.FarePortal

name: The Royal Haciendas All Suites Resort & Spa
address: Km 289 Carretera Federal Chetumal - Puerto Juarez Lote 2 Mz 70, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located next to the beach on the Mayan Riviera, the Royal Haciendas Resort & Spa offers luxury suites set in tropical gardens. The complex offers swimming pools, tennis courts and a free shuttle to Playa del Carmen. All accommodations have free Wi-Fi, and many suites have a seating area with a flat-screen cable TV and DVD player. Some also have wonderful ocean views. All reservations include two complimentary tickets for the Cancun Mayan Museum. Transportation not included. The Royal Haciendas complex has a spa and wellness centre with Turkish baths. There is also a fitness centre. The beach next to the complex offers loungers and parasols. The Hacienda complex offers activities including diving. Nearby Playa del Carmen offers a good range of shops, bars and restaurants, as well as beautiful natural surroundings. Cancun International Airport is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Barcelo Maya Caribe
address: Carretera Chetumal, 77750 Xpu Há, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Mahekal Beach Front Resort & Spa
address: 38 St And The Beach, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Welcome to the enchanting and magical Mayan paradise in Playa del Carmen - Mexico. Nestled between lush tropical gardens rich in flora and fauna - the vast white sandy beach and the indescribable turquoise water of the Caribbean Sea await you. Among the most pictures accommodations in Playa del Carmen - the Mahekal Beach Resort is a beach front hotel with exquisite hotel accommodation with unique spa services and exciting Mayan excursions to the nearby ancient ruins. The resort has well established roots in the area and provides the perfect getaways for guests since 1982. Our resort welcomes guests to our unique 4 star resort retreat with thatched roof palapas and spacious - oceanfront rooms featuring private terraces or balconies. The resort is located on the Caribbean Sea with a gorgeous beach in Playa del Carmen along the Riviera Maya. Convenient to the shops and restaurants of 5th Avenue - or "La Quinta" as it is known locally.iHotelier/iStay

name: Bluebay Grand Esmeralda
address: Carr. Chetumal - Puerto Juárez Km 300, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: The hotel is located on the Riviera Mayan about 15 minutes north of Playa del Carmen, with its restaurants, bars, exciting nightlife and shopping opportunities, and 35 minutes from Cancun International Airport. Links to public transport can be found 15 min from the hotel. Property located on 180-acres of beachfront overlooking the azure waters of Mexico's beautiful Mayan RivieraWebBeds

name: The Royal Haciendas Resort and Spa
address: Chetumal / Pto. Juarez Highway, Km 289 10 Lote 2, Mz 70, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: The Riviera Maya EDITION (SM) at Kanai
address: Paseo Kanai 14, 77730 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located on a pristine beachfront site, in the blissful stretch of Caribbean coastline, The Riviera Maya EDITION at Kanai features 182 guestrooms and suites situated within the luxurious Kanai development, and home to five food and beverage outlets including a signature restaurant, pool bar and beach club, destination spa and an expansive 4000 sqm Penthouse Suite. In addition to multiple meeting spaces, the hotel also houses an extensive outdoor deck for large-scale events and parties. The Riviera Maya EDITION at Kanai is the first property in Mexico, proud representative of the collection of individualized, customized, one-of-a-kind hotels conceived by Ian Schrager in collaboration with Marriott International.Marriott

name: Serenity Authentic Glamping Tulum
address: Carretera Federal Xpu-Ha Km 265 Lote 6, 77790 Xpu Há, Quintana Roo
description: Offering a garden and year-round outdoor pool, the property is located 18 km south of Playa del Carmen, 27 km from the famous Tulum archaeological site and at just 200 metres away from Xpu-Ha beach. The luxurious tented camp is surrounded by the native jungle and offer king and queen size beds, a colonial type desk, chair and large mirror. En suite bathrooms, toilet and separate shower plate are also included. Other facilities offered at the property include a destination expert desk, luggage storage and an array of activities that can be enjoyed in the surroundings, including snorkeling and diving. The property offers free parking. Playa del Carmen is only 20 minutes away and can be also reached via the shuttle service (extra fee).

name: El Dorado Maroma By Karisma - Adults Only
address: Carretera Cancun - Tulum Km. 55.3, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Maroma Beach and offering the renowned Gourmet Inclusive Experience by Karisma, El Dorado Maroma is a resort featuring 2 beachfront locations plus a beachfront wedding chapel. The full-service spa offers massages, facials, special body treatments and a beauty salon with an extra charge. The suites and rooms feature views of the lush tropical gardens, and are decorated with a contemporary Caribbean style. All feature air conditioning, ceiling fans, satellite TV, a minibar stock with beer, soft drinks, water and juices and a coffee maker. The bathroom is equipped with vanity mirrors, hairdryer, and a shower. The Gourmet Inclusive Experience offers different restaurants boasting a fusion of Mexican and Caribbean cuisine, typical dishes from the Orient at the restaurant, Italian cuisine, and a gourmet restaurant presenting an open-kitchen concept with burgers, tacos, fish, brochettes, BBQ and typical Spanish paella. There are several swim-up bars, a classic lounge bar and 24-hour room service. Cancun International Airport can be reached in a 60-minute drive.

name: Hilton Playa Del Carmen Adult Only Resort
address: Av. Constituyentes No. 2, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel is located 55.5km away from Cancun International Airport. Major attractions near the location include Xplor Park (8.5km), Xcaret Park (10km) and Rio Secreto (19km). Facilities and amenities include bar, concierge facilities, free Wi-Fi, gym/fitness facilities, lounge area, restaurant, sauna and spa facilities. Rooms feature Wi-Fi, room service, mini bar/fridge, TV, safe in room, telephone, air conditioning, tea/cofee maker, hairdryer, balcony/terrace and radio. Please note that some of the above facilities may be closed due to weather / seasonal conditions. Address: Avenida Constituyentes 2 Gonzalo Guerrero, 77710 Playa del Carmen Mexico.Ticket Package

name: Viceroy Riviera Maya, a Luxury Villa Resort
address: Playa Xcalacoco Frac 7, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located on the coast of Xcalacoco Beach 10 minutes outside of Playa del Carmen, this luxury resort and spa situated in the tropical rainforest features a restaurant. The villas at Viceroy Riviera Maya are furnished with a private kidney-shaped pool and flat-screen TVs with DVD players. Free Wi-Fi is provided and room service is available. This pet-friendly resort hosts a spa and wellness centre offering a hot tub, steam room, and personal massages. Yoga classes take place on the beach. A gym and outdoor pool are also part of the resort’s facilities. A concierge service is available. The passenger ferry to Cozumel is less than 15 minutes from Viceroy Riviera Maya. Xcaret Eco Park is less than 20 minutes from the resort.

name: Royal Hideaway Playacar
address: Lote Hotelero No 6 Desarollo, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: The Royal Hideaway Playacar Adults Only hotel is located on the white sands of an idyllic beach on the Riviera Maya and is very close to key points of interest such as Playa del Carmen. This adults only hotel is situated by the beach in Playacar zone, 4 km from the center of Playa del Carmen, 11 km from an amusement park, and 61 km from Cancun International Airport. Facilities and services include a 24-hour reception, air conditioning, bar, free car parking, meeting/ banquet facilities (extra charge), elevator, free Wi-Fi, garde, gym, ironing facilities, laundry facilities (extra charge), massage (extra charge), outdoor pool, restaurant, safe, terrace, and spa centre. Rooms feature air conditioning, TV, telephone, free Wi-Fi, mini bar, safe, coffee/ tea maker, bathroom, and hairdryer. Please note that some of the above facilities may be closed due to weather / seasonal conditions. Address: Lote Hotelero No 6, Desarrollo Playacar, 77710, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo, MexicoWebBeds

name: Family Concierge at Paradisus La Esmeralda
address: Quinta Avenida Esquina Calle 112 Norte Lote 1 Manzana 569, 77719 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This luxury seafront resort surrounded by a lush tropical mangrove offers spectacular views of the Caribbean Sea and Cozumel Island. It offers a family concierge, free Wi-fi and free on-site parking. Guests can relax at the resort's Yhi spa and enjoy a variety of body and facial treatments, Thalassotherapy or a massage. All rooms have a modern bathroom including a sensory tub and a rain shower. Some include a hot tub and special children’s bathroom amenities. The hotel is about 45 minutes from Cancún International Aiport and just 3 km from the centre of Playa del Carmen. Xcaret eco archaeological park is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Barceló Maya Colonial
address: Ctra. Federal Chetumal-Puerto Juarez KM 266.3, 77750 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Mexico's beautiful Mayan Riviera is home to this exceptional beachfront resort, offering a variety of on-site activities and entertainment along with numerous dining options, spacious swimming pools and comfortable accommodations. Begin the day at the Barcelo Maya Colonial Beach with a delicious meal from one of the 7 on-site restaurants. Enjoy lounging by one of 3 swimming pools or participate in the resort's daily group activities, including horseback riding through the forest. Relax with a cocktail from one of the Maya Colonial's numerous on-site bars or take advantage of on-site diving lessons, kayak rentals or basketball courts. Finish the evening at the on-site nightclub or play a game on the resort's mini-golf course.

name: Grand Riviera Princess All Suites & Spa Resort
address: Prolongacion 5ta Avenida, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Surrounded by tropical gardens and an extensive pool landscape, the Grand Riviera Princess has Mayan inspired architecture with thatched roofs and enjoys a wonderful setting directly on the white sandy beach and the crystal-clear waters of the Caribbean Sea. Various thematic restaurants leave no culinary wish unfulfilled, 10 bars and a wide range of services and amenities are at guests disposition.FarePortal

name: El Dorado Royale a Spa Resort by Karisma - Adults only
address: Km 45 Carretera Cancun, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: El Dorado Royale is an adults-only, beachfront resort on The Riviera Maya. It features 14 restaurants with the exclusive Gourmet Inclusive Experience, more than a mile of a secluded beach area, a lavish spa, and concierge services. A wonderful cenote site can be found within 25 minutes' drive away. The elegant suites and rooms at El Dorado Royal offer an indoor hot tub, bathrobes, cable TV, a furnished terrace with a small table, 2 chairs and a hammock upon request, plus a private bathroom including a hairdryer. The minibar is daily stocked with beer, soft drinks and water, plus there is a coffee maker available. The Gourmet Inclusive Experience includes flavours from the international cuisine, contemporary Italian dishes, Pacific flavours, Caribbean selection, authentic Mexican delights, traditional Italian and gourmet pizzas, among others. Naay Spa is divided into Spa Royale and Spa Casitas. Both offer an extensive menu of traditional and alternative spa treatments. Other activities that guests can enjoy at this resort include diving lessons and the rental of the equipment, a gift shop on site, WiFi access, tennis lessons and wave runners to cruise the sea.

name: Platinum Yucatan Princess All Suites -Adults Only
address: Prolongación 5ta Avenida Manzana 20 Lote 006, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool and a spa and wellness centre, Platinum Yucatan Princess Adults Only - All InclusiveAll Suites & Spa Resort is located 10 km from Playa del Carmen main square. Free WiFi access is available throughout. The suites will provide you with a TV and air conditioning. Featuring a spa bath, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and bathrobes. Extras include a minibar, an iPod dock and a seating area. At Platinum Yucatan Princess Adults Only - All InclusiveAll Suites & Spa Resort you will find 1 international buffet and 4 a la carte restaurants (without previous reservation), a tennis court and a fitness centre. Other facilities offered at the property include entertainment staff, a nightclub and water sports facilities. This property is 10 minutes’ drive from Plaza Las Américas Shopping Centre and 18 km from Xcaret Park. Cancún International Airport is 50 km away.

name: Andaz Mayakoba a Concept By Hyatt - All Inclusive
address: Carretera Federal Cancun - Playa Del Carmen Km 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Paradisus La Perla – Adults Only
address: 5ta Avenida, Esquina Calle 112, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in a stunning little bay, the hotel is within walking distance of beaches and Playa del Carmen town centre. There is a plethora of attractions in the vicinity and the hotel is also close to famous Mayan archaeological sites such as Tulum, Chichen Itza and Coba. Paradisus La Perla Adults Only features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property. The resort has an outdoor pool and hot tub, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant Free private parking is available on site. Room Service – Included. Service charge of $5 usd per delivery applies. Royal Service categories will have the service included with no extra fee. A supplement applies to book Bali Beds located at La Perla or La Esmeralda swimming pool area.FarePortal

name: Valentin Imperial Maya - Adults Only
address: Carr.Fed.307 Chetumal, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This luxurious resort is located 25 minutes from International Cancun Airport, 30 minutes from Cancun and only 20 minutes from Playa del Carmen. With more than half a mile white sand beach, located in Playa del Secreto (The Secret Beach) in the Riviera Maya.WebBeds

name: Singular Joy Vacation Rentals
address: Calle 14 norte esquina con 1ra av. norte bis, mz 35 lt 9, colonia centro, playa del carmen, solidaridad Qroo, CP 77710, 77720 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Singular Joy Vacation Rentals has an outdoor swimming pool, bar, jauzzi, a shared lounge and garden in Playa del Carmen. Located around 150 metres from Playa del Carmen Beach, the hotel with free WiFi is also less than 1 km away from Playacar Beach. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Certain rooms come with a kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. At Singular Joy Vacation Rentals rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Located in the heart of the nightclub district so it is very convenient for guests looking for nightlife options. Night Club District, Indigo Beach Club,Zenzi Beach Club and Lido Beach Club. Popular points of interest near Singular Joy Vacation Rentals include ADO International Bus Station, Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal and Kool Beach Club. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 21 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Fairmont Mayakoba
address: Carretera Federal Cancun - Playa Del Carmen Km 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: With the Caribbean Sea on one side and 240 acres of tropical forest and sparkling lagoons on all others, Fairmont Mayakoba is a hidden paradise on the coast of Mexico. Our private gated resort invites you to reconnect with nature, while enjoying all the services and facilities of an AAA Five Diamond hotel. Delve into your lush surroundings, play in the waves at nearby Playa del Carmen or relax poolside at our 5-star Riviera Maya hotel. Then dine on a decadent variety of cuisines in our restaurants.accorhotels.com

name: Hidden Beach Resort Au Naturel by Karisma - Adults only
address: KM.95 Carretera Cancun-Tulum Kantenah, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Hidden Beach Resort Au Naturel Club Gourmet All In is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Playa Del Carmen. The property offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. To be found at the property are 24-hour front desk, valet parking, room service, airport transfer, car hire. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room, or take advantage of the hot tub, private beach, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool. Convenience and comfort make Hidden Beach Resort Au Naturel Club Gourmet All In the perfect choice for your stay in Playa Del Carmen.Agoda

name: Andaz Mayakoba - a concept by Hyatt
address: Carretera Federal Cancun-Playa Del Carmen Km. 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Offering two outdoor pools and a private beach area, Upscale Andaz Mayakoba is in the gated Mayakoba complex in Playa del Carmen. The resort has a spa centre and sauna, and guests can enjoy a meal at one of the 4 restaurants. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and free private parking is available on this pet friendly property. Every room at this resort is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Some units have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Certain units include views of the sea or lake. Rooms include a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes and slippers. The restaurant offer cover fine dinning with Casa Amate, fresh and local ingredients with relaxed environment with Cocina Milagro, and beachfront street and sea food at Sotavento and Tinta del Pulpo. Room service is also available 24 hours. This elegant resort offers a Mayan Oasis Spa with 6 massage rooms and a hydrotherapy circuit centre and sauna and access to El Camaleón Golf Club and the Mayakoba Tennis Centre. This resort has water sports facilities and free use of bicycles is available. You can engage in various activities, such as golfing and snorkelling. Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 9 km from Andaz Mayakoba, while Church of Guadalupe is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancun International Airport, 40 km from Andaz Mayakoba - a concept by Hyatt. This hotel only accepts credit cards, debit cards and, where applicable, other contactless forms of payment. It is a cash-free environment

name: El Taj Oceanfront & Beachside Condo Hotel
address: 1 Norte Esquina Calle 14 Norte, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set in tropical gardens next to Playa del Carmen Beach, these luxury suites offer access to an infinity pool, outdoor hot tub and spa. Guests enjoy free access to the beach club. Suites at El Taj Oceanfront Condo Hotel offer a large terrace. El Taj property is composed by two buildings. Oceanfront suites offer sea views and direct beach access, while Beachside suites overlook the pool, fish pond and gardens. Each spacious suite has elegant Bali-inspired décor and a typical palapa thatched roof. A Smart TV and modern kitchen are included. Gourmet cuisine is served in El Taj Condo’s ASI restaurant, while pizzas, snacks and drinks are available in the beach bar. You can also request a private chef to prepare meals in your suite. El Taj is situated in central Playa del Carmen, just 2 blocks from Fifth Avenue. This popular boulevard is home to boutiques, pavement cafés, bars and restaurants.

name: Palmaia, The House of AiA
address: Paseo Xaman Ha, Lt.1, Playacar, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Strategically situated at the tail end of the most beautiful beach in the Riviera Maya, The House of AïA brings us Palmaïa, an exclusive beach enclave focused on connecting us to nature, ourselves, and the sanctity of life. Every effort was taken to ensure the original landscape remains untouched to feel the healing authenticity of old-growth trees and naturally occurring, cool-water cenotes. All guests reside in ocean-front suites: some with swim-out access to the infinity pools, others with sweeping views of the sea, and a few nestled among the ocean-side mangroves. Guests also enjoy high-end amenities without sacrificing environmentally friendly practices, while the restaurants offer the best cuisine in the region, extensive plant-based options, and impeccable style. But even still, the real jewels are the Architects of Life personal growth program and the Rituals of Sound series. The Hotel is Pet Friendly, for more information contact the hotel.FarePortal

name: Grand Hyatt Playa Del Carmen Resort
address: 1a Avenida Esquina Calle 26, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Offering 3 ocean-front outdoor pools and a spa and wellness centre with spectacular architecture resembling a Cenote, Grand Hyatt Playa del Carmen Resort is located in Mamita’s Beach. The design concept has crafted natural elements, artwork, textures and light. The rooms will provide you with a TV, air conditioning, iPod dock and seating area. Complete with a coffee machine, the dining area also has a dining table. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. Extras include free WiFi in all rooms and floor-to-ceiling windows featuring amazing views. At Grand Hyatt Playa del Carmen Resort you will find 2 restaurants serving steak specialties and international cuisine, 3 bars and a fitness centre. Unique food and beverage concepts and signature offerings from our restaurants and bars, such as Sushi "n" Raw Seafood Bar and La Cocina, will set the stage for you to enjoy the local flavors of Grand Hyatt Playa del Carmen Resort. Room Service available 24 hours. Other facilities offered at the property include water sports facilities, meeting facilities, Beauty Salon and a games room. There is also a multi-purpose ballroom plus fifteen meeting rooms and various indoor and outdoor pre-function areas for events. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out the famous shopping, gastronomic and party scenes at La Quinta Avenida. This resort is 55.5 km from Cancún International Airporttional Airport.

name: Unico 20°n 87°w - Riviera Maya - Adults Only
address: Manzana 22 Carretera Chetumal-Pto Juare, 77710 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Akumal, a few steps from Kantenah Beach, Unico Hotel Riviera Maya Adults Only offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. 30 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal and 30 km from ADO International Bus Station, the property provides a range of water sports facilities, as well as a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the resort, the rooms include a wardrobe. All rooms have air conditioning, and some units at Unico Hotel Riviera Maya Adults Only have a balcony. All guest rooms feature a safety deposit box. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and vegetarian options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Indonesian and Italian cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. You can play billiards at this 5-star resort, and the area is popular for snorkelling. Tulum Archeological Site is 33 km from Unico Hotel Riviera Maya Adults Only, while Xel Ha is 19 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 45 km from the resort.

name: Ocean Maya Royale - Adults Only
address: Carretera Federal Chetumal, km. 299, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Offering endless activities, international on-site dining and full-service spa treatments, Ocean Maya Royale provides oceanfront accommodations. Guests can enjoy direct beach access in the heart of the Mayan Riviera, near Cozumel and Cancun. With an on-site scuba diving center and daily organized activities, there is something for everyone at the Ocean Maya Royale. Take advantage of the resort's nightly live entertainment or relax in one of the 2 oceanfront swimming pools. Sample a large variety of dining options while staying at the Ocean Maya Royale, including authentic Japanese cuisine and traditional Mexican dishes. The resort also features several on-site bars. In the area surrounding the Ocean Maya Royale, discover a large variety of recreational activities, including jet skiing and guided jungle tours. The area is also home to one of the world's largest coral reefs, and is ideal for scuba diving or snorkeling.

name: Sandos Caracol Eco Experience Resort
address: Carretera Cancún Chetumal Km. 295, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This property is located on the beachfront. Featuring a spa, 9 restaurants and 2 outdoor pools and an water park with 29 water slides for kids and adults, Sandos Caracol Eco Resort is set on Playa del Carmen Beach, overlooking Cozumel Island. Some of the rooms have balconies overlooking the Caribbean Sea. Sandos Caracol Eco Resort is in beautiful gardens and features bright accommodations. All rooms have flat-screen TVs, air conditioning and a minibar. Wi-Fi is available for free in public areas. Sandos Caracol Eco Resort features lessons, including yoga and scuba diving. There is also a water sports center, evening entertainment, and children's and teen's activities. Spa facilities include a sauna, hot tub and gym. There are 3 buffetes including international and itialian, plus 6 a la carte restaurants (Oriental, Mexican Brazilian, Italian, Mediterranean and stake house), we also have a 24 hour snack bar available. There are ecological activities for the whole family. The Sandos Caracol Eco Resort is 3.2 km from the Church of Guadalupe and a 45-minute drive from Cancún Airport. The Gran Coral Golf Riviera Maya is located within the same estate as the Sandos.

name: Dreams Puerto Aventuras Resort & Spa
address: Km 269.5 Carretera Chetumal, 77750 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: Set on Quintana Beach and featuring a spa and outdoor pool, Dreams Aventuras Riviera Maya Resort has luxurious rooms overlooking its gardens, or the sea. It has 6 restaurants and a diving centre. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms at the Puerto Aventuras Resort & Spa come with a balcony. Each has subtle, Mexican-style décor with tiled floors. All feature a flat-screen TV and minibar. A range of cuisine including Italian, Mexican and grilled seafood, is on offer in the Aventuras’ restaurants. There is also an international buffet and a beach bar. Guests can relax on the charming terrace, which features thatched palapa shelters. The on-site spa has a range of hot tubs, plunge pools and steam baths. Treatments on offer include reflexology, aromatherapy and wraps. The resort is a 20-minute drive from the Mayan ruins at Tulum. The popular resort of Playa del Carmen is less than 20 km away. Family friendly hotel, please see fine print for additional information.

name: Hard Rock Hotel Riviera Maya
address: Km 72, Carretera Cancun-Chetumal, 77701 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: Bordered by a private white sand beach and lush tropical landscapes, this decadent luxury resort pulls out all the stops for an unreal holiday for families and couples alike. The resort is situated near Playa del Carmen on the Mayan Riviera, less than 50 kilometres from the pre-Colombian Mayan ruins of Tulum. Visitors will have many opportunities to explore the area with excursions to Tulum and Chichen-Itza archaeological sites, and can swim with dolphins or even tour the Hard Rock sister hotel in Cancun. Each room offers generous proportions, a hydro spa bathtub, private balcony, and a range of state-of-the-art amenities, all decorated with vibrant colours and textures. Guests will delight in the private beach, children's pool and family pool, and the resort also offers a sophisticated and opulent adults-only hotel with four pools, nine imaginative restaurants and six lavish bars exclusively for adults. generalViajes Exito Hotels

name: Blue Diamond Luxury Boutique Hotel Adults Only
address: Km. 298.8 Carretera #307, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: "Blue Diamond Luxury Boutique has 4 Diamond Award Resort, is set in tropical gardens in the Riviera Maya. It offers attractive Suites, a spa, 3 outdoor pools, golf course nearby. Blue Diamond Luxury Boutique suites have a terrace or garden, some with private pool, and include views of the Caribbean Sea, cenotes or lagoons. All have a plasma TV, CD and DVD player and a rain shower. The hotel offers a wide variety of food options. There are 3 restaurants and a tapas bar, as well as a lounge bar, cafeteria and poolside snack bar. Also room service is available with extra charge. The resort has a gym, while the spa provides beauty therapies. Other activities include yoga, pilates and watsu. There is also a boutique and a beauty salon. Cancun International Airport is 35 minutes’ drive from the Blue Diamond Luxury Boutique."

name: Barceló Maya Beach
address: Carr Chetumal Puerto Juarez Km 266.3, 77750 Xpu Há, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Hacienda del Mar Los Cabos
address: Corredor Turístico Sjc-Csl, KM. 10 Lote D, Cabo Del Sol, 23455 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Experience the beauty and charm of Hacienda del Mar Los Cabos Resort, a stunning architectural masterpiece with a classic Mexican Hacienda flair. Elegant guest villas with balconies are scattered across lush, tropical gardens overlooking a private beach on the Emerald Sea of Cortez. Enjoy a seamless blend of traditional Mexican charm and contemporary style with exceptional service unlike anywhere else. Situated in the prestigious Cabo del Sol development, the resort features 270 guest rooms and suites, the restorative Cactus SPA™, a fitness center with a steam room and sauna, a variety of restaurants to choose from, evening entertainment, and sparkling pools that create an atmosphere of pure indulgence. For timeless celebrations, our planners can assist in an unforgettable beach wedding or ballroom gathering, curated in every way.Marriott

name: Waldorf Astoria Los Cabos Pedregal
address: Camino Del Mar 1, 23455 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Welcome to Waldorf Astoria Los Cabos Pedregal, where desert beauty meets the deep blue sea. Boasting a cliffside location along 24 acres of dramatic mountains and pristine beaches, enter paradise through the private Dos Mares tunnel and begin your exclusive experience in unprecedented luxury. Every resort guest room is spacious and refined, stocked with the soothing amenities our guests expect, and includes a private plunge pool to calm and center you. Opt for a suite to enjoy butler service. Other luxuries for your stay: - Award-winning Forbes five-star signature spa offering 10 private treatment rooms - 3 pools, including infinity pool overlooking the Pacific, saltwater pool, and kids pool - Culinary offerings including signature restaurant Don Manuel's and cliffside El Farallon - Curated, luxury experience highlighting the Baja Peninsula's land, wildlife, and people - Traditional indoor and unique outdoor oceanfront event space Our Waldorf Astoria resort is close to Los Cabos International Airport, and shuttle service is provided.Hilton

name: Esperanza, Auberge Resorts Collection
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 7, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated on the coast of the Pacific Ocean, this luxury resort is 19 km from downtown Los Cabos. It features a beachfront infinity pool, spa boutique, and free yoga sessions. Each spacious cabana-style room at the Cabo San Lucas Esperanza Resort is furnished with high ceilings and a large, private terrace. Guests can watch the flat-screen TV, use the free Wi-Fi, or charge their iPod with the iPod docking station. This resort boasts a private beach with concierge services. There is a large state-of-the-art gym and an on-site art gallery. Cocina del Mar, part of the resort, is carved into the cliffs overlooking the ocean and serves Baja-inspired cuisine. La Terraza Americana is open for lunch and offers American dishes in a casual outdoor atmosphere. The infinity pool has a swim-up bar. Cabo San Lucas International Airport is 14.2 km from Esperanza Resort Cabo San Lucas. Downtown San José del Cabo is a 25-minute drive from the property.

name: Hacienda Beach Club & Residences
address: El Medano Ejidal, Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located in a private, gated community in the centre of Cabo San Lucas, this resort features an outdoor swimming pool, spa and concierge service. There is free on-site parking and free Wi-Fi is available throughout. All air-conditioned villas feature an elegant décor with natural stone floors, granite countertops and ceramic tiles. All bedrooms include a flat-screen TV and en-suite bathrooms. The master bedroom includes a spa bath and walk-in shower. Each villa has a furnished balcony with sea views and is equipped with a dishwasher, washing machine, dryer and wine storage cabinet. The spacious living room is equipped with a recessed sound system and satellite TV. Guests can enjoy local and international meals and drinks at Hacienda Cocina y Cantina restaurant. There is also a poolside bar. Hacienda Beach offers a concierge service, 24-hour security and a tour desk. A shuttle service is also available at an additional cost.

name: Montage Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 12.5 Int, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated in Cabo San Lucas, 2.6 km from Medano Beach, Montage Los Cabos features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. The accommodation offers a range of water sports facilities and a private beach area, as well as a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. Certain rooms have a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast is available each morning at the property. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Mexican cuisine. Dairy-free, kosher and vegan options can also be requested. Montage Los Cabos offers a hot tub. You can play table tennis and tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking and snorkelling. Cabo San Lucas Country Club is 2.3 km from the accommodation, while Marina Cabo San Lucas is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 42 km from Montage Los Cabos.

name: El Encanto Resort at Hacienda Encantada
address: Carr Transpeninsular KM 7.3 Suite A3, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: No description found

name: Dreams Los Cabos Suites Golf Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Transpenisular 18.5 Cls-Sjc, 23400 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located 2.6-miles from Chileno Beach, this Los Cabos resort features a full-service spa. Three sparkling pools and yoga on the beach are offered along with ocean views from every suite. This all-suite Dream Los Cabos Suites Golf Resort & Spa features suites with a private terrace overlooking the ocean. Each suite includes a stocked minibar and iPod docking station. The marble bathrooms boast separate bathtubs and showers with slippers and bathrobes provided. On-site dining includes steaks, seafood, Pan Asian and more. Guests at Dream Los Cabos Suites Resort can also choose from a la carte items and buffets. Room service is available as well. Dream Los Cabos Suites Resort & Spa offers tennis clinics, cooking classes and cocktail lessons. A seasonal turtle release event allows guests to participate in helping the Caray Green Sea Turtles.

name: Live Aqua Private Residences Los Cabos
address: Carr. Transpeninsular Km 10.3, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Discover a luxurious paradise nestled within the exclusive oceanfront community of Cabo del Sol. Overlooking the marvelous deep blue waters of the Sea of Corts, the fifth fairway of The Ocean Golf Course designed by Jack Nicklaus and the magnificent beauty of the Baja California Desert, these 35 stunning vacation residences are custom designed with high-end interior and exterior finishes to offer an experience that will likely instill a yearning to return year after year. Live Aqua Private Residence Los Cabos unveiled its multimillion-dollar concept in Fall 2017 to overindulge the senses. Fine dining, a relaxing pool atmosphere, premier beach access, exceptional personalized service and world-class golf just 5 minutes away will surely become the new standard for your family getaways.Please be advised that from now on, an official Sanitation tax of 36.31 MXN per night will be charged in our hotels located in Los Cabos, Baja California Sur.iHotelier/iStay

name: One&Only Palmilla
address: Km 7.5 Carretera Transpeninsular, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: This oceanfront hotel features spa treatments in 13 private villas. A 27-hole golf course and rooms with views of the Pacific Ocean or the Sea of Cortez are available. Guest rooms and suites at the One&Only Palmilla boast Mexican designs. Each includes a patio or a balcony. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV and iPod docking station. This hotel ranked among the top 100 Hotels & Resorts in the World. Dining options at Palmilla One&Only include ‘Mexiterranean’ and Euro Asian cuisines along with fresh sushi. Tequila tastings are also available at Agua and the resort features over 1,500 international wines. Guests can relax in the 2 outdoor pools or play a game of tennis. One&Only Palmilla in San Jose Del Cabo offers private beach access and a state-of-the-art gym. Scuba diving, deep-sea fishing and shopping are minutes from the One&Only Palmilla. Cabo San Lucas is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Grand Velas Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km. 17, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Grand Velas Boutique Los Cabos is the third property of Velas Resorts on the prestigious Touristic Corridor of Los Cabos. A seventy-nine-suite adults-only luxury boutique hotel with exclusive facilities and amenities that takes the best of the Grand Velas brand and elevates it to a level never seen before.Enjoy casual and fine dining restaurants, indoor and outdoor event spaces, a wellness center, an infinity pool overlooking the Sea of Cortez, and a hyper-personalized service that will leave even the most experienced travelers speechless.iHotelier/iStay

name: Zadun-A Ritz-Carlton Reserve
address: Boulevard Mar de Cortez, 23403 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Welcome to Zadún, the first Ritz-Carlton Reserve in Mexico where an authentic and magical experience awaits you. Our resort in San José del Cabo offers an untouched sanctum where desert and ocean collide — in your very own luxurious haven. Allow yourself to be seduced by Puerto Los Cabos, its breathtaking coastline, and a rich culture that will enchant you at every breath. Discover and explore a town with a historical charm and submerged in Spanish colonial flare. A very modern design Mexico has to offer, coupled with the handcrafted work of local artisans, will lay a magical and compelling experience at your feet. With every step you take inside Zadún, you’ll be surrounded by a natural allure and elegance unlike anything you’ve ever seen. Give in to the intimacy of our San José del Cabo hotel hideaway that you can claim as your own, reserved just for you at the end of the Earth.Marriott

name: Viceroy Los Cabos
address: Paseo Malecón Sjc, Lote 8, Zona Hotelera, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: No description found

name: Cabo Surf Hotel & Spa
address: Transpeninsular Highway km 28, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Only 10 minutes’ drive from central San Jose del Cabo, this hotel is located in one of the most popular surfing beaches of the region. It also has spa facilities, outdoor pool and hot tub. The accommodations at Cabo Surf Hotel feature light décor and wooden furniture, plus they include amenities like iPod dockings, flat-screen cable TVs and bathrobes. The bathroom offers luxury brand toiletries and a hairdryer. Wi-Fi connection is also available throughout. The 7 Seas Restaurant serves Mexican and Mediterranean dishes and operates from 07:00 until 22:00 hours. Within 2 km from Cabo Surf, guests will be able to find other food options, which include an Asian-style and salad restaurants. Popular activities that can be performed at Cabo Surf are diving, windsurfing and surfing. The front desk staff may also help the guests with popular sightseeing options. In Cabo San Lucas guests will find several golf courses and is 25 minutes’ drive from the property. Los Cabos International Airport is 23 km away.

name: The Westin Los Cabos Resort Villas - Baja Point
address: Carretera Transpeninsular KM 22.5, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Get away to The Westin Los Cabos Resort Villas – Baja Point. Our oceanfront vacation ownership resort places you along the bustling resort corridor where you can immerse in the picturesque beaches and seaside cliffs of Los Cabos, Mexico. While here, plan to scuba dive amid underwater coral reefs at nearby Cabo Pulmo Marine Preserve or tee off at nearby golf courses. Take a day trip to the famous Los Cabos Arch and after your day of exploring, schedule a revitalizing treatment at our resort’s Spa Otomí or take a swim at our outdoor infinity pool. For our littlest visitors to Mexico, the Westin Kids Club sparks a true vacation adventure. Feel recharged after a brisk run or strength training session in our WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio. Dine on-site at any of our six restaurants and bars, offering international cuisines and a sports bar. Enjoy relaxing in your spacious villa or guest room rental with complimentary Wi-Fi. Catch spectacular sunsets over Los Cabos at our scenic resort every day of your stay.Marriott

name: The Westin Los Cabos Resort Villas
address: Carretera Transpenninsular Km 22.5, 23440 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Experience the ultimate wellness retreat in Los Cabos at The Westin Los Cabos Resort Villas. Situated by the Pacific Ocean and the Sea of Cortez, our family-friendly vacation ownership resort places you steps from the picturesque beaches and seaside cliffs of Los Cabos, Mexico. Scuba dive amid underwater coral reefs at the Cabo Pulmo Marine Preserve and tee off on the rolling greens of nearby golf courses. After sightseeing at the famous Los Cabos Arch, return for a revitalizing treatment at our resort’s Spa Otomi. Our outdoor infinity pool, a 24-hour WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio, tennis courts and a Westin Kids Club activate your vacation in Mexico. Fuel up at our six on-site restaurants and bars that serve a variety of international cuisine or join friends for the big game and a craft brew at our sports bar. As the sun sets on Los Cabos, settle into your comfortable studio or spacious villa accommodations with complimentary Wi-Fi. Escape to our relaxing seaside resort.Marriott

name: Paradisus Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 19.5, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Located in San Jose del Cabo (Cabo Real), Paradisus Los Cabos is situated just 4 km away from a golf club, 13 km from San Jose Del Cabo city center, and 31 km away from Los Cabos International Airport. Facilities and services include a 24-hour reception, air conditioning, babysitting services (extra charge), bar, ATM machine on-site, children's playground, concierge, conference/ banquet facilities, currency exchange, dry cleaning (extra charge), elevator, garden, gym, ironing facilities (extra charge), laundry facilities (extra charge), massage, outdoor pools, safe, restaurant, sauna, and spa facilities, and free Wi-Fi. Rooms feature air conditioning, balcony or terrace, bath and shower, hairdryer, towels, TV with cable/ satellite channels, coffee/ tea facilities, mini bar, safe, and telephone. Address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 19.5, 23400, San Jose Del Cabo, BCS, Mexico.WebBeds

name: Pueblo Bonito Pacifica Resort and Spa
address: Cabo Pacifica, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated on a 2.5-mile stretch of pristine Cabo San Lucas, Mexico beach, the upscale all-inclusive Pueblo Bonito Pacifica Resort & Spa beckons visitors with the promise of tranquil seclusion on the Pacific coast. Adults only Situated on the garden level of the resort, Deluxe Rooms feature sliding glass doors that open an exterior patio appointed with comfortable teak furnishings and direct access to the garden. Tranquil views of the extensive cactus garden complement the added convenience of direct garden, access just steps out the door. Deluxe rooms maintain the motif of luxury without indulgence featuring the finest natural materials and Zen-inspired amenities. Accents of onyx inlaid in the guestroom entry doors allow sunlight to enter and fill the room with warm, relaxing hues, and add drama and a glow to the stylish bathroom. A cedar armoire houses On Command video and television and high-speed Internet access is also available. The bedroom is furnished with one king bed or two queen feather top beds and a pillow menu to accommodate each guest. A modern yet elegant approach to design and architecture presents luxury without limitations for a memorable vacation of relaxation and self renewal. Nestled on a secluded beach is the Cabo San Lucas luxury all-inclusive resort hideaway of Pueblo Bonito Pacifica Resort & Spa. Pueblo Bonito Pacifica Resort & Spa, a tranquil retreat for adults, is an award-winning resort and spa destination that offers full-service amenities and facilities, including five restaurants, a wellness-inspired spa, oceanview accommodations, meetings and event space, and private beach privileges.WebBeds

name: Solaz, A Luxury Collection Resort, Los Cabos
address: Km 18 5 Carretera Transpeninsular Csl-sj, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Covet is our prime location on the beach at Solaz, a Luxury Collection Resort, Los Cabos. Enjoy easy access from our luxury hotel to the Baja peninsula, downtown San Jose del Cabo and Marina Cabo San Lucas. Our contemporary luxury hotel in San Jose, Los Cabos features rooms and suites with an ideal respite and exquisite designs, luxury beds, marble floors and custom furnishings. Our resort's custom floor plans blur the line between indoor and outdoor spaces. Many rooms boast private entrances with secluded, furnished patios, outdoor showers, private plunge pools and unobstructed views of the beach and Sea of Cortez. Pamper yourself in San Jose del Cabo at our hotel spa after you sample our resort's diverse dining options. Stay fit in our 24-hour fitness center with help from a personal trainer. Then relax in one of two heated infinity pools while the kids enjoy our two heated children's pools. A truly blissful experience awaits you at Solaz.Marriott

name: Hotel Palmas De Cortez
address: Calle 20 de Noviembre # 2, 23330 Los Barriles, Baja California Sur
description: Offering spa service, a gym, swimming pool, on-site windsurfing and tennis courts, Hotel Palmas de Cortez is located right on Los Barriles Beach. Buena Vista Beach is less than 4 km away. The accommodation offers contemporary décor, air conditioning, ceiling fan, telephone and TV. The private bathrooms feature shower and include free toiletries. This complex features a restaurant serving international food and Mexican-style cuisine. There are also a swim-up bar, a pool-side bar and a lounge bar on site. Guests at Hotel Palmas de Cortez can arrange activities as eco-tours, fishing, kayaking, paddle boards and ATV rentals. There is also a playground area, children’s pool and tennis court. Events facilities as conference rooms, meeting rooms, exhibit spaces and banquets facilities are also available as well shuttle services with an extra charge. This property is 500 metres from the ExotiKite Kiteboarding School. Santiago Zoo is 23 km away and Los Cabos International Airport is a 50-minute drive away.

name: Barcelo Gran Faro Los Cabos
address: Blvd. San Jose, Sección Hotelera 1 Zona Fonatur | | San Jose Del Cabo, B.C.S. México || México, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: The Barceló Gran Faro Los Cabos (5-star) hotel is a Premium-level resort complex located overlooking the impressive waters of the Gulf of California. It's a perfect hotel for enjoying tranquility, thanks to its exclusive location 1.6 miles from San José, a colonial town famous for its cultural atmosphere and restaurants. The hotel has 350 luxurious rooms and suites, all of which have a private balcony with views of the Sea of Cortez and are fully equipped with first class conveniences to guarantee a memorable stay.FarePortal

name: The Club at Solaz
address: Corredor Turístico Csl-Sjc Km. 18.5, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Magnificent beach front resort located on the Tourist Corridor between the golden of the Baja California desert and the turquoise waters of the Sea of Cortez. Designed by Sordo Madaleno Architects to create a sculpture integrated to the landscape with ocean views from all areas of the resort.A nature-inspired refuge that is meant to bring balance, harmony and freedom to those who step inside and combines Mexican contemporary style with modern sophistication and exclusivity, that provides luxury and comfort of modernity merging in perfect tune with nature.Quarry stone, granite, marble, wood, and textures harmonize to establish an intimate bond between the complex and its location.Landscaped by Jernimo Gabayet; the selection consists of a mixture of trees, bushes and flowers of endemic and exotic origin. Together paint a grandiose atmosphere full of life and color, providing the surroundings with the natural beauty that can only come from the earth and keep our guests in touch with the Baja California Surs unique wonders.Immaculate and refined art from the renowned Mexican artist Csar Lpez Negrete, whos challenge was to make our guests to be able to remember Solaz Los Cabos through its art collection that consists of 772 pieces displayed throughout the property and longing to return time after time.iHotelier/iStay

name: Four Seasons Resort Los Cabos at Costa Palmas
address: Calle Hacienda Eureka, 23570 La Ribera, Baja California Sur
description: Set within the thousand-acre private resort community of Costa Palmas along the secluded East Cape of Mexico’s Baja Sur, the Four Seasons Resort Los Cabos at Costa Palmas™ is a haven of exquisite beauty and serenity. From its two-mile stretch of pristine beach and swimmable waters, to its sublime location—just 45 minutes from Los Cabos International Airport, yet far from the crowded Cabo resorts—this idyllic retreat makes for an ideal tropical luxury getaway. The Resort offers many open-air public spaces including the lobby and nearly all dining venues; its low-lying architectural footprint precludes the need for shared elevators or hallways. Natural light permeates the guest rooms and suites, which are designed by Todd-Avery Lenahan of TAL Studio. All accommodations showcase striking views of the Sea of Cortez as well as spacious private terraces; first-floor guest rooms and suites also boast private plunge pools. Choose from several exceptional dining options: Estiatorio Milos, Chef Costas Spiliadis’s famed Mediterranean seafood restaurant featuring a market-style menu of impeccable seafood; Casa de Brasa, a Baja-inspired brasserie; El Puesto, serving sea-to-table ceviche, tiraditos, and crudo; Limón, an all fresco bar and grill; and Ginger’s, an all-day eclectic café. Indulge in the Resort’s array of refined on-site amenities, including Costa Palmas Golf Club, a Robert Trent Jones II eighteen-hole golf course, a leading-edge sports and fitness facility designed by world-renowned fitness expert Harley Pasternak, six refreshing swimming pools, and a blissful Oasis spa, and wellness center featuring ten free-standing treatment sanctuaries. Let the Resort’s Adventure Concierge help you unlock the East Cape—Mexico’s best-kept secret—by arranging any number of exhilarating land and sea activities: hiking to hidden waterfalls, swimming alongside the majestic whale shark, surfing in legendary waters, snorkeling in the nearby UNESCO World Heritage site of Cabo Pulmo, sport fishing in the Sea of Cortez, off-roading through desert dunes, sailing from the Resort’s marina, horseback riding amid vibrant natural beauty, and more.

name: Las Ventanas al Paraiso, A Rosewood Resort
address: KM 19.5 Ctra. Transpeninsular, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Rooms Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 71 guestrooms, featuring fireplaces and plasma televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. Satellite programming and iPod docking stations are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature jetted bathtubs and designer toiletries. Amenities Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find outdoor tennis courts, an outdoor pool, and a spa tub. Additional features at this resort include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this resort consist of a conference center and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Las Ventanas al Paraiso, A Rosewood Resort in San José del Cabo, you'll be on the beach, just a 1-minute walk from Baja California Peninsula and 6 minutes by foot from Cuadra San Francisco. This 5-star resort is 6.5 mi (10.5 km) from Santa Maria Beach and 11.6 mi (18.7 km) from Medano Beach. Dining Grab a bite at The Sea Grill, one of the resort's 5 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the coffee shop/cafe. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. name: Villa del Palmar Beach Resort & Spa Cabo San Lucas
address: Camino Viejo A San Jose Km 0.5, Col. Playa El Meda, 23453 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Villa del Palmar Beach Resort & Spa, located on the Gulf of California, features suites with balconies and fully equipped kitchens. It offers two pools, a waterslide and three restaurants. Suites provide dining areas, minibars and seating areas with sofa beds. They also include satellite TV and safety deposit boxes. Wi-Fi is available. Villa del Palmar Beach Resort and Spa features a private beach area along with tennis, a gym and business center are available to guests. The on-site Las Tortugas Restaurant Cabo features musical shows and theatrical productions. The resort provides babysitting and car rentals and has a convenience store and tour desk. Villa del Palmar Beach Resort & Spa, located in Baja California Sur, Mexico, is within 3 miles of Cabo Sailing and Cabo San Lucas Country Club. It is 20 miles from Casa Dahlia Art Gallery.

name: Krystal Grand Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 29, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: BEL AIR COLLECTION RESORT AND SPA LOS CABOS - ALL is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in San Jose Del Cabo. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at BEL AIR COLLECTION RESORT AND SPA LOS CABOS - ALL. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, BEL AIR COLLECTION RESORT AND SPA LOS CABOS - ALL caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Pueblo Bonito Pacifica Golf & Spa Resort
address: Previo Paraiso Escondido, Centro, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: This impressive spa hotel has its own private beach and is located on the Pacific side, 5 minutes’ drive from Cabo San Lucas. Boasting fantastic views of the Pacific Ocean, it offers an award-winning spa and avant-garde design. The adults-only Pueblo Bonito Pacífica Resort & Spa has 5 restaurants, including one serving Mediterranean food and a Japanese restaurant serving fresh sushi. There are also 5 bars, one of which features a fire pit. The resort offers Balinese beds on the beach which you can hire for a day. From December to April the hotel arranges whale watching trips. The air-conditioned rooms at the Pueblo Bonito Pacífica feature tiled floors and soft tones. Each one comes with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV, a kitchenette and a private terrace. Cabo San Lucas Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away, and the hotel offers a shuttle service on request. The pretty coastal town of San José del Cabo is 35 minutes’ drive from the Pueblo Bonito Pacífica.

name: Hilton Vacation Club Cabo Azul Los Cabos
address: Paseo Malecon, Lote 11 Fonatur, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: With a stay at Cabo Azul Resort by Diamond Resorts in San Jose del Cabo (Zona Hotelera), you'll be a 3-minute drive from San Jose del Cabo Art District and 6 minutes from Costa Azul Beach. Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Event facilities at this resort consist of a conference center and a meeting room. Limited parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Zoetry Casa del Mar Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular KM 19.5, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Experience our most luxurious suite—measuring 2,908 square feet and showcasing a large sea-view terrace or balcony with infinity-edge plunge pool, a full kitchen with top-rated appliances, expansive living spaces with a sofa bed and entertainment center, two full bathrooms with rain showers and walk-in closets, a dining area with seating for eight, a king bedroom, plus a bedroom with two queen beds.VRBO

name: Hilton Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Iconic yet innovative, classic yet contemporary, Hilton Los Cabos embodies the evolution of the sophisticated resort experience in Cabo San Lucas. Steps away from the Sea of Cortez in the exclusive Los Cabos corridor, along one of the only swimmable beaches in the region, Hilton Los Cabos offers lush, rich surroundings, anticipatory service, and the perfect blend of relaxation and rejuvenation. With expansive views from oceanfront rooms and suites, some featuring private plunge pools, this is a place for guests to discover authentic Mexico, where elevated dining and wellness options are all flavored with local cultural experiences and an international flair. Here, nothing is scripted: From family fun at the Enclave Beach Club to romantic respites in a seaside cabana, energetic events in our gathering spaces to the prime guestrooms and upgraded amenities of AltaMar, you are free to craft your own signature story.Hilton

name: Garza Blanca Resort & Spa Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km. 17.5, 23405 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: For the ultimate luxury escape, Garza Blanca Resort & Spa Los Cabos is a family-friendly beach resort with a contemporary design inspired by the natural landscape. All of our suites feature elegant décor and unsurpassed comfort. The resort offers several chic spaces to unwind in including a world-class Spa, gourmet restaurants, and distinct pools all enhanced by highly attentive service and personalized pampering.VRBO

name: Pueblo Bonito Sunset Beach Resort & Spa
address: Predio Paraiso Escondido, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Pueblo Bonito Sunset Beach Resort & Spa - Luxury A is conveniently located in the popular Marina area. Featuring a satisfying list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Pueblo Bonito Sunset Beach Resort & Spa - Luxury A. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature fan, air conditioning, mini bar, balcony/terrace, telephone. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort make Pueblo Bonito Sunset Beach Resort & Spa - Luxury A the perfect choice for your stay in Cabo San Lucas.Agoda

name: Chileno Bay Resort & Residences, Auberge Resorts Collection
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 15, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated in Cabo San Lucas, a few steps from El Chileno Beach, Chileno Bay Resort & Residences, Auberge Resorts Collection features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared lounge and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service for guests. Some rooms also boast a kitchen with a minibar. The hotel offers 5-star accommodation with a sauna and terrace. You can play table tennis at Chileno Bay Resort & Residences, Auberge Resorts Collection. Boca del Tule Beach is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Cabo Real Golf Course is 6.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 28 km from Chileno Bay Resort & Residences, Auberge Resorts Collection.

name: Playa Grande Resort & Grand Spa
address: 1 Playa Solmar, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Beautiful 1 suite bedroom and 2 full bathroom and Kitchen, next to the pool and the beach, with a lot of amenities and adventures in a spectacular dream place to fall in love with. Let the Mexican ambient and culture fill you with nice memories and beautiful experiences. Also there are many different restaurants to pick within the property and other amenities as mini golf, gym, spas, etc. Thank You.VRBO

name: ME Cabo
address: Playa El Medano, 5, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: With its privileged location on the Medano Beach of Cabo San Lucas, ME Cabo features 5-star amenities in Los Cabos, one of Mexico’s fanciest destinations. Guest accommodations at ME Cabo are furnished with all the latest technologies. Private balconies along with rain showerhead and Aveda bath amenities are also provided. ME Cabo is a fashion and social hub for discerning local and international clientele, pulsating with a distinctive vibe that hints of celebrated hotspots. ME by Meliá blends design, art, music and service in a truly unconventional resort. And Aura hosts who welcome the opportunity to attend to your every wish and need. ME Cabo’s new hotspots include Confessions Skybar & Tapas, Taboo Beach Club, serving Mediterranean-inspired cuisine, Funky Geisha with beachside Asian fare and Mamazzita Mexican Soul with the best traditional cuisine. At only 10 minutes’ drive from downtown, ME Cabo hotel is just over half an hour away to the Airport.

name: Nobu Hotel Los Cabos
address: Polígono 1, Fracción D, Fraccionamiento Diamante, 23473 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located in Cabo San Lucas, 11 km from Marina Cabo San Lucas, Nobu Hotel Los Cabos provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a kids' club and free WiFi. Each room is equipped with air conditioning, and certain rooms at the resort have a balcony. À la carte and continental breakfast options are available daily at Nobu Hotel Los Cabos. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Guests can enjoy playing table tennis, or take advantage of the business centre. El Arco is 12 km from Nobu Hotel Los Cabos, while Cabo San Lucas Country Club is 14 km away. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 56 km from the resort.

name: Pueblo Bonito Montecristo Estates Luxury Villas
address: Predio Paraiso Escondido 1, Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Facilities The hotel comprises a total of 90 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a dining area and a business centre. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the accommodation. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning. All rooms offer a mini fridge and a safe. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. A pool is available for guests to enjoy in their free time. The hotel offers a gym (for a fee) to travellers. An entertainment programme is offered for children.Ticket Package

name: Hotel El Ganzo Adults Only
address: Blvd Tiburon, 23403 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: All 70 guestrooms overlooking the Sea of Cortez are luxuriously appointed with modern, refined dcor with rustic undertones brought in with natural materials and woods throughout. A complimentary, fully stocked minibar, custom, artisan bath amenities, and wireless internet access are among the amenities.iHotelier/iStay

name: Grand Solmar Lands End Resort And Spa
address: Av Solmar No 1- A Col Centro, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: The luxurious accommodation at Land's End Resort & Spa features stunning views over the Pacific Ocean from the private terrace. The resort includes 3 infinity pools and several hot tubs. Cabo San Lucas Country Club is just 3 km away, while San Jose del Cabo International Airport is 45 minutes away by car. Free parking is available on site. This hotel ranked among the top 100 Hotels & Resorts in the World. Grand Solmar Land's End Resort & Spa features studios and suites decorated with hand-crafted furnishings. All accommodation comes with a kitchen, lounge area and flat-screen TV. The spa offers innovative health and beauty treatments, and massage services can be enjoyed on the sea front. The hotel also has tennis courts and a fitness centre. A continental breakfast can be ordered to the room each morning. The resort has a buffet and à la carte restaurant, with ocean views.

name: Grand Fiesta Americana Los Cabos Golf & Spa
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 10.3, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Exclusivity, Mexican luxury, and sophistication in every detail. An incredible destination. Unrivalled hospitality that invites you to enjoy our restaurants, spa, and elegant spaces. (03-Sep-22 to 30-Sep-23 - Please note that this hotel will have a new Environmental Sanitation tax. It will be applied for each night of lodging in our hotels in the region corresponding to the County of Los Cabos.WebBeds

name: Villa del Arco Beach Resort & Spa
address: Camino Viejo a San José Km 0.4, El Medano Ejidal, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located in Cabo San Lucas on El Médano Beach, this hotel features spacious suites with kitchenette facilities. A 3-level health spa is available along with a sailing facility and restaurants. Each suite at Villa del Arco Cabo San Lucas includes a living area and large bathroom. The kitchenettes are equipped with a stovetop, refrigerator, and microwave. Guests can enjoy the sauna and the swimming pool. Cabo San Lucas Villa del Arco also provides a mini-market, scuba diving facility, and tennis courts. San José del Cabo is 20 miles from Villa del Arco. Sports fishing and whale watching are nearby.

name: Bahia Hotel & Beach House
address: Av. El Pescador, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Just steps from one of the finest beaches in Cabo San Lucas, guests will find a peaceful escape with exceptional service. Free WiFi is available at the front desk and the pool bar. While relaxing in the peaceful outdoor pool, guests can swim to the bar for an ice-cold beverage. Guests will also enjoy the fine dining at the on-site restaurant. Bahia Hotel is minutes from the vibrant nightlife of Cabo San Lucas city centre. The area provides some of the best fishing and boating opportunities.

name: Sandos Finisterra Los Cabos
address: Blvd. Marina, Col. Centro, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Boasting a prime location in Cabo San Lucas, a city at the southern tip of Baja California peninsula, in Mexico, this stunning complex is situated close to a long sandy beach. Los Cabos International Airport is some 45 kilometres away. This hotel's outstanding situation makes it the perfect base for those wishing to relax and unwind under the sun. Featuring different room types, it exudes the charm, warmth and comfort that clients expect today. All the guest rooms come with a balcony boasting impressive views of the beach, the bay or the stunning marina. It also includes a wide range of services and facilities to guarantee a truly unforgettable stay, such as a state-of-the-art spa, carved into the rock of one of Cabo's famous hills, a wonderful fitness centre featuring the latest technology as well as three beautifully designed outdoor pools with hot tubs and poolside service.FarePortal

name: The Towers At Pueblo Bonito Pacifica
address: Predio Paraiso Escondido, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur

address: Kilometro 7.3 Carretera Transpeninsular, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Hacienda Encantada Resort & Residences is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Cabo San Lucas. The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Hacienda Encantada Resort & Residences. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with whirlpool bathtub, air conditioning, wake-up service, mini bar, balcony/terrace. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Hacienda Encantada Resort & Residences combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Cabo San Lucas unforgettable.Agoda

name: Marquis Los Cabos, Resort & Spa - Adults Only
address: Carretera Transpeninsular KM. 21.5, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of San Jose Del Cabo, Secrets Marquis Los Cabos Hotel - Unlimited Luxury promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Salon, executive floor, restaurant, bar, meeting facilities are just some of the facilities on offer. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature executive lounge access, non smoking rooms, mini bar, inhouse movies, shower. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as outdoor pool, hot tub, golf course (within 3 km), steamroom, spa. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that San Jose Del Cabo has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Secrets Marquis Los Cabos Hotel - Unlimited Luxury.Agoda

name: Solmar Resort
address: Avenida Solmar #1, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: The Solmar Resort of Cabo San Lucas is located on the Pacific Ocean, hidden behind granite cliffs. This resort features a spa located in cabins, an outdoor pool and suites with a private balcony. The suites at the Resort Solmar are furnished with cable TV, air conditioning and a coffee maker. There is also a fridge in every suite. There are 3 restaurants serving international food, sushi and local dishes. They also offer themed nights and a range of social activities. Guests can organize sportsfishing adventures with the resort. Cabo San Lucas is a popular destination for whale watching. You can walk to Cabo San Lucas' shops, bars and restaurants in just 5 minutes from the hotel. The Solmar Resort in Cabo San Lucas is less than one mile from Land’s End and Plaza Bonita. Cabo Dolphins and The Point are also within one mile of the resort.

address: Av. Del Pescador SN, Col. El Medano, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Two Bedroom Suite Ocean view master suite with a king size bed, hot tub, bathroom with shower, living and dining areas (fridge, microwave and coffee maker), sofa bed in living area, air conditioning. Connecting room with two double beds, bathroom with bathtub, living and dining areas, kitchenette (minibar fridge, microwave and coffee maker), air conditioning. Three fully equipped terraces. ROOM DETAILS 6 People 2 Double Bed 1 King Bed 1 Sofa Bed 1539 ft2 / 143 m2VRBO
