Guests will receive coupon booklets and all details upon arrival. Restrictions apply.iHotelier/iStay

name: Secrets Puerto Los Cabos Adults Only
address: Puerto Los Cabos, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Set in the exclusive community of Puerto Los Cabos, Secrets Puerto Los Cabos Golf & Spa Resort offers adults a stunning Unlimited-Luxury® getaway in Mexico's Baja California Peninsula. The secure community around Secrets Puerto Los Cabos provides striking views of native flora and fauna and miles of unspoiled beachfront of the Sea of Cortez. The resort boasts 500 spacious non-smoking suites each with a private balcony or terrace, 24-hour room service, daily refreshed mini-bar, a Secrets Box for private in-suite dining and more. For added luxury, 150 ocean view suites are reserved for Preferred Club with access to additional privileges including a private lounge, upgraded amenities and mini-bar service, pillow menu, outdoor whirlpool and other extras. Unlimited-Luxury® continues throughout the resort where guests are treated to limitless gourmet fare and top-shelf spirits at elegant restaurants, bars and lounges. 24-hour dining options allow guests to enjoy late night bites at Coco Café. Or stay in and order room service. It's all available at any hour day or night. Indulge in the over 12,000 sq. ft. Secrets Spa by Pevonia and be treated to spa options in 21 treatment rooms, a full-service beauty salon or an extensive hydrotherapy circuit. Follow up this rejuvenation at the fully equipped fitness center or by taking part in one of many daily and nightly activities. Choose from a variety of beach, land and water activities, take a dip in one of two main heated pools, go on a leisurely walk along the 3 mile stretch of unspoiled Pacific Coast beach or catch the live nightly entertainment. Plus, the Puerto Los Cabos community provides, just steps away, a full service Marina with world-class sport fishing and artisan walkway, and the only composite 18-hole golf course in the area designed by Jack Nicklaus and Greg Norman.FarePortal

name: Sirena del Mar by Vacation Club Rentals
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km. 4.5, Cabo Bello, Cabo San Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located over a cliff, Hyatt Vacation Club at Sirena del Mar offers its guests a private beach area, terraces to soak in the sun and an outdoor swimming pool. Free WiFi is available throughout. The rooms at Hyatt Vacation Club at Sirena del Mar are air conditioned and feature terraces with sea or garden views. Some of the amenities they offer are flat-screen cable TV, DVD players and a washing machine and dryer. The private bathrooms are tiled and have a shower/bath tub combo, some have spa bath and free toiletries. This property is just a ten-minute drive to the heart of Cabo San Lucas including shopping and night-life. Guests can experience planned resort activities such as snorkeling, cooking class, ping pong tournaments, spanish lessons and guitar hero challenges. The resort has Estrella Restaurante, offers poolside and indoor air conditioned dining, opened daily for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Central Cabo San Lucas is 15 minutes’ drive from Hyatt Vacation Club at Sirena del Mar, and the famous Cabo San Lucas Arch is 8 km away.

name: The Ridge at Playa Grande
address: Av Playa Grande No 1 A, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Set between impressive rock formations, Ridge in Cabo San Lucas offers views of the Sea of Cortez and access to the private Solmar Beach. Close to the marina and Land’s End, it features a spa and 4 restaurants. The Ridge at Playa Grande provides suites with a microwave and a fridge. Each suite includes flat-screen cable TV with pay-per-view movies and an in-room safe. A bathrobe and slippers are provided. The Ridge at Playa Grande features 3 infinity swimming pools, tennis courts and mini-golf. There is also a coffee shop, and staff at reception can arrange butler services and car rental.

name: Suites at PB Rose' Resort and Spa Cabo San Lucas
address: Playa El Medano Apartado Postal 460, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Offering a private beach and an outdoor pool, this 5-star resort is located in Los Cabos. It also has a gym, a beauty centre and a sauna. Suites at Rose Resort and Spa Cabo San Lucas's room features a dishwasher, a refrigerator and a microwave. A satisfying breakfast is available each morning at the resort, and there are numerous restaurants and cafés nearby. Packed lunches are available on request for those with day trips planned. Suites at Rose Resort and Spa Cabo San Lucas is situated in the popular tourist destination of El Medano. Playa Las Viudas is just an easy car ride from the resort.HotelsCombined

name: Suites at VDP Cabo San Lucas Beach Resort and Spa
address: Camino Viejo a San Jose, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: The beachfront Suites at Villa Del Palmar Beach Resort and Spa features an outdoor lagoon-style pool with a waterfall, a whale slide, and a full-service spa. Cabo San Lucas city center is 1.5 mi away. In addition to a sea view, these suite offers WiFi and a full kitchen or kitchenette. The Suites at Villa Del Palmar Beach Resort extras include a seating area, flat-screen satellite TV, and a bathroom with a bath or shower. The Market is open all day, the Taco Bar serves Mexican food during the day, Bella California serves classic Italian cuisine for dinner, and Los Tortugas offers dinner shows and a buffet each night. Packed lunches are offered at Palmita Deli & Market. Also available is an optional all inclusive program which covers all meals and drinks during your stay. When guests tire of relaxing by Bahia San Lucas, shopping is only 6 minutes’ drive away at Puerto Paraiso Mall. The resort is also within 1.2 mi of Marina Cabo San Lucas and Cabo San Lucas Country Club.Official Hotel Information

name: Villa del Palmar Beach Resort Cabo San Lucas
address: Camino Viejo a San José Km. 0.5, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: 1.2 km from Medano Beach, Villa Del Palmar 1 Bedroom is set in Cabo San Lucas and offers air-conditioned rooms. The property is around 1.5 km from Marina Cabo San Lucas, 4.1 km from El Arco and 4.4 km from Cabo San Lucas Country Club. El Dorado Golf is 22 km from the hotel and Palmilla Golf Club is 27 km away. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a patio. At Villa Del Palmar 1 Bedroom every room includes a seating area. Cabo del Sol Golf is 10 km from the accommodation, while Cabo Real Golf Course is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 41 km from Villa Del Palmar 1 Bedroom.

name: Vista Encantada
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 7.3 Cabo Del Sol, 23455 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: A stay at Vista Encantada Spa Resort & Residences places you in the heart of Cabo San Lucas, a 1-minute drive from Cabo del Sol Golf and 9 minutes from Santa Maria Beach. Featured amenities include a business center, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Cabo San Lucas? This resort has 4827 square feet (448 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

The new travel dates must be during the same calendar year, subject to resort availability and blackout dates during the Christmas and New Years holiday period. Luxurious Junior Suite in high-end gated resort with easy access to downtown Cabo. Features a kitchenette, plush living area, elegant sleeping quarters with 1 king or 2 queen premium feather-top beds, marble bathrooms with deluxe amenities, private ocean view balcony, high-speed Internet, and satellite TV. GUEST ACCESS Access to entire Sunset Beach resort plus the two Pueblo Bonito sister resorts on Medano Beach (Rose and Blanco) and the nearby, adults-only Pacifica resort. Typically need to book by the week (i.e; 1 or 2 or X weeks). RESORT SERVICES & AMENITIES Private beach access WiFi Ten restaurants and bars on property Eight restaurants and five bars at sister properties Fitness Center (fee) Full-service Spa at Sunset Beach and salon Six swimming pools Hot tub Sunset Beach Kids Club (daily, Tues-Sun) Playground Tennis and volleyball courts Shopping (including tobacco shop, jewelry and gift shop, clothing boutique) Wide range of resort activities, including tours, classes and yoga Business Center Concierge and 24-hour Front Desk Valet and self-parking Dry cleaning Complimentary shuttle service and access to sister resorts Mass services Medical clinic IN-ROOM SERVICES & AMENITIES WiFi (fee) 24-hour room service In-room massage (fee) Twice-daily housekeeping Fully equipped kitchenette Television with premium cable Feather-top mattress and pillow menu Premium bath amenities Plush bathrobes In-room safe Wake-up callsExpedia

name: Suites at Hacienda Del Mar Resort Los Cabos
address: KM 10 Lot "D" Local "D" Cabo del Sol, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Hacienda Del Mar Los Cabos Resort Junior Suite with One Bathroom, Kitchenette, and balcony- sleeps 4. Available for a one week stay, with Saturday or Monday check in only. This unit has an ocean view, garden view, or mountain view. Rooms are assigned at check in, and you will have input on location based on availability. There is a minimum and maximum of 7 nights. There are no resort fees. This magnificent property is located in the mystical desert landscape of the Baja Peninsula. Surrounding the property are golf courses that will challenge any handicap, or you can explore the peninsula, known for its beauty and endless photographic opportunities. If you're accustomed to living, sleeping and waking in the lap of luxury, then you should identify with our accommodations, all set in low rise villas, each tasteful, spacious and offering you a choice of ocean front locations, as well as ocean, garden and golf views. -Surrounded by Jack Nicklaus Signature Ocean Golf Course known as the Pebble Beach of Baja at Cabo del Sol. -Infinity swimming pools, with water falls and countless fountains. -Private beaches, European Style SPA and fitness center with state of the art equipment and personal trainers. -Beauty Salon -Fashion Boutique -' Los Portales ', Mini-Deli -Business Center. -24-hour Room Service -Safe deposit boxes in room & Suites -24-hour cable television -Laundry and dry cleaning -24-hour medical service -Ground transportation -Car rental -Long distance phone calls and fax machines. -Free private parking. name: Suites at Gr Solmar Lands End Resort and Spa
address: Av Solmar No 1A Col Centro, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located in Cabo San Lucas, Suites at Grand Solmar Land's End Resort and Spa offers an outdoor pool and a spa and wellness centre. This self-catering accommodation features free WiFi. The property is 1 km from El Arco and 1.1 km from Marina Cabo San Lucas. Accommodation will provide you with satellite TV, air conditioning and a balcony. There is a full kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave. Featuring a spa bath, private bathrooms also come with a shower. You can enjoy sea view and mountain view. At Suites at Grand Solmar Land's End Resort and Spa you will find a restaurant, a private beach area and a fitness centre. Dry cleaning, ironing service and laundry facilities are offered. Activities in the surrounding area include golfing, horse riding and fishing. The property offers free parking. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Cabo San Lucas Country Club (3.5 km) and Cabo del Sol Golf (7.7 km). Los Cabos International Airport is located 36 km away.

name: Royal Decameron Los Cabos
address: Boulevard, P.º Malecon San Jose, Zona Hotelera, 23406 San José Del Cabo, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: This beachfront resort is located in the south part of the Baja California peninsula, just a 15-minute drive from Los Cabos International Airport and a 5-minute one from downtown San Jose del Cabo. Overlooking the Sea of Cortés, the venue is ideal for a sun-soaked holiday where one can escape from everything and recharge hers/his batteries. It boasts 2 outdoor swimming pools, with separate children's areas for the youngest guests, where guests can spend many afternoons afternoons just lazing around and sipping chilled beverages. There is also a spa and wellness centre for those who need little extra pampering, while the San Jose Golf Course is located only 300 metres from the property and offers everything the fans of the fairway can desire.FarePortal

name: Villa del Faro
address: 65 Km Camino Costero, 23400 La Fortuna, Baja California Sur
description: Villa del Faro offers an outdoor pool and terraces with spectacular views of the Cortez Sea. This eco-friendly property is located on the beachfront, 3 km north of Boca de la Vinorama. The solar-powered accommodations boast unique handmade furniture and a fireplace. All the accommodations have patios and terraces offering stunning views and outdoor furniture. The private bathrooms provide free toiletries. Facing the Cortez Sea, Villa del Faro’s small restaurant opens exclusively for guests and serves Mexican cuisine that varies every day. Breakfast is included daily and dinners can be arranged on request. There is also a full bar with an extensive wine list. Villa del Faro has its own secluded beach area. Guests have the opportunity to enjoy activities such as sport fishing, surfing, kayaking, hiking and horse riding on the beach. Whale-watching trips can be arranged in season. Cabo Pulmo National Park is just a 30-minute drive away, while Los Cabos International Airport can be reached in about 1 hour by car. Access is via a rough dirt road.

name: Marea La Paz
address: Acceso Zofemat #3230, Col. El Manglito, 23060 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and an oven, as well as a stovetop and free WiFi. Other amenities include laundry facilities, a hair dryer, towels, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Costa Baja Resort & Spa
address: Carretera a Pichilingue Km 7.5, 23010 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Discover the captivating oasis of Hotel Indigo Costa Baja Resort & Spa, where the desert meets the sea. Nestled between the Sea of Cortez and La Paz Bay, our beachfront resort in La Paz, Mexico, offers unparalleled service and breathtaking views perfect for vacations and destination weddings in the Baja. Embark on a journey of wellness at Espíritu Spa. Relax on our white-sand beach and take a swim in our infinity pool. Tee off at the El Cortés Golf Club. Enjoy bold Mexican and international flavors at our restaurants, Cardon and Barco. Indulge in beautifully designed rooms with garden and pool views. Discover the essence of La Paz along the Malecón or enjoy water sports at the marina. The perfect blend of serenity and adventure.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Puerta Cortez Residenses
address: KM 7.5 Carretera a Pichilingue, 23010 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Our Marina Village hosts restaurants offering room-service, mini-mart, health center, tour operators, and a coffee shop. The Blue Cortes Beach Club has its infinity pool and top restaurant and bar. El Cortes Golf Club, Mexico’s only 18 hole Gary Player Signature Golf Club, Tennis Courts, Fitness Center, and Spa. This 5-star resort includes free WiFi, exclusive access to all Puerta Cortes amenities. A concierge is available for booking private or public tours to the activities within and around the resort. Breakfast and lunch are served at Blue Cortes Beach Club, Cardon at El Cortes Golf Club or DoceCuarenta Coffee Shop in the Marina Village. For Lunch and dinner Puerta Cortes also has 3 restaurants in the Marina Village, Japanese food Odayaka, International Cuisine at Azul Marino, or Italian at la Barcaccia. Manuel Marquez de Leon International Airport is 17.7 km from the property and San Jose del Cabo Airport is 170 km. Check-in is to be made in the Marina Towns Official Puerta Cortes Reception

name: Hilton Vallarta Riviera Resort,Puerto Vallarta
address: Carretera Barra de Navidad km 4.5, 48390 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: No description found

name: Sheraton Buganvilias Resort and Convention Center
address: Blvd. Francisco Medina Ascencio No. 999, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Effortless and elevated, our newly renovated Sheraton Buganvilias Resort & Convention Center is a smart way to stay in stunning Jalisco, Mexico. Thrive in our beachfront location close to the city and less than a quarter mile from downtown shops and restaurants at Malecon Boardwalk and 4.1 miles from Gustavo Diaz Ordaz International Airport. Relax in a Puerto Vallarta hotel room or suite with luxury bedding, marble bathrooms, flat-screen TVs, room service and oceanfront views. Recharge with our wide variety of renovated restaurants and keep moving with our four tennis courts, two outdoor pools, swim-up bar and 24-hour Sheraton Fitness center. When it's time to pamper, book our blissful Maiavé Village spa. Families with children appreciate Sheratoons, providing the little ones with fun and engaging activities. For business travelers, we offer streamlined event spaces and Puerto Vallarta packages for groups. Experience Jalisco, Mexico, the right way at Sheraton Buganvilias Resort & Convention Center.Marriott

name: Fiesta Americana Puerto Vallarta & Spa Hotel
address: Av. Francisco Medina Ascencio km 2.5, 48333 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Location This hotel lies on the Bahía de Banderas bay and is around 200 m from the nearest beach and the town centre with its access to the public transport network. The airport is only some 5 minutes away. Facilities The hotel features 291 accommodation units. A lift can be used to access the upper floors. Amenities include a cloakroom, a safe, currency exchange facilities and a cash machine. Internet access (for a fee) and wireless internet access (for a fee) are available in the public areas. In addition, guests can also enjoy a balcony. The hotel features a range of facilities for guests with disabilities. Gastronomic options offered by the hotel include a restaurant, a dining area and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. The grounds of the hotel feature a playground and an attractive garden. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage and a car park. Among the additional services available are a childcare service, medical assistance, room service and a laundry. Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning and a bathroom. Most accommodation units additionally feature a balcony or a terrace. Each accommodation unit features a double bed or a king-size bed. Extra beds can be requested. A safe and a minibar also feature. The rooms offer a range of amenities, including tea and coffee making equipment. An ironing set is also available to guests. Convenient features include internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio and an alarm clock. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. The hotel offers an extensive outdoor sport and leisure programme, with tennis, volleyball, golf and horse riding. Those who enjoy watersports can have fun with diving and aquafit. Guests of the hotel can enjoy indoor activities including a gym. A wellness area with a spa can be used by guests of the hotel. For a fee, massage treatments are also available. An entertainment programme, an entertainment programme for children, a disco and a kids' club provide guests with recreational options during their free time. There is also a fitness centre and library. At Iberostar Playa Mita guests can enjoy a wide variety of dishes in one of the 4 specialty restaurants as well as a buffet. Massages and treatments can also be reserved. The restaurants are open for lunch and dinner. The Triton, the main restaurant with Mediterranean Sea views, is buffet style with international dishes and an open show kitchen. Breakfast is a generous hot and cold buffet. At the Skyroom Cocktail Bar & Grill guests can enjoy a drink or head to the sea-view open terrace for dinner.

name: Paradise Bay Resort
address: Cirkewwa Paradise Bay, Mellieha MLH 02
description: Featuring 3 outdoor pools, and spacious, sunbathing terraces, Paradise Bay Resort overlooks Paradise Bay on one side and the islands of Gozo and Comino on the other. Free WiFi and private parking are available on site. The hotel features sea-view rooms with satellite TV, mini fridge, and tea/coffee making facilities. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. A generous buffet-style continental breakfast is provided daily. Guests can also enjoy a meal at one of the 3 on-site restaurants. Lunch and dinner is in the form of a rich, Mediterranean buffet, with an à la carte menu also available. Paradise Hotel's private beach can be enjoyed during the summer. Water sports and scuba-diving courses with qualified instructors are available all year round. The heated indoor pool is open during cooler months. On requests, relaxing moments can be savoured in the hot tub and sauna, and discounts are available for on-site massages. A tennis court and a playground for children are also featured at the property. The hotel has a dedicated team of multi-lingual staff who are always happy to be of assistance. The Paradise Bay also has 4 meeting rooms, suitable for a maximum of 180 delegates. A nearby bus will offer you connections to Valletta and Malta International Airport, both within 30 km of the property. The hotel is also within walking distance of the Ferry Terminal to Gozo island. Mellieha beach is 3.5 km away.

name: Qawra Palace Resort & Spa
address: Qawra Coast Road, Saint Paul’s Bay
description: Overlooking Salina Bay, QAWRA Palace Resort & SPA has its own indoor and outdoor swimming pools. It also features a mini golf course and a games room with pool table. Each room features a private balcony with views of the bay or the internal courtyard and mini golf course. They are all air conditioned and come with a TV and fridge. Breakfast at the Qawra Palace is buffet style and includes both sweet and savoury items such as eggs, sausages and cereal. The restaurant serves international cuisine at lunch and dinner. There is a large, internal garden with tables and chairs. You will find 2 gift shops and a café with free newspapers. Evening entertainment is provided. This 4-star hotel is 25 metres from the nearest bus stop and 700 metres from Bugibba centre. St. Julian's is 10 minutes' drive away.

name: Doubletree by Hilton Malta
address: Qawra, Saint Paul’s Bay SPB 2402
description: Beautiful located at the waters edge, the Dolmen Hotel is the perfect retreat for an island holiday in Malta. Our hotel facilities include 488 guest rooms + suites, a variety of 7 restaurants & bars and 6 pools to choose from, an Inhouse Casino,state of the art conference facilities + meeting rooms, stunning wedding venues and Free WiFi so guests can stay connected throughout their stay. To ensure an utterly memorable vacation, take advantage of our spacious Amazonia Beach lido, 4 outdoor pools, kids' pool, PADI diving school and water sports centre. Indulge in a relaxing treatment at the Myoka leading Spa in Malta or reenergise in one of the two heated indoor pools, fitness room, hydro massage, and sauna. Animation activities are provided on a daily basis together with a kids club during the summer months and Daily entertainment is held during the evenings. As one of the best quality Malta hotels, the Dolmen Hotel also provides a multi-storey car park with over 400 car spaces. Discover the warmth of traditional Maltese hospitality, the flavours of authentic cuisine and the excitement of the Mediterranean – experience the vacation you deserve with the Dolmen Hotel.FarePortal

name: Radisson Blu Golden Sands Resort & Spa, Golden Bay
address: Golden Bay, Mlh 5510 Mellieha, Malta Mellieha, Mellieha MLH 5510
description: Set into the sandy coast of Malta's Golden Bay, the Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Malta Golden Sands includes a large swimming pool, a adult only pool and a children's pool. It also offers a private beach and a spa. Rooms are large and luxurious. Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Malta Golden Sands enjoys a quiet, private setting, with peaceful views of the sea and the surrounding countryside. It is a 10-minute drive from the harbour where ferries leave for Gozo Comino. The spa extends over 1000 m² of space, and the resort's Leisure Centre offers stunning views of the sea from its large windows overlooking the bay. Rooms are furnished with modern decorations and offer a balcony with sea or countryside views. During summer the rate includes 1 parasol and 2 sun loungers per room.

name: Ramla Bay Resort
address: Marfa L/o Mellieha, Mellieha MLH 7100
description: Located along the northern-most coast of Malta, this beachfront Resort is 2 km from the 17th-century Saint Agatha's Tower and 14 km from the ancient temples of Ġgantija is considered as one of the best Hotels of its category on the island. Just seconds from the clear waters of the Mediterranean, it offers top facilities for relaxation, as well as all the amenities required for a pleasant leisure or business stay. The hotel offers a host of in-suite room types from twin hotel rooms to deluxe rooms, suites as well as self-catering apartments, Featuring balconies offering either sea or country views, the airy rooms has a laid-back feeling have minibars or satellite TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. Breakfast and street parking are free. Dining options include a casual restaurant and a poolside bar. There are outdoor pools, as well as beach access, and a spa area with an indoor pool, a sauna and a fitness room. Bike rentals and outdoor activities are all available. Various board options are available; our guests can opt from self-catering in apartments to bed & breakfast or half board.FarePortal

name: Radisson Blu Resort, Malta St Julian's
address: St. George's Bay, St. Julian's STJ 3391
description: Set on the seafront in St. George's Bay, this 5-star hotel offers central but quiet location in St.Julians. It features 3 outdoor pools, a heated indoor pool and rooms with free WiFi and a large balcony. Air-conditioned rooms at the Radisson Blu Resort, Malta St. Julian's all come with a TV, free tea and coffee making facilities as well as bottled water upon arrival. All rooms have views of the Mediterranean Sea. An appetizing selection of snacks, wines and cocktails are available at the Bridge Bar. A generous buffet breakfast is served daily at the Kontiki restaurant. The resort also features a touch of Mediterranean cuisine at Le Bistro and outdoor casual dining at The Edge. Public transport stop to the capital city Valletta and Hop-on Hop-Off Sightseeing tour is a 2-minute walk from the property. Malta international Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Ta' Cenc & Spa
address: Cenc Street, Sannat SNT 9049
description: Swimming pools, tennis courts, a private beach, and an excellent choice of cuisine for lunch and dinner; these are just a few reasons to choose Hotel Ta' Cenc. This five-star hotel boasts an impressive list of sports and leisure facilities, all on the highest point of Gozo, overlooking the cliffs. The guest rooms are housed in stone bungalows, which are spread throughout the resort. Each room comes with air conditioning and a private terrace or small garden. You could never get bored at Ta Cenc with 2 tennis courts, and 2 swimming pools; one of which has a mini pool for children and hydro massage corner.A free minibus to the private rocky beach, which is 2 km away, is available at scheduled times (high season only). Here you will find a bar and grill restaurant. Back at the hotel you can have fun with table tennis, billiards, video games, plus a host of board games. Work out at the gym and relax in the wellness centre with a heated swimming pool, Finnish sauna, hot tub, and steam bath. Pamper yourself with a solarium or massage. The professional team of staff can organise tours around Gozo. At reception you can also change currency and hire a car. The award-winning chefs prepare the finest Italian and international cuisine at the restaurant. Choose between an à la carte and set menu. Afterwards, relax out on the terrace with a drink and enjoy live music.

name: Corinthia Palace Malta
address: De Paule Avenue, Attard BZN 9023
description: Corinthia Palace Malta is set on Malta Island, and provides 5-star accommodation as well as a private beach. Offering free Wi-Fi, a restaurant and an outdoor pool, the hotel is within a 10-minute walk of San Anton. Guests of Corinthia Palace Malta can start their morning at Athenaeum Spa, or enjoy the many fitness and leisure facilities, including pilates classes, fitness classes and outdoor tennis courts. There is also free public parking on site for those with a car. It also has a fitness centre with a swimming pool, a sauna and outdoor tennis courts. The rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV, a mini bar and a private balcony. They all feature a telephone, a radio and a desk. Each morning, guests can wake up to breakfast at Rickshaw or Orange Grove Brasserie. In the evening, guests are invited to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide variety of eating options are also found nearby. Within a 20-minute drive of St. John's Co-Cathedral and Malta International Airport, Corinthia Palace Malta offers an airport shuttle service for those staying at the property. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Attard.Revato

name: The Westin Dragonara Resort, Malta
address: Stj02 Dragonara Road, St. Julians, St. Julian's STJ 3143
description: Standing apart on a natural peninsula fringed by the sea, The Westin Dragonara Resort, Malta brings warm-hearted, luxurious Mediterranean living to a vibrant, historic island. The property has an enviable beachside position and is accessed via private gateway, inscribed with Virgil thoughtful proverb, “God made this gem for us”. A reflection of Malta’s generous character lives through the way each guest is welcomed with easy-going charm and personalized attention. Our family resort features 408 rooms and suites which have been recently renovated. Landscaped around age-old artefacts, sunken gardens and impressive pools, our 5-star hotel has stunning ocean views throughout. The villa-style lobby is naturally light and spacious where floor-to-ceiling windows and sun-drenched terrace overlook unspoiled coastline. A multi-generational favorite, it is equally appealing to both leisure and business visitors, supported by the team organic approach to wellbeing, informed by the island’s rich culture.Marriott

name: LABRANDA Riviera Hotel & Spa
address: Marfa Bay, Mellieha
description: Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa is located in one of the best-preserved areas of northern Malta and overlooks the scenic Marfa Bay. Unspoiled views over the islands of Gozo and Comino create an idyllic Mediterranean atmosphere of relaxation. Guests of the LABRANDA Riviera Hotel & Spa have access to a wide range of amenities, including two outdoor seawater swimming pools, an indoor seawater pool and a full-service Spa Centre. At Elysium Spa guests can choose from a wide range of therapy and beauty treatments. True relaxation, however, requires a holistic approach. It is more than just enjoying sea views, swimming pools and spa treatments. Indulging in superior food is also part of a comforting and rejuvenating vacation. The ability to savour an appetisingly crafted quality meal or taste a snack by the pool is among the most important experiences for guests of a Select Hotel. Therefore, Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa does its best to offer a wide array of world-class restaurants as well as bars for its valued guests. The hotel is located in Mellieha, a popular and picturesque village in Malta. It offers visitors a nice mix of experiences, from idyllic sandy beaches and authentic restaurants, to several historical sites. The latter include Saint Agathas Tower, the Church of our Lady Victory, and the Mellieha WWII air-raid shelters. Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa also provides adventure seeking guests with the ability to take part in various scuba diving activities. Labranda Riviera Hotel & Spa is the perfect choice for travelers looking for a diverse vacation in the middle of the Mediterranean Sea.iHotelier/iStay

name: Intercontinental Malta
address: St. George's Bay, St. Julian's STJ 3310
description: InterContinental Malta has established itself as the Mediterranean’s leading hotel of distinction. Located in the prime area of St. George’s Bay in St. Julian's, just seven kilometres from Valletta. All 481 rooms are elegantly furnished, having all the comforts expected of a luxury hotel. With a variety of restaurants and bars, the hotel offers varied cuisine at all times of the day. The leisure facilities include three pools, a kids club, a Fitness Centre, a spa, a beach club and room service.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Corinthia Hotel St Georges Bay
address: St. Georges Bay, St. Julian's
description: Combining a luxurious setting with premium facilities, Corinthia Hotel St Georges Bay offers a swimming pool, a private beach and free Wi-Fi. It is located a 20-minute car ride from Malta International Airport and an airport shuttle is available for guests. Guests of the hotel can begin their day at Richard Geres Personal Training, or enjoy the various fitness amenities, such as a diving centre. It also includes family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families both large and small, plus a kids pool and babysitting/child services. It also has its very own spa and wellness centre, Apollo Day. The rooms are air conditioned and include a mini bar, a private balcony and a coffee maker. They each offer slippers, heating and a flat-screen TV. Guests of Corinthia Hotel St Georges Bay are invited to sample regional and international cuisine at Fra Martino, or try local dishes at Caviar & Bull. Dining options at the hotel include Le Café and Henry J. Bean's Bar & Grill. Guests can also enjoy a drink at Pearl Lounge. The area around Corinthia Hotel St Georges Bay has a range of cafés and restaurants. St Julians is within a 20-minute walk of the hotel, and local sightseeing information can be found at the tour desk.Revato

name: Grand Hotel Excelsior
address: 1810 Great Siege Road, Floriana Valletta, Valletta FRN 1810
description: Luxury 5 Star Hotel and Beach Resort with private sandy beach and private 30 Berth Yacht Marina.Located by the Waters edge and in close proximity to the Capital City of Malta, Valletta.The hotel is embraced by the historical bastion walls of the World Heritage City of Valletta. The spectacular water's edge location is breathtaking, blending contemporary vision with the rich history that graces Marsamxett Harbour and Valletta. A Grand Ballroom, an Exhibition Hall and meeting rooms; the majority having natural light, The hotel offers over 4,000 square meters of versatile conference & banqueting facilities with complimentary WIFI also available throughout the hotel.iHotelier/iStay

name: Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort
address: 1, St. Georges Bay, St. Julian's STJ 3390
description: Set in Pembroke, Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort Malta offers a range of superior features, including 6 swimming pools and exclusive access to a secluded beach. It also provides a private dock, a beauty centre and free wireless internet access in all areas. Guests of the hotel can start their day at Pilates Centre, or enjoy the many leisure facilities, such as a diving centre. There is also free public parking on site for those travelling with a car. It also has its very own spa and wellness centre, Apollo Day. There are 249 rooms at Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort Malta, each offering all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. There are also several rooms especially designed for families. Guests of Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort Malta are welcome to sample Asian cuisine at Buddhamann, or try Italian and regional meals at Da Marina. Dining options at the hotel include Cafe24 and White Olive. Other dining options are also available. The area around Marina Hotel Corinthia Beach Resort Malta has a variety of cafés and restaurants. St Julians and Is-Swieqi are just a short drive away.Revato

name: Royal Savoy - Ocean Resort - Savoy Signature
address: Rua Carvalho Araujo 1, 9000-022 Funchal, Madeira
description: The luxurious Royal Savoy - Ocean Resort is set amidst tropical gardens in the Bay of Funchal, featuring 2 heated lagoon-style pools and private ocean access. The 5-star hotel combines exotically decorated interiors and contemporary architecture." All the stylish suites and rooms are beautifully decorated and have sophisticated furnishings, as well as a private balcony with panoramic views of the Atlantic Ocean. Each has a modern bathroom with free toiletries and the suites have a full kitchenette. The Royal Savoy - Ocean Resort - Savoy Signature also boasts a poolside bar and a bar with nightly live music and refreshing cocktails. Guests may have a taste of exquisite Portuguese flavours at The Armada, an à la carte and buffet restaurant, which also offers international cuisine options. Following a day of touring the island and enjoying the sights, guests may unwind at the spa, an ideal spot for a relaxing massage, a visit to the gym or indoor pool. Guests can soak up the sun on the extensive ocean front solarium. The attentive staff can organise various off-site activities, including arrangements for golf as well as provide a rental car service. The Funchal Marina is a 14-minute walk from the Hotel. Guests may also try their luck at the slot machines of Madeira Casino, which is 700 metres away. The greenery of Madeira's Botanical Gardens is 4 km away, while the stunning views of Girão Cape are within 12 km. The Royal Savoy - Ocean Resort - Savoy Signature is 23 km from Madeira International Airport.

name: Sentido Galosol
address: Rua D. Francisco Santana, 9125-909 Caniço, Madeira
description: This beach resort in Caniço, Madeira offers a gym, massage services and beauty treatments. It has 2 restaurants, 2 bars, 3 pools and panoramic sea views. Funchal’s centre is a 20-minute drive away. The rooms at the 4-star Galo Resort Hotel Galosol have a balcony with panoramic sea views. They also have air conditioning, satellite TV and a private bathroom with toiletries. All rooms have free WiFi access. Guests can enjoy a range of relaxation treatments at the spa, including stone massages, pedicures and manicures. They can also attend aerobics or yoga classes and anti-stress programs. A diving centre is also available. The Hotel Galosol also features a restaurant which serves local and international cuisine which can be enjoyed on the terrace overlooking the ocean. The Galo Resort is a 20-minute drive from Madeira Airport.

name: Pestana Palms
address: Rua do Gorgulho, 17, 9000-107 Funchal, Madeira
description: Set within a leafy garden, this apart-hotel boasts an outdoor pool overlooking Funchal coastal cliffs. Pestana Vila Lido Madeira Ocean Hotel‘s studios are spacious and decorated with soft beige colours. Each one has low-back armchairs in the lounge area and TV with multilingual cable channels. A Flor do Mar Restaurant has large windows overlooking the ocean and also hosts regular entertainment events. Salads, light snacks and cakes are available in the cosy Vila Lido Tea Room. The hotel’s attentive staff can organize outdoor excursions around the coastline. The apart-hotel’s surrounding area also features nature and walking trails. Pestana Vila Lido Madeira Ocean Hotel is 2 km away from Funchal town centre’s local museums. Free parking is available on site, subject to availability.

name: Sentido Galomar - Adults Only
address: Rua D Francisco Santana 10, 9125-909 Caniço, Madeira
description: Perched on a cliff at Ponta D’Oliveira, Galo Resort Hotel Galomar offers stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean. It features direct sea access and indoor and outdoor pools. The rooms at Hotel Galomar are decorated in a modern style. All rooms have satellite TV and an en suite bathroom. Some rooms have a private balcony with scenic sea views. The Ashoka Spa offers a wide variety of treatments, including Ayurveda therapy. It also offers saunas and a hot tub. Guests can enjoy fresh seafood at Restaurant Atlantis, at Hotel Galosol also features our buffet restaurant which serves local and international cuisine which can be enjoyed on the terrace.The Blue Bar at Galosol and Capoeira Pub offer a wide variety of drinks and snacks. Caniço’s centre is 2.5 km from Galo Resort Hotel Galomar, and Funchal’s centre is 12 km away.

name: The Cliff Bay
address: Estrada Monumental 147, 9004-532 Funchal, Madeira
description: The Atlantic Ocean stretches as far as the eye can see at the foot of The Cliff Bay. Perched on the top of a natural promontory, the hotel is surrounded by gardens - with innumerable secluded corners and centenary palm trees extending to the very edge of the cliff face. The panorama is completed by a magnificent view over the bay of Funchal to the east of the hotel. This 5 star hotel, one of PortoBay Hotels premium resorts, assures that every single little detail has been carefully conceived to present genuine peace, well-being and elegance. In the hotels sea access area one can combine the Atlantic Ocean breeze with the spell-binding views when choosing the new pontoons and solariums. The most influential restaurant guide in the world, the Michelin Guide, has awarded the Il Gallo d'Oro, The Cliff Bay's gourmet restaurant, run by Chef Benot Sinthon, with 2 Stars.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Quinta da Penha de França
address: Rua Imperatriz Dona Amelia 85, 9000-018 Funchal, Madeira
description: Set within tropical gardens on Madeira Island, this charming guesthouse features far-reaching sea views and 2 outdoor seawater pools, one of which is heated in winter period. The rooms’ balconies offer views of the scenic gardens or the Atlantic Ocean. All rooms are equipped with telephone, mini-bar, safe, cable TV and a hair dryer. Guests can relax with a massage treatment at Quinta Da Penha De França. The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk service. Quinta Da Penha De França’s restaurant, The Brothers provides an a la carte menu with views of the garden and guests can dine al fresco at Penha França Mar Restaurant Rivus, with views of the the sea Free private parking is available. Cristiano Ronaldo's Museum is 200 metres away and the Madeira Congress Centre is a 5-minute walk from the property. Free WiFi is available in the lounge and reception areas of the hotel.

name: Vidamar Resort Hotel Madeira - Dine Around Half Board
address: Estrada Monumental 175-177, 9000-100 Funchal, Madeira
description: A popular hotel due to its extensive 5-star facilities and exclusive DINE AROUND meal plan. Competitively priced large sea front rooms with balconies and King Size beds. Thalasso Sea Spa and free membership to the exclusive VIDA health and fitness club.iHotelier/iStay

name: Rocamar Lido Resort
address: Caminho Cais da Oliveira 7, Caniço de Baixo, Apartado 23, Canico, 9125-028 Caniço, Madeira
description: Set on a cliff overlooking the ocean, Roca Mar features a solarium and an outdoor pool. Located in Caniço de Baixo, it offers spacious rooms with a private balcony. Hotel Roca Mar’s rooms are bright and sunny with glass sliding doors opening onto a furnished balcony. Each one has a lounge area with a plush armchair, work desk and cable TV. Roca Mar’s restaurant specializes in seafood including sword fish and octopus, all served alongside regional wines. Guests can also enjoy live music shows at the Bar Restaurant. Roca Mar Hotel is 8 km from Madeira Airport. Palheiro Golf Course is 20 minutes’ drive away. Hotel minibus to Funchal available on weekdays (subject to availability and payment).

name: Hotel Apartamento Cais Da Oliveira
address: Caminho Cais da Oliveira, Santa Cruz, Madeira
description: Boasting a cliff-top location a 10-minute drive from Funchal, this 4-star hotel features studios and suites with a private balcony. It has a private access to the beach, a waterfront terrace and 2 pools. The air-conditioned accommodations at Caniço's Hotel Cais da Oliveira include satellite TV and a kitchenette with a microwave and refrigerator. Each private bathroom has a shower and hairdryer. Hotel Cais da Oliveira features an à la carte restaurant. The bar serves refreshing drinks and cocktails. Guests may also go for a work-out in the fitness centre, or even relax at the solarium, both situated at the next-door Royal Orchid Hotel. The unit is located 2 km from the centre of Caniço. For golfing enthusiasts, the property is 8 km away from Palheiro Golf and 15 km from the Santo da Serra Golf Course. On weekdays, the 24-hour reception staff provides a minibus service to Funchal (subject to availability and payment), which is a 10-minute drive away. It is also possible to rent cars and bikes. The property is is 9 km from Madeira’s International Airport.

name: Pestana Madeira Beach Club
address: Largo Antonio Nobre nº1, Funchal Ilha da Madeira, 9000-100 Funchal, Madeira
description: What strikes your fancy, the city or the sea? Just walking distance from the capital Funchal, this resort has all the city has to offer, but is graced with a seaside view and a multitude of amenities. Head to the sea for water sports when you want a little adventure, or take advantage of all the resort offers including two pools and all the facilities of the Carlton Hotel, including the restaurants, nightclub, bars, tea room, beauty salon, fitness center and tennis court.Ticket Package

name: Sana Sesimbra Hotel
address: Avenida 25 de Abril, 11, 2970 Sesimbra, Setubal
description: No description found

name: Pine Cliffs Hotel, a Luxury Collection Resort, Algarve
address: Praia da Falesia, P.O. Box 644, 8200 Albufeira, Faro
description: Treat yourself to a matchless vacation at the mesmerizing Pine Cliffs Hotel, a Luxury Collection Resort, Algarve in Albufeira. This iconic, 5-star cliff-top retreat is located above Portugal's famous beach, Praia da Falésia, and boasts stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean. With a Moorish influenced decor, our hotel's newly-renovated guest rooms teem with exquisite, indigenous details, plush beds and spa-inspired bathrooms. Each hotel room boasts a private balcony with views of Algarve's red cliffs overlooking the ocean or beautifully manicured gardens. Our resort's exceptional amenities include a 9- hole golf course, a tennis club, a revitalizing spa, 8 swimming pools, an up-to-date fitness center and a variety of fine dining options. Families love our fantastic kid's facilities including Porto Pirata, the biggest kids club in the region. Whether in Albufeira, Portugal for business or for pleasure, Pine Cliffs Hotel, a Luxury Collection Resort, Algarve wants to make your stay a flawless 5-star experience.Marriott

name: Penina Hotel & Golf Resort
address: Estrada Nacional 125, 8501-952 Portimão, Faro
description: Set within expansive, lush gardens, this 5-star resort in the Algarve is 5 km from Portimão and the city of Lagos. Penina Hotel & Golf Resort features a selection of sports and leisure facilities, including 3 golf courses and a large outdoor swimming pool. The rooms at Penina Hotel & Golf Resort are filled with natural light and have plush beds with white linens. Some open onto balconies and feature seating areas. Many overlook the pool area. Leisure amenities include massage treatments, a sauna, a well-equipped fitness centre, 5 on site tennis courts. For younger guests, Penina Hotel & Golf Resort features a Children's Club, which offers weekly programmes with a selection of leisure and sporting activities. There are 5 restaurants available, which serve a range of Portuguese, Italian and international cuisine. Children’s menus and themed evenings are offered. The 4 on site bars provide light snacks and cocktails. Free parking is offered at the hotel. Alvor Beach and Continente Shopping Centre are both a 5-minute drive away from the Penina Hotel & Golf Resort.

name: Hotel Azur Premium
address: Erkel Ferenc U. 2/d, Siófok 8600
description: The 5-star Hotel Azur Premium in Siófok offers a private beach on Lake Balaton and a large wellness centre with an indoor pool, hot tub, sauna and panoramic views of the lake. Its stylish rooms all have a balcony. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Air conditioning and flat-screen cable TV are standard room facilities. Decorated in terracotta colours, every room comes with a minibar, bathrobes and toiletries. Some rooms also enjoy direct views of Lake Balaton and the Tihany Peninsula. With 1,800 m², the wellness centre offers a great range of spa facilities including an infrared cabin and 3 Finnish saunas. The services of the beauty centre and massage rooms are available for a surcharge. Premium Azur also has an outdoor pool and sun terrace where you can relax in the summer. Hungarian and international dishes are served at the restaurant. At the wine bar guests can taste the quality wines of the local wine cellars. Hotel Azur Premium also features a garden and a playground for children. There is a free fitness centre on site, while billiards and bowling can be enjoyed for an additional fee. Siófok Train Station is 1.3 km away.

name: Residence Hotel Balaton
address: Erkel Ferenc Street 49, Siófok
description: Residence Hotel Balaton is located in quiet surroundings, featuring a private beach with a snack and cocktail bar only 150 metres away and its spa area. Free WiFi access is available in all areas. The air-conditioned rooms come with a satellite TV. The bathroom is fitted with a shower and a hairdryer. The restaurant of the Residence Hotel Balaton offers fine Hungarian cuisine and international specialties and a rich buffet breakfast with lots of healthy options. The wellness area comprises a free indoor pool, sauna and hot tub, while massage services are available for a surcharge.

name: Hotel Azur Siofok
address: Erkel Ferenc Utca 2/c, Siófok 8600
description: Boasting a free private sandy beach as well as a free wellness centre with 2 pools, a hot tub and a sauna, Hotel Azur Siofok is located in Siófok, on the shore of Lake Balaton. Free WiFi access is available in all areas. The air-conditioned rooms provide a seating area. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Hotel Azur Siofok also features an on-site restaurant, while guests can also have a drink at the bar. You can relax in the garden or on the sun terrace, or do exercise in the fitness centre. A children’s playground is also located on the premises, while bowling and billiards are available for a surcharge. Meeting and banquet facilities can be arranged for an additional fee. The property also provides bike rental and free luggage storage, while staff at the 24-hour reception can help with tour planning. Siófok Train Station is set 1 km from Hotel Azur Siofok.

name: Mala Garden Design Hotel
address: Petöfi Sétány 15/A., Siófok 8600
description: Designed in Bali Island-style, the 4-star superior Mala Garden Design Hotel is situated directly on the shore of Lake Balaton in Siófok. It offers a restaurant with Hungarian, Thai and vegetarian cuisine and free WiFi. The spa area features a hot tub, a Finnish sauna, an infrared sauna, a tropical shower and Thai massages. All rooms at Mala Garden Design Hotel are air-conditioned and are decorated with warm colours, hardwood floors and comfortable, large beds. The Mandara Modern Italian Kitchen offers home-made pastries, cocktails and hot dishes, as well as a lake-side terrace. Guests can rent bicycles, windsurfing and swimming in Lake Balaton or relax on the private sun terrace above the water. The hotel provides parking in a secured parking area, available on request and for a surcharge.

name: Hotel Club Tihany
address: Rev u.3., Tihany 8237
description: Located on the shore of Lake Balaton, Hotel Club Tihany offers thermal pools and a large sports centre. The rooms are equipped with a minibar, satellite TV and hairdryers. Club Tihany provides a spa area including an indoor pool, a pool with massage jets and a waterfall and an outdoor children’s pool. Guests can relax in the hotel’s sauna or steam bath. Massages and beauty treatments are also offered. Set within a nature park reserve, Hotel Tihany features a water sport facility for surfing or sailing from May till September, as well as a sports centre for tennis or minigolf, among others. Guests can also go kite surfing, kayaking or bowling. A restaurant with international and Hungarian cuisine and a bar are on site. In Summer, a beach side restaurant and a pool bar are also available. The Royal Balaton Golf Club can be reached within 8 km.

name: Hunguest Hotel Bal Resort
address: Bajcsy-Zsilinszky Street 14, Balatonalmádi 8220
description: The Hunguest Hotel Bál Resort in Balatonalmádi offers panoramic views over Lake Balaton and a modern spa centre with a large indoor pool. Free WiFi is available. All rooms at the Hunguest Hotel Bál Resort are air-conditioned and feature a satellite TV with pay TV channels and a minibar. description: On the white sands of Taperapuã Beach, this resort is surrounded by rich gardens and offers a large pool. It provides a tennis court, gym and sauna, plus free WiFi and a panoramic restaurant. Featuring a patio with garden views, the 5-star rooms in this Villagio resort are air-conditioned and include a modern bathroom. They offer a TV with cable channels, telephone, safe and minibar. Other services and facilities offered in front of the hotel at our Terrazzo Al Mare Beach Eco Club include an All-Inclusive service, and live music. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and on-site parking is free. Toa-Toa Bar is 1 km from Resort Villaggio Arcobaleno, while Memorial of Discovery is 5 km away. Porto Seguro historical centre and Porto Seguro Airport are 6 km from Resort Villaggio Arcobaleno.

name: Manary Praia Hotel
address: Rua Francisco Gurgel, 9067, Natal 59090-050
description: Rising on the sands of the beautiful Ponta Negra Beach, the Manary Praia Hotel invites you to have a restful time in its spacious rooms and on the hammocks found on their balconies. The building has a neocolonial-style architecture and offers several leisure options, such as swimming pools for adults and children. All comfortable rooms of Manary Praia are air conditioned, fitted with a balcony, cable TV and a minibar. From some room categories, you will be able to admire a view of the beach and as an extra, free toiletries are provided. The Manary Hotel also provides a poolside bar and restaurant with beautiful sea views, as well as room service during limited hours. It is only 2 km to reach Morro do Careca and within a 300 metres radio guests will find several shops, restaurants and bars. To get to the airport, guests will take more or less one hour by car, since it is 34 km away.

name: Hotel La Foret & Beach Club
address: Rua 11 Quadra G Lotes 39 East 40, Búzios
description: Located 400 metres from Joao Fernandes Beach, Hotel La Forêt & Beach Club features 2 swimming pools and a pool bar. Guests also enjoy access to an exclusive beach leisure area at Club La Plage, 400 metres away. Each room is air-conditioned. Accommodation at Hotel La Forêt & Beach Club includes a private bathroom and a balcony with a hammock. The hotel’s tour desk can offer advice on excursions. Guests can enjoy a sauna or a massage session at Club La Plage´s spa. The club features a submerged bar, a fitness area, a beauty parlour and a beachfront restaurant with a variety of dishes. Breakfast is offered at La Foret’s restaurant. The hotel’s pool bar serves drinks and snacks.

name: Porto Pacuiba Hotel Ilhabela
address: Avenida Leonardo Reale 2392, Ilhabela
description: Situated in beautiful Ilhabela, on Praia do Viana, Porto Pacuíba was recently renovated and offers spacious accommodation. Guests can enjoy on-site amenities, which include an indoor pool, a heated outdoor pool with a wet bar, three Japanese hot tubs for adults and a children's hot tub, a deck with panoramic ocean views, and free parking. Rooms at Porto Pacuíba Hotel feature silent air conditioning and a Smart LCD satellite TV with over 90 TV channels, music and Netflix. Some accommodations also feature a hot tub and a balcony with a private hammock overlooking the sea or garden. Run by Chef Lucas Figueiredo, the Portofino Restaurant has an international menu with a hint of local cuisine. Guests can also enjoy the breakfast buffet, which includes more than 50 options of homemade cakes, jams and cheeses. You can also relax by the pool with a drink from the hotel bar, enjoy a revitalizing massage at the spa and use the sauna. For your convenience, free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.
